-----title
濮阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='dc772ae6061a4ea7aa80d0d0bcf6ca1d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("dc772ae6061a4ea7aa80d0d0bcf6ca1d");'><span id='dc772ae6061a4ea7aa80d0d0bcf6ca1d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=977&endYear=978')">977-978年</a>，24-25岁</div><div id='dc772ae6061a4ea7aa80d0d0bcf6ca1d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=977&endYear=977')">977年</a>　王禹偁始在濮水与张咏结交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=977&endYear=977')">977年</a>　王禹偁在濮阳被邀参加部分新进士宴会。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=977&endYear=977')">977年</a>　是年或明年，诗人田告东游过濮州，止王禹偁舍，禹称贻书勉进其道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=978&endYear=978')">978年</a>　在濮州。<br /></div>

-----title
开封
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1fd8126f69454c38bbfc2f8f40f9cbeb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1fd8126f69454c38bbfc2f8f40f9cbeb");'><span id='1fd8126f69454c38bbfc2f8f40f9cbeb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=979&endYear=980')">979-980年</a>，26-27岁</div><div id='1fd8126f69454c38bbfc2f8f40f9cbeb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=979&endYear=979')">979年</a>　是年冬，王禹偁来汴京，投书宋白以求见知。作品：《投宋拾遗书》<div id='poem_1148401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148401?labeling=true' target='_blank'>投宋拾遗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（979年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148401")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148401'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148401'>十一月二十日，乡贡进士王某谨斋庄沐浴，裁书百拜于拾遗执事：某尝谓书契以来，以文垂教者，首曰孔孟之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148401_comment'></div>始否而终泰，则孟不足侔于孔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148401_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148401_comment'></div>夫子连聘七十国而无尺土之位，则否于始也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148401_comment'></div>洎祖述尧舜，宪章文武，张三纲之目，提五常之领，制礼以检人迹，作乐以和人心，恢刑政以救人失，崇祭祀以介人福，使后之为君者、为臣者、为父者、为子者，不可斯须而离也，则泰于终也又明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148401_comment'></div>孟子生不享其位，死不行其教，所著书亦在世之空文尔，孰学而行之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148401_comment'></div>唯皮子请以孟氏为学科，属唐祚将终，弃而不用，可痛惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148401_comment'></div>孟轲氏没，扬雄氏作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148401_comment'></div>时哀、平失道，贤、莽用权，子云以穷愁著书，始务脱祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148401_comment'></div>故作《太玄》准《周易》，《法言》准《论语》，微机深旨，世人鲜知，能师而受者，止一侯芭而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148401_comment'></div>方之孟氏，季孟间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148401_comment'></div>扬雄氏丧，文中子生，知隋运将终，圣道来跻，退居河、汾间，修先王之业，九年而成《王氏六经》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148401_comment'></div>门弟子有若钜鹿魏徵、河南房玄龄、京兆杜如晦，咸北面师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148401_comment'></div>隋文中子迹逝矣，门弟子归于唐，尽出先师之道以弼于文皇，故能立贞观之业，垂三百年，传十八叶，夫岂非王氏教之效欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148401_comment'></div>谓隋之夫子焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148401_comment'></div>虽劣于仲尼而复优于孟、扬又明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148401_comment'></div>文中子灭，昌黎文公出，师戴圣人之道，述作圣人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148401_comment'></div>从而学者，有若赵郡李翱、江夏黄颇、安定皇甫湜，固其徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148401_comment'></div>然位不足以行其道，时不足以振其教，故不能复贞观之风矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148401_comment'></div>独以词旨幽远，规正人伦，亦曰唐之夫子焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148401_comment'></div>下韩氏二百年，世非无其文章，罕能聚徒众于门，张圣贤之道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148401_comment'></div>其或者复授于明公乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148401_comment'></div>明公履孔、孟、扬雄之业，振仲淹、退之之辞，矧天与其时，身得厥位，则追还唐风，不为难焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148401_comment'></div>然登明公之门、师明公之道者甚未众，止闻胡、田二君矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148401_comment'></div>岂明公道高德深之所隔也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148401_comment'></div>而诲人诱善之未至耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148401_comment'></div>某又闻：不伤胎卵之命，则麟凤见矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148401_comment'></div>不弃死马之骨，则千里之驹来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148401_comment'></div>明公方欲张姬、孔之道，聚游、夏之风，盍以某为首？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148401_comment'></div>则贤于某者，不远千里而至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148401_comment'></div>贤既至，则明公之道得不光明乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148401_comment'></div>道之光明也，则明公得不为宋之夫子乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148401_comment'></div>得不为文之大柄乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148401_comment'></div>顷者明公之典宋、鲁也，某尝策杖辞亲，揭厉行潦，编文著书，求明公之顾，一接威重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148401_comment'></div>属明公有泰山之祷，某以晨羞阙贡，旅火是逼，不果志业，彷徨而归居鲁西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148401_comment'></div>二年间贫病相绊，乞衣假食，以给切累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148401_comment'></div>勉强为文，皆有悲愁寒冻之意，不知他人之见者，悯乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148401_comment'></div>咎乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148401_comment'></div>周乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148401_comment'></div>舍乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148401_comment'></div>但以砚席旧交，变化殆尽，故里眦睚，以为不才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148401_comment'></div>今年春始敢囊琴笈文，来诣辇毂，登明公之门以求誉，师明公之道以进身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148401_comment'></div>未知明公按剑而拒之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148401_comment'></div>解榻而延之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148401_comment'></div>向所谓以某为首，则贤于某者不远千里而来矣，其在今日哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148401_comment'></div>且某辍旨甘之具，为桂玉之费，久留阙下，则身与亲冻馁俱至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148401_comment'></div>进之退之，俟明公命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1148401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148401'><span class='label'>按：</span>《圣宋文选》卷七，影印文渊阁四库全书本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1148401_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=980&endYear=980')">980年</a>　是年，王禹偁省试登甲科，殿试落选。作品：省试《三杰佐汉孰优论》<div id='poem_1148465' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148465' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148465?labeling=true' target='_blank'>省试三杰佐汉孰优论<span class='inlineComment2'>（太平兴国五年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（980年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148465")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148465_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148465'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148465'>夫百姓不能自治，命圣人以治之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148465_comment'></div>圣人不能独治，生贤臣以佐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148465_comment'></div>粤自有天地，建国家，历代已来，固非贤而不乂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148465_comment'></div>在昔嬴氏之有天下也，蚕食六国，虎噬兆民，君政猛于豺狼，人命轻于草芥，役五岭之戍，起阿房之宫，坑儒学之徒，惑神仙之事，筑城北塞，鞭石东溟，苍生嗷嗷，上诉求主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148465_comment'></div>天命高祖，革秦之暴，纂尧之绪，斩蛇于大泽，逐鹿于中原，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148465", 1148465, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>云飞</span>丰沛之间，雷动崤函之地，将欲洗万人之涂炭，救六合之分崩，乃生三杰以佐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148465_comment'></div>则有应炎汉之运，储昴宿之精，举不失贤，动无遗策，供转输于千里，约法令于三章，收图籍之书，令府库之利，使诸侯同反掌，定万国如走丸，此酂侯为一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148465_comment'></div>则有继韩国之裔，受黄公之书，解纷陈八难之諆，运筹决千里之胜，掉三寸舌，蔚为帝者之师，封万户侯，自是布衣之极，此留侯为二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148465_comment'></div>次乃勇冠三军，功深百战，下强齐如拾芥，虏叛魏如摧枯，七十阵征伐之劳光乎史策，四百年兴隆之祚垂之古今，此淮阴为三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148465_comment'></div>故高祖尝曰：「此皆人之杰也，吾能用之，奋布衣而取天下，未为艰哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148465_comment'></div>然则汉犹鼎也，三杰为足以负之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148465_comment'></div>汉犹天也，三杰为辰以烛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148465_comment'></div>鼎去一足则有欹倾之虞，天阙一辰则失经躔之度，汉亏一杰则无霸王之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148465_comment'></div>岂非天之道启圣哲，救黎元，灭乱秦，殄强楚，而兴大汉哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148465_comment'></div>不然，何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148465", 1148465, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>龙虎风云</span>会合之若是邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148465_comment'></div>噫，辅弼则同，优劣斯异，故谓「韩信之功如猎犬，虽云有获，盖指踪在乎人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148465_comment'></div>如是，则萧、张，人之功也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148465_comment'></div>韩信，犬之劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148465_comment'></div>优劣之义，不其明乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148465_comment'></div>其或得名遂之道，其在子房乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148465_comment'></div>故萧公受絷，韩信受戮，虽成功于前，终贻戚于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148465_comment'></div>未若定储君之计，从赤松而游，远害全身，垂名于万世者，不为优哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1148465_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=980&endYear=980')">980年</a>　郝太冲来京预礼部试，忿而不就，王禹偁赠序。作品：《送进士郝太冲序》<div id='poem_1148424' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148424' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148424?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送进士郝太冲序</a><span class='authorDate'>（980年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148424")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148424_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148424'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148424'>大邺郝生，好刚有文，立性不羁，耻屑屑为儒者行，凡议一事，吐一辞，未始不以皇王帝霸之道为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148424_comment'></div>洎求名进身，则默而处，讷而言，盖恶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148424", 1148424, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>趋附</span>而好<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148424", 1148424, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>耿直</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148424_comment'></div>去年秋，乡老竞荐，俛而从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148424_comment'></div>笈文远来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148424_comment'></div>会我阙下，彻盖一揖，交分如故，且嬉且游，昏旭累百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148424_comment'></div>五年春三月，帝旨下有司，校群士之艺，预其试者八百人，缝掖之衣雪晃贡部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148424_comment'></div>生因叹而言曰：「大丈夫处世当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148424", 1148424, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>拔立</span>群萃，求明天子之知，恶能与阘茸辈丛试于礼闱哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148424_comment'></div>掷毫裂笺，忿而不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148424_comment'></div>王公大人为之兴叹，况同侪乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148424_comment'></div>洎予受知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148424", 1148424, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>春卿</span>，荐以甲科，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148424", 1148424, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>喧喧</span>我名，雷奋人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148424_comment'></div>廷试不利，前功并遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148424_comment'></div>茫茫九衢，尘土相困，愤气一吐，高于虹蜺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148424_comment'></div>追乎郝生，有先见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148424_comment'></div>然我朝甚明，我志俱壮，誓雪前耻，庸何恨哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148424_comment'></div>夫如是，偶负小屈，岂能芥蒂吾辈之心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148424_comment'></div>毒飙扇空，炉焰天地，告我行迈，宁亲北堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148424_comment'></div>省台草平，漳水波冷，游赏之兴，不知暑天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148424_comment'></div>俟乎凉风再鸣，寒露其零，期我乎上京，邀我乎紫庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148424_comment'></div>囊策袖书，款于帝扃，高吐三千言，直上九万里，未为难哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148424_comment'></div>前所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148424", 1148424, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>拔立</span>群萃，求明天子知者，岂空言也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148424_comment'></div>小别不足为念，长揖而请行乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148424_comment'></div>郝生无背盟约。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1148424_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='919bacb7010f4c088232ec4633a4d810_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("919bacb7010f4c088232ec4633a4d810");'><span id='919bacb7010f4c088232ec4633a4d810_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=983')">983年</a>，30岁</div><div id='919bacb7010f4c088232ec4633a4d810' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>王禹偁举进士时，馆于著作郎臧丙家。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>中书舍人、权知贡举宋白等上所试合格奏名进士王禹偁以下若干人。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>省试第一人。作品：《四科取士何先论》<div id='poem_1148466' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148466' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148466?labeling=true' target='_blank'>省试四科取士何先论<span class='inlineComment2'>（太平兴国八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（983年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148466")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148466_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148466'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148466'>昔仲尼以周道下衰，儒风不竞，痛九畴之攸斁，疾四维之不张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148466_comment'></div>位屈陪臣，制作之功曷著？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148466_comment'></div>地无尺土，帝皇之业何施？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148466_comment'></div>祖述尧舜之心，宪章文武之道，历聘者七十国，授教者三千徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148466_comment'></div>于是设以四科，垂之万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148466_comment'></div>以为立身者莫若德，故德行以首之，则颜、闵、冉、仲其人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148466_comment'></div>表德者莫若言，故言语次之，则宰我、子贡其人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148466_comment'></div>化民者莫若政，故政事又次之，则冉有、季路其人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148466_comment'></div>经纬者莫若文，故文学又次之，则子游、子夏其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148466_comment'></div>用能作万古法，为百王师，使后之君天下者，凡欲取士，必先考德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148466_comment'></div>是以古者立乡里之选，采廉让之名，登于三庭，贡之天府者，斯之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148466_comment'></div>设若以言语取士，则不过善应对，专议论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148466_comment'></div>及其失也，则捷给纵横，辩说之流进矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148466_comment'></div>以政事取士，则不过守循良，明法度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148466_comment'></div>及其失也，则苛刻聚歛，刀笔之徒用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148466_comment'></div>以文学取士，则不过通古今，明纪述；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148466_comment'></div>及其失也，则浮华巧艳，谄谀之辞作矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148466_comment'></div>是知修其德，立其行者，则言语、政事、文学可以兼而有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148466_comment'></div>何以明之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148466_comment'></div>且先师曰：「吾与回言终日，其心如愚」，盖「夫人不言，言必有中」，则回之言语可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148466_comment'></div>又曰：「不迁怒，不贰过」，「其殆庶几乎」，则使回从政又可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148466_comment'></div>又曰：「闻一以知十」，「好学不倦」，「拳拳服膺」，则回之文学亦可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148466_comment'></div>由此观之，德行之于人，犹车之有轮，舟之有楫，不可斯须而离也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148466_comment'></div>是以善取士者，必能使师表一人，富寿百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148466_comment'></div>其为言也垂于后，其为政也利于时，其为文也归于理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148466_comment'></div>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148466", 1148466, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>离坚合异</span>以侈其言，不乱常变古以施其政，不寻章摘句以骋其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148466_comment'></div>赫乎功名，与天地共尽，则德行之效，不亦章章乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148466_comment'></div>方今酌古典，行帝道，执取士之柄，致得人之昌，文物声明，与古<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1148466", 1148466, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>争辔</span>，在乎厚德行而薄言语，卑政事而贱文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148466_comment'></div>非经邦论道、献可替否者，其言不取，则言语得其士矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148466_comment'></div>非化人利俗、致君寿民者，其政不用，则政事得其士矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148466_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148466", 1148466, "Clauses/106/Comments/1")'>经天纬地</span>、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148466", 1148466, "Clauses/106/Comments/2")'>通古达变</span>者，其文不贵，则文学得其士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148466_comment'></div>然后四科之名，总而归乎德，使天下三尺童子，知吾君好德之心，则取士之道，其在兹乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1148466_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>殿试中乙科进士。作品：《六合为家赋》《鹦啭上林诗》《文武双兴论》<br /></div><div class='label1' id='e09f2fd42c71455fba865c0c48cbda6a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e09f2fd42c71455fba865c0c48cbda6a");'><span id='e09f2fd42c71455fba865c0c48cbda6a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=991')">987-991年</a>，34-38岁</div><div id='e09f2fd42c71455fba865c0c48cbda6a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　冬间，王禹偁在开封，有记。作品：《待漏院记》<div id='poem_1148478' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148478' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148478?labeling=true' target='_blank'>待漏院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148478")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148478_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148478'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148478'>天道不言而品物亨、岁功成者，何谓也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148478_comment'></div>四时之吏，五行之佐，宣其气矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148478_comment'></div>圣人不言而百姓亲、万邦宁者，何谓也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148478_comment'></div>三公论道，六卿分职，张其教矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148478_comment'></div>是知君逸于上，臣劳于下，法乎天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148478_comment'></div>古之善相天下者，自咎、夔至房、魏可数也，是不独有其德，亦皆务于勤尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148478_comment'></div>况<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148478", 1148478, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>夙兴夜寐</span>，以事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148478", 1148478, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>一人</span>，卿大夫犹然，况宰相乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148478_comment'></div>朝廷自国初因旧制，设宰臣待漏院于丹凤门之右，示勤政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148478_comment'></div>至若北阙向曙，东方未明，相君启行，煌煌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148478", 1148478, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>火城</span>，相君至止，哕哕銮声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148478_comment'></div>金门未辟，玉漏犹滴，彻盖下车，于焉以息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148478_comment'></div>待漏之际，相君其有思乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148478_comment'></div>其或兆民未安，思所泰之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148478_comment'></div>四夷未附，思所来之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148478_comment'></div>兵革未息，何以弭之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148478_comment'></div>田畴多芜，何以辟之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148478_comment'></div>贤人在野，我将进之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148478_comment'></div>佞臣立朝，我将斥之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148478_comment'></div>六气不和，灾眚荐至，愿避位以禳之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148478_comment'></div>五刑未措，欺诈日生，请修德以釐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148478_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148478", 1148478, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>忧心忡忡</span>，待旦而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148478_comment'></div>九门既启，四聪甚迩，相君言焉，时君纳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148478_comment'></div>皇风于是乎清夷，苍生以之而富庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148478_comment'></div>若然，总百官，食万钱，非幸也，宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148478_comment'></div>其或私雠未复，思所逐之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148478_comment'></div>旧恩未报，思所荣之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148478_comment'></div>子女玉帛，何以致之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148478_comment'></div>车马器玩，何以取之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148478_comment'></div>奸人附势，我将陟之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148478_comment'></div>直士抗言，我将黜之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148478_comment'></div>三时告灾，上有忧色，搆巧词以悦之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148478_comment'></div>群吏弄法，君闻怨言，进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148478", 1148478, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>谄容</span>以媚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148478_comment'></div>私心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1148478", 1148478, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>慆慆</span>，假寐而坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148478_comment'></div>九门既开，重瞳屡回，相君言焉，时君惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148478_comment'></div>政柄于是乎隳哉，帝位以之而危矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148478_comment'></div>若然，则死下狱，投远方，非不幸也，亦宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148478_comment'></div>是知一国之政，万人之命，悬于宰相，可不慎欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148478_comment'></div>复有无毁无誉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1148478", 1148478, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>旅进旅退</span>，窃位而茍禄，备员而全身者，亦无所取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148478_comment'></div>棘寺小吏王某为文，请志院壁，用规于执政者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148478_comment'></div>年月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1148478_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年1月</a>　与罗处约应中书试，奏篇称旨。以大理评事王禹偁为右拾遗，罗处约为著作郎，并直史馆，赐绯衣。作品：《诏臣僚和御制贺雪诗序》<div id='poem_1148436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书试诏臣僚和御制雪诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148436")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148436'>雍熙纪号之四年冬十有二月，宝图大昌，岁律将暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148436_comment'></div>日穷次而月穷纪，方及送寒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148436_comment'></div>车同轨而书同文，咸归大化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148436_comment'></div>五行以之顺序，六气以之和平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148436_comment'></div>繁云翳空，密雪飘野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148436_comment'></div>至诚攸感，爰当大蜡之期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148436_comment'></div>上瑞斯呈，何止小康之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148436_comment'></div>其始也，阴风淅沥，微霰悠飏，散五谷之精华，润三农之畎亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148436_comment'></div>上林未暖而花发，禁柳不春而絮飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148436_comment'></div>星榆之叶下青冥，琪树之蕊飘沧海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148436_comment'></div>黠缀于五城双阙，飞翻于三市九衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148436_comment'></div>溟濛而远蔽耕坛，凌乱而光生御坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148436_comment'></div>天颜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148436", 1148436, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>兑悦</span>，临轩乍满于重瞳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148436_comment'></div>民心乂安，在野惟闻于鼓腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148436_comment'></div>则有天禄石渠之士，鸿笔丽藻之臣，睹是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148436", 1148436, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>休祥</span>，聿陈歌咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148436_comment'></div>《风》《雅》作矣，见王化之兴隆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148436_comment'></div>物情诱之，动诗人之藻思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148436_comment'></div>同称圣感，互达天聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148436_comment'></div>皇帝乐善忘疲，诲人无倦，诏令向所进者，咸可属而和之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148436_comment'></div>埙篪之韵相谐，黼黻之华交映。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148436_comment'></div>虞歌鲁颂，铿锵俱合于声诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148436_comment'></div>王后卢前，颖脱各呈于锋锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148436_comment'></div>赓歌既罢，睿览尤嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148436_comment'></div>于是宸眷曲回，王言焕发，示天心之善诱，降御制以作程，称赏良多，激劝斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148436_comment'></div>遂使四方文士不敢言诗，五榜门生咸思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148436", 1148436, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>阁笔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148436_comment'></div>夫如是，则周穆之咏《黄竹》，祇因阴沴而兴怀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148436_comment'></div>汉祖之歌《大风》，但以壮士而为念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148436_comment'></div>未若我六出之瑞，不愆伏于天时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148436_comment'></div>四始之兴，乃形容于盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148436_comment'></div>而又赐以圣作，耀乎人文，足可以播大宋之乐章，跻攀三代；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148436_comment'></div>表圣人之能事，糠秕百王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148436_comment'></div>且夫其言七，同七星之垂象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148436_comment'></div>其句八，同八音之治世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148436_comment'></div>其韵四，若四时之成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148436_comment'></div>有以见睿哲文思，不徒然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148436_comment'></div>宜乎编群彦之什，附一人之诗，焕此昌期，传为嘉集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148436_comment'></div>俾夫千古而下，六义孔昭，且知文物之大兴，君臣之相合也，不其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148436_comment'></div>臣稽古寡闻，效官无绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148436_comment'></div>尧廷擢第，虽有玷于科名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148436_comment'></div>吴郡字人，实久抛于笔砚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148436_comment'></div>序兹盛事，颇愧非才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148436_comment'></div>亦犹清庙有仪，必覆之以茅屋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148436_comment'></div>锦袍在御，或尚之以褧衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148436_comment'></div>幸获纪于文明，庶有光于贱吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148436_comment'></div>臣谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1148436_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年1月</a>　在京任右拾遗。有启呈宰相李昉。作品：《谢除右拾遗直史馆启》<div id='poem_1148387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除右拾遗直史馆启</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148387")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148387'>右某启：蒙恩特授前件官充职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148387_comment'></div>位列谏垣，职兼史氏，虽听已行之命，难逃非据之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148387_comment'></div>祗荷宠荣，不任感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148387_comment'></div>恭以献箴规于谏署，必待正人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148387_comment'></div>彰善恶于史书，宜归直笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148387_comment'></div>矧兹庸贱，遽有忝尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148387_comment'></div>伏念某门第本寒，才华不秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148387_comment'></div>乡庠里塾，从师而才识姓名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148387_comment'></div>画地书空，力学而稍通经史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148387_comment'></div>明代方求于翘楚，高堂渐逼于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148387", 1148387, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>垂榆</span>，因持滥吹之竽，来示藏家之帚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148387_comment'></div>虽春官与进，荐叨隗始之名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148387_comment'></div>而明主求人，果失卢前之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148387_comment'></div>然而紫庭擢第，白屋知荣，衡茅惹丹桂之香，布素曳出蓝之色，里闾改观，亲族生光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148387_comment'></div>洎邑佐弦歌，任移铜墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148387_comment'></div>廷评乃士官之属，不谓冗僚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148387_comment'></div>县事则诸侯之权，岂言下位？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148387_comment'></div>甘随常调，敢叹徒劳？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148387_comment'></div>固无易俗之能，惟待黜幽之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148387_comment'></div>岂期贱吏，误达宸聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148387_comment'></div>把篱畔之菊花，方多憔悴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148387_comment'></div>近阶前之蓂荚，顿觉光辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148387_comment'></div>而又召诣黄扉，显加明试，深虞固陋，有负品题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148387_comment'></div>序贺雪之诗，固多肤浅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148387_comment'></div>赋履冰之什，愈见荒唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148387_comment'></div>既有黩于宸严，讵敢期于天奖？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148387_comment'></div>方在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148387", 1148387, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>端忧</span>之际，忽惊非次之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148387_comment'></div>芝函乍降于人寰，棘寺骤归于谏署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148387_comment'></div>职兼馆殿，地极清华，通宵未息于征彸，诘旦遽谐于告谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148387_comment'></div>绿袍褫处，休贻碧鹳之讥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148387_comment'></div>朱绂纡来，但负维鹈之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148387_comment'></div>备忽忘而简横象齿，耀搢绅而带饰犀文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148387_comment'></div>荷王泽之沾濡，空惊浃背；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148387_comment'></div>对天颜之咫尺，惟誓杀身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148387_comment'></div>夫何寒贱之人，有此遭逢之事！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148387_comment'></div>此皆相公尼丘借峻，文曲生光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148387_comment'></div>数仞墙边，暗展铸颜之力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148387_comment'></div>如椽笔下，潜施<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1148387", 1148387, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>与点</span>之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148387_comment'></div>遂令清切之资，光被孤平之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148387_comment'></div>亦犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1148387", 1148387, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>洴澼</span>为事，遽邀列地之封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148387_comment'></div>鶢鶋呈灾，误享钧天之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148387_comment'></div>顾艺行之无取，荷生成之有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148387_comment'></div>得不慎守当官，恪供其职？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148387_comment'></div>况无遗之可拾，幸有瑞而必书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148387_comment'></div>编修出綍之言，垂于信史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148387_comment'></div>撰著得贤之颂，播在乐章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148387_comment'></div>少施<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1148387", 1148387, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>染削</span>之劳，上答受知之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148387_comment'></div>过此已往，未知所裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1148387_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年1月</a>　在京任右拾遗。太宗于东郊飨神农氏坛，以后稷氏配，遂耕籍田，大赦，改元端拱，赋东郊籍田五七言诗各一首赐侍臣，禹称亦撰成《籍田赋》<div id='poem_1148212' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148212' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148212?labeling=true' target='_blank'>籍田赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148212")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148212'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148212'>臣谨按：周制，孟春之月，天子亲载耒耜，躬耕籍田，所以事天地、山川、社稷、先王，醴酪粢盛，于是乎取之，恭之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148212_comment'></div>自周德下衰，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>礼文</span>残缺，故宣王之时，有虢公之谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148212_comment'></div>秦皇定霸，鲜克由礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148212_comment'></div>汉祖隆兴，日不暇给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148212_comment'></div>孝文、孝景，始复行焉，昭帝弄田，亦其义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148212_comment'></div>后汉永平中，明帝东巡，耕于怀县，非古制焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148212_comment'></div>魏氏亲耕，阙百官之礼，盖草创尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148212_comment'></div>晋武太始之年，略修坠典；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148212_comment'></div>宋文元嘉之代，亦举旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148212_comment'></div>齐用丁亥之辰，梁以建卯之月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148212_comment'></div>后魏、北齐，沿革有异；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148212_comment'></div>隋朝、唐室，文物可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148212_comment'></div>太宗行之于前，明皇继之于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148212_comment'></div>自兹已降，废而不行，将焕先农，必待真主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148212_comment'></div>皇家享国三十载，陛下嗣统十四年，武功以成，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>文理</span>以定，乃下明诏，耕于东郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148212_comment'></div>百职悦随，三农知劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148212_comment'></div>礼官、博士，蹈舞而草仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148212_comment'></div>甸师、啬夫，歌咏而供职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148212_comment'></div>右拾遗直史馆王禹偁再拜而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>飏言</span>曰：耕籍之义大矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148212_comment'></div>千亩之田，三推之礼，所以教诸侯而事上帝，率人力而成岁功，实邦国之彝章，皇王之大典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148212_comment'></div>昔潘安仁赋之于晋，岑文本颂之于唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148212_comment'></div>今王道行矣，王籍修矣，神功帝业，焕其有光，宜畅颂声，以播乐府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148212_comment'></div>谨上《籍田赋》一章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148212_comment'></div>虽不足形容盛德，亦小臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>勤拳</span>之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148212_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1148212'>十四年兮，帝业<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>遐宣</span>，寰区晏然，乃顺考于古道，将躬耕乎籍田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148212_comment'></div>务本劝农，稽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>前文</span>而备矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148212_comment'></div>事神教养，举坠典以行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148212_comment'></div>万国欢心而怿怿，百官供职以虔虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148212_comment'></div>草仪注于有司，议沿革于遗编，筑坛墠之四陛，开阡陌之百廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148212_comment'></div>文物声明，合礼经而有度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148212_comment'></div>旌旗衣服，应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>方色</span>而不愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148212_comment'></div>既而届孟春，择元日，太史先奏，天子将出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148212_comment'></div>是月也，遒人徇路，星鸟中律，当东郊之迎春，是东作之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>平秩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148212_comment'></div>皇帝于是即斋宫，辞帝室，戒钖鸾，严警跸，乘青辂以有威，俨朱纮而无逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148212_comment'></div>佩乎玉也，悬黎之色苍苍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148212_comment'></div>载其旂焉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>干吕</span>之云郁郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148212_comment'></div>属车负播殖之器，后宫献穜稑之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148212_comment'></div>红縻黛耜，服葱犗以陆离；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148212_comment'></div>缥轭绀辕，驾苍龙而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>飘歘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148212_comment'></div>太常之礼具举，司农之属各率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148212_comment'></div>甸师掌舍，警御陌以惟严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148212_comment'></div>封人野庐，设<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>壝宫</span>而靡失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148212_comment'></div>于国之东，千官景从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148212_comment'></div>风清尘而习习，雨洒道以濛濛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148212_comment'></div>时也，木德盛，阳气充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148212_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>春芒</span>甲拆，青青兮葱葱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148212_comment'></div>春土脉起，油油而溶溶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148212_comment'></div>冠盖蔽野，佩环咽风，状浮云兮随应龙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148212_comment'></div>旂帜张日，车徒塞空，若众星兮环紫宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148212_comment'></div>修农事以惕惕，袭春服之重重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148212_comment'></div>尔乃配少皞，祠先农，尸祝无愧，豆笾以供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148212_comment'></div>太牢之牲荐之而肥腯，太簇之乐奏之而舂容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148212_comment'></div>于是修帝籍，劳圣躬，抚御耦以无怠，履<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/154/Comments/0")'>游场</span>而有踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148212_comment'></div>将循乎千亩之制，岂止乎数步之中！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148212_comment'></div>耕钩盾之弄田，但矜儿戏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148212_comment'></div>脩建康之春籍，未焕农功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148212_comment'></div>有以见万乘之尊，三推而舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148212_comment'></div>或五或九，隆杀之义有伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148212_comment'></div>尔公尔侯，贵贱之班相亚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148212_comment'></div>啬夫洒种以斯毕，庶人终亩而告罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148212_comment'></div>千耦其耕，焕乎礼成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148212_comment'></div>播百谷兮率人力，歌《载芟》兮扬颂声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148212_comment'></div>将见乎馀粮栖亩，腐粟如京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148212_comment'></div>神仓令纳乎黍稷，以备粢盛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148212_comment'></div>廪牺氏收其藁秸，用饷牺牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148212_comment'></div>亲畎亩兮化被，重人天而教行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148212_comment'></div>自得训农之实，非贪慕古之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148212_comment'></div>然后下青坛，归绛阙，百姓知劝，群后咸谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148212_comment'></div>在镐之宴启，歌虞之音发，献万寿兮欢呼，奏九《韶》兮铿越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148212_comment'></div>开三面以行惠，宥五刑而慎罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148212_comment'></div>恩流于孝弟力田，德被于雕题<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/194/Comments/0")'>辫发</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148212_comment'></div>兴五上之利，固必躬而必亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148212_comment'></div>同三代之风，复不矜而不伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148212_comment'></div>大矣哉，籍田之礼，岂三年而不为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148212_comment'></div>躬耕之义，将百代而可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148212_comment'></div>我所以举久废之礼，定不刊之仪，虑弗勤于四体，将有害于三时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148212_comment'></div>务农桑兮为政本，兴礼节兮崇教资，民乃力穑，岁无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1148212", 1148212, "Clauses/211/Comments/0")'>阻饥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148212_comment'></div>神农斲木之功，我其申矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148212_comment'></div>后稷播时之利，我得兼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148212_comment'></div>供秬鬯以斯在，介丰年而有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148212_comment'></div>丕显事天之礼，诞歌祈社之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148212_comment'></div>祀山川兮神鉴明矣，配祖考兮德馨远而！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148212_comment'></div>永锡纯嘏，用光孝思，乃作颂曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_82_1148212'>倬彼东郊，公田是辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148212_comment'></div>大君戾止，言耕其籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148212_comment'></div>帝籍既脩，乃及公侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148212_comment'></div>亲尔耒耜，勤尔田畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148212_comment'></div>言采黍稷，祀于圆丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148212_comment'></div>亿万斯年，以承天休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1148212_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_88_1148212'>又曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_88_1148212'>倬彼东郊，耕坛其崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1148212_comment'></div>大君戾止，言训其农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1148212_comment'></div>农功既勖，乃知荣辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1148212_comment'></div>尔家以给，尔人以足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1148212_comment'></div>言奉烝尝，遍于比屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1148212_comment'></div>亿万斯年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1148212_comment'></div>以介景福<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_94_1148212_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148212'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_94_1148212_0'>⑴ 《小畜集》卷一，四部丛刊初编二次印本。又见《皇朝文鉴》卷一，《圣宋文海》卷四，《古今图书集成》礼仪典卷三○二。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1148212_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年11月</a>　在京任右拾遗。有序送友人。作品：《送荣礼丞赴宋都序》<div id='poem_1148433' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148433' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148433?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送荣礼丞赴宋都序</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148433")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148433_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148433'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148433'>雁池，国东之巨屏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148433_comment'></div>天启我祖，封于商丘，玄德升闻，乃受周禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148433_comment'></div>既建大号，斯为名藩，必求亲贤，用锡茅土，重始封也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148433_comment'></div>今上嗣统以来，或以儒官承其乏，系于才而不系于位矣，故朝之能臣，相望前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148433_comment'></div>盖孟诸，域中之大薮，征赋寔繁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148433_comment'></div>汴流，天下之通津，漕运斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148433_comment'></div>不有馀刃，孰能釐之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148433_comment'></div>端拱元祀春二月，诏以曲台丞荣公出莅于宋，旌汶阳之善政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148433_comment'></div>公之文行门地，吾侪仰之，吾君知之，是以五榜之中，擢进士第者有四人焉，父子兄弟灿乎士林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148433_comment'></div>昔杜正伦一家三秀，当时犹称为盛，方我茂族，不其远哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148433_comment'></div>是行也，宋居其泰乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148433_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148433", 1148433, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>青门</span>晓晴，皇华启行，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148433", 1148433, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>隋岸</span>柳翠，浚郊草平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148433_comment'></div>騑騑之四牡，别峨峨之五城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148433_comment'></div>抚临近辅，利泽编氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148433_comment'></div>君之望也，公之职也，可不勉哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1148433_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年</a>　在京任右拾遗。太宗下诏求直言，禹称于是年夏季献《端拱箴》一篇，以寓规讽。<div id='poem_1148494' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148494' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148494?labeling=true' target='_blank'>端拱箴</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148494")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148494_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148494'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148494'>天生蒸民，树之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148494", 1148494, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>司牧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148494_comment'></div>开物成务，膺图授箓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148494_comment'></div>为君实难，惟辟作福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148494_comment'></div>在以欲而从人，不以人而从欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148494_comment'></div>位既尊大，时惟开泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148494_comment'></div>渐忘焦劳，或生懈怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148494_comment'></div>乃有谏诤，乃陈箴诫，箴诫惟艰，斥君之过；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148494_comment'></div>谏诤惟艰，救君之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148494_comment'></div>君或好谏，臣亦何患？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148494_comment'></div>臣或尽忠，君何不从？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148494_comment'></div>君臣之义，今古攸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148494_comment'></div>普天之下，人谁不宾？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148494_comment'></div>如父如母，为妾为臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148494_comment'></div>虐之则雠，抚之则亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148494_comment'></div>是以王者，可畏非民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148494_comment'></div>率土之宾，物何不足？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148494_comment'></div>乃犀乃贝，惟珠惟玉，寒不被体，馁不充腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148494_comment'></div>是以圣人，所宝惟谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148494_comment'></div>无侈乘舆，无奢宫宇，当念贫民，室无环堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148494_comment'></div>无崇台榭，无广陂池，当念流民，地无立锥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148494_comment'></div>御服煌煌，有采有章，一裘之费，百家衣裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148494_comment'></div>御膳郁郁，有粱有肉，一食之用，千人口腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148494_comment'></div>勿谓丰财，经费不节，须知府库，聚民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1148494", 1148494, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>膏血</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148494_comment'></div>勿谓强兵，征伐不息，须知干戈，害民稼穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148494_comment'></div>赏罚者国之大柄，喜怒者人之常情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148494_comment'></div>赏虽由己，勿因喜而行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148494_comment'></div>罚虽在我，勿因怒而刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148494_comment'></div>喜赏或滥，亏损天鉴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148494_comment'></div>怒刑不正，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1148494", 1148494, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>枉屈</span>人命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148494_comment'></div>大臣元老，经邦论道，裨补<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1148494", 1148494, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>聪明</span>，于何不照？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148494_comment'></div>乐成、尹寿，所以为其师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148494_comment'></div>小臣阉官，执巾沃盥，干议政事，于何不乱？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148494_comment'></div>竖刁、易牙，所以败其邦家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148494_comment'></div>孰为君子？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148494_comment'></div>先人后己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148494_comment'></div>信而用之，斯为至理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148494_comment'></div>孰为小人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148494_comment'></div>害物谋身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148494_comment'></div>察而斥之，斯为至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148494_comment'></div>无好人辩，或有虚诞，喋喋之言，侈而多讪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148494_comment'></div>无恶人讷，或有淳质，期期之口，直而不屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148494_comment'></div>浮图之教，乃戎乃蕃，汉明之际，始入中原，行之既久，存而勿论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148494_comment'></div>匈奴之种，无义无仁，秦皇之后，常苦边尘，御之以道，疏而勿亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148494_comment'></div>计口授田，兼并何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148494_comment'></div>是谓仁政，及于黔首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148494_comment'></div>约人署吏，侵渔则少，是谓能官，惠于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1148494", 1148494, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>无告</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148494_comment'></div>父天母地，日兄月姊，乃郊乃禋，劝其孝悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148494_comment'></div>左辅右弼，前疑后丞，一举一动，戒其骄矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148494_comment'></div>罔或明察，政体用伤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148494_comment'></div>罔或弛紊，国经不张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148494_comment'></div>行乎大中之道，渐乎无何之乡，游神乎简易之域，息虑乎清净之场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148494_comment'></div>斯则妙有，垂之无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148494_comment'></div>谁谓古道，背而不还？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148494_comment'></div>君或行之，是亦非艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148494_comment'></div>谁谓淳风，去而不返？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148494_comment'></div>君或继之，是亦何远！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148494_comment'></div>慎始则多，克终盖鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148494_comment'></div>朽索当手，覆车在眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148494_comment'></div>庸庸祗祗，兢兢战战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148494_comment'></div>小臣司箴，敢告旒冕。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1148494'></div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1148494_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年</a>　在京任右拾遗。太宗下诏求直言，禹称于是年夏季献《端拱箴》一篇，并有进表。作品：《进端拱箴表》<div id='poem_1148290' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148290' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148290?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进端拱箴表</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148290")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148290_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148290'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148290'>臣某言：臣闻宣尼立教，陈五谏以训民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148290_comment'></div>天子设官，命七人而庭诤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148290_comment'></div>欲嘉言之罔伏，致盛德之日新<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148290_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，志在任贤，动必师古，大开言路，精择谏臣，改拾遗、补阙之名，设司谏、正言之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148290_comment'></div>必须端士，方称<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148290", 1148290, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>美官</span>，臣且何人，亦当此任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148290_comment'></div>三月中，伏奉明诏，用训庶僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148290_comment'></div>于中两省之班行，有异百官之督责，必容謇谔，无取因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148290_comment'></div>是时臣方议迎亲，已谐告假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148290_comment'></div>陛下矜其贫乏，锡以缗钱，恩庥曲被于一家，用度有充于千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148290_comment'></div>况臣曾为县吏，每督民租，为尺布斗粟之逋，行灭耳鞭刑之法，因知府库，皆出生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148290_comment'></div>空有泪以感恩，惭无功而受赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148290_comment'></div>洎再趋象魏，时见冕旒，猥尘书殿之资，久蠹太官之膳，曾无绩效，空玷清华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148290_comment'></div>且官在谏垣，未尝有一言裨补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148290_comment'></div>职当史笔，未尝有一字<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148290", 1148290, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>刊修</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148290_comment'></div>《语》所谓「饱食终日，无所用心」者，臣之谓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148290_comment'></div>思欲举谏诤之职，言朝廷之事，则陛下圣德昭被，神功著明，四辅无私而秉大钧，百姓不知而归<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1148290", 1148290, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>至化</span>，君何事哉，臣何言哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148290_comment'></div>然而「安不忘危，理不忘乱」，「靡不有初，鲜克有终」，古圣贤之深旨也，故夏后有盘盂之铭，周王有几杖之诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148290_comment'></div>敢徵斯义，用导愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148290_comment'></div>臣又尝读唐史，见贞观中张蕴古上《大宝箴》，辞理切直，太宗深加称赏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148290_comment'></div>臣虽不才，愿继其美，谨昧死撰《端拱箴》一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148290_comment'></div>固不足裨益明圣万分之一，亦臣之举职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148290_comment'></div>随表诣东上閤门跪进以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148290_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣无任僭越待罪之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1148290_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年</a>　在京任右拾遗。秋，殿中丞王旦通判郑州，王禹偁送之以序。作品：《送王旦序》<div id='poem_1148410' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148410' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148410?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王旦序</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148410")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148410_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148410'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148410'>圣人籍千亩之岁，元老膺三入之命，王泽大赉，庙谟惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148410_comment'></div>有善必举，有恶必去，乃放郑侯，以肃京辅，有以见善人为邦，而不善者远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148410_comment'></div>言念圃田，择贤而治，用御暴横，是资循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148410_comment'></div>先诏侍御史范阳卢公牧而抚之，次命殿中丞郎邪王公通而理之，皆能哲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148410_comment'></div>王公即故夏官贰卿之子也，以雄文直气扬其父风，以儒学吏才张为国器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148410_comment'></div>是行也，所任虽小，而所委重矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148410_comment'></div>西门秋风，北阙行色，四牡夙驾，五马迎郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148410_comment'></div>朝僚知其得贤，郡人歌其来暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148410_comment'></div>右省谏官王某迹郑民之旨，为诗以送焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148410_comment'></div>辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1148410'>昔我郑邦，厥守不良，厥佐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148410", 1148410, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>吐刚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148410_comment'></div>吾相疾之，吾君窜之，我民用康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148410_comment'></div>今我郑封，其守惟公，其佐惟通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148410_comment'></div>吾相佥之，吾君命之，我民其丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148410_comment'></div>荥泽之兽，溱水之鱼，泳尔清流，毓尔丰刍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148410_comment'></div>不弋不网，与民同苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148410_comment'></div>匪我圣君，匪我相臣，暴曷去兮，贤曷举兮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148410_comment'></div>革我苦兮，为乐土兮！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1148410_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年10月</a>　在京任右拾遗。十月初，太宗分赐近臣御草书急就章，并朱邸旧集歌，王禹偁受赐一份，深以为荣。作品：《谢宣赐御草书急就章，并朱邸旧集歌》<div id='poem_75151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75151?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣赐御草书急就章并朱邸旧集歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75151")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75151'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75151'>臣闻伏羲画卦朴且淳，苍颉造字初有文。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75151'>大篆小篆八分体，楷隶章草何纷纭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75151'>因兹八法各有要，遂使六艺区以分。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75151'>其中最难惟草圣，玄妙功夫自天性。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75151'>又闻关雎本王化，四始洋洋风化下。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75151'>比兴赋颂六义分，乃有变风兼变雅。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75151'>仲尼删后屈平作，郢客李陵斗名价。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75151'>古来诗道难得人，其唱弥高和弥寡。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75151'>如今草圣与雅言，尽在吾皇万机暇。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75151'>元年十月近乾明，崇文院静寒霜晴。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75151'>直庐日午雠书罢，闲曳朱衣绕砌行。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75151'>中使传宣来上界，忙把鱼须下阶拜。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75151'>宝函钿轴光陆离，御札文书御制诗。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75151'>折腰搢笏拭双目，汗流魄骇聊一窥。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75151'>急就章，何纵横，蓝田种玉苗初成。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75151'>雪花洒破烟岚壁，黑云漏出天汉星。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75151'>乍似鲛人泣下珠无数，错落晶荧满盘贮。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75151'>又似大鲸吞尽沧海波，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_75151", 75151, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>查牙</span>露出珊瑚树。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75151'>朱邸集，何清奇，仙风撼动琼林枝。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75151'>汉皇休道白云句，穆满虚吟黄竹诗。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75151'>乍似三春直上伯阳台，熙熙物华当眼开。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75151'>又似十洲夜伴王母宴，鸾歌凤吟次第来。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75151'>小臣再拜受一轴，捣纸抄诗抄<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作犹）</span>未足。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75151'>焚香朝向天日看，执简夜对星辰读。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75151'>臣见高宗飞帛亦有名，笔迹往往颁公卿。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75151'>所得不过三五字，当时臣子犹为荣。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75151'>又见玄宗诗什颇留意，吟咏时时成御制。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75151'>属和止于一两篇，至今史册犹为贵。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75151'>若徵往事比明时，万分之一徒尔为。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_75151'>未如我四十三纸圣人作，一百二章天子诗。<div id='poem_sentence_29_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75151'>永为家宝藏书箧，岂让西方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_75151", 75151, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>贝多叶</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_30_75151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_75151'>且教世世传子孙，长与皇家作臣妾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_75151_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年11月</a>　在京任右拾遗。有序赠别友人。作品：《赠别鲍秀才序》<div id='poem_1148432' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148432' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148432?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠别鲍秀才序</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148432")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148432_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148432'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148432'>皇家耕籍之岁，仆始自廷评擢补谏官，分直于太史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148432_comment'></div>越三月，以家寄江都，告假迎侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148432_comment'></div>亦既遂请，沿流而东，至止之日，会同年、光禄丞河东薛公昭，屈文学之才，职关市之税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148432_comment'></div>评文话旧，洽然得朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148432_comment'></div>公出文数十章，即进士鲍生之作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148432_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148432", 1148432, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>命题</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148432", 1148432, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>立意</span>，殆非常人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148432_comment'></div>其为学也，依道而据德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148432_comment'></div>其为才也，通古而达变；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148432_comment'></div>其为识也，利物而成务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148432_comment'></div>求之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148432", 1148432, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>广场</span>，未易多得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148432_comment'></div>仆固愿与之交，且贺薛之能知人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148432_comment'></div>翌日缝掖而来，光我衡荜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148432_comment'></div>风骨俊茂，言论闲雅，非风尘之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148432_comment'></div>徵其氏族，乃明远之裔耳，世以儒术为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148432_comment'></div>先君隶钱氏为陪臣，国小而才大，故功弗之立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148432_comment'></div>归朝终太仆丞，位卑而道屈，故庆及后昆，其有后于宋乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148432_comment'></div>不然，又安得富生以天才，遇生以昌运乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148432_comment'></div>先是，皇上即位已来，策试贡士必亲临之，是岁始委有司，宜如故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148432_comment'></div>上且曰：「予官人牧民十有四载，歇贡举取士者实五年，重以郡县至广，吏官多阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148432_comment'></div>刺史二千石绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148432", 1148432, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>辟命</span>之路，公卿大夫无资荫之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148432_comment'></div>虽九品下僚，一邑小吏，必由乡举而后进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148432_comment'></div>茍求备以取人，则其如庶官何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148432_comment'></div>是以四科之中，所尚文行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148432_comment'></div>三事之内，兼采言貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148432_comment'></div>或门阀沦坠者，继其绝以第之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148432_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148432", 1148432, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>场屋</span>衰晚者，哀其穷以与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148432_comment'></div>得人既多矣，补吏既足矣，是用釐革，复以典彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148432_comment'></div>凡今取才，必率英髦，所以慎名器而激风俗也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148432_comment'></div>天下寒俊，闻而乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148432_comment'></div>夫如是，生何患于穷乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148432_comment'></div>青紫之贵，可俯而拾之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148432_comment'></div>江梅堕枝，溪竹翻箨，困旅火以何适，縻王爵以言归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148432_comment'></div>广陵秋风，望子之随计；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148432_comment'></div>曲江春色，见子之必荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148432_comment'></div>其间勤道以自强，加餐以自爱，勿辜我名声之望尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148432_comment'></div>生勉之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1148432_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年</a>　在京任右拾遗。修成端拱元年春季《日历》，上书宰相、监修国史吕蒙正。作品：《上史馆吕相公书》<div id='poem_1148385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148385' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148385?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上史馆吕相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148385")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148385_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148385'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148385'>月日，右正言、直史馆王某谨斋戒拜书，有言于相公执事：某累日前，以久不修谒求见相府，相公以某馆中诸生召坐与语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148385_comment'></div>某窃不自料，遂以书《日历》为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148385_comment'></div>相公因及史氏废坠，阙人编修，且曰国子博士李觉屡以修撰干时政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148385_comment'></div>某虽对以梗概，曾未毕辞，退食徬徨，不自宁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148385_comment'></div>何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148385_comment'></div>古者守道不如守官，故以弓招虞人而不进者，不见皮冠之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148385_comment'></div>某虽不才，忝在史职，至于记简牍之事，定褒贬之文，不为僭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148385_comment'></div>李觉位列国庠，当教胄子以《诗》《书》《礼》《乐》，讲诵诲诱而已，又安得授之史笔哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148385_comment'></div>今馆中之士，先进者有若金部员外郎安德裕、右司谏兼直秘阁宋泌，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148385", 1148385, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>砥砺名节</span>，老于文学，俾之修撰，舆论归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148385_comment'></div>其于后进十数辈，不敢自衒，虑有朋党之刺也，在相公熟参之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148385_comment'></div>相公且曰：「史笔之难有三焉：才也，学也，识也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148385_comment'></div>相公岂以馆阁诸生才、学、识见皆不及觉邪，则舍此而取彼可矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148385_comment'></div>若犹未也，相公又何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148385_comment'></div>况朝行混杂也久矣，唯三馆两制非文士不居，一旦又轻之，盖扫地矣必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148385_comment'></div>相公尽至公，塞浮议，莫若遍召直馆与觉聚而廷试以考之，则是非较然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148385_comment'></div>若因而授之，取笑千古之下，则某耻之，相公亦耻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148385_comment'></div>矧相公监修国史，得不留意乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148385_comment'></div>干犯廊庙，躬俟谴责，某惶惧顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1148385_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年11月</a>　在京任右拾遗。有序送李巽。作品：《送李巽序》<div id='poem_1148414' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148414' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148414?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李巽序</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148414")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148414_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148414'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148414'>古者设关所以禁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148414", 1148414, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>末游</span>，为市所以通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148414", 1148414, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>货殖</span>，后世因而有税焉，亦以资国用而佐地征也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148414_comment'></div>历代便之，未尝或改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148414_comment'></div>旧制皆委郡县署胥徒以掌其务，故侵渔自奉，利入于下，割剥公行，怨归于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148414_comment'></div>不有釐革，孰为经久？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148414_comment'></div>国初已来，始用儒臣以莅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148414_comment'></div>锡之皇华，尊其任也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148414_comment'></div>委以利柄，观其器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148414_comment'></div>是以周行之士，由此而进焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148414_comment'></div>端拱元祀夏六月，诏以光禄寺丞李公督婺州关市之赋，遵历试也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148414_comment'></div>君，建阳人，少以文章干禄江表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148414_comment'></div>神德平吴之六年，皇上嗣统之五载，始随计偕，求试于大宗伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148414_comment'></div>君尤善辞赋，得贞元、长庆时风格，如《土鼓》《蜃楼》数篇，皆辞理精妙，出人意表，故秉笔者许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148414_comment'></div>仆时在场屋，与之游者凡三年，同登乙科，交分益至，是以君之文行，可得而熟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148414_comment'></div>宜乎立丹墀，奋鸿笔，作邦家之秀，为搢绅之光，而适海隅、釐冗务者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148414_comment'></div>盖建溪、婺女实邻境也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148414_comment'></div>君离邦去里，自闽之蜀，官历再命，年将一纪，堂有亲老，室有妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148414_comment'></div>是行也，道未畅于国，孝可成于家也，士君子闻而荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148414_comment'></div>噫，行道之要，利不如义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148414_comment'></div>立事之干，义不如利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148414_comment'></div>昔君佐管城、宰晋原，抚民人、亲稼穑，非谓义乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148414_comment'></div>今君奉朝命、临外司、歛关征、助经费，非谓利乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148414_comment'></div>义以行之，利以干之，政成归朝，何往而不济！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148414_comment'></div>上国残暑，江天早秋，凉风入怀，旧物在目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148414_comment'></div>郡守迎劳，乡人咏歌，徵四牡以宴使臣，唱《白华》而延孝子，柅轺车于故里，侍板舆于任所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148414_comment'></div>有道之禄，得以及亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148414_comment'></div>无外之时，得以聚族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148414_comment'></div>䌽衣奉养，何乐如之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148414_comment'></div>至止之日，为我登八咏楼，赋新什以寄远，即嘉惠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148414_comment'></div>怀安败名，乐不可极，仲权其志之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1148414_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年12月</a>　在京任右拾遗。有序上奏，为其建议政治改革之始。作品：《三谏书序》<div id='poem_1148437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三谏书序</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148437")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148437'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148437'>臣闻前事者，后事之元龟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148437_comment'></div>是以读二帝之《典》，则首曰「稽古帝尧」，又曰「稽古帝舜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148437_comment'></div>以唐虞之圣，尚考古道而行，况居三代之末，乘百王之弊者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148437_comment'></div>臣遭遇文明，叨窃名器，更直多暇，闭门读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148437_comment'></div>见前代理乱之源，览昔贤谏诤之语，念空文之未泯，痛直道之难行，放逐以终，而词气不屈，布在方册，千古如生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148437_comment'></div>茍举而行之，则其道未坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148437_comment'></div>因采掇古人章疏，可救今时弊病者凡三篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148437_comment'></div>其一以搢绅浮竞，风俗浇漓，率多躁进之徒，鲜闻笃行之士，不移旧辙，渐紊彝伦，臣故献刘寔《崇让论》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148437_comment'></div>其二以齐民颇耗，像教弥兴，兰若过多，缁徒孔炽，蠹人害政，莫甚于斯，臣故献韩愈《论佛骨表》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148437_comment'></div>其三以选举因循，官常隳紊，署置不已，俸禄难充，但蠹疲民，罕闻良吏，臣故献杜佑《并省官吏疏》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148437_comment'></div>斯皆事可遵行，言非迂阔，亦欲使昔贤遗恨发自微臣，前代遗文兴于圣主者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148437_comment'></div>每篇之末，臣别有起请条目，指陈时病，稽合前文，庶引古以證今，必朝行而暮复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148437_comment'></div>又自立问难，缀于终篇，断在不疑，以绝浮议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148437_comment'></div>待罪之至，引表具焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1148437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年</a>　在京任右拾遗。有表进奏。作品：《进乾明节祝圣诗表》<div id='poem_1148294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进乾明节祝圣诗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148294")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148294'>臣某言：闻天道化成，分八节而运行元气；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148294_comment'></div>圣人降庆，膺千年而开阐洪图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148294_comment'></div>诞灵既偶于嘉辰，祝寿乃名于圣节，照临之下，祷愿攸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148294_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以汉感赤龙，晦云雷于大泽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148294_comment'></div>周因玄燕，带弓矢于高禖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148294_comment'></div>符瑞之来，今古相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148294_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，二仪叶德，九庙储祥，于时而里社方鸣，是夕而常星不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148294_comment'></div>孟冬建亥，爱日在房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148294_comment'></div>紫电绕枢，式表自天之命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148294_comment'></div>青云如盖，爰标出震之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148294_comment'></div>当睿圣之继天，以乾明而命节，千官上寿，万国来庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148294_comment'></div>僸佅兜离，铿越乐悬之下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148294_comment'></div>鬼侯梅伯，欢呼文陛之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148294_comment'></div>骏奔竞效于祝尧，宴乐且殊于在镐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148294_comment'></div>臣职叨三馆，位列丹墀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148294_comment'></div>听九奏之箫韶，欣同鸟兽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148294_comment'></div>献千钟于尧舜，幸接夔龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148294_comment'></div>舞蹈之馀，咏歌斯发、谨上《乾明节祝圣寿》古诗三篇合七章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148294_comment'></div>章无定句，篇有小序，稍殊俗态，似近古风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148294_comment'></div>虽播在乐章，惭非《风》《雅》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148294_comment'></div>或歌于寿酒，可代俳优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148294_comment'></div>冒黩冕旒，臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1148294_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年</a>　在京任右拾遗。代王沔作让官表。作品：《代王侍郎（沔）让官表》<div id='poem_1148350' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148350?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代王侍郎让官表</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148350")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148350_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148350'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148350'>臣某言：今月日，伏蒙圣慈，赐臣官告一通、敕牒一道，特授臣户部侍郎、参知政事，兼加阶勋爵邑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148350_comment'></div>位列贰卿，职参四辅，虽听成命，实惧旷官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148350_comment'></div>叫天阍而自卜远图，让帝泽而诚非饰诈<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148350_comment'></div>伏念臣才非命世，学谢通儒，雕虫强继于家门，射鹄敢希于科第？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148350_comment'></div>不谓策名之日，适当出震之期，垂衣方霈于殊恩，释褐不循于常调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148350_comment'></div>未经历试，便立班行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148350_comment'></div>不出数年，俄居近密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148350_comment'></div>佐乃圣乃神之主，为旅进旅退之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148350_comment'></div>有何谟猷，裨益政化？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148350_comment'></div>至于断决机务，无非禀听聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148350_comment'></div>尸禄居多，黜幽有待，虽圣情之未咎，在物议而可惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148350_comment'></div>岂谓尊号皇帝陛下，猥以謏才，入参大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148350_comment'></div>在青坛之行庆，虽举彝章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148350_comment'></div>佐黄閤之持衡，是为非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148350_comment'></div>而又阶勋并进，爵邑兼荣，茍或不辞，岂为度德？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148350_comment'></div>且陈力就列，有不能则止之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148350_comment'></div>惟器与名，有不可假人之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148350_comment'></div>愿改已行之命，免贻将至之殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148350_comment'></div>伏望陛下特寝新恩，令居旧位，靡厚素餐之罪，庶无覆餗之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148350_comment'></div>臣则老在谏垣，终于密地，永知止足，敢有觊觎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148350_comment'></div>获避斯权，是为多福。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1148350_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=988&endYear=988')">988年</a>　在京任右拾遗。有碑文。作品：《有巢氏碑》<div id='poem_1148517' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148517' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148517?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有巢氏碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（988年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148517")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148517_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148517'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148517'>我承天命，作民之帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148517_comment'></div>生而不号，死而无谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148517_comment'></div>居民以巢，因得为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148517_comment'></div>我先伏羲，卦象未画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148517_comment'></div>《大壮》之说，我民不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148517_comment'></div>凭高就树，作巢之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148517_comment'></div>横刍蔽空，启扉向风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148517_comment'></div>疏不为拙，密不为工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148517_comment'></div>晨翔暮栖，与禽鸟同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148517_comment'></div>弗罟弗网，寿其考终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148517_comment'></div>比巢熙熙，若居天宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148517_comment'></div>无何后主，上栋下宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148517_comment'></div>萌以堂奥，渐其庭户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148517_comment'></div>鸠绳聚墨，回廊合庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148517_comment'></div>痛乎我巢，悄焉无睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148517_comment'></div>犹赖伊耆，俭于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148517_comment'></div>椽不用斲，阶无剪茨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148517_comment'></div>舜禹善嗣，宫室孔卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148517_comment'></div>不壮不丽，民其歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148517_comment'></div>至于周公，摄政于姬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148517_comment'></div>明堂辟雍，有威有仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148517_comment'></div>亦克用乂，人罔知疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148517_comment'></div>降及后世，风俗浇漓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148517_comment'></div>穷奢极侈，蔓延而滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148517_comment'></div>瑶台琼室，夏、商祸基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148517_comment'></div>章华壮楚，忽焉空土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148517_comment'></div>姑苏丽吴，阒然荒墟。<div class='inline'
