1148529, "Clauses/743/Comments/0")'>环极</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1148529_comment'></div>能执干戈，以卫社稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1148529_comment'></div>呜呼勋贤，弗登大年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1148529_comment'></div>薨于路寝，像列甘泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1148529_comment'></div>恩隆赙赠，宠贲貂蝉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1148529_comment'></div>边功未辑，遗恨依然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1148529_comment'></div>其谁祔之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1148529_comment'></div>永宁园邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1148529_comment'></div>昔也筑馆，秦楼岳立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1148529_comment'></div>王姬之车，星繁雾集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1148529_comment'></div>今也同穴，沁园雨泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1148529_comment'></div>贵主之坟，烟愁露湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1148529_comment'></div>其谁哭之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1148529_comment'></div>开宝宫中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1148529_comment'></div>昔也归宁，车服有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1148529_comment'></div>烂其盈门，侄娣以从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1148529_comment'></div>今也<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_280_1148529", 1148529, "Clauses/770/Comments/0")'>哀凶</span>，怙恃弗终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1148529_comment'></div>号天罔极，鞠育何功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1148529_comment'></div>乃会同盟，乃先远日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1148529_comment'></div>丹旐悠悠，佳城郁郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1148529_comment'></div>薤露凄咽，松阡萧瑟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1148529_comment'></div>万古龙门，丰碑屹屹<span class='inlineComment2'>（《小畜集》卷二八。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1148529_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_286_1148529'>三年：原无，据傅本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_286_1148529_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年12月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有文。作品：《唐河店妪传》<div id='poem_1148512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐河店妪传</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148512")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148512'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148512'>唐河店南距常山郡七里，因河为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148512_comment'></div>平时虏至店饮食游息，不以为怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148512_comment'></div>兵兴已来，始防捍之，然亦未甚惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148512_comment'></div>端拱中，有妪独止店上，会一虏至，系马于门，持弓矢坐定，呵妪汲水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148512_comment'></div>妪持绠缶趋井，悬而复止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148512_comment'></div>因胡语呼虏为王，且告虏曰：「绠短不能及也，妪老力惫，王可自取之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148512_comment'></div>虏因系绠弓杪，俯而汲焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148512_comment'></div>妪自后推虏堕井，跨马诣郡，马之介甲具焉，鞍之后复悬一彘首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148512_comment'></div>常山民吏观而壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148512_comment'></div>噫，国之备塞，多用边兵，盖有以也，以其习战斗而不畏懦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148512_comment'></div>一妪尚尔，其人可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148512_comment'></div>近世边郡骑兵之勇者，在上谷曰静塞，在雄州曰骁捷，在常山曰厅子，是皆习干戈战斗而不畏懦者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148512_comment'></div>闻虏之至，或父母辔马，妻子取弓矢，至有不俟甲胄而进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148512_comment'></div>顷年胡马南下，不过上谷者久之，以静塞骑兵之勇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148512_comment'></div>会边将取静塞马分隶帐下以自卫，故上谷不守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148512_comment'></div>今骁捷、厅子之号尚存，而兵不甚众，虽加召募，边人不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148512_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148512_comment'></div>盖选归上都，离失乡土故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148512_comment'></div>又月给微薄，或不能充所赐，介胄鞍马皆脆弱羸瘠，不足御胡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148512_comment'></div>其坚利壮健者，悉为上军所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148512_comment'></div>及其赴敌，则此辈身先，宜其不乐为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148512_comment'></div>诚能定其军，使有乡土之恋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148512_comment'></div>厚其给，使得衣食之足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148512_comment'></div>复赐以坚甲健马，则何敌不破？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148512_comment'></div>如是得边兵一万，可敌客军五万矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148512_comment'></div>谋人之国者，不于此而留心，吾未见其忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148512_comment'></div>故因一妪之勇，总录边事，贻于有位者云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1148512_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普等作诰。作品：《王贽授殿中侍御史诰》《徐昶授楚州宝应县主簿诰》<div id='poem_1148262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148262' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148262?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王贽授殿中侍御史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148262")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148262_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148262'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148262'>故事，御史府三院转迁，各有月限，考绩之命，异于他官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148262_comment'></div>国朝以来，不用此制，必因行庆，方得叙迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148262_comment'></div>其间才行有闻，为众所誉者，不时而授，人以为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148262_comment'></div>具官王贽，本以懿文，辅之通识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148262_comment'></div>自登宪署，继领诏条，絜己爱民，所在称理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148262_comment'></div>司漕运者奏其课，执风宪者举其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148262_comment'></div>受代南康，陛见与语，宜从改秩，用以劝能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148262_comment'></div>勉荷宠光，勿渝素履。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1148262_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普作表。作品：《为宰臣上尊号表》《谢降御札表》《贺雨表》《贺罢谒庙大礼表》《贺御楼肆赦表》<div id='poem_1148279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宰臣上尊号表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148279")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148279_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148279'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148279'>内外文武臣寮、具官赵某等言：今月二十一日共干天听，别上尊名，奉宸翰以未俞，虑精诚而不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148279_comment'></div>戴天就日，犹悬亿兆之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148279_comment'></div>伏閤叫阍，宁避再三之黩<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148279_comment'></div>臣等闻运行四时者，惟天之大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148279_comment'></div>照临万国者，惟日之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148279_comment'></div>天不宰其玄功而有苍旻之号，日不耀于阳德而有畏爱之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148279_comment'></div>是以居广大而罔辞，处贞明而弗让，盖功德著乎上，而名号随于下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148279_comment'></div>前王后圣，茂实英声，取譬于兹，其则不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148279_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下继天而王，如日之升，静则垂尧舜之衣裳，动则仗武汤之旄钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148279_comment'></div>明堂制礼，走玉帛于万方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148279_comment'></div>宣室崇儒，焕文章于三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148279_comment'></div>候气而八风从律，陈诗而万物由庚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148279_comment'></div>既理定以功成，尚宵衣而旰食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148279_comment'></div>早以兆民爱戴，群后推崇，率由旧章，共上徽号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148279_comment'></div>陛下让不得已，俯而从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148279_comment'></div>虽百姓同欢，方谐归美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148279_comment'></div>而一人善下，终恐近名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148279_comment'></div>昨者，法天道以流谦，敷王言而如綍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148279_comment'></div>谓大道不器，何假先天之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148279_comment'></div>谓圣人无名，岂须惟睿之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148279_comment'></div>尽除尊号，颇骇群情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148279_comment'></div>臣等奉诏靡遑，再章请复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148279_comment'></div>陛下过防满假，终未允俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148279_comment'></div>守《谦》卦之六爻，动而无悔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148279_comment'></div>去汤书之七号，卑不可踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148279_comment'></div>遂使中外包羞，军民沮色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148279_comment'></div>既难移于成命，乃别献于嘉猷，共倾天诱之衷，用纪日新之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148279_comment'></div>蓍龟叶吉，蛮貊同文，咸愿听卑，以期得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148279_comment'></div>陛下特迂凤藻，犹避鸿名，固愈振于谦光，奈重违于人欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148279_comment'></div>而况皇王显号，今古彝章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148279_comment'></div>上则尊列圣之贻谋，光辉七庙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148279_comment'></div>下则称庶邦之系望，威服八荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148279_comment'></div>凡在含生，共观休烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148279_comment'></div>岂可执劳谦之小节，废立极之大名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148279_comment'></div>居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1148279", 1148279, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>轩昊</span>之至尊，慕巢由之独行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148279_comment'></div>此臣等之所未谕也，陛下之所不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148279_comment'></div>臣等不胜大愿，敢固请上尊号曰法天崇道文武皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148279_comment'></div>庶得将顺谦冲之旨，惟新<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1148279", 1148279, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>徽懿</span>之名，免使圣朝有兹阙典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148279_comment'></div>跼天蹐地，罔敢自安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148279_comment'></div>碎首糜躯，期于必遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148279_comment'></div>臣等无任区区恳迫之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1148279_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148320' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148320' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148320?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢降御札表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148320")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148320_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148320'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148320'>臣某言：今月二十二日夜，伏蒙圣慈，特降御札云云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148320_comment'></div>骄阳作沴，乃相臣调燮之愆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148320_comment'></div>乙夜飞文，见圣主焦劳之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148320_comment'></div>引过咎以归己，教刑政以留心，捧读惊惭，不遑启处<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148320_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，为民父母，受天聪明，覃恩而已灭祅星，转祸而尚忧时雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148320_comment'></div>侧身修行，自符《云汉》之诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148320_comment'></div>旰食宵衣，莫有华胥之梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148320_comment'></div>特形宸翰，备见天心，恨不自作牺牲，何止靡爱圭璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148320_comment'></div>谅至诚之所感，致甘泽以非遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148320_comment'></div>臣备位台司，亲承睿旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148320_comment'></div>若岁大旱，多惭傅说之才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148320_comment'></div>谓天盖高，必听汤王之祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148320_comment'></div>未蒙册免，尤愧搢绅，而又诲以政刑，敢不勤于夙夜，少助忧心之意，庶成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148320", 1148320, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>澍雨</span>之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148320_comment'></div>伏限脚膝未痊，不获拜谢阙庭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1148320_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺雨表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148321")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148321'>臣某言：伏睹今月日甘雨大降，宰臣吕某等便殿称贺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148321_comment'></div>自秋以来，时雨不降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148321_comment'></div>遇灾而惧，至诚爰祷于上玄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148321_comment'></div>有感则通，甘泽忽沾于下土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148321_comment'></div>丰登有望，朝野同欢<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148321_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下七政咸齐，五行为质，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148321", 1148321, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>夤畏</span>昊穹之命，焦劳刑政之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148321_comment'></div>一昨祅彗告灾，丰年失望，宿麦播而未茁，旱云垂而不沾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148321_comment'></div>陛下靡爱斯牲，遍走群望，降廷臣而决狱，御便殿以录囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148321_comment'></div>御笔摛文，乙夜引万方之罪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148321_comment'></div>清词沥恳，经旬祈五福之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148321_comment'></div>惟德动天而天不违，至诚感神而神授职，向夕而月离于毕，崇朝而云上于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148321_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148321", 1148321, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>散丝</span>遍洒于燋枯，比屋重兴于耒耜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148321_comment'></div>岂止小康之兆，将书大有之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148321_comment'></div>尧眉舒八彩之颦，免贻臣辱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148321_comment'></div>舜乐复九成之韵，大悦民心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148321_comment'></div>凡在含生，同知大赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148321_comment'></div>臣为霖寡术，和鼎备员，方期册免之文，以塞燮调之咎，处台司而愈愧，荷圣感以弥深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148321_comment'></div>伏限未任拜起，不获称庆朝堂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1148321_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺罢谒庙大礼表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148323")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148323'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148323'>臣某言：伏睹御札示谕内外文武百寮，以彗孛之祅，特罢八月二十四日谒庙大礼，仍择日御丹凤楼肆赦者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148323_comment'></div>清庙陈仪，玄穹示诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148323_comment'></div>引万方之罪，皆在圣躬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148323_comment'></div>退三舍之祅，伫光帝德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148323_comment'></div>凡居覆焘，尽仰休昭<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148323_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下夤畏上玄，祗严列圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148323_comment'></div>垂象忽呈于怪异，惟馨罢荐于祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148323_comment'></div>洒宸翰以飞文，出纶言而引咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148323_comment'></div>仍行赦宥，用答穹旻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148323_comment'></div>九土编氓，尽闻哀痛之诏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148323_comment'></div>三边戍卒，顿减歌吟之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148323_comment'></div>伫见玄德升闻，至诚感应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148323_comment'></div>五纬变连珠之状，载耀乾文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148323_comment'></div>万邦倾执玉之诚，同扶帝业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148323_comment'></div>臣久叨辅弼，备熟忧勤，惭非伊、吕之致君，但仰禹、汤之罪己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148323_comment'></div>欢呼抃蹈，倍万常情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148323_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺御楼肆赦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148324")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148324_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148324'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148324'>臣某言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148324_comment'></div>伏睹今月某日，皇帝御丹凤楼大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148324_comment'></div>谪见上玄，乃降责躬之诏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148324_comment'></div>泽流率土，仍推<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148324", 1148324, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>作解</span>之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148324_comment'></div>凡在照临，同深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148324", 1148324, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>庆赖</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148324_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下顺考古道，观乎天文，有年将谢于祖宗，玄象忽垂于躔次，遂停吉礼，用慰咎徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148324_comment'></div>虑庶政之阙修，欲普天而流惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148324_comment'></div>楼开丹凤，大昭引咎之诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148324_comment'></div>竿揭金鸡，咸与自新之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148324_comment'></div>幽明靡间，囹圄皆空，人心已作于颂声，天道顿回于和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148324_comment'></div>伫观符瑞，用答忧勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148324_comment'></div>臣年在衰残，功亏燮理，册免尚稽于旧典，御灾但仰于新恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148324_comment'></div>愧畏兢虞，罔知所措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1148324_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普上表。作品：《乞归私第养疾表》《为乾明节不任拜起陈情表》<div id='poem_1148326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞归私第养疾表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148326")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148326'>臣伏念臣久废常朝，将临圣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148326_comment'></div>紫宸咫尺，难献寿以捧觞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148326_comment'></div>黄阁优闲，但备员而调鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148326_comment'></div>不归私第，实玷公朝，是以辄述恳诚，形于章奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148326_comment'></div>伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下曲垂敦谕，未赐听从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148326_comment'></div>念畴昔之遭逢，存始终之宠遇，圣慈虽厚，公议难安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148326_comment'></div>况廊庙具瞻，台衡重务，固当夙夜匪懈，朝夕论思，岂有半年之间，殊无一拜之礼？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148326_comment'></div>外论恐伤于冒宠，私心未免于怀忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148326_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下俯察衰残，更容假告，庶药石之有效，俟筋骸之稍康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148326_comment'></div>尽瘁匪躬，尚更期于晚节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148326_comment'></div>悬车告老，敢轻议于明时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148326_comment'></div>傥遂允俞，不胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148326", 1148326, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>恳愿</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1148326_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148327?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为乾明节不任拜起陈情表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148327")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148327_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148327'>臣伏念臣向婴羸疾，久免起居，顾圣节以将临，候天颜而尚阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148327_comment'></div>在百辟具瞻之地，合展礼容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148327_comment'></div>当千官献寿之时，未任拜起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148327_comment'></div>载循衰朽，但积<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148327", 1148327, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>兢忧</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148327_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，甲观储祥，华封祝圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148327_comment'></div>万邦玉帛，俱倾就日之诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148327_comment'></div>五等公侯，共乐后天之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148327_comment'></div>凡居覆焘，孰不祷祈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148327_comment'></div>况臣首冠台司，曲承天眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148327_comment'></div>曳履方艰于步武，捧觞实阻于欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148327_comment'></div>有礼则安，考格言而是惧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148327_comment'></div>无德而禄，召厥病以攸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148327_comment'></div>空存善祷之心，愿恕不良之足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148327_comment'></div>筋力为礼，虽临几杖之年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148327_comment'></div>股肱惟良，深愧搢绅之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148327_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148327_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普作表。作品：《乞差官通摄谒庙大礼表》《贺雪表》<div id='poem_1148328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞差官通摄谒庙大礼使表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148328")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148328'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148328'>臣虔倾丹恳，仰达紫宸，载三虽黩于圣聪，万一冀回于天眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148328_comment'></div>伏念臣遭逢昌运，忝窃台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148328_comment'></div>三十年将相之权，周旋备位；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148328_comment'></div>一千载君臣之分，终始无渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148328_comment'></div>而自秋夏以来，脚膝无力，免常参于紫殿，预大政于黄扉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148328_comment'></div>伏遇尊号皇帝陛下告谢丰登，祗严宗庙，既列三台之首，合居五使之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148328_comment'></div>顾筋力之不支，虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148328", 1148328, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>趋跄</span>之失度，辄伸悃愊，冀免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148328", 1148328, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>遣差</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148328_comment'></div>岂谓陛下虽念暮年，犹敦后事，猥将大礼，责在老臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148328_comment'></div>加以中使、太医旁午于道路，王言、御札稠沓于门庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148328_comment'></div>认睿旨之丁宁，岂自图于安逸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148328_comment'></div>受已行之命，焉敢固违；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148328_comment'></div>在临事制宜，尚期通摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148328_comment'></div>是敢预陈危恳，上祷宸严，庶于行事之晨，免致乖仪之咎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1148328_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺雪表</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148322")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148322'>臣某言：伏睹今月九月，腊雪应时，宰臣吕某等便殿称贺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148322_comment'></div>伏以腊者四时之暮，所以成岁功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148322_comment'></div>雪者五谷之精，所以滋农亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148322_comment'></div>实上玄之垂祐，表圣主之忧民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148322_comment'></div>凡在昌朝，共欣嘉瑞<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148322_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下勤劳庶政，钦顺天时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148322_comment'></div>因百姓以为心，思跻寿域；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148322_comment'></div>虑一夫之不获，常若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148322", 1148322, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>纳隍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148322_comment'></div>而自秋徂冬，密云不雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148322_comment'></div>陛下念兆民之稼穑，忧七庙之粢盛，彻金石于尧轩，减荤膻于舜甑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148322_comment'></div>而又京师之内，鳏寡之徒，大颁金帛之资，用拯饥寒之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148322_comment'></div>靡神不举，有感则通，遂令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148322", 1148322, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>六出</span>之祥，大副三农之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148322_comment'></div>连宵委积，遍野沾濡，彰圣德以弥光，书有年而无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148322_comment'></div>臣方居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148322", 1148322, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>假告</span>，忽睹休祥，虽惭调燮之功，但乐丰登之望。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1148322_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有奏疏。作品：《因岁旱凶饥请节减财政开支疏》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有赋。作品：《圣人无名赋》<div id='poem_1148223' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148223' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148223?labeling=true' target='_blank'>圣人无名赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（元圣之道，无得称也。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148223")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148223_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148223'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148223'>圣人执大象，体乾元，虽有教以及下，故无名于自尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148223_comment'></div>仰之弥高，强配乃神之号；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148223_comment'></div>为而不有，奚矜惟睿之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148223_comment'></div>原其先天之谓道，体道之谓圣，所以居域中之大，所以为天下之正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148223_comment'></div>惟澹惟默，固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148223", 1148223, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>抱璞</span>以含章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148223_comment'></div>不识不知，岂命氏而考姓？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148223_comment'></div>所谓上德不德，无为不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148223_comment'></div>其作也，万物所睹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148223_comment'></div>其用也，百姓弗知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148223_comment'></div>难审之于耳目，徒象之于希夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148223_comment'></div>亦犹微妙者神焉，盖强而名矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148223_comment'></div>苍黄者天也，但据远视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148223_comment'></div>徒观其妙有群生，躬临大宝，宁钻燧以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148223", 1148223, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>启祚</span>，岂巢居而建号？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148223_comment'></div>聪明尽黜，罔求浚哲之褒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148223_comment'></div>迹用弗彰，但守虚无之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148223_comment'></div>得非丧天下于华胥，得环中于道枢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148223_comment'></div>蛇身牛首兮非吾之耦，云官鸟纪兮莫我为徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148223_comment'></div>孰跻王而黜霸，孰追尧而禅虞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148223_comment'></div>其或稽之以帝箓皇图，则视之若无；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148223_comment'></div>求之以温恭允塞，则名之莫得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148223_comment'></div>其何必谓栗陆氏以居尊，据轩辕丘而启国者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148223_comment'></div>所谓莫之与京，无得而称，探至赜以为用，曷常名而足徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148223_comment'></div>尼父复生，欲宪章而何取？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148223_comment'></div>子长虽在，思纪列以无能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148223_comment'></div>今我后尚黄老以君临，阐清净而化下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148223_comment'></div>抑徽号于睿圣，扇玄风于华夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148223_comment'></div>有以见圣无名兮神无功，信大人之造也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1148223_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有祭文。作品：《祭韦氏夫人文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（殆撰于端拱二年前后，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148545' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148545?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭韦氏夫人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148545")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148545_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148545'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148545'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148545_comment'></div>阴偶阳奇，天地拘百六之数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148545_comment'></div>劳生休死，古今同七十之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148545_comment'></div>适往虽关于冥契，扳号实动于孝思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148545_comment'></div>凡人有丧，犹匍匐兮必救；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148545_comment'></div>无母何恃，固劬劳兮孔悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148545_comment'></div>惟灵贞纯内蕴，柔顺外驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148545_comment'></div>以上容兮已任，盖令淑兮天资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148545_comment'></div>祖德有光，豕韦与五百之数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148545_comment'></div>妇道斯备，《采蘋》列二《南》之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148545_comment'></div>在昔羔雁成礼，室家用宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148545_comment'></div>环佩之音合节，保阿之训无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148545_comment'></div>事舅姑兮嗃嗃，睦亲族兮熙熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148545_comment'></div>俨如宾之容，式符于阃则；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148545_comment'></div>称未亡之日，躬修于母仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148545_comment'></div>仁或亲兮我发必断，邻或善兮我居必移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148545_comment'></div>故得花砖启封，焕耀从夫之贵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148545_comment'></div>桂枝并折，旌酬训子之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148545_comment'></div>或青宫兮赞导，或墨绶兮抚绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148545_comment'></div>立朝者诲之以直道，字人者戒之以无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148545_comment'></div>庆高门兮若是，跻上寿兮何疑？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148545_comment'></div>嗟人生之无定，信天道之难知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148545_comment'></div>年来兮霜满洞庭，犹思怀橘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148545_comment'></div>日下兮人回上国，已报焚芝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148545_comment'></div>心肝摧兮若剖割，涕泗乱兮如绠縻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148545_comment'></div>魂魄兮已沉蒿里，哀号兮莫睹灵輀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148545_comment'></div>钟鼎珍羞，家庙徒陈于异代；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148545_comment'></div>封崇典册，泉扃止漏于他时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148545_comment'></div>有富贵兮不能及也，念鞠育兮何日忘之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148545_comment'></div>顾泣血兮罔极，谅终天兮已而。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148545_comment'></div>某钦慕德门，交游令子，同年幸忝于丹墀，结绶仍连于百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148545_comment'></div>食而舍肉，方健羡于颍封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148545_comment'></div>今也则亡，又同悲于渭水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148545_comment'></div>聊薄奠以是陈，庶英魂兮降此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148545_comment'></div>伏惟尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1148545_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有诗送查道。作品：《送查校书(道)从事彭门》<div id='poem_74879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_74879'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74879'>佐幕徐方鬓未秋，官升芸阁更风流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74879_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74879'>姓名旧在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_74879", 74879, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>莺迁榜</span>，诗什重题燕子楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74879_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74879'>渐有俸钱供药债，应无归梦到渔舟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74879_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74879'>公馀时上台头寺，珠履金貂共胜游<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：曹侍中为徐帅。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74879_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_74843'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74843'>密疏封来乙夜看，延英召对议安边。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74843'>荣颁紫绶同三品，旧赐朱衣未一年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74843'>白兽捧樽斟御酒，金鱼垂鬣惹炉烟。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=989&endYear=989')">989年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有诗送友人。作品：《送光禄王寺丞通判徐方》<div id='poem_74857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74857?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送光禄王寺丞通判徐方</a><span class='authorDate'>（989年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_74857'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74857'>通悴徐方茜绶新，老莱衣服暂离身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74857'>家君莲幕开厅事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，府帅金貂耀缙绅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74857'>戏马台荒春寂寞，斩蛇乡古树<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_74857", 74857, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>轮囷</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75117_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年1月1日</a>　太宗御朝元殿受册尊号，改元淳化。禹称摄中书侍郎，捧玉册玉宝，代赵普上表。作品：《贺册尊号表》<div id='poem_1148319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺册尊号表<span class='inlineComment2'>（已下皆代赵侍中作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148319")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148319'>臣某言：伏奉去年十二月二十四日批答，允百寮所上尊号内四字，今年正月一日，御朝元殿受册礼毕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148319_comment'></div>日新盛德，让茂实而不居；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148319_comment'></div>天启群心，上尊名而得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148319_comment'></div>事光简册，庆洽华夷<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148319_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下受天灵符，作民司牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148319_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148319", 1148319, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>元元本本</span>，咸臻富寿之乡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148319_comment'></div>战战兢兢，未减焦劳之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148319_comment'></div>一昨特颁凤诏，尽省鸿名，谦冲之道弥光，推戴之心安仰？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148319_comment'></div>百辟请仍于旧贯，睿眷不回；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148319_comment'></div>三章别上于新名，宸聪见纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148319_comment'></div>尚以为法天之义，可以体刚健而奉高明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148319_comment'></div>崇道之名，可以守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148319", 1148319, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>虚无</span>而务清净。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148319_comment'></div>见帝皇之自下，却文武之大功，俯顺万邦，作程百代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148319_comment'></div>粤兹元日，诞受徽章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148319_comment'></div>册镂乾文，愈见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148319", 1148319, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>流谦</span>之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148319_comment'></div>礼成帝箓，更隆卜世之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148319_comment'></div>臣权列上台，得观盛事，伏限未任拜起，不获称庆朝堂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1148319_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年1月2日</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。诏改乾明节为寿宁节，禹称押诸方表案。赵普称病，四上表致政，皆禹称代作。作品：《求致仕第一表》<div id='poem_1148329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>求致仕第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148329")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148329'>臣某言：臣闻知进知退，贤达之格言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148329_comment'></div>有始有终，君臣之大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148329_comment'></div>将染乞骸之疏，犹驰就日之魂，冀仁主之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>悯嗟</span>，遂老臣之休退<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148329_comment'></div>伏念臣比乏宏材，且非世胄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148329_comment'></div>邓仲华之素望，不过功曹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148329_comment'></div>岑文本之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>初心</span>，止于县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148329_comment'></div>偶以遭逢景运，攀附先皇，擢自宾从，骤居相辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148329_comment'></div>捐躯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>誓命</span>，不后他人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148329_comment'></div>任重才轻，终无成绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148329_comment'></div>洎盟津之出将，遇代邸之兴王，骏奔北阙之前，备位东宫之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148329_comment'></div>臣此际已能知止，便誓终焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148329_comment'></div>岂期陛下轸念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>青毡</span>，重升黄阁，但奉文明之教令，曾无启沃之谋猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148329_comment'></div>迩后陛下察以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>兢持</span>，均其劳逸，连镇襄邓，暂远唐虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148329_comment'></div>节旄久窃于宠荣，寒暑渐成于衰飒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148329_comment'></div>前岁幸遇陛下躬事上帝，亲耕千亩之田；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148329_comment'></div>老臣位忝诸侯，合预<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>五推</span>之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148329_comment'></div>请朝天阙，寻奉帝俞，得伸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>助祭</span>之诚，实有分司之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148329_comment'></div>陛下过私天眷，复列上台，既责重以位高，果积忧而成病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148329_comment'></div>今春始于微恙，遂至沉痾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148329_comment'></div>陛下终赐哀怜，多方治疗，痊平未几，步履犹艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148329_comment'></div>自兹特免常朝，仍司大政，无一言以裨圣听，无一拜以觐天颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148329_comment'></div>在中书则省吏扶行，羞看朝士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148329_comment'></div>归私第则鸣驺前导，耻见都人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148329_comment'></div>已为废疾之身，曷称具瞻之地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148329_comment'></div>近因岁暮，转觉形羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148329_comment'></div>虽云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>告假</span>之中，仍列钧台之上，存问频劳于圣虑，优容实玷于公朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148329_comment'></div>况宰臣一月之俸金，乃下位数年之禄食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148329_comment'></div>君恩虽厚，斁有国之彝伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148329_comment'></div>内府虽丰，耗生灵之膏血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148329_comment'></div>茍不思止，但冒宠光，岂惟辜负圣知，直恐招延鬼瞰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148329_comment'></div>伏望陛下听其告老，惠以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>归全</span>，庶于瞑目之前，少遂安身之计，示君恩之有卒，使贤路之无妨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148329_comment'></div>必也辞荣，许归西洛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148329_comment'></div>幸而未死，获见东封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148329_comment'></div>免令就木之年，更取《伐檀》之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148329_comment'></div>尚虑陛下过存念旧，便断来章，虽犯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>严诛</span>，当期必遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148329_comment'></div>限以尚艰步武，不获躬拜朝堂，谨遣次男六宅使承煦诣东上閤门拜表陈乞以闻<span class='inlineComment2'>（《小畜集》卷二三。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148329_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1148329'>今春：按赵普求致仕及让西京留守诸表均上于淳化元年春，《让西京留守第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（见后）</span>云：「臣去年春季，即染沉疴，今年正初，方求致仕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148329_comment'></div>是赵普上年春已染疾，疑此处「今春」乃「去春」之误。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1148329_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普上表。作品：《求致仕第二表》《求致仕第三表》《求致仕第四表》《慰公主薨表》《让西京留守第一表》《让西京留守第二表》《让西京留守第三表》《让西京留守第四表》<div id='poem_1148330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>求致仕第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148330")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148330'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148330'>臣某言：今月日拜章上閤，告老悬车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148330_comment'></div>优诏未俞，虽增宠遇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148330_comment'></div>残年无几，须至哀鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148330_comment'></div>纵获戾于违天，冀退身而得地<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148330_comment'></div>臣闻葛亮蜀之名相，以二十罚而伤神；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148330_comment'></div>裴度唐之钜贤，始四十岁而发白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148330_comment'></div>或成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148330", 1148330, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>衰促</span>，盖积忧虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148330_comment'></div>况臣非武侯之才能，无晋公之智略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148330_comment'></div>然以遭逢先帝，际会圣君，尘重位者三十年，处浮生者七十载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148330_comment'></div>虽无功名报国，常以畏慎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148330", 1148330, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>周身</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148330_comment'></div>衰老若兹，死亡无日，未解弼谐之任，颇伤公共之朝，但冒宠于三台，终取笑于千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148330_comment'></div>是以恳求致仕，适合旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148330_comment'></div>陛下曲存始终，过有敦谕，听自天之成命，虽没地以知荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148330_comment'></div>其如老病弥加，死期非远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148330_comment'></div>况庙堂三入，贵极生人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148330_comment'></div>尸素万钱，罪招阴谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148330_comment'></div>与其速之以毙，曷若优之以生？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148330_comment'></div>伏望陛下惠以考终，致之散地，冀延馀息，尚见明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148330_comment'></div>感圣主于生前，从先臣于泉下，幽魂无愧，朽骨有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148330_comment'></div>区区之诚，实望于此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148330_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148331' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148331' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148331?labeling=true' target='_blank'>求致仕第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148331")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148331_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148331'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148331'>臣某言：臣屡上封章，请还朝政，继蒙批答，未赐帝俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148331_comment'></div>七十悬车，于礼文而非远；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148331_comment'></div>载三则黩，考《易》象以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148331", 1148331, "Clauses/8/Comments/2")'>怀忧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148331_comment'></div>念老病之日加，冀皇慈之见悯<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148331_comment'></div>臣闻老氏玄言，诫于知足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148331_comment'></div>箕子《洪范》，福尚考终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148331_comment'></div>臣虽至愚，窃慕兹义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148331_comment'></div>况才非王佐，位极人臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148331_comment'></div>出则拥上将军之鼓旗，贵居方面；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148331_comment'></div>入则佩大丞相之印绶，首冠台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148331_comment'></div>三代有赠官，诸子居贵仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148331_comment'></div>俸禄锡赉，聚之则何啻万金；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148331_comment'></div>官爵阶勋，数之则无非一品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148331_comment'></div>日有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148331", 1148331, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>秩酒</span>，月有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148331", 1148331, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>飧钱</span>，奉此一身，已踰二纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148331_comment'></div>外不能出奇画策，廓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148331", 1148331, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>氛祲</span>而偃干戈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148331_comment'></div>内不能阜俗安人，救茕嫠而跻富寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148331_comment'></div>玷圣朝之公道，为陛下之私人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148331_comment'></div>齿发衰残，形骸病弱，此而不退，是谓无厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148331_comment'></div>向者祅彗忽生，亢阳斯久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148331_comment'></div>天怨神怒，实为老臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148331_comment'></div>引咎责躬，翻劳圣主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148331_comment'></div>今幸时雪大降，丰年有期，多惭燮理之功，全赖文明之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148331_comment'></div>陛下复颁诏旨，尽去尊名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148331_comment'></div>臣则兼八字之功臣，处三台之上列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148331_comment'></div>当万乘焦劳之日，为一生尸素之人，纵免国刑，必招阴责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148331_comment'></div>臣所以号泣求退，朝夕不安者，正为此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148331_comment'></div>伏望陛下察由衷之危恳，行册免之时文，庶延风烛之年，获尽云龙之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148331_comment'></div>若一旦溘先朝露，尚秉洪钧，则埋骨泉台，幽魂负愧，书名国史，后嗣何观！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148331_comment'></div>沥恳披肝，期于得请。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1148331_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>求致仕第四表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148332")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148332'>臣某言：自今月五日至十四日，三上封章，恳陈致仕，伏奉十七日批答不允，令断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148332_comment'></div>伸告老之诚，实当暮齿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148332_comment'></div>拒已行之命，合受常刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148332_comment'></div>与其冒宠以招殃，不若违天而获戾<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148332_comment'></div>臣闻上天之育万物，各使得其时，是以春则发生，秋则肃杀，示有成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148332_comment'></div>明君之驭百官，各使得其所，是以壮而入仕，老而悬车，明有终也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148332_comment'></div>敢徵斯义，以导危诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148332_comment'></div>伏念臣遘疾弥深，残年非永，圣主不能载造，神医不能有瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148332_comment'></div>自料此生，必难报国，惟当明代，早遂退身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148332_comment'></div>继有哀鸣，固非饰诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148332_comment'></div>况去年十二月二十三日，陛下幸臣私第，见臣病容，以至金口悯嗟，重瞳沾泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148332_comment'></div>臣此际潜忻得退，志在不疑，始望一表见俞，岂谓三章未允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148332_comment'></div>曲形敦谕，过念遭逢，虽恋圣明，其如病废！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148332_comment'></div>臣今日暮途远，居常待终，气羸则药剂无功，手颤则粥杯难把。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148332_comment'></div>谓出纳惟允，臣则蹇涩于言词；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148332_comment'></div>谓股肱惟良，臣又艰难于步履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148332_comment'></div>衰残之状，备对天颜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148332_comment'></div>尸禄之愆，累烦圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148332_comment'></div>实谋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148332", 1148332, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>归骨</span>，讵敢要君？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148332_comment'></div>鄙志不移，有死而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148332_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148325' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148325' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148325?labeling=true' target='_blank'>慰公主薨表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148325")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148325_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148325'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148325'>臣某言：今月某日得进奏院状，二十一日某国公主薨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148325_comment'></div>云愁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148325", 1148325, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>鲁馆</span>，风咽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148325", 1148325, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>秦箫</span>，骖鸾辔以飙驰，惨龙头而雪泣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148325_comment'></div>伏以某国公主自天钟秀，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148325", 1148325, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>禀圣</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148325", 1148325, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>含华</span>，声诗早咏于肃雍，选尚遂从于釐降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148325_comment'></div>行舅姑之礼，克表人伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148325_comment'></div>宜公侯之家，诞彰妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148325_comment'></div>岂谓瑶台促召，玉树先摧，星沉而婺女难留，月晦而常娥不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148325_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下悲深天性，痛极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148325", 1148325, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>皇枝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148325_comment'></div>叹妫汭之逝波，空惊长往；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148325_comment'></div>望沁园之荒土，无复归宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148325_comment'></div>凡在人臣，共增悲悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148325_comment'></div>臣限拘留务，不获陈慰阙庭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148325_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>求致仕第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148329")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148329'>臣某言：臣闻知进知退，贤达之格言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148329_comment'></div>有始有终，君臣之大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148329_comment'></div>将染乞骸之疏，犹驰就日之魂，冀仁主之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>悯嗟</span>，遂老臣之休退<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148329_comment'></div>伏念臣比乏宏材，且非世胄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148329_comment'></div>邓仲华之素望，不过功曹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148329_comment'></div>岑文本之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>初心</span>，止于县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148329_comment'></div>偶以遭逢景运，攀附先皇，擢自宾从，骤居相辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148329_comment'></div>捐躯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>誓命</span>，不后他人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148329_comment'></div>任重才轻，终无成绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148329_comment'></div>洎盟津之出将，遇代邸之兴王，骏奔北阙之前，备位东宫之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148329_comment'></div>臣此际已能知止，便誓终焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148329_comment'></div>岂期陛下轸念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>青毡</span>，重升黄阁，但奉文明之教令，曾无启沃之谋猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148329_comment'></div>迩后陛下察以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>兢持</span>，均其劳逸，连镇襄邓，暂远唐虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148329_comment'></div>节旄久窃于宠荣，寒暑渐成于衰飒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148329_comment'></div>前岁幸遇陛下躬事上帝，亲耕千亩之田；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148329_comment'></div>老臣位忝诸侯，合预<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>五推</span>之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148329_comment'></div>请朝天阙，寻奉帝俞，得伸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>助祭</span>之诚，实有分司之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148329_comment'></div>陛下过私天眷，复列上台，既责重以位高，果积忧而成病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148329_comment'></div>今春始于微恙，遂至沉痾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148329_comment'></div>陛下终赐哀怜，多方治疗，痊平未几，步履犹艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148329_comment'></div>自兹特免常朝，仍司大政，无一言以裨圣听，无一拜以觐天颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148329_comment'></div>在中书则省吏扶行，羞看朝士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148329_comment'></div>归私第则鸣驺前导，耻见都人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148329_comment'></div>已为废疾之身，曷称具瞻之地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148329_comment'></div>近因岁暮，转觉形羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148329_comment'></div>虽云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>告假</span>之中，仍列钧台之上，存问频劳于圣虑，优容实玷于公朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148329_comment'></div>况宰臣一月之俸金，乃下位数年之禄食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148329_comment'></div>君恩虽厚，斁有国之彝伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148329_comment'></div>内府虽丰，耗生灵之膏血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148329_comment'></div>茍不思止，但冒宠光，岂惟辜负圣知，直恐招延鬼瞰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148329_comment'></div>伏望陛下听其告老，惠以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>归全</span>，庶于瞑目之前，少遂安身之计，示君恩之有卒，使贤路之无妨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148329_comment'></div>必也辞荣，许归西洛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148329_comment'></div>幸而未死，获见东封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148329_comment'></div>免令就木之年，更取《伐檀》之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148329_comment'></div>尚虑陛下过存念旧，便断来章，虽犯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1148329", 1148329, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>严诛</span>，当期必遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148329_comment'></div>限以尚艰步武，不获躬拜朝堂，谨遣次男六宅使承煦诣东上閤门拜表陈乞以闻<span class='inlineComment2'>（《小畜集》卷二三。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148329_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1148329'>今春：按赵普求致仕及让西京留守诸表均上于淳化元年春，《让西京留守第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（见后）</span>云：「臣去年春季，即染沉疴，今年正初，方求致仕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148329_comment'></div>是赵普上年春已染疾，疑此处「今春」乃「去春」之误。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1148329_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让西京留守第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148334")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148334'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148334'>臣某言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148334_comment'></div>今月某日，蒙恩授臣某官，臣当日上表陈让，伏奉批答未允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148334_comment'></div>留司重任，垂死残年，闻命不遑，拜章陈让，未回宸眷，恐速天殃，夙夜以来，神魂飞越<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148334_comment'></div>伏念臣去年春季，即染沉痾，今岁正初，方求致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148334_comment'></div>非不眷恋明代，盖忧逼近死期，述<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148334", 1148334, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>度德量力</span>之心，减<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148334", 1148334, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>尸禄素餐</span>之咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148334_comment'></div>所望尽停厚俸，高谢台司，随太平之老农，作皇家之旧相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148334_comment'></div>是为大愿，夫复何求？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148334_comment'></div>岂期陛下特委居留，仍加官秩，改功臣之懿号，付大尹之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148334", 1148334, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>剧权</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148334_comment'></div>虽荷皇恩，实乖素望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148334_comment'></div>且念臣之富贵，天下共知，臣之衰羸，陛下具见，肯因休退，复取宠荣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148334_comment'></div>况西都事繁，中分邦政，留守禄厚，十倍宰臣，臣若受之，是无厌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148334_comment'></div>岂止冒荣于当世，亦将取笑于后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148334_comment'></div>平生无致主之功，临死有要君之罪，此臣之所必不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148334_comment'></div>若以拒违成命，冒犯严诛，视死如归，期不奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148334_comment'></div>伏望陛下存<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148334", 1148334, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>退人</span>之大体，割念旧之小慈，赐以安车，期于就木，虽死之日，犹生之年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1148334_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148335' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148335' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148335?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让西京留守第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148335")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148335_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148335'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148335'>臣某言：臣自听宣麻，载陈让表，伏奉答诏，令断来章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148335_comment'></div>顾老疾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148335", 1148335, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>婴缠</span>，荷圣恩之稠沓，因辞荣而受禄，是冒宠以沽名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148335_comment'></div>泣血惭魂，不遑启处<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148335_comment'></div>伏念臣去年抱病，久在中书，上有万乘聪明，下有三臣辅弼，臣安则署敕，困则高眠，尚多虚羸，不任来往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148335_comment'></div>而况两京分务，百职具存，七世之庙甚严，万夫之政斯在，既非卧理之地，尚增尸禄之尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148335_comment'></div>且三千贯之俸金，数百家之赋调，夺其膏血，奉此衰残，虽曰优臣以恩，乃是速臣之死，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148335", 1148335, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>兴言</span>及此，苟活何为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148335_comment'></div>臣又见前代退人，自有常礼，或以师事之旧，或以定策之勋，亦不过赐以千金，与之驷马而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148335_comment'></div>臣之富贵，止是遭逢，有位无功，既老且病，放归私第，何负于臣，岂烦朝廷，过作礼数？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148335_comment'></div>伏望陛下容其告老，察以由衷，俾谐知足之心，尽寝已行之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148335_comment'></div>朝退夕死，臣无恨焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1148335_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148336' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148336' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148336?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让西京留守第四表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年1月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148336")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148336'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148336'>臣某言：臣伏奉今月某日第三道批答，不许臣陈让恩命，令断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148336_comment'></div>上言则是拒命，受宠则是要君，忧惶失图，进退无据<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148336_comment'></div>伏念臣累陈危恳，未动宸衷，实惭老病之身，不称保釐之任，万端忧悸，三表哀鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148336_comment'></div>陛下累降纶言，兼贻御札，且云开国勋旧，惟卿一人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148336_comment'></div>又云颐养洛阳，事光青史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148336_comment'></div>伏读圣语，泣顾残骸，恨不能追已往之年华，换已废之筋力，奔走上道，应副天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148336_comment'></div>其如步履艰难，言辞蹇涩，不求致政，是谓贪荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148336_comment'></div>安有始则让三百贯料钱，终则受三千贯月俸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148336_comment'></div>必若均于庶吏，可给数百员；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148336_comment'></div>分于六师，可养数千辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148336_comment'></div>或使安民布政，或令御寇备边，割老臣之私恩，成陛下之公道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148336_comment'></div>亦恐增臣微福，减臣馀殃，因之剩活数年，必得载见万乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148336_comment'></div>若须令赴任，不许罢官，尸素转多，忧劳速死，恐无益也，适足苦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148336_comment'></div>伏望陛下思一物失所之言，察匹夫不夺之志，寝兹成命，俾遂初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148336_comment'></div>则长往九原，免有冒荣之耻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148336_comment'></div>更生一日，亦蒙载造之恩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148336_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年3月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有诗送赵普赴西京留守任。作品：《送赵令公西京留守》<div id='poem_75047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送赵令公西京留守</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75047")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75047_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75047'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75047'>勋业与谁同，萧何第一功。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75047'>两朝行直道，万国变淳风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75047'>微恙妨三接，辞荣动四聪。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75047'>白麻宣上阁，清洛守离宫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75047'>让表回宸翰，朝辞泣舜瞳。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75047'>对深移五刻，官重带三公。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75047'>凤浴荀池暖，龙蟠洛邑雄。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75047'>位尊非借寇，神爽近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_75047", 75047, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>维嵩</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75047'>导骑香尘细，肩舆晓雾笼。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75047'>下车鶗鴂语，开宴牡丹红。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75047'>温树深严<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>梦，甘棠蔽芾丛。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75047'>趋庭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_75047", 75047, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>采兰子</span>，投刺茹芝翁。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75047'>广化如灵鹫，天津似䌽虹。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75047'>先皇陵树老，白傅影堂空。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75047'>春馔思山蕨，秋屏画水荭。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75047'>御泉通廨宇，禁柳映帘栊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75047'>元老优游盛，明君眷注隆。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75047'>更须归相府，特地代天工。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75047'>永佐千年运，重颁九锡弓。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75047'>不同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_75047", 75047, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>崔四入</span>，正在乱离中。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75047'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_75047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote'
