原作笼，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75047_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普上表。作品：《谢降御札并宰臣就第传宣不允陈让留守乞候病愈日赴任表》《谢许肩舆入内表》《谢宣差长男送赴西京表》《谢宣旨令次男西京侍疾表》《西京谢上表》<div id='poem_1148337' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148337' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148337?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢降御札并宰臣就第传宣不允陈让留守乞候病愈日赴任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148337")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148337_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148337'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148337'>臣某言：今月日，伏蒙圣慈，特降入内小底押班韩守英载赐御札；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148337_comment'></div>当日晚，宰臣吕某已下至臣私第，奉宣圣旨，重叠示谕，兼再赐批答，不允臣陈让恩命，令断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148337_comment'></div>宰臣谕旨，中使传宣，宸翰丁宁，虽难封执，残骸衰惫，实不支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148337_comment'></div>若伏枕坚拒于君恩，飞章更烦于圣听，为臣之道，实不自安，稍俟有瘳，以膺成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148337_comment'></div>谨当遍求良药，精疗沉痾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148337_comment'></div>恳愿未间，忧惶失次。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1148337_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢许肩舆入内表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148338")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148338'>臣某言：二月日准枢密院劄子，奉圣旨，许臣过清明节选日朝辞，仍令乘檐子于崇政殿入见者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148338_comment'></div>老病衰羸，圣慈悯恻，察其足疾，听以肩舆，实君父之殊私，非人臣之常礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148338_comment'></div>昔蔡义授经于宣帝，则两吏扶以趋朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148338_comment'></div>裴寂纳命于太宗，则三卫舁之入觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148338_comment'></div>臣无此勋旧，有此宠荣，自知杀身，无以报主，兢惶涕泗，不知所裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1148338_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣差长男送赴西京表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148339")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148339'>臣伏奉宣命，差臣长男左羽林军大将军承宗送臣赴西京者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148339_comment'></div>自天有命，举族知荣，慰其父子之情，益见君臣之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148339_comment'></div>伏念臣比惭衰老，未遂归休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148339_comment'></div>明君重委于保釐，方忧旷位；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148339_comment'></div>长子幸叨于环卫，合预常参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148339_comment'></div>陛下辍自班行，许随行李，出于圣念，实耀私门，歧路有光，室家感泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148339_comment'></div>独亲独子，既有玷于公朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148339_comment'></div>尽孝尽忠，岂敢忘于家训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148339_comment'></div>永言感遇，空极涕洟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1148339_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣旨令次男西京侍疾表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148340")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148340'>臣某言：今月日枢密院送到宣头一道，付臣次男某，令随臣赴任西京侍疾，仍不落请受者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148340_comment'></div>君亲厚遇，父子偕行，祗荷宠荣，弥增感泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148340_comment'></div>臣近以将之洛邑，入觐尧阶，少倾恋阙之心，并写感恩之抱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148340_comment'></div>沐圣君之发问，许幼子之侍行，不落班行，仍支俸给，实非常例，并出特恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148340_comment'></div>想暮齿以知荣，顾私门而积耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148340_comment'></div>此盖陛下义敦天性，恩厚孝思，念黄发之衰羸，俾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148340", 1148340, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>彩衣</span>而侍养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148340_comment'></div>老夫耄矣，罢相辅而忝居留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148340_comment'></div>童子何知，奉晨昏而兼内职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148340_comment'></div>唯于忠孝，以誓子孙，过此以还，不知所措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1148340_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西京谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148341")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148341'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148341'>臣某言：伏奉恩制，授臣西京留守，已于今月日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148341_comment'></div>乍远龙庭，初临龟洛，望冕旒而积恋，对宫阙以知荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148341_comment'></div>伏念臣素乏宏才，偶逢开国，历两朝而窃禄，叨三入以无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148341_comment'></div>去岁因染沉痾，恳辞重位，抗表止期于致仕，出纶复委于留司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148341_comment'></div>四上让章，愿罢已行之命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148341_comment'></div>载蒙答诏，未谐往诉之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148341_comment'></div>虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148341", 1148341, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>坚卧</span>以要君，遂力疾而受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148341_comment'></div>此盖陛下情深念旧，礼极退人，遂令衰朽之年，享此殊常之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148341_comment'></div>入则荣提相印，冠四辅以调元；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148341_comment'></div>出则分务神皋，守三公而在外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148341_comment'></div>仍启荀池之贵，弥彰洛宅之雄，增老臣无德之殁，实近古未行之典，永言宠遇，无与比伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148341_comment'></div>而自感泣朝辞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148341", 1148341, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>扶力</span>上道，乍临理所，弥耀残年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148341_comment'></div>奉列圣之宗祧，睹百司之典故，对两观而宁忘恋阙，俯三川而更切朝宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148341_comment'></div>谒太祖之园陵，魂销弓剑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148341_comment'></div>扫先臣之坟墓，泪滴松楸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148341_comment'></div>念往追思，既荣且惧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148341_comment'></div>惟惭潦倒，不称居留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148341_comment'></div>亦当虔奉朝经，旁询属吏，卧治上凭于圣化，求医庶便于微躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148341_comment'></div>固无裨补之功，但感始终之道。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普作事状。作品：《为寿宁节不任朝觐奏事状》<div id='poem_1148345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为寿宁节不任朝觐奏事状</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148345")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148345'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148345'>臣伏念沉痾未愈，圣节将临，顾筋力以不支，望云天而积恨，既乖修觐，莫敢宁居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148345_comment'></div>窃以臣自偶昌朝，久叨贵仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148345_comment'></div>入则位崇于三事，累玷台司；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148345_comment'></div>出则名冠于诸侯，谬尘居守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148345_comment'></div>凡关庆贺，皆合率先，而况寿宁嘉辰，节名新改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148345_comment'></div>当百辟称觞之日，是二年伏枕之馀，历夏经秋，有增无减，莫预欢呼之会，仅成病废之身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148345_comment'></div>天边空仰于流虹，床下尚迷于斗蚁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148345_comment'></div>倾尧日而虽同葵藿，通虞泉而自念桑榆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148345_comment'></div>遐瞻北极之光，恨无迅翼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148345_comment'></div>善祷南山之寿，但有精诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148345_comment'></div>臣无任祈天祝圣激切忧惶之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148345_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普上表。作品：《奏侄男表》《谢赐侄男大理评事表》《缴连寿宁节功德疏表》<div id='poem_1148346' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148346' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148346?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏侄男表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148346")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148346_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148346'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148346'>臣前件侄男某早慕通修，比求科试，既未精于举业，难轻入于文场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148346_comment'></div>寻以奏授朝恩，补充衙内，随从已经于三任，蹉跎遂滞于一名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148346_comment'></div>况四房昆弟之间，唯有此侄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148346_comment'></div>念千载君臣之分，恐失良时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148346_comment'></div>傥蒙甄录之恩，粗有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148346", 1148346, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>公勤</span>之诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148346_comment'></div>干犯宸扆，无任兢惶激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1148346_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐侄男大理评事表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148347")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148347_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148347'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148347'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148347_comment'></div>臣伏蒙圣慈，授臣侄男某大理评事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148347_comment'></div>祗荷宠光，不任荣惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148347_comment'></div>伏以法寺美官，圣朝好爵，凡云选授，必择器能，岂期<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148347", 1148347, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>不调</span>之材，遽忝起家之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148347_comment'></div>伏念臣侄男某禀训虽久，知书未深，但以补署职名，侍行藩镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148347_comment'></div>既蹉跎而有素，恐仕进以无阶，爰因诞圣之辰，辄有量材之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148347_comment'></div>伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下不循常例，特降殊恩，赐犹子之官常，念老臣之衰暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148347_comment'></div>谅杀身而何报，空举族以知荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148347_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1148347_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148348' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148348' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148348?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴进寿宁节功德疏表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148348")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148348_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148348'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148348'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148348_comment'></div>伏以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148348", 1148348, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>河清社鸣</span>，千载启兴王之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148348_comment'></div>天长地久，万邦倾祝圣之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148348_comment'></div>居留既冠于台司，虔祷宁同于庶位？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148348_comment'></div>是以集祇园之开士，启秘藏之真经，仰赞云天，不舍昼夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148348_comment'></div>钟梵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148348", 1148348, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>锵洋</span>于四水，香花焕耀于六街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148348_comment'></div>预期华渚之星，已满周天之月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148348_comment'></div>仗西方之圣教，祝南面之至尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148348_comment'></div>庶使星望帝车，与金轮而永固；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148348_comment'></div>山齐圣寿，历<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148348", 1148348, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>沙劫</span>以长存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148348_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148348_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有序。作品：《送寇密直西京迁葬序》<div id='poem_1148405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148405?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送寇密直西京迁葬序</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148405")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148405'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148405'>皇上省徽号之明年春正月，尚书郎、直宥密上谷寇平仲葬先正少卿于西洛，君命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148405_comment'></div>外姻同位，饮而饯之，咸以为哀荣之极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148405_comment'></div>初，少卿之终也，平仲尚幼，葬是以缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148405_comment'></div>洎平仲十九登进士第，三迁得佐著作，尹成安县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148405_comment'></div>成安，大名之属邑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148405_comment'></div>大名，少卿佐幕之地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148405_comment'></div>亲友间有以葬事为请者，平仲曰：「未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148405_comment'></div>于礼，子为大夫，父为士，祭则大夫，葬则士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148405_comment'></div>吾先人以懿文茂行中甲科，遭时乱离，终于下位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148405_comment'></div>今吾虽为王官，尚未通籍，苟赠典不及，则吾先人陪臣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148405_comment'></div>若以士礼葬之，吾弗忍也，且非所以显吾亲而成吾孝耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148405_comment'></div>议者闻之曰：「寇氏果有后于宋乎，其志大也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148405_comment'></div>越明年，迁殿中丞，循恩例也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148405_comment'></div>时夏师未复，兵食颇艰，乃诏平仲使西北边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148405_comment'></div>归，上便宜，因得召见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148405_comment'></div>试《御戎论》，称上旨，制授右正言，分直东观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148405_comment'></div>且以邦计之地，吏缘为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148405_comment'></div>辍史笔之才，试奏刀之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148405_comment'></div>君子不器，斯之谓欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148405_comment'></div>会诏下百官各言边事，平仲慷慨拜章，极陈利病，天子壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148405_comment'></div>不数日，擢拜虞曹郎，置于密地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148405_comment'></div>寻以天官之职委焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148405_comment'></div>出领铨衡，入备顾问，扬清激浊，物论多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148405_comment'></div>既而有司以平仲贵为侍臣，当赠父母，故少卿、太君之并命行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148405_comment'></div>平仲于是卜地开阡，择日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148405", 1148405, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>请告</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148405_comment'></div>上可其奏，赠礼有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148405_comment'></div>翌日别尧阶，趋洛汭，金印紫绶，白马素车，且护先太君之神柩祔焉，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148405_comment'></div>君子曰：少卿之积善馀庆也既如彼，平仲之遇主荣亲也又如此，《诗》云「诒厥孙谋，以燕翼子」，少卿有焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148405_comment'></div>《经》曰「立身扬名，以显父母」，平仲有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148405_comment'></div>群公著位明庭，弗克会葬，盍各赋诗，取《白华》之义，歌孝子之洁白乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148405_comment'></div>直凤阁王某序，以冠其首云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1148405_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。冬间，孙何再到阙下，始过王禹偁门，告归日，禹称贻之以文。作品：《送孙何序》<div id='poem_1148408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148408?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送孙何序</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148408")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148408_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148408'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148408'>天之文，日月五星；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148408_comment'></div>地之文，百谷草木；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148408_comment'></div>人之文，六籍五常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148408_comment'></div>舍是而称文者，吾未知其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148408_comment'></div>咸通以来，斯文不竞，革弊复古，宜其有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148408_comment'></div>国家乘五代之末，接千岁之统，创业守文，垂三十载，圣人之化成矣，君子之儒兴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148408_comment'></div>然而服勤古道，钻仰经旨，造次颠沛，不违仁义，拳拳然以立言为己任，盖亦鲜矣，富春孙生有是夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148408_comment'></div>先是，余自东观移直凤阁，同舍紫微郎广平宋公尝谓余曰：「子知进士孙何者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148408_comment'></div>今之擅场而独步者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148408_comment'></div>余因徵其文，未获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148408_comment'></div>会有以生之编集惠余者，凡数十篇，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148408", 1148408, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>师戴</span>六经，排斥百氏，落落然真韩、柳之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148408_comment'></div>其间《尊儒》一篇，指班固之失，谓儒家者流非出于司徒之职，使孟坚复生，亦当投杖而拜曰：「吾过矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148408_comment'></div>又《徐偃王论》，明君之分，窒僭之萌，足使乱臣贼子闻而知惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148408_comment'></div>夫《易》之所患者，辨之不早辨也，斯可谓见霜而知冰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148408_comment'></div>树教立训，他皆类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148408_comment'></div>且其数千万言，未始以名第为意，何其自待之多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148408_comment'></div>余是以喜识其面而愿交其心者有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148408_comment'></div>今年冬，生再到阙下，始过吾门，博我新文，且先将以书，犹若寻常贡举人，恂恂然执先后礼，何其待我之薄也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148408_comment'></div>观其气和而壮，辞直而温，与夫向之著述相为表里，则五事之言、貌，四教之文、行，生实具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148408_comment'></div>宜其在布衣为闻人，登仕宦为循吏，立朝为正臣，载笔为良史，司典谟，备顾问，为一代之名儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148408_comment'></div>过此则非吾所知也，岂止一名一第哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148408_comment'></div>告归许田，序以为赠，余非多可而易与者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148408_comment'></div>凡百君子，宜贺圣朝得贤、吾道之不坠尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1148408_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有序。作品：《送戚维序》《诏臣僚和御制赏花诗序》《回尹黄裳启》《送薛昭序》《送李蕤序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（或作于端拱间。）</span>《送柳宜通判全州序》<div id='poem_1148411' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148411' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148411?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送戚维序</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148411")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148411_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148411'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148411'>崇位厚禄，人心弗欲者鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148411_comment'></div>然取之不以道，昔人不贵焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148411_comment'></div>是知学古入官，沉于下僚者，非君子之耻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148411_comment'></div>盐官戚君，始以儒雅受训于庭，复以文学策名于国，终以廉平莅事于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148411_comment'></div>下笔到古人，诵书得圣理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148411_comment'></div>家门嗃嗃，敦大《易》之象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148411_comment'></div>亲族熙熙，有遂古之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148411_comment'></div>士流之家，仰为模范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148411_comment'></div>用是而进，虽位未崇，禄未厚，固不为耻耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148411_comment'></div>自释褐已来，縻郡曹，沉邑佐，颠踬穷苦者二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148411_comment'></div>晨夕芳鲜，曾未快志，况<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148411", 1148411, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>温饫</span>妻子乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148411_comment'></div>去年参常调选于天官，始授郡主簿，辇亲挈子，来即谯亳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148411_comment'></div>修吏职外，日得以俸给躬荐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148411", 1148411, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>甘滑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148411_comment'></div>䌽衣煌煌，色若自得，古之称孝子者，殆将无及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148411_comment'></div>今年秋，国家以蜀之令长阙而未补，用是有遂宁之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148411_comment'></div>公不以遐适为念，而以违养是患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148411_comment'></div>且曰：「退耕无田，则伏腊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148411", 1148411, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>寅酉</span>其可虞乎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148411_comment'></div>进而取禄，则温凊喜惧得无思乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148411_comment'></div>藩羊其羸，进退安据」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148411_comment'></div>复自念曰：「与其千里负米，孰若五斗折腰者邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148411_comment'></div>一旦捧天书，禀亲旨，拜手北堂，膏车西下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148411_comment'></div>《白华》在咏，心其摇摇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148411_comment'></div>剑关倚云，遐指天末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148411_comment'></div>名利之役，其若是欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148411_comment'></div>噫，导一人之泽，福百里之民，亦足行乎道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148411_comment'></div>食有道之禄，及高堂之亲，亦足光乎孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148411_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148411", 1148411, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>割慈</span>去里，无庸介怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148411_comment'></div>矧皇朝平蜀已来，宰邑相望于候馆，是以宋紫微由小著往，杨侍御自拾遗出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148411_comment'></div>是役也，安知遂宁不为大来之朕乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148411_comment'></div>行哉勉旃，勿以铜墨为愧耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1148411_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148441?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诏臣僚和御制赏花诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148441")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148441_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148441'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148441'>臣闻周文灵沼，诗人著「鱼跃」之词；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148441_comment'></div>汉武横汾，史氏载「雁归」之什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148441_comment'></div>义存《小雅》，语焕青编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148441_comment'></div>属在昌朝，继兹盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148441_comment'></div>我法天崇道皇帝诞膺骏命，光启鸿基，当千年下武之期，为一代好文之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148441_comment'></div>皇坟帝典，穷步骤于宸机；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148441_comment'></div>壁宿奎星，焕文章于御笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148441_comment'></div>然而动循礼法，志尚忧勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148441_comment'></div>来燕来宜，式叶《凫鹥》之咏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148441_comment'></div>弗洒弗扫，恐招《蟋蟀》之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148441_comment'></div>于时淳化之年，暮春之月，蓂荚初生于一叶，牡丹乍拆于千苞，乃召侍臣，爰开曲宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148441_comment'></div>入内园而洞启，望绮席以霞舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148441_comment'></div>风递鸣梢，乍见七香之辇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148441_comment'></div>波摇水殿，齐瞻八彩之眉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148441_comment'></div>欢呼方到于轩墀，侍从共登于栏槛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148441_comment'></div>亲承睿旨，竞剪宫花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148441_comment'></div>露湿冠缨，表君恩于湛露；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148441_comment'></div>香笼襟袂，杂帝坐之天香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148441_comment'></div>次临积翠之池，咸举不纲之钓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148441_comment'></div>忽宣奇韵，俾赋新诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148441_comment'></div>既奉诏以援毫，各争妍而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1148441", 1148441, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>构思</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148441_comment'></div>天颜咫尺，强叩于芜音；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148441_comment'></div>圣语褒扬，实同于华衮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148441_comment'></div>俄颁御制，复见宸踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148441_comment'></div>兼尧、舜、禹、汤、文、武之才，备钟、王、欧、虞、褚、陆之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148441_comment'></div>咏歌无斁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148441", 1148441, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>传玩</span>为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148441_comment'></div>恍若梦中，入阆苑瑶池之景；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148441_comment'></div>浑疑天上，得金简玉字之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148441_comment'></div>既而尚辇更衣，保章告刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148441_comment'></div>观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1148441", 1148441, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>乳鱼</span>而罢钓，自契深仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148441_comment'></div>思中鹄以为娱，未忘习礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148441_comment'></div>于是奏《驺虞》之节，挽乌号之弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148441_comment'></div>振振盘石之子孙，赳赳登坛之将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148441_comment'></div>心平体正，发金镞以无虚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148441_comment'></div>目骇神惊，捧金罍而献寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148441_comment'></div>尧樽潋滟，舜乐锵洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148441_comment'></div>合经义于五豝，自同往诰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148441_comment'></div>逞雄心于一豕，堪诮前王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148441_comment'></div>不醉无归，尽欢而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148441_comment'></div>越明日，复出御制《赏花》之什十五章，五章章八句，十章章四句，首示辅臣，次传近位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148441_comment'></div>文含五纬，韵叶八风，锵乎治世之音，大矣经天之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148441_comment'></div>《雅》《颂》之道，虽易俗而移风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148441_comment'></div>「元首」之歌，亦君唱而臣和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148441_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1148441", 1148441, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>让章</span>虽上，宸旨弗移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148441_comment'></div>况两制、三馆之臣，幸当文理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148441_comment'></div>美千载一时之盛，宁寝颂声？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148441_comment'></div>各进数章，共成一集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148441_comment'></div>虽群星向日，更无嘒彼之光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148441_comment'></div>而众草偃风，亦助穆如之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148441_comment'></div>其间有燃箕欲速，既醉成篇，或体律未谐，或风骚无取，上咸令甄录，曾不弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148441_comment'></div>亦犹朝百谷于沧溟，未尝辞露；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148441_comment'></div>会九江于云梦，足得包荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148441_comment'></div>臣叙事非工，言诗鲜妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148441_comment'></div>五吏写诏，无王勮之雄才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148441_comment'></div>百僚和诗，非太真之高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148441_comment'></div>久在育材之地，躬承善诱之恩，用纪文明，辄为序引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148441_comment'></div>书之国史，何惭《天马之歌》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148441_comment'></div>垂作人文，不愧景龙之集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148441_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1148441_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148398' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148398?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回尹黄裳启</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148398")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148398_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148398'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148398'>右某启：伏以谏垣清秩，缀螭头侍从之班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148398_comment'></div>史氏设官，修麟笔不刊之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148398_comment'></div>享兹清切，允属<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148398", 1148398, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>英翘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148398_comment'></div>正言学士学富百家，文穷三变，桂籍先鸣而擅誉，柏台持宪以生风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148398_comment'></div>近者金阙献书，召试王褒之颂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148398_comment'></div>石渠载笔，更伸班固之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148398_comment'></div>凡在立朝，共欣得俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148398_comment'></div>猥蒙殊念，特示长笺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148398_comment'></div>载窥彪炳之文，益认谦冲之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148398_comment'></div>钦隆佩服，并集所怀，谨修启事陈谢。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1148398'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1148398_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148416' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148416' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148416?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送薛昭序</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148416")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148416_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148416'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148416'>今上即位之五年庚辰岁，仆始随计吏，来举场中，闻用晦名籍甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148416_comment'></div>有司考艺，俱登甲科；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148416_comment'></div>覆试殿庭，不中上旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148416_comment'></div>虽命未遇，而交愈亲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148416_comment'></div>故仆《送用晦下第》诗有「明年同醉杏园春」之句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148416_comment'></div>擢第之日，卒如斯言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148416_comment'></div>补吏以来，于今八载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148416_comment'></div>洎仆历东观，践西垣，迁谏官，掌书命，殆三年矣，而用晦尚以光禄丞领维扬关市之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148416_comment'></div>青衫瘦马，受代而来，囊括其文，未始衒露，何其自待之多也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148416_comment'></div>先是，用晦之在淮海也，虽屈其才，亦干厥事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148416_comment'></div>故司漕运、按风俗者，奏课以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148416_comment'></div>至是或谓用晦曰：「可移文相府，请畴前劳，则增秩之命可得矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148416_comment'></div>用晦闻而拒之曰：「非知言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148416_comment'></div>吾学古圣贤之道以取禄位，不幸而司管库，又乌以羡财而为功乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148416_comment'></div>如有用我者，则关讥而不征矣，岂终为俗吏耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148416_comment'></div>士君子闻而壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148416_comment'></div>内翰武功苏君，即薛氏之出也，视用晦为外兄，敦勉诱激，俾献文以自试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148416_comment'></div>不得已而从之，始以所业四十编拜章进御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148416_comment'></div>天子嘉之，试于凤阁，文不加点，数刻而成，灿乎千言，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148416", 1148416, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>耸动</span>台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148416_comment'></div>翌日，循近制改著作佐郎，延英中谢，上又誉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148416_comment'></div>未几有建阳通理之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148416_comment'></div>是行也，位虽未充而名以大矣，恩虽未渥而知则深矣，讵非历试之渐、大来之阶乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148416_comment'></div>且将慰慈母，省元昆，浮舟东下，吟啸山水，闽之才子得以师其道，闽之远俗得以观其政，又何穷达先后之足云乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148416_comment'></div>于是两制、三馆之士，为歌诗以饯行，且命不才序冠其首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1148416_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148419' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148419' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148419?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李蕤学士序</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148419")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148419_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148419'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148419'>唐韦处厚由考功员外郎出刺盛山，为诗十二章，当时名士自元、白而下皆和之，韩文公为之序，以为考功显曹，盛山僻郡，非处厚道胜自遣，不能乐于诗什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148419_comment'></div>流播编简，以为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148419_comment'></div>司封李学士尝以文行策名江左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148419_comment'></div>上即位之二祀，锁厅举进士中甲科，在馆殿十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148419_comment'></div>其间司外计、典大郡亦多矣，又以名曹史职，出佐庐江，而怡然自得，何道胜之若是耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148419_comment'></div>将见乎吟咏江山，传闻辇毂，俾朝之名士若元、白者属和成集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148419_comment'></div>某，希韩者也，愿为序以继其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148419_comment'></div>告行有期，聊以为送。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1148419_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148420' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148420' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148420?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送柳宜通判全州序</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148420")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148420_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148420'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148420'>河东柳无疑，江左之闻人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148420_comment'></div>在霸国时褐衣上疏，言时政得失，李国主器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148420_comment'></div>累迁监察御史，多所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148420", 1148420, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>弹射</span>，不避权贵，故秉政者尤忌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148420_comment'></div>继出为县宰，所在有理声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148420_comment'></div>皇家平吴之明年，随伪官得雷泽令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148420_comment'></div>雷泽，仆之故里也，始与之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148420_comment'></div>逮今几十五载，连尹三邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148420_comment'></div>州县之职，困于徒劳，居低摧穷辱之中，有死丧疾病之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148420_comment'></div>旅鬓生雪，朱衣有尘，知其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148420", 1148420, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>气业</span>者共惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148420_comment'></div>淳化元祀，始以任城宰来抵阙下，携文三十卷，叫阍上书，且请以文笔自试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148420_comment'></div>天子壮之，下章丞相府，翌日召试，且举汉时以粟为赏罚事，使析而论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148420_comment'></div>无疑援引剖判，灿然成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148420_comment'></div>吾君吾相皆以为识理体而合经义也，故改官芸阁，通倅湘源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148420_comment'></div>其官尚卑，其郡亦小，然由文艺而取，故有识者荣之，与夫谄权媚势，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148420", 1148420, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>奴颜婢色</span>，因采风谣、司漕运者言而得之者远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148420_comment'></div>于是沿汴达淮，浮江湖，入湘潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148420_comment'></div>是时也，可以吏隐，未可以行道，况江山猿鸟、云泉竹树为天下甲，民讼甚简，兵赋甚鲜，固可卧而理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148420_comment'></div>姑能致身于不才之间，放意于无何之域，则又不知县令为著作耶，著作为县令耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148420_comment'></div>或过故国，动《黍离》之情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148420_comment'></div>伤远行，有「于役」之念；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148420_comment'></div>叹下位，起「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148420", 1148420, "Clauses/66/Comments/2")'>山苗</span>」之刺，则于道远矣，于生劳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148420_comment'></div>勉哉，无疑善饭自爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1148420_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有表。作品：《为宰臣谢御书钱样表》《谢赐御书字样钱表》《谢赐御制逍遥咏秘藏诠表》<div id='poem_1148280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宰臣谢御书钱样表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148280")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148280_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148280'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148280'>臣等伏蒙圣慈，赐御书三体字样钱各一贯文者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148280_comment'></div>五铢新样，货泉将布于人间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148280_comment'></div>三体成文，笔札互彰于天纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148280_comment'></div>出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148280", 1148280, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>炉冶</span>而首蒙颁赐，望冕旒而共积兢荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148280_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，道极至玄，学探众妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148280_comment'></div>宸居多暇，书九府之钱刀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148280_comment'></div>御笔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148280", 1148280, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>摛华</span>，夺三辰之文彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148280_comment'></div>尽真草欧行之法，在方圆肉好之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148280_comment'></div>通流将遍于溥天，固殊当百；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148280_comment'></div>锡赉先沾于近位，其数且千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148280_comment'></div>臣等传玩为荣，收藏至宝，荷天光而悚惕，对圣作以兢惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148280_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1148280_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148292' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148292' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148292?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐御书字样钱表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148292")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148292_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148292'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148292'>臣某等今月二十三日于学士院分赐得御书三般字样「淳化元宝」钱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148292_comment'></div>洪炉新样，通行将遍于万方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148292_comment'></div>御笔摛华，神妙互分于八体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148292_comment'></div>颁宣非次，传玩知荣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148292_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下留意货泉，精心笔札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148292_comment'></div>书纪年之大号，用焕钱神；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148292_comment'></div>逞上圣之多才，爰彰墨妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148292_comment'></div>尽返鹊回鸾之法，掩天龙地马之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148292_comment'></div>庄山、历山之金，可齐重宝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148292_comment'></div>开元、乾元之字，莫比神踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148292_comment'></div>将大济于兆民，仍分沾于两制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148292_comment'></div>臣等名惭夷甫，才谢鲁褒，实<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148292", 1148292, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>赵囊</span>而空荷君恩，探禹穴而难穷圣作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148292_comment'></div>周太公之圜法，自合包羞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148292_comment'></div>欧率更之笔精，从兹扫地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148292_comment'></div>永言感遇，空极兢荣，臣等无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1148292_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐御制逍遥咏秘藏诠表</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148281")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148281'>臣等言：伏蒙圣慈，赐臣等御制《秘藏诠逍遥咏》共四十一卷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148281_comment'></div>伏以竺乾之教，所以祛色相而示真如；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148281_comment'></div>老氏之书，所以去滋章而务清净。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148281_comment'></div>大不过四句偈，多不出五千言，始则殊途而同归，终则枝分而派别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148281_comment'></div>洎乎演三乘于贝叶，文字渐多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148281_comment'></div>编三洞于瑶函，筌蹄逾远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148281_comment'></div>纵人十而己百，奈暮四以朝三，自非上圣之才，孰立不刊之典？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148281_comment'></div>发挥教法，允属文明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148281_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下思妙玄沙，心游赤水，因民设教，与天比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148281_comment'></div>知几其神，建皇王之有极；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148281_comment'></div>恭默思道，念释老之多歧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148281_comment'></div>于是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148281", 1148281, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>诠注</span>微言，咏歌至道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148281_comment'></div>撮其枢要，辟户牖于法门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148281_comment'></div>搴其菁英，芟萧稂于玄圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148281_comment'></div>示万机之多暇，表三教之精通，足可以指<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148281", 1148281, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>迷误</span>于群生，扇穆清于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148281_comment'></div>岂比夫刘庄、萧衍，但多佞佛之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148281_comment'></div>汉武、秦皇，空作求仙之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148281_comment'></div>自合镌诸玉简，藏在名山，将日月以同悬，与鬼神而争奥，传于不朽，垂之无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148281_comment'></div>臣等谬列词臣，躬承圣教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148281_comment'></div>披尧天之云雾，已觉濡身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148281_comment'></div>听舜殿之弦歌，共知忘味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148281_comment'></div>谨当授持读诵，抃舞欢呼，少遵善诱之心，庶助无为之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148281_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1148281_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。奉敕撰《重修北岳碑》作品：《重修北岳庙碑》<div id='poem_1148518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148518?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修北岳庙碑奉敕撰</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148518")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148518'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148518'>臣闻元气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148518", 1148518, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>胚浑</span>，结而为山岳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148518_comment'></div>幽灵肸蚃，降而为神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148518_comment'></div>矧乎地属阴方，位居水德，于八卦在《坎》，于四时为冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148518_comment'></div>固阴冱寒，万物之所藏伏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148518_comment'></div>早生晚熟，五谷之所蕃滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148518_comment'></div>帝尧开唐侯之封，大禹奠冀州之域，厥有巨镇，兹惟恒山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148518_comment'></div>却雁塞以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148518", 1148518, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>标雄</span>，压龙荒而挺秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148518_comment'></div>天官画野，势当昴毕之星；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148518_comment'></div>《易》象流形，名系雷风之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148518_comment'></div>下斡坤轴，高摩斗魁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148518_comment'></div>土俗粹灵，登神仙者七十户；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148518_comment'></div>岁时祈祷，置侍祝者九十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148518_comment'></div>藏简子之宝符，产昌容之蓬蔂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148518_comment'></div>足冻长城之窟，影达天汉之墟，积厚穷阴，出灵见怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148518_comment'></div>雪霜风雨，潜施及物之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148518_comment'></div>泰华嵩衡，共揭参天之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148518_comment'></div>禀是阴骘，孰无主张？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148518_comment'></div>洪惟岳神，受命上帝，燕南赵北，我实主之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148518_comment'></div>福善祸淫，人皆仰止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148518_comment'></div>名载乎祀典，德加乎生民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148518_comment'></div>视秩于公，遵周制也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148518_comment'></div>列爵为王，肇唐室也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148518_comment'></div>既奉时祀，亦禳天灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148518_comment'></div>凡水旱疠疫之祅，举玉帛牲牷之事，必有昭报，诞符至諴，历代奉之，其来尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148518_comment'></div>我法天崇道皇帝之抚运也，天祚明德，民怀有仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148518_comment'></div>括禹画于无垠，化尧封于比屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148518_comment'></div>雕题、儋耳，骈罗入王会之图；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148518_comment'></div>僸佅兜离，沸渭杂宫悬之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148518_comment'></div>文德丽星辰之象，武功彰雷电之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148518_comment'></div>宋文帝之读书，则七行俱下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148518_comment'></div>周武王之振旅，则一戎大定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148518_comment'></div>然犹焦劳克己，宵盰临民，每战战兢兢，念元元本本，师虞舜之无怠，法文王之犹勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148518_comment'></div>至若掖廷椒房，俭约中度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148518_comment'></div>离宫别馆，行幸殊稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148518_comment'></div>隆冬御裘，则念高年之无褐，于是乎有缯帛之赐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148518_comment'></div>当暑操扇，则轸下狱之罹辜，于是乎有缧绁之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148518_comment'></div>非蒐苗狝狩之时，无驰骋畋猎之事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148518_comment'></div>非朝会燕飨之日，无金石丝竹之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148518_comment'></div>岁出御题，亲考贡籍，拔造士之秀也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148518_comment'></div>日坐便殿，躬览庶政，达穷民之情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148518_comment'></div>向者星文告差，御端门而引启，故一夕而孛彗沉，宋景之退荧惑也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148518_comment'></div>大旱作沴，贬常膳而责躬，故崇朝而霖雨降，汤王之祷桑林也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148518_comment'></div>哲后之罪已也既如彼，上玄之祐善也又如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148518_comment'></div>《易》所谓「圣人久于其道，而天下化成」，《语》所谓「如有王者，必世而后仁」，其是之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148518_comment'></div>不然，何夤畏天命，艰难王业，若斯之甚邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148518_comment'></div>于是庶政交修，百神蠲洁，严祭祀而为人祈福，行教令而先天弗违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148518_comment'></div>菲饮食而厚牲牢，天神地祇享至诚之荐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148518_comment'></div>卑宫室而崇庙貌，名山大川启必葺之祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148518_comment'></div>岂比夫禋于六宗，未洽礼神之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148518_comment'></div>祀于五畤，但萌徼福之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148518_comment'></div>坠典无文，我能具举；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148518_comment'></div>矧兹阴岳，固有徽章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148518_comment'></div>华衮珠旒，受王者之册礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148518_comment'></div>太牢秬鬯，命守臣而行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148518_comment'></div>下迩玄冥之宅，旁邻黑帝之居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148518_comment'></div>因道武之基扃，旧推宏壮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148518_comment'></div>韫慕容之圭璧，素彰神异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148518_comment'></div>祠祀之盛，莫之与京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148518_comment'></div>然而运有污隆，时有兴废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148518_comment'></div>虽无方之体奚往不通，而有象之躯未逃其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148518_comment'></div>先是，匈奴之犯塞也，来诣祠宇，卜其吉凶，不从猾夏之心，遂纵燎原之火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148518_comment'></div>殊不知天惟辅德，神实依人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148518_comment'></div>乏祀虐民，自作败亡之计；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148518_comment'></div>彼曲我直，坐观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1148518", 1148518, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>荡覆</span>之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148518_comment'></div>圣上犹示含容，更期柔服，戢天威而自守，益民力之是宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148518_comment'></div>单于之火照甘泉，岂伤文帝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148518_comment'></div>颉利之兵陈渭水，未累太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148518_comment'></div>亟命有司，惟新大壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148518_comment'></div>乌台御史，持节而庀徒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148518_comment'></div>黄门贵人，鸠工而蒇事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148518_comment'></div>楩楠杞梓以云集，绳墨斧斤而子来，五材寔繁，百堵皆作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148518_comment'></div>乃复堂殿，于以俨像设之睟容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148518_comment'></div>乃兴廊庑，于以列徒御之绘事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148518_comment'></div>门阙有翼，阶陛斯隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148518_comment'></div>绣栭云楯，玄曜烟霞之色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148518_comment'></div>璇题藻井，交含日月之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148518_comment'></div>旌旗衣服昭其文，簠簋豆笾陈其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148518_comment'></div>能事毕矣，神功焕然，不愆揆日之期，再耸凌云之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148518_comment'></div>于是戒尸祝，命使臣，我将落之，神用至止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148518_comment'></div>厚厚惟馨之奠，永安不测之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148518_comment'></div>三献具而礼成，八音和而神降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148518_comment'></div>溪云拂槛，如绛节以翻空；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148518_comment'></div>山溜垂檐，误鸣珂之振响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148518_comment'></div>介尔繁祉，庇吾边民，况犷俗之未平，冀阴兵而助顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148518_comment'></div>或示之祸福，革彼豺狼之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148518_comment'></div>或鼓以雷霆，剿其犬羊之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148518_comment'></div>然后雨我禾黍，洁尔粢盛，铸农器而毁戈鋋，荐兴多稼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148518_comment'></div>耕边田而饱士卒，永乐丰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1148518_comment'></div>况今将相叶谋，人神共忿，岂使韩昌、张猛刑白马而登东山，将令去病、卫青取金人而踰北海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1148518_comment'></div>何往不利，何谋不臧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1148518_comment'></div>尚思魏绛之言，更鉴王恢之策，安民和众，契天地以为心，含垢匿瑕，谅神明之降鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1148518_comment'></div>伫灵台之偃伯，备法驾以省方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1148518_comment'></div>千年南面之尊，永知高枕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1148518_comment'></div>十月北巡之礼，尽举彝章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1148518_comment'></div>辑五瑞于公侯，问百年之耆艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1148518_comment'></div>燔柴奠玉，如西岳之礼容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1148518_comment'></div>陈《诗》观风，察北方之哀乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1148518_comment'></div>声明文物以咸备，律度量衡而必同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1148518_comment'></div>升中于绝岳之前，肆觐于重峦之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1148518_comment'></div>起白云而表瑞，何止岱宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1148518_comment'></div>呼万岁以效灵，岂惟嵩岳而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1148518_comment'></div>夫如是，则封狼居而禅姑衍，但恃穷兵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1148518_comment'></div>临瀚海而勒燕然，未为神武者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1148518_comment'></div>臣沐浴皇泽，优游紫垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1148518_comment'></div>请终军之缨，非无壮节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1148518_comment'></div>投班超之笔，尚负明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1148518_comment'></div>惭非掷地之才，有玷他山之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1148518_comment'></div>谨为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_107_1148518'>节彼恒山，峻极于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1148518_comment'></div>崛起万仞，生乎一拳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1148518_comment'></div>摩穹戛汉，控赵排燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1148518_comment'></div>人皆仰止，神或凭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1148518_comment'></div>明明岳神，上帝所授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1148518_comment'></div>不骞不崩，可大可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1148518_comment'></div>其谁祭之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1148518_comment'></div>皇宋哲后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1148518_comment'></div>其谁尸之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1148518_comment'></div>中山郡守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1148518_comment'></div>祑视公兮爵为王，金其几兮玉其床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1148518_comment'></div>何以赠之兮赤绂斯皇，何以处之兮峻宇雕墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1148518_comment'></div>谅聪明兮无得丧，维庙貌兮有兴亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1148518_comment'></div>嗟睟容兮荡毁，遇丑虏兮猖狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1148518_comment'></div>物成败兮有数，神杳冥兮无方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1148518_comment'></div>虽像设兮云坏，于精灵兮靡伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1148518_comment'></div>诏新斯庙，表匈奴之不道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1148518_comment'></div>诏祠尔神，彰皇家之至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1148518_comment'></div>天辅德兮我有庆，鬼害盈兮胡无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1148518_comment'></div>绝代马之南牧，扬和銮兮北巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1148518_comment'></div>有效灵之云物，无出塞之妖氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1148518_comment'></div>齐泰山兮等梁甫，并亭亭兮接云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1148518_comment'></div>飞英声兮腾茂实，握乾符兮阐坤珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1148518_comment'></div>垂千龄兮万祀，永昭德于吾君。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_130_1148518'></div><div id='poem_sentence_130_1148518_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有记。作品：《李氏园亭记》<div id='poem_1148479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李氏园亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148479")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148479'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148479'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148479", 1148479, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>重城</span>之中，双阙之下，尺地寸土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148479_comment'></div>与金同价，其来旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148479_comment'></div>虽圣人示俭，宫室孔卑，而郊庙市朝不可阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148479_comment'></div>已有百司之局署，六师之营壁，侯门主第，释宇玄宫，总而计之，盖其半矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148479_comment'></div>非勋戚世家，居无隙地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148479_comment'></div>设或有之，则又牵于邸店之利，其能舍锥刀之末，资耳目之娱者亦鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148479_comment'></div>故隰牧陇西李侯与神德皇帝有布衣之旧，在乾德、开宝中，继刺边郡，时并、汾未下，屡有军功铭于旂常，此不烦述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148479_comment'></div>侯幼读《春秋》，故战必尚计而不尚力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148479_comment'></div>晚好道术，故处必务实而不务华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148479_comment'></div>居某坊之后第，在大内之东南，实繁会之所也，而能开一园，构二亭，竹树花卉少而且备，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148479", 1148479, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>游赏</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148479", 1148479, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>宴息</span>近而不劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148479_comment'></div>其始也，患土地之不广，则倍价以市之，故善邻献其第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148479_comment'></div>病树艺之不滋，则厚利以诱之，故老圃效其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148479_comment'></div>不议其物之贵贱，不计乎时之有无，又掘旧地以及泉，辇野土而袤丈，费数十万，不以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148479_comment'></div>与夫谋衣食之源，作子孙之计者远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148479_comment'></div>洎侯之捐馆也，诸子尚幼，为季父纳质于富家，其取直四百万，将稔其利以夺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148479_comment'></div>上闻而骇其事，遽命出内府钱购而还焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148479_comment'></div>君子曰：李侯之好义忘利也既如彼，诸子之谨身节用也又如此，宜乎有是之光也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148479_comment'></div>吾见乎为公侯广第宅，连坊断曲，日侵月占，死而不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148479_comment'></div>及乎坟土未乾，则为子弟狱讼之具者，亦足悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148479_comment'></div>先是，侯尝牧于济，即予之故里也，以是知其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148479_comment'></div>又同舍紫微郎毕公，即侯之外姻也，以是熟其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148479_comment'></div>己丑岁，与予游其园，息其亭，一则叹旧馆之丧，一则思甘棠之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148479_comment'></div>因目其亭之中央者曰「克家」，取象于《易》也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148479_comment'></div>谓其东南者曰「肯构」，徵义于《书》也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148479_comment'></div>又总述其始终之状，为《李氏园亭记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148479_comment'></div>其幽致嘉况，则见群公之诗什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148479_comment'></div>大宋淳化元年九月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1148479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。为郭守文撰墓志铭。作品：《宣徽南院使镇州都部署郭公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1148531' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148531' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148531?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣徽南院使镇州都部署郭公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148531")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148531_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148531'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148531'>郭氏之先，虢叔之后也，虢郭声近，因而改焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148531_comment'></div>婚阀轩裳，代为著姓，自两汉、两晋而下，其间立大功，居显位者，不可备书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148531_comment'></div>有唐已来，孝恪为佐命之将，汾阳王子仪、代公元振皆人杰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148531_comment'></div>本大枝茂，侍中公当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148531_comment'></div>公讳守文，字国华，并州太原人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148531_comment'></div>曾王父讳湛，赠太子少保；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148531_comment'></div>曾祖母刘氏，追封彭城郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148531_comment'></div>大父讳秉，赠太子少傅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148531_comment'></div>祖母郝氏，追封太原郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148531_comment'></div>皇考讳晖，赠太子少师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148531_comment'></div>妣赵氏，追封天水郡太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148531_comment'></div>皆从公之贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148531_comment'></div>公即少师之长子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148531_comment'></div>少师在汉为护圣军使，从征蒲帅李守贞，先登而殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148531_comment'></div>时公尚幼，周高祖见而奇之，召置帐下，旌死事之孤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148531_comment'></div>洎受禅元年，补左班殿直，且以银印青绶崇其阶级，用国子祭酒、司宪大夫纪其官氏，上骑都尉策其勋伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148531_comment'></div>起家之命，有足优者，时广顺二年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148531_comment'></div>世宗嗣位，检校冬官卿，加上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148531_comment'></div>时内职东西两班，各置押班之名，又署都知之职，公皆任焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148531_comment'></div>显德中，遍历礼部、刑部二尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148531_comment'></div>待之虽优，用之未至，公韬晦而已，但以谨愿闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148531_comment'></div>我太祖神德皇帝之开国也，素知其名，建隆初，迁地官之长，充西头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148531_comment'></div>三年，改大司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148531_comment'></div>开宝中，授大冢宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148531_comment'></div>是时太祖经营四方，有澄清天下之志，励兵谋帅之外，所难者乘使车、传密命之人矣，始得公以用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148531_comment'></div>公既以知己之主难逢，亦以使者之才自许，往复万里，不逾浃辰，敷奏闲详，动中上旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148531_comment'></div>西蜀平，以公知简州军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148531_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1148531", 1148531, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>夷落</span>未化，寇攘孔多，公治盗以威，抚人以惠，人安盗息，公之力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148531_comment'></div>开宝四年，问罪岭表，公与其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148531_comment'></div>远驰捷音，数日而至，授右仆射、翰林副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148531_comment'></div>八年，下金陵，虏伪主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148531_comment'></div>是役也，公亦往焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148531_comment'></div>太祖以李煜恃险累世，劳师踰年，虑其惧罪自图，有伤国体，诏公监送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148531_comment'></div>公待以周旋，加之开释，尝谓曰：「国家止吊苗民之顽，不责防风之后也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148531_comment'></div>以至俘于端门，献之清庙，公之智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148531_comment'></div>太祖嘉之，赏赐殊厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148531_comment'></div>九年二月，迁左揆，改西京作坊使，翰林职司如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148531_comment'></div>四月，封南阳开国男，食邑三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148531_comment'></div>是岁，从曹州节度使党公御胡骑于团柏谷，大破走之，降玺书慰劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148531_comment'></div>今皇帝即位之始，乃作司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148531_comment'></div>太平兴国三年，以西羌弗宁，秦陇搔动，诏公安抚和辑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148531_comment'></div>丁内艰而归，哀毁过礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148531_comment'></div>未几，授起复西上閤门使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148531_comment'></div>上行郊祀之礼，霈雷雨之恩，俾迁司徒，以敷五教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148531_comment'></div>四年，上载木主，御戎衣，讨汾、晋之邦，除腹心之疾，以公为河东行营马军都监兼先锋使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148531_comment'></div>时多为地洞，以穴其城，且命公提举经略之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148531_comment'></div>渠魁面缚，戎辂凯旋，公实展其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148531_comment'></div>先是，王师之未至也，刘继元以其弟继文军于雁门，以张掎角，至是尚守孤垒，以招犬戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148531_comment'></div>诏公赴之，弃城而遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148531_comment'></div>车驾还，以公为定州驻泊兵马都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148531_comment'></div>冬十月，胡马南下，公出御之，遇于满城，一鼓而溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148531_comment'></div>迁东上閤门使、澶州刺史，旌战功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148531_comment'></div>五年冬十月，复有常山之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148531_comment'></div>会戎人攻我雄州，公承急诏，领轻骑以援之，狂虏望风而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148531_comment'></div>六年冬，上再郊圜丘，大赉群后，加金紫阶，进开国子，增食邑五百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148531_comment'></div>七年，奉诏归朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148531_comment'></div>明年，迁内客省使，仍以郡印处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148531_comment'></div>雍熙元年，进封开国侯，加食邑一千户，卜郊之泽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148531_comment'></div>二年春二月，有并州驻泊之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148531_comment'></div>三月就迁武州团练使，内省之职不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148531_comment'></div>五月，夏州白狄之戎叛，公往招诱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148531_comment'></div>至则张以军威，谕以朝旨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1148531", 1148531, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>诛逆</span>抚顺，蕃部便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148531_comment'></div>三年春，大举平燕之役，以公为幽州道行营前军马步军水陆战棹都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148531_comment'></div>其初也，继上捷书，累赐优诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148531_comment'></div>公以暑雨将降，师老为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148531_comment'></div>力战方酣，忽中流矢，公声色不变，人莫知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148531_comment'></div>俄而我师不利，朝议左迁，授右屯卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148531_comment'></div>斯盖冯异回溪之败，仁贵大非之失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148531_comment'></div>四年春，特拜宣徽北院使，充镇州驻泊北面排阵使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148531_comment'></div>端拱元年，上修帝籍，祀先农，恩例之行，乃迁太保，加食邑一千五百户，改宣徽南院使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148531_comment'></div>夏五月，诏许入觐，听其休沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148531_comment'></div>秋八月，召诣便殿，付以密旨，授镇州行营都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148531_comment'></div>二年五月，兼领镇定、高阳关两路排阵使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148531_comment'></div>百万之师，四七之将，萃于是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148531_comment'></div>公以威爱抚下，以谦和御众，有誉无毁，时论多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148531_comment'></div>方将伸威大漠，刷耻蹛林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148531_comment'></div>焚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1148531", 1148531, "Clauses/245/Comments/0")'>老上</span>之庭，横行域外，系单于之颈，牵致阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148531_comment'></div>公之志也，人之望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148531_comment'></div>天不憖遗，忽焉薨殂，以十一月九日捐馆于镇阳公署，享年五十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148531_comment'></div>上闻之泣下，特诏辍朝两日，赠侍中，皆非常例也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148531_comment'></div>遣黄门护其丧柩，丧事之费给于县官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148531_comment'></div>以淳化元年某月某日葬于东京某县某乡某里，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148531_comment'></div>公娶梁氏，封安定郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148531_comment'></div>有子四人：孟曰崇德，承奉郎、守太常寺太祝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148531_comment'></div>仲曰崇信，叔曰崇俨，皆为西头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148531_comment'></div>季曰崇仁，幼而未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148531_comment'></div>有后之义，其在兹乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148531_comment'></div>女二人：长适殿直张永福，左千牛卫将军再兴之子也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1148531_comment'></div>次许忠武军节度使、太师潘公之孙，未行而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1148531_comment'></div>公学军旅之事，负将帅之才，绵历两朝，遭逢四主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1148531_comment'></div>阃外之政，多识便宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1148531_comment'></div>禁中之言，未尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1148531", 1148531, "Clauses/287/Comments/0")'>漏露</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1148531_comment'></div>守封疆则尽命，援桴鼓则忘身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1148531_comment'></div>家无馀财，军有遗爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1148531_comment'></div>降年不永，大勋未立，可痛惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1148531_comment'></div>尝试论之曰：自古画策安边、铭功绝域者，赵充国、班定远称为名将，然皆年馀七十，垂老穷荒而后能著其效，非一朝一夕之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1148531_comment'></div>向使公天假之年，如二贤之寿，则丑虏不足平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1148531_comment'></div>见托勒铭，直书无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1148531_comment'></div>其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_1148531'>天难谌兮命靡常，国不幸兮人之亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1148531_comment'></div>公之生兮威加北荒，何以贵之兮驷诐彭彭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1148531_comment'></div>公之没兮魂游东岱，何以赠之兮珥貂煌煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1148531_comment'></div>遗英风兮传雁塞，閟贞魄兮启牛冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1148531_comment'></div>铭真宅兮昭茂绩，随地久兮天长。</div><div id='poem_sentence_102_1148531_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有书答张知白。作品：《答张知白书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（或作于淳化二年。）</span><div id='poem_1148380' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148380' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148380?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答张知白书</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148380")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148380_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148380'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148380'>某白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148380_comment'></div>校书先辈足下：辱示《籍田赋》、《污樽铭》、律赋、歌行凡五章，且以书先，似有所质于仆者，何过听自损之若是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148380_comment'></div>岂所谓「敏而好学」、「不耻下问」者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148380_comment'></div>仆虽不敏，得不为足下少陈梗概，以叶大《易》「同声」之义哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148380_comment'></div>夫赋之作，本乎诗者也，自两汉以来文士，若相如、扬雄、班固辈皆为之，盖六义之一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148380_comment'></div>洎隋唐始以科试取进士，而赋之名变而为律，则与古戾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148380_comment'></div>然拘变声病，以难后学，至使鸿藻硕儒，有不能下笔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148380_comment'></div>虽壮夫不为，亦仕进之羽翼，不可无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148380_comment'></div>铭之义本乎钟鼎，孔悝之家庙详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148380_comment'></div>歌又杂诗之伦也，故《书》曰：「诗言志，歌永言」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148380_comment'></div>又《诗序》云：「嗟叹之不足，则永歌之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148380_comment'></div>此其始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148380_comment'></div>吁哉后人，流荡忘反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148380_comment'></div>盖其得也，荐宗庙，播管弦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148380_comment'></div>其失也，语淫奔，事诡怪而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148380_comment'></div>凡是数者，足下尽知之矣，仆又申明之者，欲足下深识之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148380_comment'></div>仆尝隶东观、直纶阁者数年矣，天下举公，以文相售，固亦众焉，如足下之文，实亦鲜得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148380_comment'></div>况可畏之年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148380", 1148380, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>日新</span>之业，仆安敢测其涯涘乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148380_comment'></div>来书勤拳，聊以此报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148380_comment'></div>某白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148380_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有文。作品：《授王扶大理评事忠武军节度掌书记制》《条制三司不得将可断公事闻奏敕》<div id='poem_1148274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授王扶大理评事忠武军节度掌书记制</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148274")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148274'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148274'>敕将仕郎、守大名府清平县主簿王扶：古人云：知人实难，而受知不易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148274_comment'></div>尔以文学策名，以廉平佐邑，而忠武军节度使潘美谓尔有折冲樽俎之略，纵横书檄之才，爰上奏章，命为记室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148274_comment'></div>且拜廷评之秩，俾增戎幕之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148274_comment'></div>彼知人而不疑，尔受知而何报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148274_comment'></div>勉思婉画，勿忝初筵。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1148274_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>条制三司不得将可断公事闻奏敕</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148275")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148275_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148275'>敕：朝廷设官分职，各有所司，委任责成，皆宜集事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148275_comment'></div>至于帐籍错误，行遣稽迟，显有刑名，并可断决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148275_comment'></div>自非公然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148275", 1148275, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>作弊</span>，岂合辄便上言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148275_comment'></div>近日臣僚，殊乖职分，至于琐细，无不奏陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148275_comment'></div>匪惟烦黩朕听，兼亦紊乱官守，曾非举职，但欲邀功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148275_comment'></div>宜行条制之文，用绝僭差之路。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1148275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有诗送姚铉赴宣城任。作品：《送姚著作（铉）之任宣城》<div id='poem_74865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李著作</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_74865'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74865'>芸阁新衔捧诏归，历阳湖畔拜庭闱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74865'>已闻爱子披朱绂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，犹学婴儿著䌽衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74865'>饭馈海陵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_74865", 74865, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>红稻</span>软<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，鲙擎淮水白鱼肥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74865'>吾生自失荣亲禄，谩踏花砖入北扉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74865'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_74865'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_74865_0'>⑴ 自注：著作郎君已赐服色（原作邑，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_74865_0'>⑵ 原作软稻，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本乙</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_74865_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=990&endYear=990')">990年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。田锡赴陈州任，禹称先后作诗七首贻之。作品：《送田舍人出牧淮阳》<div id='poem_75126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送田舍人出牧淮阳</a><span class='authorDate'>（990年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75126")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_75126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75126'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75126'>药树吟多且握兰，蔼然公议<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作誉）</span>满<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_0_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75133'>有道不在位，颜回舜之徒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75133'>无德殃且至，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_75133", 75133, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>商受</span>为独夫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75133'>以此固名节，富贵安足图。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75133'>睢阳戚先生，今世古之儒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75133'>终身不求仕，没齿唯诵书。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75133'>孝爱睦姻族，淳谨化里闾。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75133'>文翁变蜀土，尚以德位俱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75133'>仲淹居汾水，专用素教敷。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75133'>青青子衿辈，栉比曳朝裾。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75133'>盛德苟无报，吾道将焉如。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75133'>鲤庭生二子，骊颔委双珠。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75133'>朴厚有父风，学业张皇谟。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75133'>各登进士科，齐乘使者车。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75133'>阆中佐郡政，亳社司搉酤。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75133'>佐郡古半刺，可使茕嫠苏。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75133'>搉酤今权道，亦助军国须。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75133'>牵车骥虽屈，补履刃有馀。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。在西掖，始见白发，作诗记之。作品：《阁下咏怀》<div id='poem_75136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
