id='poem_sentence_2_74617'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74617_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年2月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。春，丁谓来访，告归日，禹称赠之以序。作品：《送丁谓序》<div id='poem_1148409' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148409' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148409?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送丁谓序</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148409")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148409_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148409'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148409'>主上躬耕之岁，仆始自长洲宰被召入见，由大理评事得右正言，分直东观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148409_comment'></div>既岁满，入西掖掌诰，且二年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148409_comment'></div>由是今之举进士者，以文相售，岁不下数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148409_comment'></div>朝请之馀，历览忘怠，然有视其命题而罢者，有读数句而倦者，有终一篇而止者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148409_comment'></div>或诗可采，其赋则无有也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148409_comment'></div>或赋可称，其文则无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148409_comment'></div>能全之者，百不四五，况宗经树教、著书立言之士乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148409_comment'></div>去年得富春生孙何文数十篇，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148409", 1148409, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>格高意远</span>，大得六经旨趣，仆因声于同列间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148409_comment'></div>或曰：「有济阳丁谓者，何之同志也，其文与何不相上下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148409_comment'></div>仆未之信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148409_comment'></div>会有以生之文示仆者，视之，则前言不诬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148409_comment'></div>是秋，何来访，仆既与之交，又得生之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148409", 1148409, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>履行</span>甚熟，且渴其惠顾于我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148409_comment'></div>今春生果来，益以新文二编，为书以投我，其间有律诗、今体赋文，非向所号进士者能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148409_comment'></div>其诗效杜子美，深入其间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148409_comment'></div>其文数章，皆意不常而语不俗，若杂于韩柳集中，使能文之士读之，不之辨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148409_comment'></div>由是两制间咸愿识其面而交其心矣，翰林贾公尤加叹服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148409_comment'></div>是知道之尊人也，岂位也乎哉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148409_comment'></div>学之富人也，岂赀也乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148409_comment'></div>今之不勤于道、不力于学而望人之知者，宜视丁氏子之道何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148409_comment'></div>告归许田，序以为赠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148409_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年3月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。为书致薛惟吉以荐丁谓。作品：《荐丁谓与薛太保书》<div id='poem_1148374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荐丁谓与薛太保书</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148374")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148374'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148374'>三月一日，左司谏、知制诰王某谨致书于淮海薛侯閤下：先民有言曰：贵视其所举，富视其所与，贫视其所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148374_comment'></div>今天下贵而举人者，有大丞相在，此不复议，直以取与之道干于阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148374_comment'></div>非为己也，将为人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148374_comment'></div>非止为人也，又将为道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148374_comment'></div>唯閤下详择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148374_comment'></div>有进士丁谓者，今之巨儒也，其道师于六经，汎于群史，而斥乎诸子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148374_comment'></div>其文类韩、柳，其诗类杜甫，其性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148374", 1148374, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>孤特</span>，其行介洁，亦三贤之俦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148374_comment'></div>先君尝为泾原从事，幼而侍行，故参政窦公抚顶叹异，以女妻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148374_comment'></div>伟乎窦公，能知人也如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148374_comment'></div>去年冬，携文百篇游辇毂下，两制司言之，臣览之振骇，佥谓今之举人，未有出乎右者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148374_comment'></div>仆与之游甚熟，问其居则曰家颍川，问其业则曰衣食之具仅不给妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148374_comment'></div>斯亦圣朝之遗贤，吾道之深耻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148374_comment'></div>且念世之服儒冠而得禄者，位至尚书，则月俸五万，而给长幼者，三分有二，其下从可知矣，又安能哀王孙而知国士乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148374_comment'></div>至于分茅土、为公侯者，仆又希识其面矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148374_comment'></div>唯閤下以名相之子，得大将军官，而能市义礼贤，读书好古，知丁谓者非侯而谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148374_comment'></div>是以裁书荐才，不远千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148374_comment'></div>至止之日，幸解榻焉，勿使郭代公、于襄阳辈独称义于前代也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148374_comment'></div>某白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1148374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年7月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。代赵普作表文。作品：《谢手诏别录赐生辰国信表》《谢传宣抚问表》<div id='poem_1148343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢手诏别录赐生辰国信表</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148343")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148343'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148343'>臣某言：今月日，伏蒙圣慈差臣男某官押赐臣生辰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148343_comment'></div>天眷回光，私门积耀，方动劬劳之感，忽承睿圣之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148343_comment'></div>举族为荣，百身何报！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148343_comment'></div>伏念臣才非兼济，运偶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148343", 1148343, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>重熙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148343_comment'></div>一言无补于宸聪，三入徒尘于相位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148343_comment'></div>向以虚羸遘疾，筋力不支，优容犹列于上台，拜谒不拘于常礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148343_comment'></div>死难塞责，方期伏枕以上章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148343_comment'></div>疾既有瘳，亦合悬车而告老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148343_comment'></div>尚恋文明之德，冀伸补报之心，岂谓陛下特记生辰，曲回睿眷，衣袭六宫之制，器分三品之珍，出鞍马于内闲，分䌽缯于天府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148343_comment'></div>惟惭老朽，不称鲜华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148343_comment'></div>无褐无衣，益负下民之愧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148343_comment'></div>有始有卒，空知上圣之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148343_comment'></div>惟思苦口之言，以尽致君之节，过此以往，莫知所为。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1148343_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148344' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148344' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148344?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢传宣抚问表</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148344")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148344_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148344'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148344'>臣某言：臣男某押生辰国信至，伏蒙圣慈，召赴崇政殿，面传宣示抚问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148344_comment'></div>俯听圣语，如对天颜，涕泣感恩，兢惶失次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148344_comment'></div>伏念臣遭逢有素，功业无闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148344_comment'></div>亦尝潜数昔贤，略徵近代：刘仁轨处保釐之任，功著征辽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148344_comment'></div>裴晋公兼将相之权，勋高伐蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148344_comment'></div>称为国老，不愧后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148344_comment'></div>臣无此勤劳，有此名位，未谐休退，常负忧虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148344_comment'></div>岂意生辰，尚关圣念，特垂宠锡，俾耀衰残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148344_comment'></div>词臣草诏于玉堂，已循往例；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148344_comment'></div>家子授宣于金口，事则非常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148344_comment'></div>万死百身，终难补报，无任涕咽感恩之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148344_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有论。作品：《用刑论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（约在淳化元、二年间。）</span><div id='poem_1148455' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148455' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148455?labeling=true' target='_blank'>用刑论</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148455")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148455_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148455'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148455'>予自幼服儒教，味经术，尝不喜法家流，少恩而深刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148455_comment'></div>洎擢第入官，决断民讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148455_comment'></div>又会诏下为吏者，皆明法令，考绩之日，用是为殿最，乃留意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148455_comment'></div>后以制诰舍人领廷尉，朝夕阅视，亦少详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148455_comment'></div>然见其用刑，与古相戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148455_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148455_comment'></div>今法吏所禁之切者，曰故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148455", 1148455, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>出入人罪</span>而已，法皆以全罪论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148455_comment'></div>予读《家语·始诛篇》，见仲尼为鲁司寇，戮乱法大夫少正卯于两观之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148455_comment'></div>及数其罪，则曰：「心逆而险，行僻而坚，言伪而辩，学非而博，顺非而泽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148455_comment'></div>此五者有一于人，则不免君子之诛」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148455_comment'></div>以今之法治之，正卯之罪无正科，其在不应得而为乎罪，当笞尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148455_comment'></div>苟以圣人之法诛之，是故入人之罪者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148455_comment'></div>又有子讼父者，同狴执之，三月不别，其父请止，夫子赦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148455_comment'></div>及季孙不悦，乃叹之曰：「上失其道而杀其下，非理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148455_comment'></div>不教以孝而听其狱，是杀其不辜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148455_comment'></div>以今法论之，子讼父者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148455_comment'></div>茍以圣人之法赦之，是故出人之罪者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148455_comment'></div>呜呼，古今之不同也如是，遂使圣人之言为空文尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148455_comment'></div>欲望刑措，其可得乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148455_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有序。作品：《东观集序》<div id='poem_1148438' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148438?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东观集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148438")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148438_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148438'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148438'>士君子者，道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148438_comment'></div>行道者，位也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148438_comment'></div>道与位并，则敷而为业，《皋陶》、《益稷谟》、《伊训》之类是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148438_comment'></div>道高位下，则垂之于文章，仲尼经籍，荀、孟、扬雄之书之类是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148438_comment'></div>洎三王道丧，五伯风行，有位之人以彊兵为事业，在野之士以小辩为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148438_comment'></div>虽两汉遏其颓波，而六朝荡其馀烬，天未厌德，付于李唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148438_comment'></div>然而三百年间，圣贤相会，事业之大者，贞观、开元；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148438_comment'></div>文章之盛者，贞元、长庆而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148438_comment'></div>咸通而下，不足徵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148438_comment'></div>企及三代，其惟圣朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148438_comment'></div>我法天崇道皇帝之宅天下也，守尧之仁，躬禹之勤，奋成汤之武，阐姬昌之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148438_comment'></div>仁以布政，故兆民之心归焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148438_comment'></div>勤以开国，故九土之贡入焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148438_comment'></div>武以定乱，故奸雄跋扈弭焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148438_comment'></div>文以化俗，故《诗》《书》《礼》《乐》行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148438_comment'></div>是以儒教兴，贤臣出，事业昭于上，文章灿于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148438_comment'></div>德生人而未有，道与皇而比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148438_comment'></div>天下文明，我弗多让，然而汉文之代，贾谊之道不行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148438_comment'></div>元和之时，李贺之才自夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148438_comment'></div>天弗与命，位不称才，岂曰无时，亦将有数，故著作郎、直史馆罗君之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148438_comment'></div>君讳处约，字思纯，其先京兆万年人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148438_comment'></div>曾祖彖，长安令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148438_comment'></div>彖弟衮，有文学大名，历事僖、昭二帝，入梁为谏议大夫，有文集行于代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148438_comment'></div>祖仅，万年令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148438_comment'></div>父济，皇朝太常丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148438_comment'></div>处约九岁能赋诗，十三通经义，尤长于《易》，故所为文，必臻乎道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148438_comment'></div>二十六，御前擢进士第，解褐宿州临涣簿，再命苏州吴县宰，得大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148438_comment'></div>雍熙中被召赴阙，试文于相府，制授大著作，直太史氏，面赐银章朱绂以荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148438_comment'></div>明年乘使车，将帝命，按狱讼于江浙，采风谣于湘潭，举善发奸，不避权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148438_comment'></div>虽被劾者侧目，而君子是之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148438_comment'></div>不幸以淳化元年十一月卧疾终于家，年三十三，亦贾谊、李贺之俦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148438_comment'></div>友人翰林学士、尚书祠部郎中、知制诰苏易简，左司谏、知制诰王某以布素之分，哭之恸，收其遗文，洒泪编次，勒成十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148438_comment'></div>以其终于史职，目为《东观集》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148438_comment'></div>总歌诗、赋、颂、私试五题、杂文、碑记、书启、序引、表状、祭文凡数百章，十万馀言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148438_comment'></div>其间有《东皋子楚义帝碑》，《录希夷子言》，《书野叟壁》数篇，极乎天人之际者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148438_comment'></div>味其文，知其志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148438_comment'></div>噫，国初已来，才有馀而位不至者，若寿光李均、襄阳观风从事郭昱、太常博士董淳、太子中允颖贽，斯皆赍志没地，垂之空文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148438_comment'></div>异日国家诏史臣修《文苑传》，此数人者不可遗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148438_comment'></div>使处约之名与之同列，文亦无愧，行又过之，亦足彰好文之朝得贤之盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148438_comment'></div>故并序其官氏，拜章进御，乞付三馆，亦所以备史笔之阙文也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1148438_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有诗。作品：《栽木芙蓉》<div id='poem_75139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>栽木芙蓉</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_75139'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75139'>忆在长洲县，手植芙蓉花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75139'>春栽秋成树，枝叶青婆娑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75139'>八月寒露下，朵朵开红葩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75139'>轻团蜀江锦，碎剪赤城霞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75139'>香侵宾朋坐，艳拂人吏衙。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75139'>凌霜伴松菊，满地如桑麻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75139'>岁寒万木脱，斫笋留根查。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75139'>春雷一声动，又长新枝柯。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75139'>良因地脉宜，岂在人力多。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75139'>今来帝城里，赁宅如蜂窠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75139'>阶前栽数根，换土拥新沙。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75139'>浇溉汲御沟，盖覆堆野莎。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75139'>经春不出土，入夏方有芽。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75139'>穷秋竟憔悴，花小尤不嘉。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75139'>地气移物性，自念良可嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75139'>还同山野人，强为簪组加。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75139'>妨贤将致诮，薄俸未充家。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75139'>所以多病身，少年双鬓华。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75139'>紫微虽云贵，白发将奈何。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75139'>终焉太平世，散地恣狂歌<span class='inlineComment2'>（《永乐大典》卷五四○）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75139'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_75139_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有文。作品：《记马》<div id='poem_1148472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记马</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148472")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148472_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148472'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148472'>今谏议大夫东莞臧公丙，予之执友也，其先人事故魏王符公彦卿，谏议亦颇熟王之家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148472_comment'></div>为予言：「王之在邺也，多畜名马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148472_comment'></div>其牝亦有良者，为之息种，岁择健马以配之，往往得骏骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148472_comment'></div>居一岁，有牝产子，与他驹特异者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148472_comment'></div>既壮，圉人将以合其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148472_comment'></div>当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148472", 1148472, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>孳尾</span>之月，出而示之，见其所生，卒无欣合之态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148472_comment'></div>将强之，则蹄齧不可向迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148472_comment'></div>圉人复曰：『以是驹配是母，幸而骝，其骏必倍，不幸而骒，又获其种，明年将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148472", 1148472, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>胥靡</span>之，不可失也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148472_comment'></div>乃以数牝马诱之，乘䘒作之势，以巾幂其目，间而进其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148472_comment'></div>既已彻巾，然后晓其所生，因垂耳俛首，若不欲活者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148472_comment'></div>旁顾适有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148472", 1148472, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>永巷</span>，修直百馀步，巷际有闬闳，扃鐍甚固，盖常所不启者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148472_comment'></div>遂哀鸣疾驰，以首触其铺，如是者数踣而死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148472_comment'></div>呜呼，《礼》称「禽兽无礼，故父子聚麀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148472_comment'></div>夫马本兽也，古圣人调伏而御之，故曰「伏牛乘马」是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148472_comment'></div>是马也，兽其身而人其心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148472_comment'></div>圉人诱陷，知耻而死，于小人之心也远矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148472_comment'></div>圉人之心望于禽兽者，又远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148472_comment'></div>予尝恨不目睹其事，具弊帷以葬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148472_comment'></div>又惧其事久泯而不传，且欲警声色狗马之家与世之内乱者，故记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148472_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。暮春，王禹偁侍宴琼林苑，独得宋太宗褒扬。作品：《初出京过琼林苑》<div id='poem_75033' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75033' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75033?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初出京过琼林苑<span "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75033")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75033_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75033'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75033'>忽忆今春暮，宫花照苑墙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75033'>琼林侍游宴，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_75033", 75033, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>金口</span>独褒扬。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75033'>屏息闻天语，酡颜醉御觞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_75033_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年7月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。党项李继迁奉表归顺，太宗赏之，及其弟与母，制词皆为禹称所草。后继迁送润笔费马五十匹，禹称却而不受。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年8月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。禹称兼判大理寺，执法为徐铉雪诬，抗疏论道安告奸不实罪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年9月</a>　在京任左司谏、知制诰。有书与冯伉。作品：《与冯伉书》<div id='poem_1148376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148376' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148376?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与冯伉书</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148376")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148376'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148376'>某读唐史，见陆忠州之在相位也，摈斥李吉甫，不容于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148376_comment'></div>及贽有南宾之贬，而吉甫方为刺史，贽之门人故吏亦皆危之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148376_comment'></div>洎到贬所，而吉甫待之颇厚，有庶僚见宰相礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148376_comment'></div>又赞皇公之秉钧也，排逐牛僧孺，有循州之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148376_comment'></div>及德裕南迁，奇章公量移在汝，赞皇路由此郡，而僧孺接之，情礼甚至，为道南方风土之宜，殊不以向之嫌隙为意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148376_comment'></div>贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148376_comment'></div>二君子之操心也如是，岂古之所谓以德报怨者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148376_comment'></div>某向以紫微郎兼廷尉事，亦尝议閤下之过，今有商于之命，而亲友间往往相唁，诚以閤下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148376", 1148376, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>通理</span>是郡也，某则独以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148376_comment'></div>且夫以怨报怨，皆私事也，故虽睚眦必报矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148376_comment'></div>今某于閤下，议刑，公事也，擢第，同年也，閤下岂以为怨乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148376_comment'></div>虽某之名位<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148376", 1148376, "Clauses/38/Comments/1")'>才业</span>望忠州、赞皇也远矣，而閤下读书为文，立身行事，岂不知吉甫、僧孺之为人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148376_comment'></div>望閤下观古人之行，敦同年之契，穷愁之中，少假气焰，则迁客之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148376_comment'></div>某顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1148376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年9月2日</a>　禹称解知制诰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年8月己卯</a>　授禹称左正言。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年</a>　在京任左正言。秋间，赋《览照》诗，深信所撰诗文定能流传后世。<div id='poem_74834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年</a>　在京任左正言。秋间，汝州团练副使宋湜与王禹偁并召入，为礼部员外郎。作品：《赠礼部宋员外阁老(湜)》<div id='poem_75011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75011' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年11月8日</a>　在京任左正言。王禹偁、宋湜均兼昭文馆，不久，禹称上《陈情表》<div id='poem_1148286' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148286' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1148286'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148286'>臣某言：臣闻改过自新，人臣之晚节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148286_comment'></div>弃瑕责效，王者之旧章<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148286_comment'></div>伏念臣近自冗员，再叨谏署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148286_comment'></div>秋兰解佩，重呼泽畔之魂；<div id='poem_sentence_5_1148286_comment'></div>其如亲寄解梁，身趣魏阙，四海无立锥之地，一家有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148286", 1148286, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>悬磬</span>之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148286_comment'></div>以至仆马龙钟，杂于工祝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148286_comment'></div>弟兄分散，迫于饥寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148286_comment'></div>若非内受职名，赐之实俸，外求差使，以救食贫，则曷以养高堂垂白之亲，备上国燃金之费？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148286_comment'></div>望云就日，非无恋阙之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148286_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148286", 1148286, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>玉粒桂薪</span>，未有住京之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148286_comment'></div>伏望尊号皇帝陛下念臣过而能改，进不因人，或西垣再命于演纶，或东鲁且令于承乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148286_comment'></div>唯中外之二任，系君亲之一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148286_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣无任僭越兢忧悃愊待罪之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1148286_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_8_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75085'>因令把笔写我意，为渠吟作雪中讴。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75085'>昔为副使不理事，待罪且免忧人忧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75085'>今为谏官非冗长，拾遗三馆俸入优。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75085'>秋来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_75085", 75085, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>连澍</span>百日雨，禾黍漂溺多不收。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75085'>如今行潦占南亩，农夫失望无来麰。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75085'>尔看门外饥饿者，往往<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_75085", 75085, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>僵殕</span>填渠沟。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75085'>峨冠旅进又旅退，曾无一事裨皇猷。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75085'>俸钱一月数家赋，朝衣一袭几人裘。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75085'>安边不学赵充国，富民不作田千秋。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75085'>胡为碌碌事文笔，歌时颂圣如俳优。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75085'>一家衣食仰在我，纵得饱暖如狗偷。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75085'>况我眼昏头渐白，安能隐几勤校雠。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75085'>何时提汝归田去，卖马可易数只牛。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75085'>深耕浅种苟自给，藜羹豆粥充饥喉。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75085'>黍畦锄理学元亮，瓜田浇灌师秦侯。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75085'>素餐免作疲人蠹，开卷免对古人羞。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75085'>未行此志吾戚戚，对酒不饮抑有由。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75085'>斯言不敢向人道，语尔小子为贻谋。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75085'></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_75085_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年</a>　在京任左正言。有诗次韵冯伉。作品：《次韵和仲咸对雪散吟三十韵》<div id='poem_75093' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75093' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75093?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和仲咸对雪散吟三十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（993年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75093")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75093_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75093'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75093'>静对春天雪，时烹月俸茶<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：副使俸唯茶一色。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75093'>久闲便<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：平。）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_75093", 75093, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>澹薄</span>，渐老厌諠哗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75093'>徙倚终朝看，溟濛向晓加。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75093'>应同头上发，复乱眼中花。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75093'>光暝侵灯暗，声繁拂竹斜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75093'>东风吹片片，北户积些些。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75093'>最豁三农望，匀淹百草芽。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75093'>润胜天上露，媚掩日边霞。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75093'>史笔应先纪，丰年的不赊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75093'>舞萦农叟袂，飘逐使君车。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75093'>善政商于郡，优闲副使家。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75093'>酒钱随分有，诗笔且须誇。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75093'>岸洒泉声好<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：公署南即丹水。）</span>，园滋荠色嘉<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：商于地暖，雪中多荠。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75093'>无心思北阙，有兴读南华。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75093'>地隐商于洛，山绵楚与巴<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：南山东入楚，南连巴峡。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75093'>拖肠甘似鼠，画足不争蛇。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75093'>有病如原宪，无才敌景差<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：一云力何反，取以叶韵。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75093'>由来叩寂寞，全胜事骄奢。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75093'>世态诚堪笑，前贤亦可嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75093'>绛侯憎贾谊，白傅怨王涯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75093'>宣室终前席，浔阳暂种畬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75093'>升沉常自得，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_75093", 75093, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>消息</span>一何佳。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75093'>自顾曾伤翼，甘同不食瓜。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75093'>但全蝼蚁命，敢斗虎狼牙。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75093'>竹箭天生直，潢污地本洼。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75093'>敢云求富贵，且免奉奸邪。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75093'>夜黑灯烧桦<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：商州无油，多烧桦烛。）</span>，朝饥饭带砂。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75093'>尚惭纡紫绶，岂望署黄麻。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75093'>亲寿高如鹤，儿娇语似鸦。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_75093'>时时倾一酌，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_75093", 75093, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>聚口</span>笑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_75093", 75093, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>唅呀</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75093'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_75093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75093'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_75093_0'>⑴ 自注：白公始右赞善贬江州刺史，时王涯为中书舍人，上言罚太轻，不可使为治民官，遂再贬司马，终身怨之。及闻甘露事，赋诗云：当君白首同归日，是我青山独往时。盖为涯作也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_75093_0'>⑵ 自注：白公江州诗云结茅栽芋种畬田。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75093_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年</a>　在京任左正言。有诗和冯伉。作品：《仲咸因春游商山下，得三怪石，辇致郡斋，甚有幽趣，序其始末，题六十韵见示，依韵和之》<div id='poem_75088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仲咸因春游商山下得三怪石辇致郡斋甚有幽趣序其始末题六十韵见示依韵和之</a><span class='authorDate'>（993年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75088")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75088'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75088'>咏尽千峰雪，吟行六里春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75088'>布多成暇政，方称好闲身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75088'>物得商山下，形如震泽根。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75088'>初期谷城叟，乍<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>遇魏榆神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75088'>固异它山石，还同似玉珉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75088'>绕看犹汩没，斲见渐轮囷。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75088'>草拥才抽甲，烟封几<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_75088", 75088, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>得辛</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75088'>绿藏苔漠漠，青乱叶蓁蓁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75088'>蛟蜃浑疑活，琳琅势逼真。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75088'>杖敲清有韵，衣拂莹无尘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75088'>起似生徐甲，扶如醉伯伦。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75088'>知吾怜磊落<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：吾，代仲咸言。）</span>，移尔出荒榛。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75088'>留滞诚为久，遭逢盖有因。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75088'>胜携堕鹊印，喜过骇鸡玲。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75088'>齐列幽斋畔，休藏古涧滨。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75088'>未邀耽酒客<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：自谓也。）</span>，先对抱琴人<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：仲咸好琴。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75088'>带藓形虽瘦，穿交<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>气已振。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75088'>自非怀峭绝，安得免沉沦。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75088'>月影无云夕，烟姿有雪辰。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75088'>参差光互动，高下势相均。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75088'>接待同嘉士，搜求等隽民。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75088'>苍茫劳拂拭，感遇似陶钧。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75088'>抚惜情如旧，装添景自新。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75088'>窗风声淅淅，檐鸟语欣欣。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75088'>映合移红药，遮须剪绿筠。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75088'>使君安置后，勾我往来频。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75088'>扪摸闲垂袖，偎挨醉脱巾。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75088'>海山低岌嶪<span class='inlineComment2'>（二字原缺，据清抄本补）</span>，华岳小嶙峋。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75088'>鹭毳莹如霰，蜗涎曳似银。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_75088'>峰峦轻菡萏，雕琢笑麒麟。<div id='poem_sentence_29_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75088'>雨霁岚光滴，春晴黛点匀。<div id='poem_sentence_30_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_75088'>鼎分聊自得，芝秀好相亲。<div id='poem_sentence_31_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_75088'>宋陨知难及，秦鞭似弗仁。<div id='poem_sentence_32_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_75088'>无瑕收作宝，不速敬如宾。<div id='poem_sentence_33_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_75088'>仙掌怜应拔，山眉妒亦嚬。<div id='poem_sentence_34_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_75088'>罅开青虎眼，痕駮黑虬鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_35_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_75088'>怪隐深难测，神驱恐不遵。<div id='poem_sentence_36_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_75088'>倚多凉透骨，卧近冷侵茵。<div id='poem_sentence_37_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_75088'>蹙缩回蛇尾，谽谺齰兽唇。<div id='poem_sentence_38_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_75088'>玉堆深愧白<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，黛泼不如彬<sup class='reference id='poem_sentence_44_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_75088'>似龙兼易扰，如虎岂难驯。<div id='poem_sentence_45_75088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_75165'>器小识不远，当年事头角。<div id='poem_sentence_43_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_75165'>遭时得一第，游宦何龌龊。<div id='poem_sentence_44_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_75165'>逐膻甚蚍蜉，斗耀同𧐔𧕋。<div id='poem_sentence_45_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_75165'>宰邑乏弦歌，谏垣无謇谔。<div id='poem_sentence_46_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_75165'>便蕃朱紫绶，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_75165", 75165, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>僭忝</span>丝纶阁。<div id='poem_sentence_47_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_75165'>方号骙骙龙，已困狺狺㹱。<div id='poem_sentence_48_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_75165'>待罪始知非，咄哉昧先觉。<div id='poem_sentence_49_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_75165'>一聆高世行，罪发庸可擢。<div id='poem_sentence_50_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_75165'>忍耻赋三章，尘埃寄寥廓。<div id='poem_sentence_51_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_75165'>中条围解县，五老烟龊龊<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作漠漠）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_55_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_75165'>米呼村婢舂，樵雇山僮斫。<div id='poem_sentence_58_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_75165'>喂马捽寒芜，看书爇秋箨。<div id='poem_sentence_59_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_75165'>信口亦吟哦，放心无适莫。<div id='poem_sentence_60_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_75165'>君恩已绝望，人事终难度。<div id='poem_sentence_61_75165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
