ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年</a>　在京任左正言。有墓志铭。作品：《故商州团练使翟公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1148534' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148534' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148534?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故商州团练使翟公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（993年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148534")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148534_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148534'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148534'>公讳守素，字昭俭，济州任城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148534_comment'></div>其先盖汉丞相方进之裔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148534_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，皇任某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148534_comment'></div>祖讳某，皇任太子少保致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148534_comment'></div>考某，皇任率府率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148534_comment'></div>公，即率府之次子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148534_comment'></div>天福初以荫入仕，补左班殿直，转供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148534_comment'></div>自晋至汉，时乱位卑，祗役不暇，故勤虽至而功未立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148534_comment'></div>洎周高祖以来，奉皇华，将密命，号为称职者，屈指比数，公首与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148534_comment'></div>世宗初平淮甸，诏公为蕲州兵马监押兼沿江巡检，善修其职，改承天军使，自是声绩闻于时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148534_comment'></div>我太祖神德皇帝乾德中始议平蜀，用许帅王全斌为主将，且择使臣恭谨者随军任使，而公实从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148534_comment'></div>蜀既平，公奉捷书，驰驲骑入奏，入祖嘉之，擢授引进副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148534_comment'></div>时故中书令石公以佐命元勋，始拜平章事，镇汶阳，乃诏公为郓州生辰国信使，赏劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148534_comment'></div>寻加判四方馆事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148534_comment'></div>且以全蜀虽下，群盗未息，再命公分屯士卒，经略郡县，乘传往复，颇得机宜，由是益亲信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148534_comment'></div>开宝中，麟、府二州番族搔动，以争地不决，闻于朝廷，公承诏和戎，部落悦服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148534_comment'></div>扈从辇辂，薄伐并门，转引进使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148534_comment'></div>出为成都管内十州都巡检使，赐钱五百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148534_comment'></div>谢日，复受宣充凤翔府魏王符公官告使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148534_comment'></div>公以锡赉优厚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148534", 1148534, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>恳让</span>不已，太祖曰：「汝十州巡警，烦费亦多，不足让也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148534_comment'></div>当时宠任，在同列间，鲜有其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148534_comment'></div>及受代归朝，会淮海王入觐，命公迎劳，颇得礼容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148534_comment'></div>并寇稽诛，大勋未集辑，公与洺州防御使郭进领偏师侵掠，深入敌境，至五台县界，取禾蹂稼，实有力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148534_comment'></div>今上嗣宝图，行兑泽，授客省使、宪州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148534_comment'></div>会梅山洞蛮恃险叛乱，受诏为都部署，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148534", 1148534, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>招怀</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148534", 1148534, "Clauses/90/Comments/1")'>讨击</span>，五溪悉平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148534_comment'></div>淮海王纳版图，奉朝请，公为两浙十三州安抚使，寻知杭州军州事，劳来安辑，浙民便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148534_comment'></div>政成召归，为西京都巡检使，因权知河南府兼留守司事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148534_comment'></div>浩穰之政，雅亚上都，简事勤公，月馀自理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148534_comment'></div>加以修宫阙，奉轺传，贵倖旁午，终无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148534_comment'></div>加商州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148534_comment'></div>上念延安戎夏杂处，以公麟、府之役，深识番情，知延州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148534_comment'></div>端拱初，边鄙未宁，胡羯南牧，议者或请坚壁以待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148534_comment'></div>公以河北诸州缮修城垒，遂充天雄军兵马钤辖、知大名府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148534_comment'></div>复以上党近边，素称难治，知潞州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148534_comment'></div>咸有课最，达于朝端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148534_comment'></div>上方考古道，兴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1148534", 1148534, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>方田</span>，俾封疆之臣，修耕战之备，公为代北<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1148534", 1148534, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>方田</span>都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148534_comment'></div>事毕，改并州兵马钤辖，移夏州驻泊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148534_comment'></div>未几，知凤翔府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148534_comment'></div>朝议以赵保忠归镇夏台，可息经费，求其监护，无易公者，遂再往焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148534_comment'></div>公承上戢下，颇叶便宜，改石州驻泊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148534_comment'></div>上以公驰驱且久，齿发渐高，俾归郡封，以均劳逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148534_comment'></div>在郡周岁，方将拜章乞骸，归老田里，以淳化三年八月五日遘疾，终于官舍，享年七十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148534_comment'></div>娶张氏，封清河郡君，先公而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148534_comment'></div>子二人，长某早亡，次继恩，右班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148534_comment'></div>孙若干人，长惟德，商州衙内都指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148534_comment'></div>四年四月某日葬于开封府某县某乡某里，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148534_comment'></div>公历四朝，事八主，检校官自常侍至太保，兼官自监察至大夫，阶自银青至光禄，勋自武骑尉至上柱国，爵自县男至郡侯，食邑自三百户至一千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148534_comment'></div>惟公谦和畏慎，慈惠恭谨，积此八者，终身不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148534_comment'></div>尝莅大都，临剧务，无留事，无败狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148534_comment'></div>以矜严训军旅，以持重守边防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148534_comment'></div>出疆有专对之才，行师无失律之咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148534_comment'></div>世之称谙练时务者，公实首焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148534_comment'></div>及治商于，郡事尤简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148534_comment'></div>盖国家优贤养老，且休息之，而早夜孜孜，未始懈怠，若初筮仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148534_comment'></div>每断一大辟，虽罪状明白，了无所疑，亦必委细咨询，遍乎僚吏，以至再三，而后用法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148534_comment'></div>复能不忤物，不近名，奉诏条外，不求赫赫之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148534_comment'></div>知属吏过失，未尝面言，必因公宴，引数十年前事，曰某人尝为某过，得某罪，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1148534", 1148534, "Clauses/211/Comments/0")'>旁指曲谕</span>，微警诫之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148534_comment'></div>周旋慎密，率多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148534_comment'></div>故能四十年间，无纤芥之过，始全身于乱世，终立事于清朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148534_comment'></div>语侯伯间，未易可得，考终牖下，不亦休哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148534_comment'></div>某左官商山，实公之副，熟闻履行，得以直书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148534_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_1148534'>官二千石，世禄之厚，公能守兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148534_comment'></div>齿七十一，人生之寿，公能有兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148534_comment'></div>委质明代，保无咎兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148534_comment'></div>归全幽宅，光有后兮。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_1148534'></div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1148534_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年10月</a>　在京任左正言。代吕蒙正作表文。作品：《代吕相公（蒙正）辞起复第二表》<div id='poem_1148349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148349?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代吕相公辞起复第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（993年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148349")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148349_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148349'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148349'>草土臣某言：臣方处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148349", 1148349, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>哀摧</span>，忽闻恩命，泣血负罪，号天自陈，诏旨未从，荒迷殆绝<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148349_comment'></div>伏念臣燮调无状，侍养乖方，于国于家，非忠非孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148349_comment'></div>不自殒灭，招此鞠凶，敢期苫块之间，更被丝纶之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148349_comment'></div>伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下，曲行恩例，过念遭逢，虽荷宠荣，恐伤风教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148349_comment'></div>况古人重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148349", 1148349, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>及亲</span>之禄，君子有终身之丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148349_comment'></div>臣虽不才，粗闻斯义，必将负一抔之土，封五尺之坟，慰泉下之幽魂，赴天下之达礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148349_comment'></div>固非饰诈，乃是常情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148349_comment'></div>伏望陛下少抑私恩，姑全大体，寝兹成命，俾执通丧，免令不孝之名，有辱具瞻之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148349_comment'></div>臣无任叫天叩地、哀号殒绝之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1148349_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年12月</a>　在京任左正言。有启。作品：《回司空相公谢官启》<div id='poem_1148395' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148395' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148395?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回司空相公谢官启</a><span class='authorDate'>（993年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148395")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148395_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148395'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148395'>右某启：伏以引年纳禄，达人知进退之宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148395_comment'></div>养老优贤，王者得始终之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148395_comment'></div>君臣之义，今古同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148395_comment'></div>伏惟司空相公受天至和，为国重器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148395_comment'></div>皇坟帝典，咸归润色之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148395_comment'></div>禹画尧封，尽被陶镕之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148395_comment'></div>位崇百揆，年俯七旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148395_comment'></div>宸心方倚于老成，达识遽辞于荣禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148395_comment'></div>圣上遂其颐养，峻以阶资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148395_comment'></div>凤皇之池，暂虚于旧位；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148395_comment'></div>鸤鸠之秩，聊示以新恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148395_comment'></div>解簪绂以加遗，指林泉而自乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148395_comment'></div>功成名遂，早知身退之机；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148395_comment'></div>漏尽钟鸣，堪笑夜行之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148395_comment'></div>然而四海有具瞻之任，三公非致政之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148395_comment'></div>激浮躁之风，式旌素节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148395_comment'></div>委弼谐之任，终复黄扉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148395_comment'></div>凡在搢绅，皆倾祷颂，猥蒙钧造，先赐台函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148395_comment'></div>仰钦止足之规，弥荷谦尊之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148395_comment'></div>卑情无任。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1148395'></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148395_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年1月</a>　在京任左正言。有表。作品：《谢免和御制元日除夜诗表》<div id='poem_1148287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢免和御制元日除夜诗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148287")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148287'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148287'>臣等言：伏蒙圣慈，特降御制《元日》、《除夜》诗四首，仍令和来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148287_comment'></div>臣等寻时连状奏谢，兼乞免和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148287_comment'></div>今月七日，伏奉恩旨，特赐俞允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148287_comment'></div>圣文绝唱，天道听卑，虽违善诱之心，幸获知难之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148287_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，五行为质，六义游心，乐天地之玄功，奋皇王之睿藻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148287_comment'></div>笔无停缀，夜乃未央，焕乎四章，降于三馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148287_comment'></div>耀日月星辰之彩，发金石丝竹之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148287_comment'></div>思入杳冥，乾坤无以逃其数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148287_comment'></div>辞包造化，鬼神不能隐乎情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148287_comment'></div>其《元日》之句也，藻绘王春，悦万物之资始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148287_comment'></div>其《除夜》之句也，发挥天吏，述四序之成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148287_comment'></div>固宜随历数而颁于华夷，与法令而悬于象魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148287_comment'></div>俾夫薰弦播奏，散为化下之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148287_comment'></div>苍玉雕镌，秘作升中之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148287_comment'></div>至若周满《黄竹》之咏，汉高《大风》之歌，唐太宗《守岁》之诗，陈叔达《初年》之作，义皆无取，事不足徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148287_comment'></div>又若除夜藏钩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1148287", 1148287, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>正朝</span>放雀，真为儿戏，岂近皇猷！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148287_comment'></div>遍数前王，实多惭德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148287_comment'></div>臣等文馆待罪，朝行具员，幸观四始之根源，徒荷千年之际遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148287_comment'></div>然而对烛龙之衔耀，难炫萤光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148287_comment'></div>当凤彩之来仪，须藏雉尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148287_comment'></div>共思阁笔，同树降旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148287_comment'></div>方倾窘蹙之诚，果降矜容之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148287_comment'></div>丰隆门下，免为聚响之蚊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148287_comment'></div>庄叟山中，甘作不鸣之雁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148287_comment'></div>臣等无任感天荷圣激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1148287_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1be7fcfb6d3040f1ba3b1ccb91b9b543_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1be7fcfb6d3040f1ba3b1ccb91b9b543");'><span id='1be7fcfb6d3040f1ba3b1ccb91b9b543_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=995')">994-995年</a>，41-42岁</div><div id='1be7fcfb6d3040f1ba3b1ccb91b9b543' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年4月</a>　召还京师为礼部员外郎，再知制诰。作品：《谢除礼部员外郎知制诰启》<div id='poem_1148389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148389' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148389?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除礼部员外郎知制诰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148389")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148389_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148389'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148389'>右某启：蒙恩特授前件官充职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148389_comment'></div>卧锦握兰，忝名曹于南省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148389_comment'></div>香含视草，复旧职于西垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148389_comment'></div>祗荷宠光，不任感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148389_comment'></div>伏念某性惟拙直，族本单平，幸逢天下之文明，遂掇御前之科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148389_comment'></div>雍熙中自百里被召，拾遗立朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148389_comment'></div>伏蒲昧五谏之名，汗简乏三长之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148389_comment'></div>方虞官谤，遽掌纶言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148389_comment'></div>书尧、舜之典谟，文非逮意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148389_comment'></div>厕渊、云之侍从，路实妨贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148389_comment'></div>归田园而盖恋盛时，践台阁而颇为非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148389_comment'></div>迩后以执法无状，蒙恩黜官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148389_comment'></div>入六里之穷山，得二车之散秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148389_comment'></div>去岁量移善地，甄叙通班，贴文馆以雠书，奉《皇华》而按狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148389_comment'></div>属以高堂垂老，悬罄屡空，恳求郡国之权，以就庭闱之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148389_comment'></div>阮宣无食，故拜官而不辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148389_comment'></div>毛义有亲，方捧檄而私喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148389_comment'></div>未遑布政，忽忝归朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148389_comment'></div>十五日之专城，焉知民瘼？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148389_comment'></div>一千年之昌运，荐辱君恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148389_comment'></div>历数前贤，鲜兹盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148389_comment'></div>昔宪宗览表，移韩愈于潮阳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148389_comment'></div>文帝经年，召贾生于湘浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148389_comment'></div>比斯遭遇，可谓殊尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148389_comment'></div>况帐烂锦窠，阶翻药树，爰循故事，无此兼荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148389_comment'></div>远则和鲁公已历仪曹，退居主客；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148389_comment'></div>近则赵给事拜从起部，改授小禋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148389_comment'></div>是何继王兵部之清尘，举太祖朝之近例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148389_comment'></div>更直紫薇之署，已觉忝尘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148389_comment'></div>绝曹玉笋之班，并居清切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148389_comment'></div>感极而空成涕泗，宠兢而如在梦魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148389_comment'></div>青琐窗开，再见壶中之日月；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148389_comment'></div>朱衣吏引，犹疑泽畔之形容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148389_comment'></div>谬恩虽自于圣知，公议终腾于众口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148389_comment'></div>此盖相公洪钧造物，青律回春，用材而木屑无遗，念旧而蓍簪靡弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148389_comment'></div>遂使苍苔入咏，复预于词臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148389_comment'></div>死灰再燃，无惭于狱吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148389_comment'></div>敢不慎修儒行，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1148389", 1148389, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>演畅</span>皇猷，庶凭翰墨之功，少答陶镕之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148389_comment'></div>卑情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1148389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　再为知制诰时，禹称兴致颇浓，有诗送裴都监。作品：《送秘阁裴都监奉使两浙》<div id='poem_74885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74885?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送秘阁裴都监奉使两浙<span class='inlineComment2'>（已下再入西掖作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74885")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74885'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74885'>霏霏梅雨洒船窗，绿荇参差早稻黄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74885'>捧诏暂辞图籍府，扬帆深入水云乡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74885'>皇华静宴江楼月，御札闲开野寺香。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74885'>若到苏台人问我，长官重拜紫微郎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74885'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74885_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。春夏间，王禹偁荐同年进士戚纶之文行于翰林学士钱若水。作品：《荐戚纶，上翰林学士钱若水启》<div id='poem_1148397' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148397' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148397?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荐戚纶上翰林学士钱若水启</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148397")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148397_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148397'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148397'>右某启：某有进士同年戚纶者，负文章器识，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148397", 1148397, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>纯谨</span>君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148397_comment'></div>其先君通五经，教授于睢阳，终身不求闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148397_comment'></div>兄维，国初登进士上第，有文有行，守道不拘，游宦三十馀年，今为殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148397_comment'></div>纶擢第亦一纪矣，历主簿、县尹，得大理评事、光禄丞，司榷酤于谯郡，非其乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148397_comment'></div>向因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148397", 1148397, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>谳狱</span>宛丘，坐系乌府，廷尉议罪，听以赎论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148397_comment'></div>既释之矣，或以前罚未塞，又夺其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148397_comment'></div>今会赦文，合从叙用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148397_comment'></div>寓止佛寺，出无车马，冒犯风雪，袖文相过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148397_comment'></div>有《理道评》十二篇，味之非空言也，然而辞直意切，急于救时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148397_comment'></div>若无知心，亦恐腾口，以为失路而造谤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148397_comment'></div>尊道之士，其将舍诸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148397_comment'></div>恭惟学士才与位并，道与时会，力开贤路之梗，手筑圣域之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148397_comment'></div>搢绅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148397", 1148397, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>颙颙</span>，有所仰赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148397_comment'></div>某罪在摈弃，恩出推挽，未能报德，尚复言人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148397_comment'></div>盖非学士之门，不敢失纶之言，贾纶之毁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148397_comment'></div>语曰：善人在患，饭不及餐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148397_comment'></div>区区之心，实愧斯义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148397_comment'></div>谨修启事，并封纶所著凡若干，几阁视草之暇，略赐观览，则纶也幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148397_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148397_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。秋天，戚纶受命知温州永嘉县，禹称有诗送之。作品：《送戚殿丞之任括苍》<div id='poem_74889' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74889' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74889?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送戚殿丞之<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>任栝苍</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74889")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74889_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_74889_0'>① 原作之丞，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本乙</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74889'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74889'>佐郡海西边，挂帆离兔园。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74889'>远经罗刹石，去近鹡鸰原。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74889'>菊暖秋飞蝶，霜晴夜叫猿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74889'>老郎方吏隐，应笑市朝喧<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：殿丞令弟知温州永嘉县。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74889'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74889_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年6月5日</a>　太宗亲书红绫扇，赐近臣各一，禹称获得后，即上表。作品：《谢赐御草书诗表》<div id='poem_1148284' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148284' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148284?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐御草书诗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年6月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148284")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148284_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148284'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148284'>臣某言：今月五日，伏蒙圣慈，赐臣红绫上御草书赵嘏《南亭绝句》诗一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148284_comment'></div>绛绡半幅，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148284", 1148284, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>霞舒</span>舞鹄之纹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148284_comment'></div>宸翰三行，云绕回鸾之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148284_comment'></div>天恩曲被，凡目荣观，佩服战兢，神魂飞越<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148284_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，书穷八法，学洞九流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148284_comment'></div>英断睿谟，运玄功而多暇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148284_comment'></div>飞文染翰，纵草圣以为娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148284_comment'></div>闲裁浙水之绫，爰写渭南之句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148284_comment'></div>宫中刀尺，剪云雾于赤城；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148284_comment'></div>笔下风雷，走龙蛇于碧落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148284_comment'></div>遍令中使，宣赐近臣，岂期琐材，亦预宸眷！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148284_comment'></div>捧持失次，传玩增辉，忻千载之遭逢，极一时之荣遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148284_comment'></div>读尽二十八字，列宿韬光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148284_comment'></div>宣来三十六宫，天香尚在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148284_comment'></div>岂止藏于箧笥，亦将传付子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148284_comment'></div>堪笑二王，非墨妙笔精之作；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148284_comment'></div>如逢伯禹，得金简玉字之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148284_comment'></div>感恩空抆于涕洟，受赐更铭于肌骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148284_comment'></div>臣无任戴天荷圣激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148284_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年7月</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。将作监丞、通判陕州孙何应召入直史馆，禹称以诗赠之。作品：《暴富送孙何入史馆》<span class='inlineComment2'>（七月下旬作。）</span><div id='poem_75171' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75171' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>暴富送孙何入史馆</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75171")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75171'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75171'>孟郊常贫苦，忽吟不贫句。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75171'>为喜玉川子，书船归洛浦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75171'>乃知君子心，所乐在稽古。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75171'>汉公得高科，不足唯坟素。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75171'>二年佐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_75171", 75171, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>棠阴</span>，眼黑怕文簿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75171'>跃身入三馆，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_75171", 75171, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>烂目</span>阅四库。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75171'>孟贫昔不贫，孙贫今暴富。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75171'>暴富亦须防，文高被人妒。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75171'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_75171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75171'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_75171_0'>⑴ 自注：孟郊有《忽不贫喜卢仝书船归洛》诗。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75171_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。冯伉自商州移任婺州，禹称以诗贻之。作品：《送冯中允之任婺州》<div id='poem_75124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送冯中允之任婺州</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75124")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_75124_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75124'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75124'>东南宦迹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>多胜游，婺女星下溪山幽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75124'>严陵隐德七里濑，沈约诗名八咏楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75124'>岸上黍离经故国，湖边木脱正高秋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75124'>承明三入妨贤久，拟觅江乡小郡侯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75124'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_75124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75124'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_75124_0'>⑴ 原作游，据孙本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75124_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。秋冬间，遭父丧，起复。其父终年七十七。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年7月20日</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。应给事中、判河南府兼留守司事李沆之请，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：《故侍御史累赠太子少师李公墓志铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（或至道元年春撰。）</span><div id='poem_1148533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148533' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148533?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故侍御史累赠太子少师李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年7月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148533")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148533_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148533'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148533'>给事中、判河南府兼留守司事李公将葬先少师，走仆求志其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148533_comment'></div>《行状》云：公讳某字某，赵郡人，广武君之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148533_comment'></div>亳州团练使、太清宫副使讳干，曾祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148533_comment'></div>泰陵令、赠太子少保讳丰，祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148533_comment'></div>洺州团练判官、赠太子少傅讳滔，父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148533_comment'></div>公幼孤，事母以孝闻，有文行为乡里所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148533_comment'></div>方将决科名，取贵仕，邢帅薛怀让知其名，奏观察支使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148533_comment'></div>公以迫于就养，不暇择禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148533_comment'></div>帅移左冯，复授记室，得五品服色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148533_comment'></div>丁母忧，护丧归洛，举先少傅合葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148533_comment'></div>制终，得盩厔令，秩满，历邠州观察、凤翔节度使判官，寻为朝士推荐，入拜殿中侍御史，掌梓州榷盐院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148533_comment'></div>归朝，奉诏知舒州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148533_comment'></div>时太祖问罪金陵，弥年未下，沿淮诸郡，供亿百端，勤王之功，舒实为最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148533_comment'></div>公以悦使，民以乐输，未尝鞭一人，呵一吏，而饷馈之用集矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148533_comment'></div>朝廷议其功，就加侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148533_comment'></div>以太平兴国元年八月二十二日寝疾，终于治所，享年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148533_comment'></div>给事之始登朝也，赠某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148533_comment'></div>入西掖，又赠某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148533_comment'></div>在中书，超赠太子少师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148533_comment'></div>夫人周氏，故邢州节度判官琪之女也，以孝谨事先姑，以慈严训诸子，贤明之行，宗族称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148533_comment'></div>始封汝南、临颍二县太君，又进封汝南郡太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148533_comment'></div>淳化四年闰十月二十二日终于东京私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148533_comment'></div>四子：长曰沆，给事是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148533_comment'></div>次曰贽，著作佐郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148533_comment'></div>次曰源，太常寺奉礼郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148533_comment'></div>次曰维，官与贽同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148533_comment'></div>三女，长适武功苏昌嗣，麟游县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148533_comment'></div>次适太原王永孚，密州录事参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148533_comment'></div>次适沛国朱贻孙，皆良婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148533_comment'></div>以某年某月某日祔葬于西京某县某乡某里，从先茔，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148533_comment'></div>公自从事至台端，率以宽简为政，所在吏民爱而思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148533_comment'></div>儒学之外，雅好《易》象、《老》、《庄》之书，复能践其言而行其道，外累不入，中心晏如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148533_comment'></div>居官清，不近名，直不忤物，得俸禄随手而尽，未尝有意于治生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148533_comment'></div>惟教诲诸子，早夜无倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148533_comment'></div>馀庆郁积，给事当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148533_comment'></div>用是为近臣，参大政，文章器度，时称巨贤，而立朝之士有识少师者，必曰：「给事履行，实得父风」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148533_comment'></div>及罢政事，丁外艰，而执丧食贫，殆不能为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148533_comment'></div>上闻之叹异，赙赠有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148533_comment'></div>维也，文学亦如其兄，自馀俱成令士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148533_comment'></div>三代赠典，皆从子贵，积善之道，岂诬也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148533_comment'></div>今以二品之礼葬，少师之服敛，不亦哀且荣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148533_comment'></div>初，给事直殿馆，知制诰，入内署，佐中枢，而太夫人尚无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148533_comment'></div>朝请之暇，兄弟举觞为寿，慈颜既和，䌽衣起舞，尽欢而罢，率以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148533_comment'></div>每正至入宫，寿宁祝圣，妇姑相望，肩舆煌煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148533_comment'></div>人臣及母之荣，无以过此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148533_comment'></div>非父严母慈，兄良弟悌，畴能若斯其盛欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148533_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1148533'>李氏之先，广武称贤，子孙绵绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148533_comment'></div>少师燕翼，位不充德，馀庆郁积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148533_comment'></div>给事堂堂，邦家之光，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1148533", 1148533, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>庸讵</span>可量？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148533_comment'></div>既赠其父，又封其母，积善之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148533_comment'></div>孝子显亲，纳石于坟，刻为斯文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1148533_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。有表。作品：《谢赐御制重午诗表》《谢赐御制中秋月诗表》<div id='poem_1148285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢御制重午诗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148285")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148285'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148285'>臣某等言：伏蒙圣慈，宣赐御制七言四韵《重午》诗一首者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148285_comment'></div>天有四时，成圣功也，八节所以宣其气；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148285_comment'></div>《诗》有六义，系王化也，《二南》所以变其风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148285_comment'></div>至若运阴阳亭毒之功，达《雅》《颂》盛衰之理，不失其正，斯惟圣人<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148285_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下运应一千，启升平之嘉会；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148285_comment'></div>节当重午，乐长养之玄功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148285_comment'></div>形于咏歌，播作诗什，特令中使，宣示词臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148285_comment'></div>降凤阁以光辉，搢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148285", 1148285, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>鱼须</span>而抃舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148285_comment'></div>仰窥首句，如当帝舜之薰风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148285_comment'></div>载味卒章，仍念屈原之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148285", 1148285, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>贞魄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148285_comment'></div>教化以被，忠邪以分，又何止述浴兰悬艾之文，逞白雪阳春之丽而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148285_comment'></div>臣等职叨掌诰，才谢言诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148285_comment'></div>献《尚书》而讽谏无闻，徒经嘉节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148285_comment'></div>学《离骚》而渊深罕究，但拜宸章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148285_comment'></div>愿扬治世之音，永作传家之宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148285_comment'></div>无任戴天荷圣欢呼抃蹈之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148285_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148291' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148291' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148291?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐御制月诗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148291")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148291_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148291'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148291'>臣某等言：今月十六日，伏蒙圣慈，宣示《中秋月》五七言诗各一首，仍令依韵和来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148291_comment'></div>月盈三五，明天道之无差；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148291_comment'></div>运偶一千，见圣人之有作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148291_comment'></div>虽听赓歌之命，终降寡和之词，传玩为荣，捧持失次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148291_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，精心六义，思若涌泉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148291_comment'></div>锐意万机，居无暇日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148291_comment'></div>当中秋之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148291", 1148291, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>届候</span>，玩素月之流空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148291_comment'></div>罢观乙夜之书，乃吟清夜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148291_comment'></div>载睹如圭之状，思继白圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148291_comment'></div>灿乎二章，大哉四始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148291_comment'></div>颁于近位，得遂荣观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148291_comment'></div>虽酌海窥天，罔知涯涘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148291_comment'></div>而君唱臣和，亲奉德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148291_comment'></div>强率謏闻，虔遵睿旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148291_comment'></div>效星辰之北拱，徒竭丹心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148291_comment'></div>诵乌鹊之南飞，终惭雅咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148291_comment'></div>顾瑕玼之难掩，谅尤悔以何逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148291_comment'></div>臣等无任歌时乐圣荣惧激切之至。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1148291'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1148291_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。冬间，为友人秘书丞、直史馆陈靖之父仁壁撰墓碣铭。作品：《故泉州录事参军赠太子洗马陈君墓碣铭并序》<div id='poem_1148540' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148540' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148540?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故泉州录事参军赠太子洗马陈君墓碣铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148540")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148540_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148540'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148540'>两汉公卿多补郡吏，由督邮功曹而用者，十有四五，故其治道邻于三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148540_comment'></div>盖考行于乡，试才于州，而后登于朝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148540_comment'></div>斯得乡举里选之遗制欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148540_comment'></div>其道虽废，其人或存，陈府君近之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148540_comment'></div>唐末大乱，天下分裂，东南曰闽，有王审知者据之自立，继以李、留、张、陈，凡五帅，七十年，虽附庸于江南，称藩于中原，其属吏皆自署也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148540_comment'></div>故积善之门，笃行之士，道不行于朝而行于郡，不在乎身而在乎后尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148540_comment'></div>君讳仁璧，字象玄，其先颍川大族，今为闽人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148540_comment'></div>曾祖讳晃，隐德不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148540_comment'></div>祖讳枢，唐广州清远令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148540_comment'></div>考讳沆，登进士第，时梁开平中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148540_comment'></div>尝从事大名府，睹梁政多僻，知中国必乱，且以清远府君旅榇在岭表，因弃官南走，万里负丧而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148540_comment'></div>葬毕，杜门坚拒王氏辟命，终身不为伪官所污，至今乡人以先辈呼其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148540_comment'></div>君即先辈府君之子，以文行称于州里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148540_comment'></div>闽帅重而辟之，君曰：「吾先人策名中夏，遭时不幸，介在伪土，义不受禄者，全其节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148540_comment'></div>虽专地悍帅，不敢加害，名高而行著故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148540_comment'></div>吾小子负荷世德，未闻于朝，一旦又将拒之，祸且至矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148540_comment'></div>乃屈身应命，凡历官六，历职八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148540_comment'></div>开宝中，以主帅命入朝，太祖嘉之，制授检校尚书膳部员外郎，赐银章朱绂，始真拜录事参军，厚礼遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148540_comment'></div>故相国、太师忠顺公籍地入觐，君实预其谋，既而谓人曰：「吾尝被天子命，无辱于先人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148540_comment'></div>今时虽可惜，而年已过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148540_comment'></div>吾其乐山水，守松楸而终天年乎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148540_comment'></div>乃辞以老，而命次子靖入于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148540_comment'></div>其后令终于家，享年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148540_comment'></div>初，靖之归国也，补许州司法参军，时富春孙何、济阳丁谓皆当世之文豪也，靖与之交，用是词格日进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148540_comment'></div>端拱中，拜疏议边，上奇其节，擢授将作监丞，主利国监，后隶御史府，专以制劾为职，皆非所乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148540_comment'></div>继上章言时事，上益重之，超拜秘书丞、直史馆，赐五品服色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148540_comment'></div>淳化四年郊祀毕，以靖贵，赠府君太子洗马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148540_comment'></div>明年秋，靖得告南归，且将以漏泽贲其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148540_comment'></div>墓有志，孙何为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148540_comment'></div>又请尚书礼部员外郎、知制诰王某书墓表，某因谓曰：「墓之有表，古也，然近世有德行、无禄位者多表而旌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148540_comment'></div>据《礼》，子为大夫，父为士，然则大夫葬则士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148540_comment'></div>今洗马、秘书俱为五品官，而欲表之，与无位者同矣，何以示贵？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148540_comment'></div>按《令》，五品已上立碑，七品已上立碣，志其墓宜矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148540_comment'></div>靖乃拜而谢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148540_comment'></div>君之行己业官、理家训子暨伪署之官职，卒葬之年月，宅兆之原里，五男三女，男为令子，女得嘉婿，凡是数者，孙之志具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148540_comment'></div>夫人李氏封陇西县太君，亦从子之贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148540_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1148540'>妫姓后，颍川陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148540_comment'></div>永嘉乱，徙于闽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148540_comment'></div>德不坠，世有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148540_comment'></div>为从事，登王宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148540_comment'></div>拒伪命，名益振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148540_comment'></div>生膳部，行恂恂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148540_comment'></div>事连帅，姑全身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148540_comment'></div>修觐礼，趋紫宸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148540_comment'></div>握有兰，佩有银。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148540_comment'></div>郡督邮，始即真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148540_comment'></div>生秘丞，文彬彬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148540_comment'></div>遇圣主，为史臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148540_comment'></div>漏斯泽，显斯亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148540_comment'></div>时孝子，时孝孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148540_comment'></div>碣其坟，垂后昆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148540_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_1148540'>太子：原无，据本文标题补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1148540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148540'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_50_1148540_0'>⑴ 《小畜集》卷三○。又见《闽中金石略》卷三。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1148540_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。为友人西头供奉官、閤门祗侯秦羲之父撰墓志铭。作品：《右卫将军秦公（承裕）墓志铭》<div id='poem_1148536' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148536' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148536?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右卫将军秦公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148536")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148536_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148536'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148536'>柏翳之盛，享国于秦，其后子孙，或以为姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148536_comment'></div>公讳某字某，庐江人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148536_comment'></div>曾祖某，唐末事吴，以功为武昌军节度使，事见本国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148536_comment'></div>祖太，岳州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148536_comment'></div>父进远，宣州节度副使，赠右监门卫率府率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148536_comment'></div>公即率府之长子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148536_comment'></div>当李氏建大号也，弱冠起家，补殿前承旨，仍令禁中侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148536_comment'></div>先主殁，中主嗣位，以公为行从副使，益加亲信，恩宠莫贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148536_comment'></div>公谨俭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>惕厉</span>，卒以无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148536_comment'></div>中主幸南昌而终，公实扈从，受遗命册后主于建康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148536_comment'></div>礼毕议功，将加不次，公三上章，愿守陵寝，情不可夺，优诏许之，授陵台令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148536_comment'></div>朝夕洒扫，朔望涕泣，积十馀岁，其志不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148536_comment'></div>后主闻之，颇为悲恸，诏书三下，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/44/Comments/1")'>强起</span>公为尚衣使、澄心堂祗候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148536_comment'></div>澄心堂，后主宴私之所也，非亲密未尝至此，凡关机务，公必与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148536_comment'></div>王师吊伐之岁，以公为抚州兵马都监，择才而捍难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148536_comment'></div>师环金陵，城中坚壁，时朝廷命浙兵攻其东，以公为寿昌殿使充建州监军使、知军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148536_comment'></div>升州不守，亡将卢绛率溃乱之兵，屠歙州，杀郡牧，远近为之震骇，顿兵富沙，逼我城垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148536_comment'></div>公坚守力战，郡人获全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148536_comment'></div>后主降，诏于郡县曰：「天命有归，无复顾望」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148536_comment'></div>且命封府库以听朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148536_comment'></div>公奉诏哭讫，缄符印，使次子羲表纳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148536_comment'></div>太祖嘉其为臣有节，完郡有功，玺书褒美，锡赉有加，以羲为右班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148536_comment'></div>公归京师，便殿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>得对</span>，恩礼越等，授西京作坊使、金紫光禄大夫、检校司空、兼御史大夫、上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148536_comment'></div>初，江表之平也，诸郡守长于苍黄中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>侵取</span>官财，用以封植，后皆自败，并伏其辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148536_comment'></div>惟公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>束身</span>而归，毫釐无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148536_comment'></div>太宗嗣位，素闻其事，非时召见，慰劳久之，赐钱三十万，以本官监白波军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148536_comment'></div>居三年，授西京巡检使，赐钱如白波之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148536_comment'></div>岁满，充广英等十二州巡检使，又赐钱五十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148536_comment'></div>归朝，改右监门卫将军，爵为开国侯，食邑一千五百户，淮南六州巡检使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148536_comment'></div>转右领军卫将军，实封二百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148536_comment'></div>淳化五年归朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148536_comment'></div>以五月某日寝疾，终于私第，享年七十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148536_comment'></div>夫人陈氏，封颍川县君，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>令淑</span>闻于宗族，先公而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148536_comment'></div>三子，长曰著，举进士不第而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148536_comment'></div>次即羲也，今为西头供奉官、閤门祗候，以才干为时所推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148536_comment'></div>有后之庆，其在兹乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148536_comment'></div>季曰恭，亦早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148536_comment'></div>二女并适人而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148536_comment'></div>以某年某月日，葬于某州某县某乡某里，以颍川县君祔，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148536_comment'></div>某与羲交甚熟，托为铭，曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1148536'>李氏割据，百官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>备具</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148536_comment'></div>去就终始，公得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148536_comment'></div>人皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>冒荣</span>，我守台陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148536_comment'></div>衔哀十稔，宠诏三徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148536_comment'></div>人去危邦，我守孤垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148536_comment'></div>郡民是完，国亡乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148536_comment'></div>人幸丧乱，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1148536", 1148536, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>侵取</span>公财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148536_comment'></div>我无一毫，空手而来，我公来思，二圣念之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148536_comment'></div>内职环尹，便蕃宠绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148536_comment'></div>人患凶夭，我独眉寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148536_comment'></div>人忧子孙，我独有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148536_comment'></div>天之报施，在公匪谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148536_comment'></div>志墓刻铭，永光世胄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1148536_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　代吕蒙正作表。作品：《代吕相公让右仆射表》<div id='poem_1148351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148351?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代吕相公让右仆射表</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148351")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148351_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148351'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148351'>臣某言：今月日，伏奉制命，授臣守尚书右仆射，仍改赐功臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148351_comment'></div>平章三事，绩效无闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148351_comment'></div>师长百僚，恩荣不次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148351_comment'></div>虽听已行之命，实怀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148351", 1148351, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>非据</span>之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148351_comment'></div>伏念臣猥以常才，骤逢昌运，擢第偶叨于殊级，效官遍历于清华，皆自圣知，实无公望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148351_comment'></div>顷者入参大政，遂正中枢，虽坚报主之心，且昧化民之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148351_comment'></div>炎凉屡换，尸素弥多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148351_comment'></div>洎免鼎司，犹居冢宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148351_comment'></div>六卿分职，既首冠于班行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148351_comment'></div>五日延英，但祗奉于朝请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148351_comment'></div>省躬知忝，没齿为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148351_comment'></div>岂意谬荷圣恩，复登台席？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148351_comment'></div>避让不获，兢惶失容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148351_comment'></div>自再秉钧衡，遽罹寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148351_comment'></div>虽身非土木，粗欲答于鸿私；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148351_comment'></div>而职昧经纶，终无裨于至化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148351_comment'></div>有辜重任，罔称具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148351_comment'></div>固合黜自庙堂，放归田里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148351_comment'></div>扬于著位，以励事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148351_comment'></div>伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下曲念遭逢，俯存终始，特加端揆，仍赐功臣，矜其不逮之心，所谓退人以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148351_comment'></div>然而中台峻秩，右相古官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148351_comment'></div>若台司无状之人，处会府弥高之位，则具僚安仰，后代何观？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148351_comment'></div>伏望陛下少抑私恩，显从公议，特追前诏，别授散官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148351_comment'></div>庶使好进之流，讵敢妄动；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148351_comment'></div>不才之士，得以小惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148351_comment'></div>区区恳诚，实非饰让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148351_comment'></div>干犯宸严，无任感天荷圣激切。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1148351_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。有启。作品：《回孙何谢秘书丞直史馆京西转运副使启》<div id='poem_1148396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回孙何谢秘书丞直史馆京西转运副使启</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148396")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148396'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148396'>右某启：伏以列中秘图书之府，贰外司漕运之权，惟是才难，允归公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148396_comment'></div>学士文同三代，名冠四科，擅场早达于天聪，独行不随于时态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148396_comment'></div>轻留侯之杂伯，浪取帝师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148396_comment'></div>慕孟子之著书，力谈王道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148396_comment'></div>暂倅坐棠之政，寻升汗简之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148396_comment'></div>闺籍通班，式耀获麟之笔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148396_comment'></div>转输剧务，更观流马之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148396_comment'></div>方切<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148396", 1148396, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>欣怡</span>，忽承缄翰，备认谦冲之旨，弥增铭荷之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148396_comment'></div>衣锦昼行，虽劳于按部；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148396_comment'></div>演纶夜直，愿效于前驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148396_comment'></div>谨奉启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148396_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。有序。作品：《诸朝贤寄题洪州义门胡氏华林书斋序》<div id='poem_1148439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148439' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148439?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诸朝贤寄题洪州义门胡氏华林书斋序</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148439")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148439_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148439'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148439'>吾读两《汉书》，见制诰一下，未始不以举孝悌、力田为急，宜其风俗淳厚、宗社长久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148439_comment'></div>今天子大孝如舜，至仁如尧，耻言霸图，纯用帝道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148439_comment'></div>然而乘五代之疵国，化百年之污俗，以为非孝悌不足以敦本，非旌表不足以劝民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148439_comment'></div>南昌旧都，胡氏大族，一门守义，四世不析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148439_comment'></div>乃降诏命，旌其里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148439_comment'></div>声闻于天，风化于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148439_comment'></div>大哉，圣人之于孝治，若是之极也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148439_comment'></div>自尔胡氏登进士第者二人，授助教者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148439_comment'></div>今岁寿宁节，胡氏子有献华封之祝者，上益嘉之，制授试秘书省校书郎，面赐袍笏，劳而遣焉，且颁御书，以光私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148439_comment'></div>由是有位于朝、有名于时者，校书皆刺谒之，且盛言其别业有华林山斋，聚书万卷，大设厨廪，以延生徒，树石林泉，豫章之甲也，愿得诗什，夸大其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148439_comment'></div>自旧相司空而下，作者三十有几人，诠次官纪，烂然成编，再拜授予，恳请为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148439_comment'></div>夫《南陔》、《白华》，古诗人之美孝子也，有其义而亡其词，仲尼存其篇，子夏序其意，束晰补其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148439_comment'></div>况身被皇朝之化，目睹孝门之事，有是歌咏播于声诗，而序引无闻，文士之阙也，且使后之采诗义、观国风者将何取实焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148439_comment'></div>时淳化五年十月十五日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1148439_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。有诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。有碑文。作品：《涟水军王御史庙碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（撰此文当在淳化五年夏到至道元年春。）</span><div id='poem_1148525' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148525' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148525?labeling=true' target='_blank'>涟水军王御史庙碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148525")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148525_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148525'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148525'>儒家者流，不语怪力乱神，所以尊师而奉教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148525_comment'></div>至于精诚所感，通于梦思，即仲尼犹言之，岂曰怪乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148525_comment'></div>故曰「吾不复梦见周公」，又曰「梦奠于两楹」是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148525_comment'></div>及述作六经，其文甚著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148525_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「吉梦维何，维熊维罴」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148525_comment'></div>《书》曰：「高宗梦得说」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148525_comment'></div>《礼》曰：「梦帝与我九龄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148525_comment'></div>是皆经夫子之手而不之去，盖有益于教，不惑于民，焉谓之神且怪邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148525_comment'></div>吾友渤海高绅，以著作佐郎领涟水军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148525_comment'></div>会夏旱，方祠祷请雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148525_comment'></div>一夕梦神人服古衣冠而至者，授诗一章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148525_comment'></div>既寤，记诗中数字云「赤岸大夫」，若神之自谓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148525_comment'></div>明日，遍祭神之在境内者，得唐御史王义方之祠，乡人不知，但云东赤岸大夫庙尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148525_comment'></div>高君晓其梦，因加礼而恳祷之，是日雨足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148525_comment'></div>乃新其庙，立石为文，按《唐史》而述其事迹焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148525_comment'></div>高君，纯儒也，不欲自言其梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148525_comment'></div>入朝，往往语乎公卿间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148525_comment'></div>执政苏公闻之曰：「是不可默也，宜择能文者书其事，刻于石阴」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148525_comment'></div>某于高君，进士同年生也，以故见请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148525_comment'></div>尝试议之曰：子产云：「用物精多，则魂魄强，是以有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148525", 1148525, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>精爽</span>，至于神明」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148525_comment'></div>彼伯有尚尔，况王御史者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148525_comment'></div>且欲后人见斯文也，知义方者知惧，如义方者知劝，又胡戾于圣人之旨哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148525_comment'></div>年月日述。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1148525_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年</a>　在京任礼部员外郎、知制诰。有诗送毋殿丞。作品：《送毋殿丞赴任齐州》<span class='inlineComment2'>（秋末冬初作。）</span><div id='poem_74850' class='_poem'><div id='poem_content_74866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74866'>长安弃废比藩方，通理犹宜占省郎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74866'>袖中丹桂家声在，道畔丰碑祖德光<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：关西夫子碑在阌乡路上。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74687'>年年赁宅住闲坊，也作幽斋著道装。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74687'>守静便为生白室，著书兼是草玄堂。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年1月</a>　在京任翰林学士、礼部员外郎、知制诰。有启。作品：《谢除翰林学士启》<div id='poem_1148390' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148390' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148390?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除翰林学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148390")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148390_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148390'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148390'>右某启：伏奉制命，特授守本官、知制诰，召入翰林充学士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148390_comment'></div>祗荷宠光，不任感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148390_comment'></div>伏以汉朝故事，待诏甘泉之宫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148390_comment'></div>唐室旧仪，召对浴堂之殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148390_comment'></div>自非枚、马、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148390", 1148390, "Clauses/10/Comments/3")'>渊、云</span>之述作，常、杨、元、白之才名，则何以塞清问于论思，润皇猷于典诰？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148390_comment'></div>岂宜孤陋，遽此忝尘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148390_comment'></div>伏念某<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148390", 1148390, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>植学</span>非深，属文无取，滥中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148390", 1148390, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>悬科</span>之选，寻叨通籍之班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148390_comment'></div>谏署拾遗，謇谔无裨于圣主；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148390_comment'></div>承明三入，清华空类于昔贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148390_comment'></div>顷因坐事以左迁，固亦息心于荣路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148390_comment'></div>洎得归朝之命，遂求典郡之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148390_comment'></div>去年召自琴台，再升纶阁，骤荷一人之宠遇，果罹三岁之凶丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148390_comment'></div>虽勉就于夺情，实重违于素志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148390_comment'></div>顾潘安之毛发，已有雪霜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148390_comment'></div>念季路之旨甘，不如藜藿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148390_comment'></div>临文翰而方寸乱矣，对搢绅而面目何为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148390_comment'></div>想石祁子之执丧，空惭至行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148390_comment'></div>比欧阳通之起复，尚欠礼文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148390_comment'></div>止期卜兆于松楸，再请效官于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148390", 1148390, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>符竹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148390_comment'></div>岂意未谐私愿，俄辱殊恩，翻令朽退之身，亦预深严之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148390_comment'></div>纶言乍降，俾离红药之阶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148390_comment'></div>宸翰高悬，已践玉堂之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148390_comment'></div>哀荣交集，宠辱堪惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148390_comment'></div>副重华好问之心，先忧学寡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148390_comment'></div>草武帝求贤之诏，更愧才难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148390_comment'></div>通宵未息于战兢，举步犹疑于魂梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148390_comment'></div>此皆相公洪钧造物，青律回春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148390_comment'></div>徵贾谊于谪官，终成前席；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148390_comment'></div>荐相如之视草，幸得同时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148390_comment'></div>敢不四禁是遵，三缄是诫？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148390_comment'></div>况艰难备历，齿发始衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148390_comment'></div>用直道以事君，虽无改变；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148390_comment'></div>肆刚肠而疾恶，渐亦销磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148390_comment'></div>庶寡悔尤，少酬知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148390_comment'></div>下情无任感戴兢荣、始终知归之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1148390_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年2月</a>　在京任翰林学士、礼部员外郎、知制诰。太宗命宰相及群臣分于京城寺观、祠庙祷雨，又命中使分祀五岳，故事，御署祝版以遣之。王禹偁上言，太宗亲批其纸尾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年4月</a>　在京任翰林学士、礼部员外郎、知制诰。李继迁遣银州左都押衙张浦以良马橐驼来贡，王禹偁献颂一篇。作品：《北狄来朝颂并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（约春夏间在京城撰。）</span><div id='poem_1148510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148510?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北狄来朝颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148510")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148510_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148510'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148510'>陇首云阔，河湟路穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148510_comment'></div>青冢镇野，黑山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>驾空</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148510_comment'></div>爰有丑虏，聚乎其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148510_comment'></div>言语衣服，不与华同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148510_comment'></div>食血茹毛，宁识八珍之味；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148510_comment'></div>荷旃披毳，安知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>五服</span>之仪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148510_comment'></div>不缉丝麻，以羽皮而御寒冻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148510_comment'></div>不修刈穫，以射猎而为耕耘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148510_comment'></div>春无拆花，夏有飞雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148510_comment'></div>沙平万里，冰固千寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148510_comment'></div>征鸿叫云，战马嘶月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148510_comment'></div>其地不可以耕而食，其民不可以畜而臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148510_comment'></div>由是古之王者，外而不内，疏而不亲，不与约誓，不就攻伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148510_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148510_comment'></div>约则贪赂而见欺，攻则劳师而招寇，故朝朔不加其国，政教不及其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148510_comment'></div>来则抚而御之，去则备而守之，信所谓天限南北而绝内外者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148510_comment'></div>茍非圣人生，至道著，又安肯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>伏膺</span>稽颡而自至于天阙邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148510_comment'></div>请陈往古之得失，表我朝之昌盛，不亦可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148510_comment'></div>在昔周宣之世也，猃狁侵削，动乎封疆，乃命将以安边，俾出师而尅敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148510_comment'></div>虽兵如貔虎，不尽剿除；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148510_comment'></div>而虏若蚊虻，止在驱逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148510_comment'></div>观衅以动，画境而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148510_comment'></div>虐我则雠，方用徂征之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148510_comment'></div>胜之不武，故无乐战之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148510_comment'></div>所谓周得中策者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148510_comment'></div>汉武之代也，匈奴暴强，犯我边鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148510_comment'></div>于是选良将，出锐兵，劳苦干戈，深入沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148510_comment'></div>戍师叹老，流矢告穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148510_comment'></div>虽多尅获之功，亦有耻辱之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148510_comment'></div>及乎李卿降北，永为败绩之人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148510_comment'></div>明妃去时，终有和亲之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148510_comment'></div>所谓汉得下策者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148510_comment'></div>始皇之世也，胡虏侵凌，乱于邦国，遂命致远戎，筑长城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148510_comment'></div>万里亘天，千雉截汉，雷杵轰野，云锸蔽空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148510_comment'></div>掘泉则战血迸流，垒土则枯骸共积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148510_comment'></div>人力告匮，邦基已倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148510_comment'></div>鹿走中原，见汉朝之将霸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148510_comment'></div>蛇横大泽，知嬴氏之须亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148510_comment'></div>所谓秦无策者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148510_comment'></div>新莽之徒，固不足徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148510_comment'></div>得上策者，在我圣朝乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148510_comment'></div>主上神武膺命，至道育物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148510_comment'></div>谓国之难治，设礼乐刑罚以正之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148510_comment'></div>谓民之难制，布道德仁义以化之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148510_comment'></div>国以之而泰，民以之而苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148510_comment'></div>然后治戈矛，议征伐，取庸蜀，下湘潭，平交广，归吴越，师如时雨，人解倒悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148510_comment'></div>仗至仁而伐不仁，八纮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>盂覆</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148510_comment'></div>去无道而就有道，兆民子来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148510_comment'></div>遂使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>朔易</span>之方，戎狄之众，有见机之义，生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>向化</span>之心，行事大之仪，陈任土之贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148510_comment'></div>离越沙漠，舞蹈藁街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148510_comment'></div>远逐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>鸿宾</span>，豁唐虞之日月；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148510_comment'></div>至同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>蚁慕</span>，观华夏之车书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148510_comment'></div>主上思欲来远人，安小国，接之以礼，示之以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148510_comment'></div>使观乎明堂辟雍，重檐复庙，则穹庐毳幕之人识制度矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148510_comment'></div>使对乎冕旒之贵，华衮之荣，则被发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>裸壤</span>之徒见服章矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148510_comment'></div>使食乎大牢之味，秬鬯之酒，则膻肉酪浆之众登<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>享宴</span>矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148510_comment'></div>使听乎钧天之乐，治世之音，则胡笳羌笛之方闻《韶濩》矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148510_comment'></div>而后歌咏皇风，沐浴天泽，如登春台，如跻寿域，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>游游</span>熙熙，乐不知斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148510_comment'></div>夫如是，则周宣、汉武乃我朝之秕糠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148510_comment'></div>臣旅寓帝里，荣观国光，睹左袂之徒咸归德化，歌垂衣之主难寝颂声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148510_comment'></div>虽未刊它山，纪国休而不尽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148510_comment'></div>聊抽鄙思，咏王化之无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148510_comment'></div>亦所以褒赞成功，游扬德业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148510_comment'></div>舞抃之外，谨献颂曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_1148510'>天辅有德，民怀有仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148510_comment'></div>上玄眷命，为天下君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148510_comment'></div>暴乱反正，浇薄归淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148510_comment'></div>拔奇夷难，迈德振民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148510_comment'></div>其仁如天，其智如神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148510_comment'></div>涵之若海，泽之如春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148510_comment'></div>就之如日，望之如云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148510_comment'></div>始修文德，人之未臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148510_comment'></div>终讲武功，以讨弗宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148510_comment'></div>乃下庸蜀，来其远人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148510_comment'></div>复取湘潭，问诸水滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148510_comment'></div>次定交广，朝于紫宸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148510_comment'></div>终平吴越，绝乎妖尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148510_comment'></div>伊彼匈奴，见机而作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148510_comment'></div>思拜休明，远出沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148510_comment'></div>紫殿欢呼，藁街抃跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148510_comment'></div>脱毳委毡，劳以王爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148510_comment'></div>弃笛捐笳，听乎《韶》乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148510_comment'></div>结恋阙廷，永忘部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148510_comment'></div>自服唐虞，宁须卫霍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148510_comment'></div>宾礼遐陬，迩安远柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148510_comment'></div>盖归道德，靡惧戈矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148510_comment'></div>陇水休咽，边云罢愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148510_comment'></div>战征思弭，封禅将修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148510_comment'></div>可纪岱岳，宜登<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/214/Comments/0")'>介丘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1148510_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1148510", 1148510, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>鲰儒</span>献颂，永孚千秋。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_88_1148510'></div><div id='poem_sentence_88_1148510_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年2月</a>　在京任翰林学士、礼部员外郎、知制诰。有文。作品：《柳赞善（宜）写真赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（约春夏间在京城撰。）</span><div id='poem_1148509' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148509' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148509?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳赞善写真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148509")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148509_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148509'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148509'>河东柳宜，开宝末以江南伪官归阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148509_comment'></div>于后吏隐者二十年，年五十有八矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148509_comment'></div>堂有母，思见其面而不得归，浮图神秀为写其真，使其弟持还以慰倚门之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148509_comment'></div>又从予乞赞：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1148509'>好君好道，气形于貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148509_comment'></div>鹤瘦非病，松寒不槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148509_comment'></div>赤绂荧煌，白须华皓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148509_comment'></div>秀师援毫，写于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148509", 1148509, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>霜缟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148509_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148509", 1148509, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>杜口</span>慎微，虚心养浩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148509_comment'></div>寄献高堂，足慰亲老。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1148509_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年4月</a>　在京任翰林学士、礼部员外郎、知制诰。春夏间，王禹偁直翰林日，钱易数以诗文相售。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年4月</a>　在京任翰林学士、礼部员外郎、知制诰。四月，以翰林学士张洎为参知政事，禹称以启贺之。张洎手书古律诗两轴与之，禹称以启谢之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年4月28日</a>　在京任翰林学士、礼部员外郎、知制诰。有表。作品：《为宰臣谢赐御制歌诗表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此表当撰于至道元年四月。）</span><div id='poem_1148282' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148282' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148282?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宰臣谢赐御制歌诗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年4月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148282")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148282_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148282'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148282'>臣等伏蒙圣慈，宣赐《喜雨》歌诗共三首者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148282_comment'></div>天时旱暵，圣虑焦劳，玄穹忽降于霶𩃱，睿藻遂形于歌咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148282_comment'></div>首蒙宣示，共极欢荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148282_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下轸念三农，精心六义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148282_comment'></div>自春徂夏，稍致愆阳，以日系时，不忘善祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148282_comment'></div>诏近臣而遍走群望，御便殿而亲录缧囚，圣感玄通，天心昭荅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148282_comment'></div>潜驱屏翳，舒张东岱之云；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148282_comment'></div>暗使丰隆，檛击南山之鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148282_comment'></div>连宵泛洒，率土昭苏，旱稼勃兴，丰年可望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148282_comment'></div>缘圣情而有作，奋御笔以成篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148282_comment'></div>帝庸作歌，高视「康哉」之咏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148282_comment'></div>上以风化，远追《皇矣》之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148282_comment'></div>灿然三章，诞敷四海，深形教诲，特有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148282", 1148282, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>宣传</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148282_comment'></div>台衡宸扆之铭，彼何肤浅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148282_comment'></div>白雪阳春之句，空衒清新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148282_comment'></div>臣等救旱功微，赓歌调下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148282_comment'></div>镂于肌骨，敢忘作诫之词；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148282_comment'></div>播在管弦，愿导移风之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_75080'>丈人果能尔，识度非寻常。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75080'>安车比疏广，辟谷如张良。<div
