id='poem_sentence_19_75080'>自念山野士，不解随圆方。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75080'>宦途多龃龉，身计颇悲凉。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75080'>行将解簪笏，归去事农桑。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75080'>幸容操杖履，洒扫近丘墙。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75080'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_75080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75080'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_75080_0'>⑴ 自注：是岁五（原作六，据《小畜集》卷二一《滁州谢上表》改）月十一日，仆射吕相公赴西京；二十一日，参政苏礼部赴南阳；二十三日，予赴滁州。承旨侍郎皆为祖席之主。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75080_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年5月23日</a>　在京，罢为工部郎中、知滁州军州事。离京时，门下士林介送至舟中，禹称作诗纪之。作品：《送林介》<span class='inlineComment2'>（五月末赴滁途中作。）</span><div id='poem_75130' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75130' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75130?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送林介</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年5月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75130")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_75130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75130'>吟变闽越声，衣有京洛尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75130'>况复久相依，知子文行淳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75130'>不能致一第，虚作金銮臣。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74999?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阙下言怀上执政<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（997年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_74999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74999'>仙驾只留烧药鼎，繐帷犹认谏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>书囊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74999'>北辰别见天垂象，西内浑疑海变桑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_74997'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74997'>早有虚名达九重，宦途流落渐龙钟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74997'>散为郎吏同元稹，羞见都人看李邕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74997'>旧日谬吟红药树，新朝曾献皂囊封。<div id='poem_title_74998_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74998'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74998'>诰词黜责子孙羞，欲雪前冤事已休。<div inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>长吟泪暗流。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74998'>虞舜五臣知此事，戏儒应<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>免更监州<span id='poem_sentence_3_74998_0'>⑵ 原作已，据赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_74998_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年10月</a>　王禹偁请撰《太宗实录》，并乞求参与编修。作品：《谢撰大行皇帝实录表》<div id='poem_1148315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148315?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请撰大行皇帝实录表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148315")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148315_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148315'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148315'>臣某言：闻二帝、三王之道，无《尚书》则泯而不见；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148315_comment'></div>战国、秦、汉之事，无《史记》则灭而不传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148315_comment'></div>能使后之视今，犹今之视古者，书史是赖<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148315_comment'></div>伏以大行皇帝功济万物，道高百王，诞敷皇谟，勤恤黔首，宪章军国之务，经制郡县之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148315_comment'></div>故得百万之师，如臂使指，亿兆之众，推心致腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148315_comment'></div>而又礼乐刑政之盛，声明文物之光，焕乎烂然，有足称述，附于二十二年行事，而王道备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148315_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下以奉先之孝，副知子之明，绍膺丕图，惟克永世，柩前即位，天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148315", 1148315, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>宅心</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148315_comment'></div>社稷人神，罔不依附；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148315_comment'></div>华夏蛮貊，罔不骏奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148315_comment'></div>斯乃先帝之贻谋，得陛下之圣嗣，乾坤交泰，日月重光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148315_comment'></div>历考近古立储闱，承帝位，未有如我朝之盛者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148315_comment'></div>臣愚以为宜撰《大行皇帝实录》，垂之不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148315_comment'></div>况盛德大业，简册具存，鸿儒硕生，台阁皆是，岂臣孤陋，敢有觊觎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148315_comment'></div>然念臣太平兴国五年，徒步应举，再就御试，遂登文科，服勤州县，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148315", 1148315, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>扬历</span>四考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148315_comment'></div>先帝采搢绅虚誉，自长洲令徵为右正言，帖直史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148315_comment'></div>明年转左司谏、知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148315_comment'></div>出入中外，十有三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148315_comment'></div>进不因人，退无显过，永惟知己之至，未得杀身之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148315_comment'></div>今陵寝有日，论撰是资，傥得措一辞于帝典之中，署一名于国史之后，臣虽死之日，如生之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148315_comment'></div>至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148315", 1148315, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>褒善</span>贬恶之文，编年纪传之例，备尝探讨，粗见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148315", 1148315, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>指归</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148315_comment'></div>况端拱元年春季《日历》是臣编修，如蒙帝俞，不辱君命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148315_comment'></div>臣无任恳悃之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1148315_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年12月24日</a>　在京任知制诰。以刑部郎中王禹偁守本官，复知制诰，与兵部郎中、史馆修撰李若拙并命。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在京任知制诰。真宗初即位，暇日，召王禹偁与之论文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年12月24日</a>　在京任知制诰。有赋。作品：《园陵犬赋》<div id='poem_1148213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>园陵犬赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年12月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148213")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148213'>嘉彼御犬，既良且驯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148213_comment'></div>蒙先朝之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148213", 1148213, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>乃眷</span>，向皇宫而托身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148213_comment'></div>有警跸以皆从，无起居而不亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148213_comment'></div>绣组饰以炜炜，金铃奋而振振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148213_comment'></div>饲以公庖，彭泽之鱼兮曾何足道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148213_comment'></div>畜之土性，西旅之獒兮讵得同伦！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148213_comment'></div>健逐天步，慵眠地茵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148213_comment'></div>效珍比夫异兽，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148213", 1148213, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>供命</span>等乎迩臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148213_comment'></div>若乃风暖掖庭，花繁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148213", 1148213, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>禁籞</span>，扇挨锦翼之雉，笼近雪衣之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148213_comment'></div>入赭袍兮曳尾，闻霓裳兮率舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148213_comment'></div>循绕乎金塘，徘徊乎瑶圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148213_comment'></div>睥睨炉烟，追随蜡炬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148213_comment'></div>见观书于乙夜，听<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148213", 1148213, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>求衣</span>于未曙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148213_comment'></div>既无吠乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148213", 1148213, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>投签</span>，每夙兴于晓鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148213_comment'></div>莫不默识圣心，潜知天语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148213_comment'></div>备指顾以弗迷，奉周旋而见抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148213_comment'></div>第辰游而夕嬉，又安在乎逐麋而捕鼠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148213_comment'></div>彼宋㹱之与韩卢，又安得同群而接武者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148213_comment'></div>嗟乎，事恋人天，时移今古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148213_comment'></div>秦皇采药，岛中之士未回；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148213_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1148213", 1148213, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>轩后</span>鍊丹，湖上之龙已去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148213_comment'></div>欠舐鼎以登仙，对遗弓而变主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148213_comment'></div>卧锦荐兮罔安，啖鲜食兮弥苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148213_comment'></div>丰颅载减，负重鋂而不胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148213_comment'></div>病骨其羸，求弊盖于何所？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148213_comment'></div>赫赫顾命，明明嗣皇，念犬马之微诚，义存始卒，徵父母之所爱，深增衋伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148213_comment'></div>俾守园陵之地，且殊盘瓠之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148213_comment'></div>縻索绦以璀璨，琢笼槛而荧煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148213_comment'></div>仗陪卤簿，车逐辒辌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148213_comment'></div>锁玄宫兮黯黯，号白日兮茫茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148213_comment'></div>松阡夜月，柏城晓霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148213_comment'></div>依六尺之舆，已成畴昔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148213_comment'></div>盗一抔之土，亦足堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148213_comment'></div>表终天之巨痛，甘朽骨于龙冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148213_comment'></div>狡兔尽而见烹，理殊炎汉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148213_comment'></div>骏马死而陪葬，事类皇唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148213_comment'></div>邈予生之介立，荷太宗之维絷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148213_comment'></div>叨泽宫之一第，玷承明而三入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148213_comment'></div>耻怀禄以不言，惟报君之是急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148213_comment'></div>胡薄命之多屯，顾寸功而莫集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148213_comment'></div>嗟白首于郎署，恸梓宫而呜悒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148213_comment'></div>生未得图形烟阁，想英、卫之难追；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148213_comment'></div>死不当赐葬长陵，岂萧、曹之能揖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148213_comment'></div>异臣哉之可歌，信尨也之罔及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148213_comment'></div>聊作赋以自伤，寄毫端而雪泣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1148213_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年12月</a>　在京任知制诰。有启。作品：《谢除刑部郎中知制诰启》<div id='poem_1148391' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148391' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148391?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除刑部郎中知制诰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148391")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148391_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148391'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148391'>右某启：伏蒙圣恩特授前件职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148391_comment'></div>一麾出守，左迁方类于阮咸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148391_comment'></div>三入承明，寓直忽同于应璩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148391_comment'></div>祗膺宠命，伏积兢荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148391_comment'></div>窃念某猥以腐儒，受知先帝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148391", 1148391, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>践扬</span>两制，出处九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148391_comment'></div>自知赋命之多奇，每愧浮名之过实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148391_comment'></div>军容捧砚，敢望于辉荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148391_comment'></div>力士抹靴，遽腾于谤议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148391_comment'></div>而自临民滁上，移任淮南，饰厨传以屡空，勾簿书而弗逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148391_comment'></div>受釐宣室，重求前席之期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148391_comment'></div>烧药鼎湖，忽起攀髯之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148391_comment'></div>心灰自死，泪血无从，属当明主之承乾，尚代藩臣而守土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148391_comment'></div>寻以拜章言事，解印归京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148391_comment'></div>睹七月之园陵，魂销弓剑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148391_comment'></div>随百官而朝谒，目断云天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148391_comment'></div>放怀书史之间，结舌搢绅之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148391_comment'></div>皂囊无取，惭越职于伏蒲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148391_comment'></div>白首为郎，甘息心于执戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148391_comment'></div>虽知止足，犹阻归休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148391_comment'></div>欲耕季子之田园，曾无二顷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148391_comment'></div>谋葬刘钟之亲属，何啻十丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148391_comment'></div>终为怀禄之人，盖逼有身之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148391_comment'></div>岂谓内廷论荐，黄閤佥谐，回天眷之新恩，复王言之旧任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148391_comment'></div>阶前药树，重吟谢客之诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148391_comment'></div>观里桃花，免动刘郎之咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148391_comment'></div>此皆某官激扬公议，启迪宸聪，洪钧岂有于弃材，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148391", 1148391, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>化笔</span>潜徵于故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148391_comment'></div>谓李杓直翰林退职，复践掖垣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148391_comment'></div>白居易禁署出官，终知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148391_comment'></div>享兹殊事，实越昔贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148391_comment'></div>驱瓜上之青蝇，虽非由径；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148391_comment'></div>乏梦中之白凤，深愧演纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148391_comment'></div>敢不考三代、两汉之典章，取贞元、长庆之风格，或少窥于边徼，庶上答于陶镕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148391_comment'></div>卑情无任感恩荷德、激切知归之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1148391_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在京任知制诰。有墓志铭。作品：《建溪处士赠大理评事柳府君墓志铭并序》<div id='poem_1148542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>建溪处士赠大理评事柳府君墓碣铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148542")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148542_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148542'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148542'>有唐以武戡乱，以文化人，自宰辅公卿至方伯连帅，皆用儒者为之，而柳氏最称显族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148542_comment'></div>故子厚自言，其家同时为尚书郎者三十馀人，其盛可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148542_comment'></div>于时宦游之士，率以东南为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148542", 1148542, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>善地</span>，每刺一郡，殿一邦，必留某宗属子孙，占籍于治所，盖以江山泉石之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148542", 1148542, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>秀异</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148542_comment'></div>至今吴越士人，多唐之旧族耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148542_comment'></div>公讳崇，字子高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148542_comment'></div>五代祖奥，从季父冕廉问闽川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148542_comment'></div>因奏署福州司马，改建州长史，遂家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148542_comment'></div>奥生诞，诞生琼，琼生祚，祚生瞪，于公为显考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148542_comment'></div>公十岁而孤，母夫人丁氏养诲成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148542_comment'></div>既冠，属王审知据福建，以公补沙县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148542_comment'></div>时审知残民自奉，人多衣纸，公曰：「此岂有道之谷耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148542_comment'></div>即以就养引去，因自誓终身御布衣、称处士而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148542_comment'></div>洎李氏奄有江左，其长子宜为太子校书郎、江宁尉，宰贵溪、崇仁、建阳三邑，拜监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148542_comment'></div>次子宣试大理评事，迎公于建康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148542_comment'></div>时以宜贵，当得致仕官，切诫宜曰：「不可奏请，以卒吾志」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148542_comment'></div>太祖平吴，宜为费宰，宣以校书郎为济州团练推官，公始渡江省诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148542_comment'></div>自沂至济，自济至京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148542_comment'></div>得疾，肩舆以归，以太平兴国五年十一月某日终于济之官舍，享年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148542_comment'></div>嫡夫人丁氏先公而亡，追封某县太君，宜、宣之母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148542_comment'></div>宜今为国子博士，宣终于大理司直、天平军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148542_comment'></div>今夫人虞氏封范阳县太君，生子四人：寘、宏举进士，寀、察并以辞学自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148542_comment'></div>有后之庆，为可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148542_comment'></div>女五人，皆得嘉婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148542_comment'></div>初，公之捐馆也，博士方按狱于沂，闻讣号绝，徒跣冒雪而行，以至于济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148542_comment'></div>时有诏不听吏守三年丧，博士负缞绖诣登闻鼓院，三上章乞护丧终制，寝而不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148542_comment'></div>又叩丞相马泣诉其事，虽不得请，君子是之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148542_comment'></div>既而诸弟扶柩以归，权窆于所居之右，以某年某月某日，卜葬于某县某里，以先太君祔焉，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148542_comment'></div>公以行义著于州里，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1148542", 1148542, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>兢严</span>治于闺门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148542_comment'></div>乡人有小忿争，不诣官府决其曲直，取公一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148542_comment'></div>诸子诸妇，动修礼法，虽从宦千里，若公在旁，其修身训子有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148542_comment'></div>柳之姓自展禽始，执卷者知之矣，今略而不书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148542_comment'></div>博士之归朝也，得雷泽令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148542_comment'></div>雷泽，某之故里也，始以邑中进士见，博士厚于我；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148542_comment'></div>司直之从事于济也，某寓家焉，司直善于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148542_comment'></div>又尝拜廷评府君于堂上，其为交也，可谓久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148542_comment'></div>乞铭公墓，义不可辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148542_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1148542'>处士之名兮象著于天，廷评之赠兮泽漏于泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148542_comment'></div>子孙文雅兮后嗣绵绵，刻铭墓石兮以永千年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1148542_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年12月</a>　在京任知制诰。有启。作品：《上宰相谢免判吏部南曹启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（或作于明年。）</span><div id='poem_1148392' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148392' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上宰相谢免判吏部南曹启</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148392")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148392_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148392'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148392'>右某启：奉今月日敕，差判吏部南曹，寻蒙抽取元敕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148392_comment'></div>伏以演纶西掖，乃王者之词臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148392_comment'></div>按吏南曹，本天官之下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148392_comment'></div>遽蒙改易，深荷陶镕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148392_comment'></div>伏念某比乏时才，滥尘清列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148392_comment'></div>苍苔红药，但遵四禁之文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148392_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148392", 1148392, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>理剧剸繁</span>，久绝五花之判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148392_comment'></div>便于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148392", 1148392, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>散拙</span>，乐在清闲，忽奉遣差，颇增忧畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148392_comment'></div>固非耻于卑贱，盖亦事有彝伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148392_comment'></div>且念判曹之名，起于总章之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148392_comment'></div>罢员外转厅之事，为尚书役属之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148392_comment'></div>勾群吏之稽违，奉三铨之指顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148392_comment'></div>显为统摄，自有礼容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148392_comment'></div>岂可职衔带制诰之文，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148392", 1148392, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>公状</span>具尊卑之数？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148392_comment'></div>虽知不便，未敢固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148392_comment'></div>岂谓相公曲为敷扬，俾谐停寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148392_comment'></div>全台阁之故事，实亦公行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148392_comment'></div>荷庙廊之殊知，且非私谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148392_comment'></div>永怀感遇，空极兢荣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148392_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在京任知制诰。有诗挽宋太宗。作品：《太宗皇帝挽歌三首》<div id='poem_74705' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74705' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74705")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74705_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74705'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74705_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74706' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74706' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74706?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74706_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74706'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74706'>舜化无偏党，尧年欠耄期。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74706'>世间人自哭，天上事难知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>旧学士，头白涕涟洏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74706'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74706_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_74706'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_74706_0'>⑴ 原作恋，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_74706_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_74704' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74704' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74704?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74704_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74704'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74704'>日到虞泉落，天从杞国崩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74704_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74704'>去年寿宁节，今<sup class='reference ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年2月</a>　在京任知制诰。自彗星出至灭，凡14日，禹称作表二篇。作品：《为宰臣（吕端等）以彗星见求退表》《又（为宰臣）谢恩表 为宰臣谢赐御制歌诗表》<div id='poem_1148352' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宰臣以彗星见求退表</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148352")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148352'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148352'>臣某言：臣闻平章百姓，任系于安危；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148352_comment'></div>册免三公，必因于灾异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148352_comment'></div>睹上玄之示谴，居大位以何颜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148352_comment'></div>伏念臣等俱乏宏才，滥司庶政，昧燮调之至理，乖启沃之嘉谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148352_comment'></div>徒以先帝误知，骤加擢用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148352_comment'></div>圣君嗣统，曲示优容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148352_comment'></div>岁月屡更，弼谐无状，既失具瞻之望，果贻覆餗之惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148352_comment'></div>数日以来，祅星忽见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148352_comment'></div>谋人之国，盖皇化之未孚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148352_comment'></div>代天之工，致乾文之告变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148352_comment'></div>此而不责，何以致君？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148352_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下舜孝奉先，尧心稽古，励克勤之至德，推好问之虚怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148352_comment'></div>循列圣之丕基，守而勿失；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148352_comment'></div>委大臣之政柄，用之弗疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148352_comment'></div>无一事不赐询求，无一言不蒙听纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148352_comment'></div>上下之情靡间，小大之政可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148352_comment'></div>所宜臻福庆于黔黎，召休祥于苍昊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148352_comment'></div>而星纬若此，庙谟可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148352_comment'></div>是乃元首至明，股肱不称之明验也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148352_comment'></div>伏以君臣同体，非人不居，阴阳未和，擢士为相，乃邦家之令典，今古之彝章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148352_comment'></div>伏望陛下思宗社之远图，惜庙堂之重任，旁求岩穴，博采搢绅，俯顺人心，上答天诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148352_comment'></div>必生良弼，用协圣猷，克致和平，坐销<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1148352", 1148352, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>变咎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148352_comment'></div>臣等不胜鼎足，耻对朝行，明降丝纶，放归田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148352_comment'></div>免玷秉钧之地，甘为击壤之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148352_comment'></div>用此终身，实为多幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148352_comment'></div>臣等无任叨荣窃禄、战汗待罪之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1148352_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为兵部向侍郎谢恩表</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148354")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148354'>臣某言：伏奉制书，入参朝政，拜章陈让，答诏不从，兢忧失图，黾勉就位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148354_comment'></div>伏念臣出于寒素，偶玷科名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148354_comment'></div>先帝误知，骤加擢用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148354_comment'></div>圣君嗣统，未忍弃遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148354_comment'></div>在臣心而自知，听物论之难处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148354_comment'></div>岂谓尊号皇帝陛下特颁纶命，俾佐鼎司，职在弼谐，事关理乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148354_comment'></div>自非抱吁谟之业，有变通之才，上可以启沃四聪，下可以赞成三事，则何以副搢绅之伫望，塞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148354", 1148354, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>宵旰</span>之虚怀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148354_comment'></div>是敢具述恳诚，愿罢光宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148354_comment'></div>陛下不移前诏，终辱大恩，再三虑黩于天心，万一冀倾于臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148354_comment'></div>又念两朝近侍，五稔叨荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148354_comment'></div>虽覆载之恩，终无补报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148354_comment'></div>幸犬马之力，未甚衰残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148354_comment'></div>谨当知无不为，退思补过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148354_comment'></div>调四时于玉烛，诚愧昔贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148354_comment'></div>誓一命于鸿毛，宁忘死地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148354_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷恩、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年2月</a>　在京任知制诰。为参政李沆作记。作品：《野兴亭记》<div id='poem_1148482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148482' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148482?labeling=true' target='_blank'>野兴亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148482")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148482_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148482'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148482'>昔裴晋公作绿野堂，负功名而务闲适也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148482_comment'></div>李卫公作精思堂，居密勿而彰尽瘁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148482_comment'></div>虽各有趣尚，而不无豪华，异乎兹亭，独履中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148482_comment'></div>参政尚书陇西公，器业宏大，识度清远，践三司论道之地，奉两朝知己之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148482_comment'></div>以为吁谟献替，君子所以行道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148482_comment'></div>消息盈虚，达人所以养神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148482_comment'></div>行道必假于权，我则操钧轴而无避；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148482_comment'></div>养神必务乎静，我则营林壑以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148482", 1148482, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>潜游</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148482_comment'></div>帝城之南，郊坛之下，辟小园以树艺，敞幽亭以宴息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148482_comment'></div>杂以蔬果，间以花卉，绿野之色乱入，四时之景互见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148482_comment'></div>至若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148482", 1148482, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>假宁</span>著令，休沐得告，绛驺騑騑，言适于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148482_comment'></div>公之来思，几务多暇，于是察物性以验政教，观民田以考丰俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148482_comment'></div>其或尔牛湿湿，阴阳之适叙也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148482_comment'></div>乳鸟喈喈，飞走之蒙仁也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148482_comment'></div>禾麦芃芃，污莱之尽辟也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148482_comment'></div>原田每每，草木之被泽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148482_comment'></div>公乃降<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148482", 1148482, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>邴车</span>，开曹樽，金印紫绶却而不御，荷衣蕙带服之无斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148482_comment'></div>撷芳以侑酒，赋诗以佐欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148482_comment'></div>心将道宜，景与神遇，穷幽殚乐，不夕不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148482_comment'></div>又若祀昊天之神，摄上公之秩，斋戒于清夜，燔燎于未晞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148482_comment'></div>公之至止，遂及我私，斯又胜游之一趣耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148482_comment'></div>谋野则获，固殊郑国之卿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148482_comment'></div>乘兴而来，或同山阴之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148482_comment'></div>命曰「野兴」，厥义在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148482_comment'></div>夫崇高富贵，非全德不能常守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148482_comment'></div>忧勤逸豫，非上智不能兼行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148482_comment'></div>故《诗》曰：「赫赫师尹，民具尔瞻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148482_comment'></div>言安危之所系也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148482_comment'></div>又曰：「或燕燕居息，或尽瘁事国」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148482_comment'></div>言劳逸之相远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148482_comment'></div>唯公以王佐之才，处公台之任，得致君之要，政行而不繁，得治心之方，体和而自适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148482_comment'></div>观其奏议公直，李兴元之胸怀、陆忠州之辞笔也，则吁谟献替，从可知矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148482_comment'></div>襟灵介特，牛奇章之进退、郑珣瑜之操履也，则消息盈虚，又可见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148482_comment'></div>宜其居崇高富贵之上，在忧勤逸豫之间，优游庙堂，永保无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148482_comment'></div>某辱在陶冶，累尘掖垣，命纪芳亭，因及盛德，亦万分之一尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148482_comment'></div>时咸平元年二月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1148482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年3月</a>　在京任知制诰。孙仅连中省元、状元，禹称作诗送之。作品：《赠状元先辈孙仅》<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148283?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宰臣谢新雕三史表</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148283'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148283'>臣某等言：伏蒙圣慈，赐臣等新印本三史书各一部者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148283_comment'></div>伏以先帝好文，校雠三史，诸儒会议，绵历两朝，模印方行，颁宣首及<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148283_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下心存稽古，志在奉先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148283_comment'></div>念五帝三王之书，具存道德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148283_comment'></div>思列国两汉之事，可鉴兴亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148283_comment'></div>睹真本之初成，先近臣而受赐，欲俾详观理乱，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148283", 1148283, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>起发</span>昏蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148283_comment'></div>臣等素匪知书，仰承善诱，敢不服勤旧史，少副圣怀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148283_comment'></div>庶窃慕于格言，或有裨于大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148283_comment'></div>臣等无任感天荷圣激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1148283_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年8月</a>　在京任知制诰。有诗和杨覃。作品：《和屯田杨郎中同年（覃）留别之什》<div id='poem_sentence_1_74768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74768'>谢公留滞苍苔院，潘岳征行落叶天。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年9月</a>　在京任知制诰。有诗送杨亿。作品：《送正言杨学士亿之任缙云》<div id='poem_75044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　在京任知制诰。种放母死，贫不克葬，王禹偁与宋湜、钱若水同上表。作品：《乞赐终南山人种放孝赠表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（秋天作。）</span><div id='poem_1148307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞赐终南山人种放孝赠表</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148307")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148307'>臣某言：臣等闻陈蕃之荐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148307", 1148307, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>五处士</span>，名动邦家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148307_comment'></div>田歆之举六孝廉，事光简册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148307_comment'></div>惟两汉之制理，于三代而同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148307_comment'></div>复有聘以安车，赐之束帛，听其不仕，姑务优贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148307_comment'></div>八月奉羊酒之仪，四时致宗庙之胙，史之所记，代不乏人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148307_comment'></div>爰属昌期，宜兴坠典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148307_comment'></div>伏见终南山处士种放，山林<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148307", 1148307, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>养素</span>，孝友修身，既聚学以诲人，亦躬耕而事母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148307_comment'></div>庞公守道，不入襄阳之城，康伯避名，永绝长安之市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148307_comment'></div>太宗皇帝知其高尚，曾示徵求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148307_comment'></div>恐违鹤发之亲，未应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148307", 1148307, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>鹄书</span>之命，让赐钱而不受，悬好爵以难縻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148307_comment'></div>今闻放执亲之丧，贫不能葬，棺衾未具，宅兆无归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148307_comment'></div>臣等或忝彼交游，或慕其名节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148307_comment'></div>伤哉贫也，睹兹窀穸之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148307_comment'></div>闻斯行诸，岂吝匍匐之救？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148307_comment'></div>虽共谋分俸，而未若推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148307_comment'></div>况褒岩穴之贤，敢掠朝廷之美？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148307_comment'></div>伏冀皇帝陛下特旌素履，曲示鸿私，少加粟帛之恩，俾谐丧葬之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148307_comment'></div>上则成先皇之雅意，下则扬隐士之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148307", 1148307, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>清规</span>，亦足以激浮竞之风，劝孝悌之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148307_comment'></div>所系者甚大，所费者至微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148307_comment'></div>比考叔之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148307", 1148307, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>遗羹</span>，一时小惠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148307_comment'></div>较郑均之义谷，千古同涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148307_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣等无任僭越之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1148307_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年9月</a>　在京任知制诰。真宗以沈伦所修《太祖实录》，事多漏略。诏宰相吕端、判集贤院钱若水重修。丁丑，又以王禹偁、李宗谔、梁颢、赵安仁等同修。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　在京任知制诰。代向敏中作表。作品：《为兵部向侍郎（敏中）谢恩表》<div id='poem_1148354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为兵部向侍郎谢恩表</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148354")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148354'>臣某言：伏奉制书，入参朝政，拜章陈让，答诏不从，兢忧失图，黾勉就位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148354_comment'></div>伏念臣出于寒素，偶玷科名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148354_comment'></div>先帝误知，骤加擢用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148354_comment'></div>圣君嗣统，未忍弃遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148354_comment'></div>在臣心而自知，听物论之难处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148354_comment'></div>岂谓尊号皇帝陛下特颁纶命，俾佐鼎司，职在弼谐，事关理乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148354_comment'></div>自非抱吁谟之业，有变通之才，上可以启沃四聪，下可以赞成三事，则何以副搢绅之伫望，塞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148354", 1148354, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>宵旰</span>之虚怀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148354_comment'></div>是敢具述恳诚，愿罢光宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148354_comment'></div>陛下不移前诏，终辱大恩，再三虑黩于天心，万一冀倾于臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148354_comment'></div>又念两朝近侍，五稔叨荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148354_comment'></div>虽覆载之恩，终无补报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148354_comment'></div>幸犬马之力，未甚衰残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148354_comment'></div>谨当知无不为，退思补过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148354_comment'></div>调四时于玉烛，诚愧昔贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148354_comment'></div>誓一命于鸿毛，宁忘死地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148354_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷恩、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　在京任知制诰。代温仲舒作表。作品：《为温侍郎（仲舒）谢除礼部尚书表》<div id='poem_sentence_1_1148355_comment'></div>伏念臣迹本孤平，才非秀茂，当先朝之践祚，遇丹陛之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148355", 1148355, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>较文</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148355_comment'></div>自忝科名，动踰涯分，骤登密勿，罔效涓埃，虽竭精诚，略无献替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148355_comment'></div>洎罢归谏署，出领藩条，奔走五年，迁移四郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148355_comment'></div>徇公之志，中外不渝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148355_comment'></div>恋阙之心，朝昏在望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148355_comment'></div>先皇帝召从荆渚，俾佐台司，未伸致主之诚，遽逼上仙之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148355_comment'></div>薄命虽在，孤魂已销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148355_comment'></div>伏遇尊号皇帝陛下统嗣丕基，遵承先旨，特迁官秩，曲示优容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148355_comment'></div>又换炎凉，卒无裨补，引退难轻于去就，恋恩遂涉于因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148355_comment'></div>一事蔑闻，两朝冒宠，宜从远贬，用戒将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148355_comment'></div>伏蒙陛下曲念遭逢，特存终始，峻陟六卿之列，罢参三事之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148355_comment'></div>尘兹显官，未塞公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148355_comment'></div>古人所谓进则负天下之望，退不失六曹尚书者，臣今是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148355_comment'></div>南宫疏远，北极崇高，欲报鸿恩，未知死所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148355_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148356_comment'></div>伏念臣猥以庸材，骤登贵仕，前忝三事，行将二年，忧畏则多，辅弼无效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148356_comment'></div>罢归左辖，寻改正卿，迁移数州，奔走万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148356_comment'></div>甘在散地，以终此生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148356_comment'></div>岂谓尊号皇帝陛下过求旧臣，曲奉先旨，委以万务，冠于三台。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年10月</a>　在京任知制诰。有启。作品：《谢仆射相公（吕端）求致仕启》<div id='poem_1148394' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148394' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148394?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢仆射相公求致仕启</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148394'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148394'>右某启：伏以悬车告老，大夫七十之期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148394_comment'></div>名遂退身，老氏《五千》之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148394_comment'></div>其或当尚齿尊贤之代，有经邦镇俗之才，虽在期颐，式存倚注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148394_comment'></div>纵止足之心自许，执礼无违；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148394_comment'></div>奈弼谐之任惟艰，非贤不乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148394_comment'></div>伏惟仆射相公受天和气，为国善人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148394_comment'></div>三朝文翰之司，丹青帝典；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148394_comment'></div>再领燮调之任，提振皇纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148394_comment'></div>昨以久处台司，重烦耆德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148394_comment'></div>事均劳逸，辍万务之忧勤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148394_comment'></div>位保崇高，为百僚之师长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148394_comment'></div>永言端揆之任，旧称廊庙之官，垂行三入之恩，求赞千年之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148394_comment'></div>岂谓浮云富贫，脱屐簪裾，拜章既达于冕旒，洒翰遍贻于台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148394_comment'></div>是何末品，亦辱台函，初谓误传，终知殊赐，兢惶无措，拜受失容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148394_comment'></div>见大儒之用心，循先圣之彝训，不独辞于世禄，亦将激彼时风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148394_comment'></div>然而上揣宸心，旁徇公议，咸谓老成之德，宜居辅弼之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148394_comment'></div>捕虎逐麋，虽鬻熊之已暮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148394_comment'></div>为霖作砺，非傅说以何归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148394_comment'></div>况钟《洪范》之康宁，宜念苍生之穷困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148394_comment'></div>伫睹白麻天降，促追振鹭之班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148394_comment'></div>黄閤洞开，重见栖鸡之树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148394_comment'></div>社稷之谋是展，君臣之分弥隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148394_comment'></div>与邦国以同休，书简编而增耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148394_comment'></div>斯为善颂，且匪虚谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148394_comment'></div>下情无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1148394_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148358?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为史馆李相公让官第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148358")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148358_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148358'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148358'>臣某言：自承制命，寻拜封章，未赐允俞，不遑启处<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148358_comment'></div>伏以知人安民，谓之圣主；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148358_comment'></div>度德量力，谓之通贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148358_comment'></div>茍冒宠荣，必乖倚注，岂独失具瞻之望，亦恐伤则哲之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148358_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下负荷二圣之基，勤求万机之务，必欲化人成俗，与古为徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148358_comment'></div>所宜择间杰之才，辅文思之德，然后内安百姓，外抚四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148358_comment'></div>使社稷永康，扬太祖太宗之业；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148358_comment'></div>圣贤相遇，成可久可大之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148358_comment'></div>物论人心，所望若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148358_comment'></div>如臣斗筲小器，章句诸生，但以遭逢，遂居通显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148358_comment'></div>先皇帝擢从内署，俾赞中枢，莫效涓埃，空更岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148358_comment'></div>洎退居散地，自誓终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148358_comment'></div>岂期际会储宫，列汉皇之四皓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148358_comment'></div>践扬相府，预虞舜之五臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148358_comment'></div>当陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148358", 1148358, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>铺张</span>政教之时，是微臣倾竭谟猷之日，徒有致君之志，实微经国之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148358_comment'></div>行将二年，未立一事，久妨贤路，又正台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148358_comment'></div>时来而身不自知，诏下而人应失色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148358_comment'></div>伏望陛下特回成命，别付钜贤，俾伸夔、契之材，用助唐、虞之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148358_comment'></div>庶陈力就列，遂不能则止之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148358_comment'></div>惟器与名，得不可假人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148358_comment'></div>言非饰让，情逼知难，伏閤拜章，期于得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148358_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1148358_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　在京任知制诰。冬，王禹偁抱孙，喜而赋诗。作品：《寿孙三日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（冬天作。）</span><div id='poem_74760' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74760' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74760'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74760'>经年病不饮，此日一开樽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74760'>鉴里休嫌老，怀中已抱孙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74760'>红绷裁锦段，香水浴银盆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74760'>他日归田去<span class='inlineComment2'>（原缺，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本补）</span>，相扶入荜门<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《小畜集》卷一一）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74760'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74760_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　在京任知制诰。王禹偁为同年进士朱九龄之父遵式撰墓志铭。作品：《监察御史朱府君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1148541' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148541' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148541?labeling=true' target='_blank'>监察御史朱府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148541")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148541_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148541'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148541'>公讳遵式，字咸则，祁州无极人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148541_comment'></div>其先高辛氏，有才子八人，朱虎其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148541_comment'></div>事舜为卿，舜命伯益作虞官，益让于虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148541_comment'></div>则盛德之后，从可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148541_comment'></div>曾祖俨、祖公政，皆隐德不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148541_comment'></div>考思琼，赠大理司直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148541_comment'></div>妣董氏，追封陇西县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148541_comment'></div>公即司直府君之第二子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148541_comment'></div>幼而聪悟，不为嬉戏，始能言，即好诵书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148541_comment'></div>将举神童，内艰而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148541_comment'></div>服阕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>业文</span>，不舍昼夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148541_comment'></div>二十四应进士，凡四上，为权势所抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148541_comment'></div>周显德初，翰林承旨、兵部侍郎徐公典贡举，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>褒拔</span>寒俊，精覈艺实，公始成名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148541_comment'></div>世宗平寿春，戎帅杨信奏公为节度推官，得秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148541_comment'></div>兵革之馀，疮痍未复，佽助军政，公实尽瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148541_comment'></div>太祖开国，以恩例试大理评事，仍进阶一级。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148541_comment'></div>是岁帅移蒲津，縻以旧职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148541_comment'></div>巨才屈乎幕府，清议闻诸朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148541_comment'></div>于时陕郊有逋民，本府有鹾务，左冯有旱灾，皆别敕委公按覆其事，操刃决滞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>根节</span>迎解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148541_comment'></div>乾德三年，杨公薨，僚佐并随府罢，新帅汾阳郭公从义素闻公名，留佐戎政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148541_comment'></div>辞避不获，僶俛就位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148541_comment'></div>汾阳一幕，公为末至，奉上率下，人无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148541_comment'></div>会诏下，督藩臣举幕吏堪为升朝官者，同舍郎皆促装俟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148541_comment'></div>汾阳，诸侯之贤者也，以为非公不可塞诏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148541_comment'></div>第以宾佐故旧之情，重难其事，因重午节请公修贡，乃密以状闻，左右无能知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148541_comment'></div>拜监察御史，制书先署举主中书令名衔，搢绅以为美事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148541_comment'></div>盐铁奏秦州银坑，比多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>逋负</span>，未入之数，不减万计，请择朝臣以主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148541_comment'></div>相府以公前佐河中，有廉干之誉，遂命监焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148541_comment'></div>乘驲之任，复经旧府，汾阳迎于远郊，具藩见台宪礼，辍执御者，对控公马，马首小却，即按辔恳揖，并驱而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148541_comment'></div>蒲人荣之，观者如堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148541_comment'></div>监银冶凡八月，宿弊尽去，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>羡利</span>居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148541_comment'></div>巴蜀初平，吕翰啸聚，国家忧三峡诸郡，以公为涪州通判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148541_comment'></div>忠信笃敬，蛮貊化之，遂知军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148541_comment'></div>岁满，夷獠相率守阙乞留，优诏许之，仍降玺书褒美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148541_comment'></div>开宝五年，始受代入宪府，掌内弹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148541_comment'></div>左补阙宗惟忠以本官知濠梁，家富于财，轻赍自奉，解印之日，有白金数千两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148541_comment'></div>时辇下用中黄门典关市之税，以为朝官禄薄，疑有奸利，即以事闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148541_comment'></div>太祖方责廉吏，养疲民，乃下御史府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148541_comment'></div>公亲劾之，其实家财，无赃污状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148541_comment'></div>惟忠请自诬以脱系狱，公不许，刺问履历，未尝有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>渎货</span>事，乃请原其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148541_comment'></div>太祖召公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>诘让</span>曰：「囊橐如此，非盗于官，即取于民，书生相党耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148541_comment'></div>公曰：「惟忠始下狱，即请服罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148541_comment'></div>臣不忍希旨致人于法，乱陛下邦宪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148541_comment'></div>因抱欸占，罗列指摘，词气不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148541_comment'></div>太祖怒曰：「吾将自决此狱，安用御史为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148541_comment'></div>遂坐惟忠徒罪，叱公使去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148541_comment'></div>公执简而出，无惧色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148541_comment'></div>时太宗皇帝尹京，睹公所守，甚奇之，使人慰勉曰：「为御史，执法当如是」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148541_comment'></div>然中外恐惧，忧在不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148541_comment'></div>未几，以公监开宝监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148541_comment'></div>畏避雷霆，韬戢锋锷，公馀与宾友纵饮而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148541_comment'></div>八年郊祀毕，策勋柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148541_comment'></div>太宗嗣位，加朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148541_comment'></div>太平兴国二年归阙，属军国事繁，未暇进用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148541_comment'></div>公微得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/175/Comments/0")'>风恙</span>，求判西京留台，遂兼商税事，非所乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148541_comment'></div>明年得病，告归东京，终于私第，享年五十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148541_comment'></div>某年赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148541_comment'></div>夫人杜氏，宿州刺史俊之女也，从夫封京兆县君，从子追封某县太君，有妇道母德传于亲族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148541_comment'></div>府君以清白捐馆，家无馀赀，二男未冠，五女未笄，居于京师，尝苦桂玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148541_comment'></div>夫人一切俭约，以身率下，外求师友以训其子，内修工容以教其女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148541_comment'></div>衣服饮食皆有撙节，唯买书则不问其价，以至抽辍簪珥，略无倦色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148541_comment'></div>雅好内典，达其旨趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148541_comment'></div>又多智，善解梦，言未来事，往往符验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148541_comment'></div>昼哭之后，微有足疾，杖而能行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148541_comment'></div>及闻长子登第，因投杖而起，曰：「朱氏之门不坠矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148541_comment'></div>吾为人妇，为人母，无负也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148541_comment'></div>足疾由是遂瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148541_comment'></div>见其子升通籍，板舆就养者十三年，以某年某月某日终于舒州，年六十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148541_comment'></div>二子，长曰九龄，秘书省著作佐郎，文学政事，不坠家法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148541_comment'></div>次曰延龄，举进士不第而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148541_comment'></div>五女：长嫁殿中丞、直集贤院程宿，次嫁岳州司理参军郭夷简，次嫁张士廉，次嫁张士宗，举进士，儒林之秀者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148541_comment'></div>季女未出室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148541_comment'></div>以某年某月某日，葬于某乡某里，以某县太君祔焉，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148541_comment'></div>公负典诰之文，止于笺檄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148541_comment'></div>有恺悌之政，流乎夷落；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148541_comment'></div>练台阁之仪，老于钱谷，时使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148541_comment'></div>有郭令之辟荐，受太宗之殊遇，而不及显位，命使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148541_comment'></div>夫位不充德者，其后必大，岂诬也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148541_comment'></div>某与大著作为进士同年，请以词臣之笔，志于丈人之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148541_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_1148541'>人恤乎无德，不恤乎无位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148541_comment'></div>德位俱充，惠于困穷，匪吾之通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148541_comment'></div>位卑德崇，系于污隆，匪吾之穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148541_comment'></div>展矣朱公，抑扬古风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148541_comment'></div>策名筮仕，二十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148541_comment'></div>一入乌府，终身不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148541_comment'></div>馀庆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1148541", 1148541, "Clauses/275/Comments/0")'>昌繁</span>，施及后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148541_comment'></div>贤子令孙，必大其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148541_comment'></div>刻此清芬，铭于九原。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_87_1148541'></div><div id='poem_sentence_87_1148541_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　在京任知制诰。是年或稍后，王禹偁为同乡父执桑光辅撰神道碑铭。作品：《殿中丞赠太常少卿桑公神道碑铭》<div id='poem_1148535' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148535' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148535?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中丞赠太常少卿桑公神道碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148535")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148535_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148535'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148535'>按《丧葬令》，五品已上立碑，螭首龟趺，高不得过九尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148535_comment'></div>又云：文武五品已上致仕官薨卒者，其吊祭赙物，依见任殿中丞品第五、太常少卿品第四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148535_comment'></div>今云中留后桑侯葬先少卿，树碑于神道，用旧制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148535_comment'></div>公讳光辅，字鲁卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148535_comment'></div>其先弘羊以心计得幸于汉武，世居东郡之黎阳，徙家于高平钜野县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148535_comment'></div>周显德中以县为济州，今为郡人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148535_comment'></div>曾祖某，祖某，并隐晦不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148535_comment'></div>考讳某，密州莒县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148535_comment'></div>公即莒县府君之长子，以唐天祐甲戌岁生于钜野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148535_comment'></div>既冠，长七尺，风貌峻整，襟怀豁如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148535_comment'></div>治三《礼》，穷其渊奥，随乡举累上，为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148535", 1148535, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>权势</span>所轧，退耕肄业，一不屑意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148535_comment'></div>太平兴国初，太宗皇帝亲试举人，拔孤贫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148535", 1148535, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>湮厄</span>之士，公始以本科擢第于御前，解褐许州郾城主簿，会太宗亲征并垒，诏郡县督民飞挽以饷六师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148535_comment'></div>郾城令当行，令畏懦有忧色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148535_comment'></div>公曰：「古人辞易不辞难，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148535", 1148535, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>急病让夷</span>，吾之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148535_comment'></div>今天子蒙犯霜露，吊伐叛逆，岂臣下宴安之时耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148535_comment'></div>遂诣郡请代令行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148535_comment'></div>事毕赏劳，改潍州团练推官、秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148535_comment'></div>俄迁大理评事兼监察御史，充泰宁军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148535_comment'></div>时留后已掌禁军，号御龙直，以宿卫忠谨，恩顾弥渥，因从容侍立，奏曰：「臣父年齿甚高，为藩郡从事，非所乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148535_comment'></div>臣坐享厚禄，不得奉朝夕之膳，心所未足」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148535_comment'></div>因制授太子左赞善大夫致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148535_comment'></div>明年转殿中丞，赐五品服色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148535_comment'></div>优游辇下，时议荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148535_comment'></div>以淳化二年六月十二日寝疾，终于上都之官舍，享年七十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148535_comment'></div>以留后贵，赙赠有加，是月权窀于法宝寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148535_comment'></div>自淳化四年太宗郊祀至咸平元年今上嗣位，由成均博士累赠奉常亚列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148535_comment'></div>夫人张氏先公而亡，追封南阳郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148535_comment'></div>子四人，长曰赞，即留后太傅，次曰某，次曰某，次曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148535_comment'></div>女一人，适某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148535_comment'></div>以某年某月某日葬于本县获麟乡休祥里，以清和郡太君祔焉，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148535_comment'></div>公读周公、孔子之书而道屈于场屋，负冉有、季路之政而命厄于州县，积善馀庆，留后得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148535_comment'></div>用能会风云于代邸，执干戈以卫社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148535_comment'></div>安边却敌，势若长城；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148535_comment'></div>尊主庇民，精贯白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148535_comment'></div>善训之道，有自来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148535_comment'></div>某，钜野人也，为儿童时，少卿数来吾家，先人命拜，少卿踞受，曰「童子答」，某常记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148535_comment'></div>见托勒铭，词实无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148535_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1148535'>富贵无种，善恶有源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148535_comment'></div>不在其身，在其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148535_comment'></div>少卿儒雅，留后藩垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148535_comment'></div>文武之道，在公一门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148535_comment'></div>公来悬车，享兹眉寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148535_comment'></div>何以馈之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148535_comment'></div>肥羜旨酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148535_comment'></div>公去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1148535", 1148535, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>宾职</span>，处兹高堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148535_comment'></div>何以贵之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148535_comment'></div>赤绂银章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148535_comment'></div>令终帝里，归葬吾乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148535_comment'></div>乐卿褒赠，垄树增光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148535_comment'></div>刻铭真宅，千古流芳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1148535_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　在京任知制诰。有文。作品：《书蝗》<div id='poem_1148473' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148473' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148473?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书蝗</a><span class='authorDate'>（998年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148473")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148473_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148473'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148473'>仲尼修《春秋》，设凡例，物为灾则书之，不为灾则阙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148473_comment'></div>盖物之灾祥，系君之善恶，特取其为灾者，以垂戒尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148473_comment'></div>茍不为灾者亦书之，则虑后之为君者，谓灾不由德而由于数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148473_comment'></div>斯圣人之微旨在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148473_comment'></div>故《传》曰：「有蜚，不为灾，亦不书」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148473_comment'></div>噫，去圣渐远，诡诞争起，阴阳家流，得以蔓其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148473_comment'></div>使君天下者，视天灾时变，不务德以禳之，但委其数而已，吁，可悲也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148473_comment'></div>然则君有修德御灾、转祸为福者，茍灭而不书，曷以儆后代？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148473_comment'></div>是以尧水汤旱，非不灾也，能以德御之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148473_comment'></div>皇宋嗣统之七载，夏四月，有飞蝗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148473_comment'></div>上念粢盛稼穑之重，则贬常膳，避正寝，彻宫悬，眚灾恤刑，以赦天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148473_comment'></div>曾未旬浃，蝗死于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148473_comment'></div>或曰：皇上以勤俭之德，驯致太平，无为之风将有待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148473_comment'></div>天其或者虑怠于理，故用蝗以为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148473_comment'></div>果能修德以御之，则我后之德，唐尧之德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148473_comment'></div>宋景之退荧惑，太宗之去虫蝗，得为比邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148473_comment'></div>儒臣不佞，敢作《书蝗》一篇，附于国史之末，非独彰我朝之善，亦欲垂后世之戒也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1148473_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年12月29日</a>　禹称预修《太祖实录》，直书其事。时宰相张齐贤、李济不协，意禹称议论轻重其间。落知制诰，出知黄州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　王禹偁谪黄州，窦元宾握手泣唁于閤门，禹称以诗谢之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　王禹偁谪黄州，未行，旬浃之间，杨徽之三至其家，慰勉开释，情礼备至。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=998&endYear=998')">998年</a>　王禹偁谪黄州，枢密副使宋湜亲至其家为之开释。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年1月</a>　王禹偁以卜葬父柩告假，遇郑昱，赠诗。作品：《一品孙郑昱》<div id='poem_75059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>一品孙郑昱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（999年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75059")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75059_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_75059_0'>① 郑絪元和中拜相，至郑昱六世矣（注原缺，据孙本、赵本补）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75059'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75059'>卜葬得假告，南出安上门。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75059'>鞭马六十里，暮投中书村。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75059'>村翁馆我宿，茅屋欲黄昏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75059'>有客忽投刺，自称一品孙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75059'>气貌不凡俗，因为开酒樽。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75059'>坐久问家谍，其族大且繁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75059'>池州有清节，滥觞登洪源<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75059'>太傅擅鸿笔，入相又出藩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75059'>其家本开封，改号一何尊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75059'>至昱始六代，布衣老丘樊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75059'>跨驴入府县，驱犊耕郊原。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75059'>家庙固已毁，国史空具存。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75059'>盛德百世著<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，功必格乾坤。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75059'>高太已不祀，羡絪何可论。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75059'>况复起章句，乘时宠便蕃。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75059'>子孙虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_75059", 75059, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>替陵</span>，尚得守田园。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75059'>我爱三代时，法度有深根。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75059'>卿大夫称家，世世奉蘋蘩。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75059'>四民有定分，宦路无驰奔。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75059'>自从杂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_75059", 75059, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>伯道</span>，倾夺日喧喧。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75059'>脱耒秉金钺，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_75059", 75059, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>吮笔</span>乘朱轩。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75059'>朝荣又暮辱，容易如掌翻。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75059'>古道不可复，颓波益以浑。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75059'>何况度木者，倒置轮与辕。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75059'>我亦起白屋，两朝直紫垣。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75059'>荫子有官常，赏延弟与昆。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75059'>尽待<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作得）</span>食人禄，将何报君恩。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75059'>农桑国之本，孝义古所敦。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75059'>吾族不力穑，终岁饱且温。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_75059'>虽非享富贵，亦以蠹黎元。<div id='poem_sentence_29_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75059'>唐贤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>尚消歇，我辈奚足言。<div id='poem_sentence_30_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_75059'>呼儿讽此诗，播在篪与埙。<div id='poem_sentence_31_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_75059'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_75059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75059'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_75059_0'>⑴ 自注：郑羡，天宝末携家遁于嵩少，不受禄山伪命，由是有清名。大历中自尚书郎刺池州，不赴任，遂隐居嵩、洛。生五子，絪最知名。羡累赠司空。絪自撰父碑，事迹甚详。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_75059_0'>⑵ 自注：絪，元和中拜相，又镇岭表，终太子太傅致仕，年七十八。王起撰碑。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_75059_0'>⑶ 自注：絪为相时，诏改宰辅乡凤池里中书村。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_75059_0'>⑷ 自注：絪生祗德，祗德之子曰颢，大中朝尚主。颢弟顼，乾宁中太子太保。顼子峤，太子少詹事。峤子藇，用一品孙补太庙斋郎，显德元年，终泌阳令。藇子昱，昱一品曾孙，至絪六世矣。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_75059_0'>⑸ 原作者，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_30_75059_0'>⑹ 原作元，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75059_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年2月</a>　有诗寄宰相李沆。作品：《出守黄州上史馆相公》<span class='inlineComment2'>（春天作。）</span><div id='poem_74713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74713' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74713?labeling=true' target='_blank'>出守黄州上史馆相公</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74713")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74713'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74713'>出入西垣与内廷，十年四度直承明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74713'>又为太守黄州去，依旧郎官白发生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74713'>贫有妻贤须薄禄，老无田宅可归耕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74713'>未甘便葬江鱼腹，敢向台阶请<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_74713", 74713, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>罪名</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《小畜外集》卷七）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74713'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74713_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年</a>　王禹偁谪黄州时，翰林学士毕士安以其家贫，乃致白金三百两为赆。<br /></div>

定陶
