class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75162' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75162?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬安秘丞见赠长歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（980年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75162")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75162_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75162'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75162'>我闻进士登科换凡骨，信知不是风尘物。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75162'>贡籍由<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>来数百年，直疑空却神仙窟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75162'>其间最贵龙虎榜，乘时得路为卿相。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75162'>一从巢寇犯阙来，梁氏礼闱还草创。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75162'>庄宗明宗虽膺命，晋朝汉朝俱不永。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75162'>其中纵得神仙材，太平不见哀之哉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75162'>上玄应恐天地闲，安仙又谪来人寰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75162'>二十把笔疏辞源，黄河倾落昆崙山。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75162'>有周道衰犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_75162", 75162, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>叹凤</span>，天公留得归皇宋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75162'>天水夕郎掌贡时，禹门万仞连云耸。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75162'>不是真龙不能过，嗔波怒浪浇雷火。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75162'>是岁北极七个星，一时下降为门生。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75162'>安仙堂堂冠其首，六星煌煌愿随后。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75162'>驺虞赋就铿金石，丹水诗成摛锦绣。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75162'>玉皇殿前受恩渥，一时命入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_75162", 75162, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>芙蓉幕</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75162'>独得归州近巫峡，十二晴峰长在睫。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75162'>郡斋狂醉复狂吟，书尽巴东一川叶。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75162'>迩来游宦五六年，吴山越水供新编。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75162'>还同白傅苏杭日，歌诗落笔人争传。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75162'>去年始上芸香阁，出典陶丘滞锋锷。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75162'>阮籍营中浮蚁馨，亚夫门外垂杨弱。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75162'>骥足虽知暂縻绊，樽前未始长嗟叹。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75162'>只应会得老聃言，大器本来成较晚。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75162'>吾君正是兴文教，不日徵归掌纶诰。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75162'>醉挨雉扇扫宫辞，怒上螭头呈谏草。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75162'>笔下追还三代风，祛尽浇漓成古道。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75162'>丈夫方见兼济才，莫学西山采薇老。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75162'>我今自是蓬蒿身，如何一见如故人。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75162'>长歌谓我相剪饰，便疑平地升青云。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_75162'>文章难得逢知己，知己相逢贵终始。<div id='poem_sentence_29_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75162'>伊我行止方悽悽，老亲稚子相顾啼。<div id='poem_sentence_30_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_75162'>出门动足歧路迷，得君引上登天梯。<div id='poem_sentence_31_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_75162'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_75162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75162'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_75162_0'>⑴ 原作有，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75162_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
成武
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a166122d6cd345e48c8fe82875e93438_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a166122d6cd345e48c8fe82875e93438");'><span id='a166122d6cd345e48c8fe82875e93438_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=984')">983-984年</a>，30-31岁</div><div id='a166122d6cd345e48c8fe82875e93438' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=983')">983年7月</a>　七月，禹称奉命任成武县主簿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=983')">983年</a>　禹称到成武县主簿任未久，友人鞠仲谋来访，禹称贻之以序。作品：《送鞠仲谋序》<div id='poem_1148407' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148407' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148407?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送鞠仲谋序</a><span class='authorDate'>（983年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148407")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148407_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148407'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148407'>皇帝嗣位之五祀，余始随计吏识鞠生于场屋中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148407_comment'></div>是岁余与生俱为御试所诎，胥别辇下，邈无音尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148407_comment'></div>王八年春，余第中乙科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148407_comment'></div>生以家艰，不预于选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148407_comment'></div>阅同年之籍，不下二百人，无生之名，为长太息矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148407_comment'></div>洎余解褐，掌簿书于成武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148407_comment'></div>县即隋之戴州也，庭有顽吏，土无秀民，或通刺而来者，皆腐儒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148407_comment'></div>以是供吏职、奉晨羞外，经旬浃未尝与人语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148407_comment'></div>居一日，生款扉而来，余既喜且愧，盖喜生之命驾而愧生之未禄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148407_comment'></div>问其行，则曰：「哀瘵之中，不敢事笔砚而事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148407", 1148407, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>家产</span>，姑以卜葬为事耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148407_comment'></div>曰：「某之祖考洎季父，俱以游宦终于理所，今悉扶护而归，将祔于故里」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148407_comment'></div>且出中谏苏公德祥饯行文序以示余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148407_comment'></div>夫苏公，天下之名士也，非生之博雅笃行，又乌肯序以褒之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148407_comment'></div>且述生自申抵陕，历河阳，下洛都，由浚郊而东至于高密，迂行曲涂，殆近万里<span class='inlineComment2'>（事具苏中谏序中。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148407_comment'></div>非事父母能竭其力者，孰能与于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148407_comment'></div>余因念家本寒素，宅于澶渊，梁季乱离，举族分散，叔父没于兵而葬雷夏，伯父没于客而葬博关，太夫人又旅葬于济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148407_comment'></div>当时未名，以乞丐自给，无立锥之地以息<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148407", 1148407, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>幼累</span>，况殡礼乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148407_comment'></div>今兹起家，位下俸薄，接晨炊之不及，况茔域乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148407_comment'></div>一旦睹生之行事，良可恸哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148407_comment'></div>噫，堂有严君，微得月俸以奉甘旨，则生之幸民也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148407_comment'></div>野有露骨，无土地以厝窀穸，则生之罪人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148407_comment'></div>誓将积馀俸，市高原，捧土起坟，负骨归葬，以继生之行事，则所愿毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148407_comment'></div>辱生之来，起余以不匮之志，受惠多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148407_comment'></div>生之门地文学，已备苏公之笔，故不书，但感慨而序云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1148407_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=983')">983年</a>　在成武县任主簿，有文。作品：《双鹦志》<div id='poem_1148488' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148488' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148488?labeling=true' target='_blank'>双鹦志</a><span class='authorDate'>（983年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148488")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148488_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148488'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148488'>鹦之为鸟，惠而能言也，人悉之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148488_comment'></div>故豪门右宗持金市之，以为耳目之玩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148488_comment'></div>罗者□于其利也，必生致之以求善价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148488_comment'></div>或衣衿鲜翠，喉舌鸣爽者，往往邀千金之直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148488_comment'></div>癸未岁，予策名辇下，与同年觞于旗亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148488_comment'></div>有置鹦而鬻者，因评其直将市之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148488_comment'></div>俄有丐妪曳杖而来者，熟视鹦而泣，悲不自止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148488_comment'></div>余因诘之，则曰：「妪少贱，为某侯之女奴，惟饮食是掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148488_comment'></div>侯家尝豢二鹦，以金笼锢之，置庭之左右庑下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148488_comment'></div>至于饮啄，妪实主焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148488_comment'></div>其一善言，侯颇爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148488_comment'></div>其一终岁不能出一言，侯则曰：『鹦之爱养于人，以其能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148488_comment'></div>尔不能言者，是尸吾泉粒也，不如释之』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148488_comment'></div>因释其不能言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148488_comment'></div>由是善言者，爱愈厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148488_comment'></div>时妪幼，在侯家以贱附贵，温于身而不知衣之出，饫于腹而不知食之自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148488_comment'></div>饭之馀者，虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148488", 1148488, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>椒桂</span>之味，必覆于地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148488_comment'></div>馔之善者，虽膏粱之美，或投于秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148488_comment'></div>而妾盖婢隐，侯莫得而知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148488_comment'></div>无何，鹦窃窥之，俟侯至，辄以实告，而侯则笞妪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148488_comment'></div>妪忿其谗于己也，因夜盗启笼，拉其颈而毙，告以暴卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148488_comment'></div>侯命瘗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148488_comment'></div>洎侯得罪窜逐，妪以贱不见杀，放从于良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148488_comment'></div>将求其匹，人则弃其老也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148488_comment'></div>将复于奴，人则忌其凶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148488_comment'></div>流离民间，以乞丐自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148488_comment'></div>今之睹市鹦者，思畴昔之事，妪是以泣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148488_comment'></div>余因叹曰：言虽俚，事虽鄙，可为君子之戒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148488_comment'></div>且夫鹦之不言，非全身远害乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148488_comment'></div>鹦之能言，非讦以为直之谓乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148488_comment'></div>妪之毙鹦，非恶直丑正之谓乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148488_comment'></div>且念古之小人居大用者，尸庙堂之位，素钟鼎之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148488_comment'></div>人之言者，岂特害其身，亦得赤其族，又何啻妪之毙鹦也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148488_comment'></div>是以志之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1148488_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=983')">983年</a>　在成武县任主簿，高锡卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=983')">983年</a>　在成武县任主簿，有序送翟骧。作品：《送翟骧序》<div id='poem_1148421' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148421' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148421?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送翟骧序</a><span class='authorDate'>（983年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148421")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148421_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148421'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148421'>士君子谓不由进士第者，为终身之耻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148421_comment'></div>贵而不归者，有夜行之刺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148421_comment'></div>禄不及亲者，立不仕之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148421_comment'></div>兼此三者，士龙是行之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148421_comment'></div>士龙尝策名江表有年矣，皇朝平吴之明年，始归于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148421_comment'></div>兵革之后，旅食于京师，悬于养亲，不暇择禄，因随伪官，署一簿于雷夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148421_comment'></div>考满，改一尉于彭城，折腰作吏六七年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148421_comment'></div>混无名之徒，食有道之禄，士龙耻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148421_comment'></div>八年，复举进士科中第，迁从事于广陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148421_comment'></div>广陵即其里也，故庐半空，乔木斯拱，物华人事，依然旧情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148421_comment'></div>飘飘䌽衣，奉版舆而东下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148421_comment'></div>昆弟妻子，罗列目前，手调莼鲈，躬扫坟墓，孝子之愿毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148421_comment'></div>噫，大丈夫得其时而行其道者，必能师表一世，利泽百姓，匪独善人之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148421_comment'></div>然立大功，居显位，必由乎命，士龙岂无志乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148421_comment'></div>姑见其策美名，归故里，侍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148421", 1148421, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>偏亲</span>，亦旅人之小亨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148421_comment'></div>行乎哉，士龙宜自爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148421_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=983&endYear=983')">983年</a>　在成武县任主簿，有诗。作品：《成武县作》《官成武主簿作五首》<div id='poem_74740' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=984&endYear=984')">984年</a>　在成武县任主簿，有文。作品：《单州成武县行宫上梁文》<div id='poem_1148548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>单州成武县行宫上梁文<span class='inlineComment2'>（太平兴国九年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（984年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148548")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148548'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148548'>窃以七十二家，管仲记升平之迹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148548_comment'></div>千八百处，桓谭述纪录之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148548_comment'></div>盖以王者易姓之初，必受命而改制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148548_comment'></div>天下太平之后，乃加厚而增高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148548_comment'></div>焕乎皇王之大猷，倬彼古今之茂典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148548_comment'></div>粤自唐风不竞，巢寇暴兴，伏莽之徒尽闻鸡而夜舞，揭竿之士思逐鹿以横行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148548_comment'></div>皇纲于是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>丝棼</span>，黔首以之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>瓜割</span>，求小康之不暇，废大礼以诚宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148548_comment'></div>我国家运应千龄，化敷九有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148548_comment'></div>天人克正，虚危朗而宗庙安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148548_comment'></div>地宝方登，河洛清而图书出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148548_comment'></div>垂衣裳于尧殿，走玉帛于涂山，一戎而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>倒载干戈</span>，万国而混同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>文轨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148548_comment'></div>制礼作乐，亦既表于成功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148548_comment'></div>降禅登封，尚未行于旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148548_comment'></div>望介丘而黯色，见率土之翘心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148548_comment'></div>遂使百辟具僚，八荒夷长，杂沓缁黄之众，龙钟耆艾之人，共倾葵藿之心，来扣凤凰之阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148548_comment'></div>露封章而三进，对旒冕以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>迁延</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148548_comment'></div>同歌时迈之诗，请展告成之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148548_comment'></div>皇上俯从人欲，上答<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>天休</span>，鸣銮特议于省方，御路聿修于行阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148548_comment'></div>莫不务崇俭德，屡降诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148548_comment'></div>圬墁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>剞劂</span>之人，来从公府；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148548_comment'></div>榱桷栋梁之用，出自神州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148548_comment'></div>见万乘之为心，无一人之劳力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148548_comment'></div>单州成武县者，城惟古戴，地即梁丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148548_comment'></div>左倚宓堂，子贱弹琴之日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148548_comment'></div>右邻曹国，文公观胁之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148548_comment'></div>牧雁之沼漾于前，俘玉之丘亘其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148548_comment'></div>泽通鲁甸，入哀公西狩之郊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148548_comment'></div>乡号汉泉，湛武帝东封之井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148548_comment'></div>地征人事，可得略诸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148548_comment'></div>监修殿直孙公，贵连戚里，家门可继于金、张；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148548_comment'></div>内品梁公，位列黄门，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/76/Comments/1")'>势望</span>自齐于冀、石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148548_comment'></div>知县、邢州观察推官崔公，初筵曳履，依王俭之红莲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148548_comment'></div>百里字人，忆陶潜之旧菊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148548_comment'></div>咸能戮力，遂致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>僝功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148548_comment'></div>择嘉辰而先驾虹梁，迎圣日而得开象阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148548_comment'></div>莫之敢指，无得而踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148548_comment'></div>爰陈善祷之文，用壮非常之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148548_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1148548'>儿郎伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148548_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>抛梁</span>东，东去金根御六龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148548_comment'></div>祥云未出参天岳，喜气先生见日峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148548_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1148548'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>抛梁</span>西，西来凤盖拂云霓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148548_comment'></div>祈福不劳藏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>玉牒</span>，礼天须至用金泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148548_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1148548'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>抛梁</span>南，瘴海朱方化已覃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148548_comment'></div>愿献江茅藉鄗黍，竞誇西鲽与东鹣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148548_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1148548'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1148548", id='poem_sentence_45_1148548_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1148548'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>抛梁</span>上，瑞彩祥烟拥天仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148548_comment'></div>丹凤黄麟随辇行，万岁三声满山响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148548_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1148548'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1148548", 1148548, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>抛梁</span>下，微雨轻风导仙驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148548_comment'></div>岩前奇兽纵游嬉，山畔神光生昼夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148548_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_1148548'>伏愿上梁之后，我皇功格上帝，恩流溥天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148548_comment'></div>邦家兮如松竹之茂，子孙兮如瓜瓞之绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148548_comment'></div>赫赫兮登三而迈五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148548_comment'></div>巍巍兮君圣而臣贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148548_comment'></div>同北辰兮居大，等南山兮不骞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148548_comment'></div>庶齐休于天地，垂万祀兮千年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1148548_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=984&endYear=984')">984年</a>　在成武县任主簿，有记。作品：《单州成武县主簿厅记》<div id='poem_1148475' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148475' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148475?labeling=true' target='_blank'>单州成武县主簿厅记</a><span class='authorDate'>（984年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148475")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148475_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148475'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148475'>主簿之任，在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148475", 1148475, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>名品</span>间最为卑冗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148475_comment'></div>然台府寺监洎郡县皆署焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148475_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148475", 1148475, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>总而言之</span>，县主簿又为卑冗之魁者，是以古人或耻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148475_comment'></div>噫，士君子学古入官，不以位之高下，身之贵贱，在行乎道、利乎民而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148475_comment'></div>故中都宰、鲁司寇，圣人为之者，为是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148475_comment'></div>矧百里之惨舒，系一邑之令长，令长得其人，主簿又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148475", 1148475, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>裨赞</span>之，则人受其赐也宜矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148475_comment'></div>令长非其人，主簿又阿谀之，则人罹其苦也又宜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148475_comment'></div>茍能曲尽规正，俾合于道，则一邑之政有由主簿而化者，得轻其所任乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148475_comment'></div>至于理簿书、课农事、供赋调、求考绩者，固主簿之职然尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148475_comment'></div>其间有斗讼相高、婚田未决、畜产<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148475", 1148475, "Clauses/28/Comments/3")'>交夺</span>、契券不明者，在乎察其情伪，正其曲直，助令长详而决之，使刑罚得其中，则百里之人，手足知所措矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148475_comment'></div>有奸猾，有茕独，有堕农，有无赖，有不孝，有不悌，在乎助令长遏抚之，诱导之，惩激之，则百里之人，耻格而移其风矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148475_comment'></div>有力田，有孝悌，有义夫，有节妇，在乎助令长<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148475", 1148475, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>申举</span>之，礼厚之，旌别之，则百里之人知劝而易其俗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148475_comment'></div>引而伸之，主簿之能事毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148475_comment'></div>然后可移之于郡，用是道佐佑长吏，则龚、黄循良之政可待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148475_comment'></div>复可移之于国，用是道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148475", 1148475, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>弼谐</span>帝皇，则尧舜雍熙之化可致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148475_comment'></div>夫如是，则为主簿者，始能公于心而执乎道，足下千里，毫末合拱，岂为难哉，又何卑冗之有焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148475_comment'></div>某策名起家，作吏斯邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148475_comment'></div>到任之明年，属岁丰政简，因笔其志于屋壁，所谓「知之非艰，行之惟艰」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148475_comment'></div>亦欲使后来居是位、升是厅者，勿以下位而自败其道焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148475_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
苏州（长洲）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='df716e4a79b04cb4824516edf64ac764_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("df716e4a79b04cb4824516edf64ac764");'><span id='df716e4a79b04cb4824516edf64ac764_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=984&endYear=987')">984-987年</a>，31-34岁</div><div id='df716e4a79b04cb4824516edf64ac764' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=984&endYear=984')">984年</a>　以大理评事知苏州长洲县。同年进士罗处约知吴县，相与日赋五题，苏杭间人多传诵。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=984&endYear=984')">984年</a>　富阳人谢涛居姑苏，与王禹偁、罗处约往来论学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=984&endYear=984')">984年</a>　在长洲任知县，有序。作品：《剑池铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此铭撰年未详，姑置于此。）</span><div id='poem_1148502' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148502' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148502?labeling=true' target='_blank'>剑池铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（984年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148502")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148502_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148502'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148502'>虎丘剑池，泉石之奇者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148502_comment'></div>《吴地记》引秦皇之事以为诡说，考诸旧史，则无闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148502_comment'></div>矧儒家者流，不可语怪，因为铭以辨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148502_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1148502'>茂苑之侧，震泽之湄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148502_comment'></div>岩岩虎丘，沈沈剑池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148502_comment'></div>峻不可以仰视，深不可以下窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148502_comment'></div>吾疑乎太枢作怪，化工好奇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148502_comment'></div>水物设险，山妖忌危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148502_comment'></div>陷其泉也，盖取诸《坎》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148502_comment'></div>磔其石也，以象乎《离》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148502_comment'></div>《艮》有止兆，《蒙》无亨期，搆此《屯》艰，成乎险巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148502_comment'></div>直恐夏后，弗能导之，岂惟秦皇，而能肇兹？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148502_comment'></div>盖其始也，一气发泄，两仪分别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148502_comment'></div>争融斗结，击搏而裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148502_comment'></div>断壁双揭，摩云不彻，翠秃青残，挫锐而中绝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148502_comment'></div>寒流下咽，奔山未决，雪涌雷收，拗怒而曲折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148502_comment'></div>蹙束湍濑，呀槎洞穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148502_comment'></div>䲡翻成窟，龙战有血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148502_comment'></div>非自人力，盖由天设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148502_comment'></div>谁谓一拳，登之惟艰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148502_comment'></div>谁谓一勺，挹之不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148502_comment'></div>池实自然，剑何妄传？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148502_comment'></div>我欲涉道，如地之渊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148502_comment'></div>我欲立节，如石之坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148502_comment'></div>位以道取，名以节全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148502_comment'></div>濡笔池心，勒铭山巅，破众惑焉，言予志焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1148502_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75173'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75173'>江东多果实，橄榄称珍奇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75173'>北人将就酒，食之先颦眉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75173'>皮核苦且涩，历口复弃遗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75173'>良久有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_75173", 75173, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>回味</span>，始觉甘如饴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75173'>我今何所喻，喻彼忠臣词。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75173'>直道逆君耳，斥逐投天涯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75173'>世乱思其言，噬脐焉能追。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75173'>寄语采诗者<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作官，据经锄堂本改）</span>，无轻橄榄诗。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/75071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为恶</a><span class='authorDate'>（984年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_75071'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75071'>明时巧言士，乱世佞倖郎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75071'>佞倖惟苟且，巧言颇包藏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75071'>为恶虽不同，同归于覆亡<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《小畜集》卷六）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75071'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_75071_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赴长洲县作<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（984年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74846")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74846_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_74846_0'>① 五首按：原作二首，据宋范成大《吴郡志》卷三七补后三首。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74846'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74846'>移任长洲县，孤帆冒雨行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74846'>全家随逆旅，一夜泊江城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74846'>身世漂沦极，功名早晚成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74846'>惟当泥尊酒，得丧任浮生。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74846'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74846_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74848' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74848' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74848?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（984年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74848_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74848'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74848'>移任长洲县，穷秋入水乡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74848'>江涵千顷月，船载一篷霜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74848'>竹密藏鱼市，云疏漏雁行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74848'>故园渐迢递，烟浪白茫茫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74848'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74848_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74845?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（984年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74845'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74845'>移任长洲县，沿流渐入吴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74845_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74845'>见碑时下岸，逢店自徵酤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74845_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74845'>野庙连荒冢，江禽似画图。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74845_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74845'>高堂从别后，应梦宿菰蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74845_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74845'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74845_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=985&endYear=985')">985年</a>　在长洲任知县，有文。作品：《上许殿丞论榷酒文》<div id='poem_1148375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上许殿丞论榷酒书</a><span class='authorDate'>（985年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148375")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148375'>殿臣阁下：某闻可言而不可行，君子不言也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148375_comment'></div>可行而不可言，君子不行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148375_comment'></div>今之所贡，皆可言之事，有可行之利，故不谋名位之相悬，不虞枢机之见辱也，望閤下留意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148375_comment'></div>某自前岁策名起家，作吏于成武，无功无过，偶历一考，而国家有长洲之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148375_comment'></div>越江而来，莅事亦未旬浃，亦尝聚簿书以阅之，则见长洲之民，著版图、分地利者，止七、八千家，岁出租钱馀一万七千缗，秋输赋米复不下十万硕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148375_comment'></div>重以盐法通商，又有加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148375_comment'></div>某以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148375", 1148375, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>赋舆</span>之重，出苏台五邑之右，是閤下旧治之地，不待一小吏言而后知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148375_comment'></div>今又闻朝廷以浙江榷酤，于民不便，比岁多犯禁者，是用择能臣以釐革之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148375_comment'></div>是行也，閤下知天子不为利也，为措刑而爱人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148375_comment'></div>某窃听<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148375", 1148375, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>舆言</span>，以为閤下将取一郡榷酒之数分于编户，然后听其自酿而沽诸，是亦割赤子之肉，饫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148375", 1148375, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>幸民</span>之腹也，其实惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148375_comment'></div>且钱氏据十三郡，垂百馀年，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148375", 1148375, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>琛赆</span>为名而肆烦苛之政，邀勤王之誉而残民自奉者久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148375_comment'></div>属中原多事，稔小利而忘大义，故吊伐之不行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148375_comment'></div>洎圣人有作，钱氏不得已而纳其土焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148375_comment'></div>均定以来，无名之租息，比诸江北，其弊犹多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148375_comment'></div>今若又以榷酒之数，益编户之赋，何异负重致远者，未有息肩之地，而更加石焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148375_comment'></div>何以堪之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148375_comment'></div>谅閤下必不尔为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148375_comment'></div>况閤下居士大夫之位，读古圣人之书，赫乎方名，晖映朝右，自当以兴利除害为己任，又非小吏之所及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148375_comment'></div>然屋漏在上，知之者在下，閤下试思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148375_comment'></div>使江东之地百万家，以至子孙受閤下之赐者，在此时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148375_comment'></div>某，县吏也，举字人之职以贡说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148375_comment'></div>是非得失固不自知，惟閤下宽而勿罪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1148375_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=985&endYear=985')">985年</a>　在长洲任知县，有序送许制。作品：《送许制归曹南序》<div id='poem_1148431' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148431' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148431?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送许制归曹南序</a><span class='authorDate'>（985年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148431")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148431_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148431'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148431'>士君子修辞立诚，必先之以孝悌，孝悌著而后忠可移矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148431_comment'></div>反是道者，吾何取焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148431_comment'></div>颍川许生，大族也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148431_comment'></div>先君以学古入官，终州县之职，齐、鲁、济、汶间至今号为廉吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148431_comment'></div>仲父、季父俱擢进士第，有大才而无显位，惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148431_comment'></div>是以高门之庆，钟于子孙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148431_comment'></div>元昆今曲台博士，负大名于天下，长涂远驭，未易知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148431_comment'></div>先是，博士之释褐也，补秋官，掾于江陵，再命为均阳倅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148431_comment'></div>先夫人以衰老之年，乐处乡曲，故板舆不行，留生以侍左右，尽生事死葬之礼，则生之孝可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148431_comment'></div>博士之立朝也，通理于苏，命生偕行以干家事，尽在原御侮之义，则生之悌可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148431_comment'></div>噫，生行已光而名未立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148431_comment'></div>矧皇上嗣位已来，登进士第者不下千馀人，顾生之怀，能无戚戚乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148431_comment'></div>然生行周业茂，于人无愧，将见受乡老荐，取太常第，犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148431", 1148431, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>抵掌</span>尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148431_comment'></div>然后以孝悌之行移之于国，则忠又可知矣，岂以先后为意哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148431_comment'></div>江梅弄黄，江雨飘白，别酒未尽，征帆屡移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148431_comment'></div>平芜远山，连袤千里，之子于役，相别何之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148431_comment'></div>曹，无礼义之国也，至止之日，慎其交焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148431_comment'></div>斯所谓以言之送也，生勉之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1148431_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=985&endYear=985')">985年</a>　在长洲任知县，有诗。作品：《陆羽泉茶》<div id='poem_74594' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74594' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74594?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陆羽泉茶</a><span class='authorDate'>（985年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74594")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_74594_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74594'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74594'>甃石封苔百尺深，试茶尝味少知音。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74594'>唯馀半夜泉中月，留得先生一片心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74594'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74594_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=985&endYear=985')">985年</a>　在长洲任知县，有诗寄柴成务。作品：《投柴殿院（成务）三十韵》<div id='poem_75035' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75035' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75035?labeling=true' target='_blank'>投柴殿院<span class='inlineComment2'>（三十韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（985年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75035")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75035_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75035'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75035'>南面修文德，东吴纳土疆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75035'>苍生思抚育，丹诏择循良。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75035'>乌府官新转，龙头桂旧香。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75035'>渡江骢马瘦，垂地绣衣长。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75035'>纶阁材知屈，苏台俗必康。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75035'>恩流一车雨，威凛柏台霜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75035'>休假寻山寺，行春泊野塘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75035'>白公是前政，鲁望有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_75035", 75035, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>维桑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75035'>求瘼心虽切，颐神道岂妨。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75035'>煎茶虎丘井，捣药木兰堂。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75035'>笋蕨供家馔，园林著道装。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75035'>击筇教鹤舞，收橘待僧尝。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75035'>迎使朝衣稳，娱宾绮席张。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75035'>犬声销巷陌，莺舌动笙簧。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75035'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_75035", 75035, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>冷句</span>题秋叶，孤琴贮夜囊。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75035'>歌楼寒月白，饮舫晚波凉。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75035_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75056'>馈粮萧相国，制礼叔孙通。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75056'>移石情无倦，抄书俸不充。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75056'>按琴苔院冷，捣药月堂空。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_75056", 75056, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>象阙</span>，清秩冠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_75056", 75056, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>鸳鸿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75056'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_75056_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县，有记。作品：《长洲县令厅记》<div id='poem_1148476' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148476' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148476?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长洲县令厅记</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148476")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148476_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148476'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148476'>天下语宰邑之贤者，率以宓不齐为称首，以其弹琴化民，民不忍欺，谓得致理之要也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148476_comment'></div>殊不知行是道者，不独系于人，亦将系于时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148476_comment'></div>当时王室虽微，皇纲未绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148476_comment'></div>有周礼在鲁，则单父岂曰乱邦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148476_comment'></div>有圣人为师，则子贱宜乎行道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148476_comment'></div>居百里之位，得诸侯之权，社稷民人，自我而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148476_comment'></div>井田车赋，得均其轻重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148476_comment'></div>刑罚教令，得济其宽猛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148476_comment'></div>凶荒水旱，得专其赈恤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148476_comment'></div>农时民力，得听其休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148476_comment'></div>然则无私于心，克俭于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148476_comment'></div>辨田之腴瘠，定赋之上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148476_comment'></div>强暴者刑之以法，孝悌者旌之以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148476_comment'></div>宽其教以诱人，峻其令以约吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148476_comment'></div>时丰则敛之，岁饥则赈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148476_comment'></div>农有力而不夺，役非时而不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148476_comment'></div>辟之以庠序，诲之以礼乐，使父子亲、兄弟友、夫妇和，然后教祭祀以事鬼神，行庆吊以睦乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148476_comment'></div>自然怀土不散，熙熙如春，弗知其然而然也，在上者不鸣琴而何俟哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148476_comment'></div>洎王道云亡，霸图<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148476", 1148476, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>孔炽</span>，大小相并，强弱相攻，区区子男，宗庙不保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148476_comment'></div>故《传》曰：「汉南诸姬，楚实尽之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148476_comment'></div>又曰：「楚县陈，盖县之始也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148476_comment'></div>秦有天下，画三十六郡，则小国皆为县而隶于郡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148476_comment'></div>国之于郡，犹身之有臂也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148476_comment'></div>郡之于县，犹臂之有指也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148476_comment'></div>国取于郡，郡取于县，县取于民，是以臂指捶民而自奉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148476_comment'></div>由是田有暴赋，丁有常佣，春役而夏不休，朝令而夕必具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148476_comment'></div>小则惩之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148476", 1148476, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>殿最</span>，大则惧之以刑法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148476_comment'></div>岂唯道不能行，亦将身受其辱，遂使宰邑者茍禄食、免笞骂而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148476_comment'></div>昔人叹「徒劳」而歌「归去」者为是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148476_comment'></div>向使子贱复生，亦将舍琴折腰，奔走不暇，况行道乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148476_comment'></div>虽欲不顾其时，不程其力，亦犹建一指而扶天柱，不其艰哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148476_comment'></div>时使之然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148476_comment'></div>长洲之名，见《吴都赋》，贞观中分吴县以建之，垂二百年，宰邑名氏，县志阙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148476_comment'></div>钱氏享国几一百稔，专建属吏，莫得而知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148476_comment'></div>皇上嗣位之二载，淮海王归于我，国家始设官以理焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148476_comment'></div>袁仁鐬首之，王某次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148476_comment'></div>其土污潴，其俗轻浮，地无柔桑，野无宿麦，饪鱼饭稻，衣葛服卉，人无廉隅，户无储畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148476_comment'></div>好祀非鬼，好淫内典，学校之风久废，诗书之教未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148476_comment'></div>兼并者僭而骄，贫窭者欺而堕，田赋且重，民力甚虚，租调失期，流亡继踵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148476_comment'></div>或岁一不稔，则鞭楚盈庭而不能集事矣，至有市男女以塞责者，甚可哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148476_comment'></div>是盖隔中夏之政，寖列国之风使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148476_comment'></div>今圣人求理于上，庶官陈力于下，斯民之泰，其有渐乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148476_comment'></div>某非循良之才，莅凋瘵之邑，仍以旧贯，民安仰哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148476_comment'></div>会到任之明年，大有年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148476_comment'></div>先是，司漕运者，转民岁租，更送他郡，苦舟楫之役，糜堰埭之费者久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148476_comment'></div>至是，始听民以本属郡输之，从便宜也，亦小康之有萌矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148476_comment'></div>是岁狱讼靡繁，赋调中考，因鸠敛民瘼，评议政体，总而刊之，存诸厅事，待贤者以举之，所谓能言而不能行者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148476_comment'></div>时大宋雍熙三年正月九日，守大理评事、知县事王禹偁记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1148476_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。秋间，禹称往访苏州胥山上之伍子胥祠，有诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。有记。作品：《昆山县新修文宣王庙记》<div id='poem_1148477' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148477' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148477?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昆山县新修文宣王庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148477")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148477_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148477'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148477'>夫圣人之生，必受天命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148477_comment'></div>有位者，天使之化民为一时也，三五帝皇之谓乎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148477_comment'></div>无位者，天使之立教为万世也，先师夫子之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148477_comment'></div>是以穷于旅人，终于陪臣，非不幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148477_comment'></div>向使居帝王之位，行尧舜之风，则颜、闵之科，犹元、凯之举也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148477_comment'></div>两观之诛，即四凶之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148477_comment'></div>自然道至而我无为，化行而人不知，时之歌者必曰「何力之有」，后之美者必曰「无得而称」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148477_comment'></div>虽流为典谟，形乎简册，亦不过「浚哲文明」、「温恭允塞」而已，岂复有祖述宪章之道流于后代乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148477_comment'></div>故曰生人已来，未有如夫子者也，秉笔之士，得轻议其德业欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148477_comment'></div>吴之诸郡，姑苏称其首；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148477_comment'></div>郡之属邑，昆山出其右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148477_comment'></div>杂以鱼盐之利，溉乎朝夕之池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148477_comment'></div>昔在皇唐，是为名邑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148477_comment'></div>降及钱氏，兹惟上腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148477_comment'></div>距海之田，民斯阜矣，然而庠序或缺，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148477", 1148477, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>儒素</span>弗兴，实仓廪而礼节未知，既富庶而教化不至，为邑之长，得无咎乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148477_comment'></div>县大夫边公世为儒流，时号甲族，自起家之调，历宰邑之资，所在播其能名，侪类惊其久次，大来之望，固未易知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148477_comment'></div>皇上嗣位之明年，淮海王如京师，且献图籍，尊王室也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148477_comment'></div>主上思泰远人，精择循吏，铜墨之任，尤难其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148477_comment'></div>始得公以宰吴，吴民受赐，降玺书以劳之，旌善政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148477_comment'></div>秩满受代，将选于天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148477_comment'></div>会兹邑有令尹之乏者，二千石命公以承乏，且状政绩，闻诸冕旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148477_comment'></div>未几有即真之命，免常调也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148477_comment'></div>公因民所利，期月而治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148477_comment'></div>以为人者政之本，儒者教之先，茍非师严而道尊，乌可移风而易俗哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148477_comment'></div>先是，文宣王庙但有基址，尽为蓁芜，废而不修六十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148477_comment'></div>公乃出俸金以营之，同僚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148477", 1148477, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>悦随</span>，群吏弗违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148477_comment'></div>乃庀工徒，度材用，一亩之宫，图蔓以出之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148477_comment'></div>数仞之墙，树土而揭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148477_comment'></div>殿堂既严，门阙斯备，丽以丹漆，饰以圬墁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148477_comment'></div>制度合乎礼文，力役当乎农隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148477_comment'></div>乃像素王，被华衮，垂珠旒，王者之制彰矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148477_comment'></div>乃状十哲，冠章甫，衣缝掖，儒者之服备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148477_comment'></div>庙之兴也既如彼，像之设也又如此，粤上丁之晨，行释奠之礼，所以列豆笾，陈簠簋，洁牲牢，具罍洗，贽币有数，尸祝有辞，八音作而人和，三献终而神悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148477_comment'></div>礼无违者，道不虚行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148477_comment'></div>观之如堵墙，化之犹影响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148477_comment'></div>俎豆之事修矣，礼乐之道兴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148477_comment'></div>十室之邑，期忠信以如丘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148477_comment'></div>一变之风，阐《诗》《书》而及鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148477_comment'></div>议者曰：吴地，裸国也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148477_comment'></div>昆山，海嵎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148477_comment'></div>旧染霸俗，未行儒风，非明君以文德敷万邦，非良宰以儒术化百里，又安能遵先王之教，移小国之风者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148477_comment'></div>某幸忝德邻，熟闻善政，爰旌茂绩，俾述斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148477_comment'></div>难言虽在于圣门，不朽愿刊于贞石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148477_comment'></div>时大宋雍熙三年月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1148477_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟制。作品：《拟成王判开封制》<div id='poem_1148267' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148267' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148267?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟陈王判开封府制<span class='inlineComment2'>（雍熙三年，在长洲。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148267")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148267_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148267'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148267'>门下：我国家以天下为公，居域中之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148267_comment'></div>京邑翼翼，求尹正以惟艰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148267_comment'></div>子孙振振，择亲贤而是用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148267_comment'></div>其有祥标甲观，望峻维城，素推宗室之贤，宜殿王畿之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148267_comment'></div>示无私于名器，俾作翰于家邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148267_comment'></div>元龟之兆叶从，丹凤之书乃降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148267_comment'></div>皇子具官陈王，庆钟七庙，秀禀五行，温良本自于天资，礼让讵因于时习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148267_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148267", 1148267, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>前星</span>有烂，拱辰极以弥光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148267_comment'></div>玉叶腾芳，挺本枝而可辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148267_comment'></div>爰自临轩降制，出閤就藩，崇高疏一字之封，慎重出五王之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148267_comment'></div>西园清夜，曾无飞盖之游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148267_comment'></div>北阙诘朝，常展问安之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148267_comment'></div>动静叶国家之庆，周旋尽臣子之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148267_comment'></div>将永辅于皇基，宜更亲于民政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148267_comment'></div>乃眷浩穰之地，是为践历之阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148267_comment'></div>尔其按千里之提封，观万夫之政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148267_comment'></div>肃清畿甸，考覈吏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148267_comment'></div>抚育我黎民，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148267", 1148267, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>宣布</span>我德化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148267_comment'></div>恤茕独以惠，戢豪右以威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148267_comment'></div>式观器能，以副<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148267", 1148267, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>毗倚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148267_comment'></div>又念隋朝而下，唐氏以还，京内史别任它官，亲王牧不知釐务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148267_comment'></div>今兹兼领，允谓试难，勉树厥功，无旷重位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148267_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148267_comment'></div>居亿兆之上，岂独子而独亲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148267_comment'></div>生帝王之家，在惟忠而惟孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148267_comment'></div>励尔事君之节，体余知子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148267_comment'></div>钦哉勖哉，勿替休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148267_comment'></div>可依前特进、检校太傅、兼侍中、行开封府尹、陈王。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1148267'></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1148267_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。应太子中舍、知萧山县事李允之请，为撰《潘阆咏潮图赞并序》<div id='poem_1148508' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148508' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148508?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潘阆咏潮图赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148508")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148508_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148508'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148508'>贾阆仙以夺卷之忤，谪于长沙，李洞铸其像以师之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148508_comment'></div>孟浩然以上书之句，弃于襄阳，王维图其形以观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148508_comment'></div>故能使穷辱之士弥光，风雅之道不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148508_comment'></div>清气未尽，奇人继生，处士潘阆得之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148508_comment'></div>处士总角之岁，天与诗性，故亲族骇其语焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148508_comment'></div>弱冠之年，世有诗名，故贤英服其才焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148508_comment'></div>今内翰广平宋公白赠诗云：「宋朝归圣主，潘阆是诗人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148508_comment'></div>其见许也如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148508_comment'></div>处士《自序吟》诗云：「发任茎茎白，诗须字字清」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148508_comment'></div>又《贫居》诗曰：「长喜诗无病，不忧家更贫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148508_comment'></div>又《峡中闻猿诗》云：「何须三叫绝，已恨一声多」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148508_comment'></div>又《哭高舍人锡》诗云：「生前是客曾投卷，死后何人与撰碑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148508_comment'></div>又《寄张咏》诗云：「莫嗟黑鬓从头白，终见黄河到底清」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148508_comment'></div>又《临江亭》诗云：「醉卧岂能妨燕雀，狂吟争不动鱼龙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148508_comment'></div>寒苦清奇，多此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148508_comment'></div>然趣尚自远，交游不群，松无俗姿，鹤有仙格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148508_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148508", 1148508, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>脱屣</span>场屋，耻原夫之流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148508_comment'></div>栖心云泉，有终焉之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148508_comment'></div>言念吴越，跨江而来，钱塘、会稽，卖药自给，因赋《浙江观涛》之什，称为冠绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148508_comment'></div>今太子中舍李公允以春宫之臣，被墨绶之贬，好奇尚异，有古人风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148508_comment'></div>乃出轻绡，徵彩毫，写彼诗景，悬为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1148508", 1148508, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>句图</span>，飞翰走僮，以越茂苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148508_comment'></div>且曰：「若得吴县序之，长洲赞之，可垂于不朽矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148508_comment'></div>会予卧病不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148508_comment'></div>疾间之日，复出图以阅之，诵诗以味之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148508_comment'></div>乃知处士之句，绝唱也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148508_comment'></div>李公之画，好事也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148508_comment'></div>罗君之序，乐善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148508_comment'></div>援毫赞之，以卒予志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148508_comment'></div>辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1148508'>天生潘阆，以诗为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148508_comment'></div>卖药泽国，吟潮海城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148508_comment'></div>风引鹤领，霜号猿声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148508_comment'></div>天地借意，鬼神以惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148508_comment'></div>闻之心骇，诵之骨清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148508_comment'></div>卢肇之赋，但述虚盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148508_comment'></div>光庭之论，徒曰纵横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148508_comment'></div>何如一章，穷万古情？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148508_comment'></div>中舍李公，爰徵画工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148508_comment'></div>快自象外，写于图中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148508_comment'></div>吟态伊何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148508_comment'></div>昂头指空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148508_comment'></div>寒沙暮岛，望月孤鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148508_comment'></div>吟声伊何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148508_comment'></div>舍水咽风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148508_comment'></div>秋山虚谷，喷霜晓钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148508_comment'></div>笔精墨妙，幽致何穷！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148508_comment'></div>凌烟有阁，甘泉有宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148508_comment'></div>欲图厥象，必待其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148508_comment'></div>此诗克成，与勋比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148508_comment'></div>霜缣一开，清风四来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148508_comment'></div>展矣君子，芳尘远哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148508_comment'></div>我藏此图，携于上都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148508_comment'></div>朝端人间，其能舍诸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148508_comment'></div>吴山未泐，浙江未枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148508_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1148508", 1148508, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>汤汤</span>潮声，与诗名俱。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_1148508'></div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1148508_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟文。作品：《拟裴寂祷华山文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148549?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟裴寂祷华山文</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148549")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148549'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148549'>伊太华之峻极，故神明之攸宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148549_comment'></div>尸上帝之赏罚，主下民之休戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148549_comment'></div>俾福仁以祸淫，类设官而分职，在乎区别贤愚，较量淑慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148549_comment'></div>苟道丰而德茂，神宜阴助；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148549_comment'></div>或行乖而义忒，神乃幽责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148549_comment'></div>善者所以钟其祉，恶者所以加其殛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148549_comment'></div>故载彼祀典，飨乎血食，视三公之秩，永播鸿名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148549_comment'></div>列五岳之中，亮无惭德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148549_comment'></div>是以国得而祭之，人得而祷斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148549_comment'></div>既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148549", 1148549, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>肸蚃</span>之不昧，岂聪明之我欺？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148549_comment'></div>嗟余生之在世，苦命薄而数奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148549_comment'></div>裸虫三百兮，赋余以至灵之性；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148549_comment'></div>风抟九万兮，诱余以上击之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148549_comment'></div>故戴仁以抱义，亦阅《礼》而敦《诗》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148549_comment'></div>冀代耕以干禄，尝筮仕乎神龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148549_comment'></div>君将致于尧、舜，道本师乎孔、姬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148549_comment'></div>何宦游之不调，沉下寮而流离？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148549_comment'></div>负王佐之器，处徒劳之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148549_comment'></div>彼呜钟以列鼎，余反接乎晨炊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148549_comment'></div>彼纡朱以拖紫，余独被乎荷衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148549_comment'></div>彼华轩以绣毂兮，余泣路以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1148549", 1148549, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>连洏</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148549_comment'></div>彼雕墙以峻宇兮，余衡门以栖迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148549_comment'></div>叹穷通以未决，亦进退而自疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148549_comment'></div>是敢敷壮志，谒严祠，方穷困之至此，庶富贵之可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148549_comment'></div>幸示得丧，形于梦思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148549_comment'></div>余若位极人臣，业展经纶，黜陟乎百执，启沃乎一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148549_comment'></div>印悬斗以照日，堤筑沙而绝尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148549_comment'></div>禄千钟之永保，食万钱而具陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148549_comment'></div>褒扬信史之中，勋庸不朽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148549_comment'></div>图画凌烟之上，德业弥新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148549_comment'></div>余则三黜而无愠，五就以求伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148549_comment'></div>俟风云之胥会，期鱼水以相亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148549_comment'></div>必也行乎道泽乎民，不独茍其位荣其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148549_comment'></div>使乎霸道升帝，浇风返淳，有域皆寿，无台不春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148549_comment'></div>虽伊傅兮吕尚，可继踵而比邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148549_comment'></div>余或命本贫寠，材非相辅，或沉在执戟，或老于郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148549_comment'></div>食箪笥兮饮一瓢，尘飞甑兮鱼游釜，履穿东郭以自叹，貂弊洛阳而谁顾？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148549_comment'></div>咏钱囊之什，唯日怨咨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148549_comment'></div>哭穷途之泪，莫皇攸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148549_comment'></div>余则考肥遁之友，结方外之侣，和《招隐》以裁诗，赓《归田》而作赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148549_comment'></div>必能守躁君，静灵府，匪谓钓虚名，沽浪誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148549_comment'></div>然后寂尔叩虚，浩然养素，谷处霞栖，呼风饮露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148549_comment'></div>虽颍许与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1148549", 1148549, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>箕巢</span>，可驾肩而接武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148549_comment'></div>余志若是，神心则那？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148549_comment'></div>苟无言而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1148549", 1148549, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>冥昧</span>，俾没世以蹉跎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148549_comment'></div>又安用三峰秀出，千仞高摩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148549_comment'></div>但凝岚而杳霭，徒叠石以嵯峨！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148549_comment'></div>幸灵贶之一告，决荣枯而靡它。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1148549_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟制。作品：《拟封田千秋为富民侯制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span>《拟追封建成元吉为巢王息王制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span>《拟拜屈突通为兵部尚书制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148263' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148263' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148263?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟封田千秋为富民侯制</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148263")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148263_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148263'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148263'>门下：谷者，人之司命也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148263_comment'></div>地者，谷之所生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148263_comment'></div>积其谷则国用备，耕其地则人食足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148263_comment'></div>是故朝有八政，货食为先；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148263_comment'></div>世修<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148263", 1148263, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>六府</span>，土谷在列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148263_comment'></div>圣人云：「足食足兵，民信之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148263_comment'></div>又谓「既富而教」，可不务乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148263_comment'></div>故命尔为富民侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148263_comment'></div>富民之道，在乎劝农；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148263_comment'></div>劝农之方，莫先力穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148263_comment'></div>朕自躬临万方，手拓四海，征伐未息，费用日滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148263_comment'></div>虽云五口之家，不暇三人之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148263_comment'></div>疆埸徒广，田畴半荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148263_comment'></div>由是奸民生于不足，不足生于不农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148263_comment'></div>竞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148263", 1148263, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>世利</span>于锱铢，并家人如鸟兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148263_comment'></div>务农者盖鲜，游食者良多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148263_comment'></div>胶漆刀圭，糠秕耒耜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148263_comment'></div>是使贫者无立锥之地，富者有过制之田，朕甚痛之，卿所睹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148263_comment'></div>昔尧、汤水旱而国无捐瘠者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148263_comment'></div>以其蓄积多而备先具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148263_comment'></div>今国家民之众，地之广，岂让于尧、汤之世乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148263_comment'></div>况无水旱之灾，反见囷仓之弊，盖地有遗利，人无馀力，膏腴之土不尽垦，山泽之利未尽归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148263_comment'></div>是知背本趋末、离邦去里者，不可胜纪，非彼万民之罪也，乃予一人之咎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148263_comment'></div>朕欲化此惰民，革之前弊，唯尔戮力，为予疚心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148263_comment'></div>虽有玄珠虹玉，勿谓之宝，朕之宝者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148263", 1148263, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>嘉谷</span>也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148263_comment'></div>虽有紫芝朱草，勿谓之瑞，朕之瑞者，丰年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148263_comment'></div>一夫不耕，一妇不织，惟尔之责；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148263_comment'></div>三时不害，九谷斯丰，惟尔之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148263_comment'></div>无使后稷播时，独美于前代也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148263_comment'></div>往钦哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1148263_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148264' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148264' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148264?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟追封建成元吉为息王巢王制</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148264")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148264_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148264'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148264'>门下：姬周圣人，有管、蔡二叔之伐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148264_comment'></div>炎汉明主，有吴、越七国之征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148264_comment'></div>仗大义以灭亲，弃小节而不守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148264_comment'></div>然而尺布斗粟，古者所以兴讥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148264_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148264", 1148264, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>同气连枝</span>，人情之所不忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148264_comment'></div>顷念宗祧之重，致忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148264", 1148264, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>手足</span>之情，虽契《鸱鸮》之诗，终惭《鹡鸰》之什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148264_comment'></div>良深哀悼，特议追封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148264_comment'></div>唯尔幽灵，听予徽册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148264_comment'></div>故皇太子建成，地居冢嫡，早膺压纽之符；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148264_comment'></div>故皇子元吉，贵属宗枝，幼列维城之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148264_comment'></div>顷以同窥大宝，共忌𦕈躬，盖彼师傅之非贤，陷予兄弟于不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148264_comment'></div>须为社稷之计，难存骨肉之恩，上依七庙之威，下顺三灵之意，事不获已，良用怃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148264_comment'></div>况高祖皇帝以予征伐之劳，早有废立之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148264_comment'></div>予事存嫡长，固避元良，讵思御侮之心，翻起乱常之衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148264_comment'></div>萧墙祸作，难避阋墙之讥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148264_comment'></div>中原时危，岂顾在原之义？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148264_comment'></div>虽从民意，实病朕心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148264_comment'></div>念韡韡之花，已加剪伐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148264_comment'></div>思亲亲之义，空自衋伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148264_comment'></div>岂可尚议<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148264", 1148264, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>污宫</span>，仍除属籍？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148264_comment'></div>宜服日中之字，用安泉下之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148264_comment'></div>建成可追封息王，仍以赵王福为汝嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148264_comment'></div>元吉可追封巢王，仍以曹王明为汝嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148264_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148264_comment'></div>周子之兄常闻无惠，郑伯之弟亦见厚崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148264_comment'></div>予上则有不悌之名，下则有失教之罪，顾兹丑恶，一至于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148264_comment'></div>言服犬牙，齐膺驼纽，庶俾分茅之贵，再招游岱之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148264_comment'></div>魂而有知，享我休命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1148264_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148265' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148265' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148265?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟拜屈突通为兵部尚书制</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148265")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148265_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148265'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148265'>非英贤不能辅真主，非昏乱无以见忠臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148265_comment'></div>是以箕子去商，叙九畴而德茂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148265_comment'></div>淮阴归汉，厕三杰以功高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148265_comment'></div>但节义之不亏，亦败亡而何累？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148265_comment'></div>具官屈突通，间代英气，前朝重臣，清望蔼乎当时，军功推于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148265", 1148265, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>舆议</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148265_comment'></div>顷自隋皇失驭，黔首罹灾，率土之人，吁天求主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148265_comment'></div>大宝不可虚其位，圣人所以应乎乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148265_comment'></div>朕首举义师，力平多垒，事非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148265", 1148265, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>乐战</span>，义解倒悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148265_comment'></div>每降一伏莽之徒，获一揭竿之士，未尝不加之真命，示以仁恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148265_comment'></div>遂致平定京师，易于拾芥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148265_comment'></div>扫除暴乱，疾若走丸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148265_comment'></div>汝独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148265", 1148265, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>向隅</span>自持，坚壁不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148265_comment'></div>域中之大，固已知归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148265_comment'></div>城下之盟，终为深耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148265_comment'></div>以至只轮匹马，兵尽矢穷，流涕谢于君亲，束手归于俘虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148265_comment'></div>所谓严霜已降，寒松于是益贞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148265_comment'></div>疾风聿来，劲草以之不屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148265_comment'></div>朕方行懋赏，贵在得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148265_comment'></div>孰云亡国之大夫，乃为徇义之君子，宜加好爵，用劝为臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148265_comment'></div>况复司会化经，文昌政本，李固比于斗极，韦彪谓之枢机，斯位之难，非人则阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148265_comment'></div>加以地崇天阁，权总兵曹，纳言之帻斯荣，进贤之冠是假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148265_comment'></div>我之所重，汝则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1148265", 1148265, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>当仁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148265_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148265_comment'></div>君败而身亡者，士之小节也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148265_comment'></div>前王而后霸者，人之远图也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148265_comment'></div>所以夷吾不死于子纠，卒成九合之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148265_comment'></div>陈平虽叛于项王，终画六奇之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148265_comment'></div>姑能事朕如彼隋朝，则去就之理克全，富贵之禄长守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148265_comment'></div>钦哉莅位，无替前劳。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1148265'></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1148265_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟诏。作品：《拟贬萧瑀出家诏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148266?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟贬萧瑀出家诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148266")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148266'>朕闻为臣之道，主愎谏则去之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148266_comment'></div>为国之道，臣要君则刑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148266_comment'></div>朕早举义师，克成王业，富有四海，亭毒兆民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148266_comment'></div>每得端士正人，必推心以委用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148266_comment'></div>每闻昌言直气，必伏膺以听从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148266_comment'></div>固无愎谏之名，翻有要君之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148266_comment'></div>既干无上，是谓不忠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148266_comment'></div>国有彝章，罪难私赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148266_comment'></div>事不得已，举而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148266_comment'></div>具官萧瑀，梁室皇宗，隋朝内戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148266_comment'></div>昔在草昧之际，来赴风云之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148266_comment'></div>国家方在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148266", 1148266, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>钓贤</span>，寻加好爵，以至位崇师保，权执枢衡，勋庸未多，宠遇斯极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148266_comment'></div>近者言朕「大臣朋党，未见是非」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148266_comment'></div>谓予「小子昏蒙，辄轻去就」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148266_comment'></div>许国之心何在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148266_comment'></div>出家之奏屡闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148266_comment'></div>若云远害全身，予且本非于虐主；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148266_comment'></div>若云功成名遂，尔亦未及于前贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148266_comment'></div>且佛教出自胡方，幻惑中土，耗蠹我黔首，杂乱我皇风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148266_comment'></div>岂可轻去君亲，不惜肤发？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148266_comment'></div>既失股肱之体，难居廊庙之崇，降从符竹之资，责以苾刍之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148266_comment'></div>可贬商州刺史，仍降其封邑。<div class='inline'
