id='poem_sentence_21_1148266_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148266_comment'></div>朕失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1148266", 1148266, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>任贤</span>之道，昧则哲之明，遂令宰执之中，互生猜忌，以致君臣之际，有是睽离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148266_comment'></div>虽正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148266", 1148266, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>刑章</span>，良多愧耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148266_comment'></div>勉思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148266", 1148266, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>省己</span>，以卜自新。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1148266_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟文。作品：《拟封淮海国王可汗南国王册文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148268?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟封淮海国王可汉南国王册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148268")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148268_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148268'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148268'>维年月日朔，皇帝若曰：惟王者奉承天休，惟诸侯夹辅王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148268_comment'></div>世功世德，既耀大邦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148268_comment'></div>懋赏懋官，爰遵彝典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148268_comment'></div>考<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148268", 1148268, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>师锡</span>以有谓，降<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148268", 1148268, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>徽章</span>而弗私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148268_comment'></div>矧乃祖有功于唐，启国在越，遍享九锡，专征五侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148268_comment'></div>《梼杌》美于齐桓，《缁衣》歌其郑武，勋庸镂于钟鼎，茅土延于子孙，于今百年，咸有一德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148268_comment'></div>洎我太祖应运而启，勤王有闻，修九贡之罔亏，奉百役而无怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148268_comment'></div>赴盟津之会，平金陵之城，策勋清庙，有累等焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148268_comment'></div>逮朕承祧，固求入觐，献图籍以请吏，趋象魏而观法，义动君父，事光国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148268_comment'></div>予嘉乃纯诚，锡之异数，命元帅以开府，册真王而启国，爵命车服，咸极等威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148268_comment'></div>君臣之节弥光，授受之间无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148268_comment'></div>汝惟克荷先烈，不伐厥功，朝请之容有章，献纳之言无隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148268_comment'></div>扈并汾之问罪，从河朔之省方，周旋有仪，勤瘁至此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148268_comment'></div>今朕祗见上帝，礼成圆丘，庆赏方行，勋贤斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148268_comment'></div>是宜迁淮海之旧壤，启襄、沔之新封，跨广汉以为池，奄诸姬而有国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148268_comment'></div>朝宗之水，用鉴汝之一心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148268_comment'></div>堕泪之碑，将纪汝之善政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148268_comment'></div>勉大祖德，无忽天休，可遣使某册拜汝为汉南国王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148268_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148268_comment'></div>汉限非刘，何长策也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148268_comment'></div>唐分疏属，盖少恩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148268_comment'></div>朕惟推于公共，汝无忝于祖先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148268_comment'></div>庶使岘山为砺，汉江为带，屏翰邦国，永孚于休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148268_comment'></div>往钦哉！</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1148268'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1148268_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟诏。作品：《拟罢苏州贡桔诏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span>《拟给补阙拾遗谏纸诏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span>《拟赐天下雍熙三年承历诏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148270' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148270' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148270?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟罢苏州贡橘诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148270")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148270_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148270'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148270'>《书》云「厥苞橘柚锡贡」，明不常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148270_comment'></div>眷彼遐方，实生珍果，荐庙之外，朕何用焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148270_comment'></div>虽任土之得宜，亦劳人之是叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148270_comment'></div>况又涉江湖之险阻，役舟楫之往来，置候供须，耗吾廪实，堤防推挽，动我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148270", 1148270, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>编民</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148270_comment'></div>忍将口腹之资，重困黔黎之力？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148270_comment'></div>所宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148270", 1148270, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>停寝</span>，用减烦劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148270_comment'></div>起今后本州所贡洞庭柑橘，候见敕旨，即得供进，不得脩为常贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148270_comment'></div>惟尔长吏，当体朕怀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1148270_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148269' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148269' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148269?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟给补阙拾遗谏纸诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148269")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148269_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148269'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148269'>敕：朕奄有四海，谏臣七人，既罔伏于嘉言，实乐闻于己过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148269_comment'></div>言之无罪，思得其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148269_comment'></div>爰念补阙、拾遗，职在讽谕，旧给谏纸，备于奏章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148269_comment'></div>近世已来，故事多阙，既乖激劝，渐至因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148269_comment'></div>将昭不讳之风，爰举未行之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148269_comment'></div>起今后应补阙、拾遗，宜令有司月给谏纸二百张，以备章疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148269_comment'></div>其奉使外方、兼摄他职者，亦如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148269_comment'></div>庶使集囊之事复兴，曳履之声相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148269_comment'></div>伏青蒲而沥恳，于尔有光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148269_comment'></div>饮白兽以陈辞，致予无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148269_comment'></div>凡在谏署，申朕意焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148269_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟赐天下雍熙三年新历诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148271")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148271'>敕：王者钦历象于昊天，授人时于率土，七政协璿玑之度，四时腾玉烛之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148271_comment'></div>爰举旧章，乃颁新历，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148271", 1148271, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>诞昭</span>正朔，广被华夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148271_comment'></div>庶令守土之臣，共乐同文之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148271_comment'></div>可赐尔《雍熙三年新历日》一卷，想宜知悉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1148271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟表。作品：《拟批答高丽国贺正表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148272?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟批答高丽国贺正表</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148272")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148272'>敕：高丽国王某，岁举梯航，世遵正朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148272_comment'></div>言祝南山之寿，远浮东海之波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148272_comment'></div>朝元恨阻于鸡林，方物仍陈于象阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148272_comment'></div>永言臣节，嘉叹良多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148272_comment'></div>所贺知。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1148272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟制。作品：《拟除开封县令可郑州刺史制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟除开封县令可郑州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148273")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148273'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148273'>敕：刺史县令，古之诸侯，共治亲民，因不轻授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148273_comment'></div>以尔具官某，宰予赤县，绰有政声，宜旌墨绶之贤，用布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148273", 1148273, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>褰帷</span>之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148273_comment'></div>甸服之重，厥惟圃田，虽曰百城，亦犹三辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148273_comment'></div>颁条按部，尔其勖哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148273_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1148273_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。有文。作品：《代伯益上夏启书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148362?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代伯益上夏启书</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148362")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148362_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148362'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148362'>臣益言：臣与先帝比肩事尧舜，在二十二人之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148362_comment'></div>先帝以老臣为贤，以天下授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148362_comment'></div>老臣德薄力寡，不足当之，且知天意人事，尽归于吾君矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148362_comment'></div>今君身临大宝，手握神器，老臣得伸一言以为裨益哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148362_comment'></div>夫天下者非一人之天下，乃天下之天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148362_comment'></div>理之得其道则民辅之，失其道则民去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148362_comment'></div>民既去，又孰与同其天下乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148362_comment'></div>故帝尧不授于子而授于大舜，大舜不传于家而传于先帝，盖恐失道而民去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148362_comment'></div>是知亲一子则不能子兆人，成一家则不能家六合，圣人之用心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148362_comment'></div>如是，先帝得之虽勤，吾君继之勿忘其勤，臣恐失大宝而毁神器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148362_comment'></div>先帝力拯横流，为民粒食，得《九畴》，定九州，乘四载，距四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148362_comment'></div>栉风沐雨，奠山浚川，却昏垫之忧，平水土之患，以父殛而是念，闻子哭而不名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148362_comment'></div>然后六府孔修，四隩攸宅，兴播殖之利，定贡赋之差，亿兆熙熙，以成淳化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148362_comment'></div>是以受禅而有天下，可谓艰难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148362_comment'></div>及其在位也，卑宫室，恶衣食，见罪人而泣，闻昌言而拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148362_comment'></div>故能会诸侯于涂山，执玉帛于万国，可谓勤俭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148362_comment'></div>今君得不思其艰难乎，念其勤俭乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148362_comment'></div>且创业者易，守文者难，始则苦于焦劳，终或流于逸乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148362_comment'></div>今君生居帝宫，坐即天位，勿谓家传之，勿谓己有之，宜惕惕而惧其失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148362_comment'></div>矧乎天无所亲，亲于有德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148362_comment'></div>人无所怀，怀乎有仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148362_comment'></div>茍不肖而毁先业，亦为臣羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148362_comment'></div>吾君以臣言为何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148362_comment'></div>听用之则铭于案几可也，罪咎之则斥于荒裔可也，庶几老臣朽骨泉壤，见先帝而无愧色矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148362_comment'></div>斯言非佞，君其念之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148362_comment'></div>臣益顿首。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1148362'></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1148362_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟书。作品：《拟留侯与四皓书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟留侯与四皓书</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148400")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148400'>汉丞相留侯张良谨裁书遣使致于商山四先生侍者：盖闻有天地以来，圣人曰轩辕，有崆峒之请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148400_comment'></div>又曰帝尧，有箕山之让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148400_comment'></div>况乎风移世变，民浇化漓，北面而为臣者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148400_comment'></div>有国家之未决，智虑所不及，得不资取于贤士哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148400_comment'></div>先生抱大道，藏大器，荣辱之事出于身外，兴亡之理了于掌中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148400_comment'></div>胶漆云泉，泥滓爵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148400_comment'></div>琼林瑶池，以游以息；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148400_comment'></div>云浆霞馔，以饮以食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148400_comment'></div>芳君桂父，先生之交也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148400_comment'></div>青鸾紫凤，先生之驾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148400_comment'></div>龟亡鹤夭，神气愈清；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148400_comment'></div>桂朽椿枯，童颜未改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148400_comment'></div>万乘不能屈其节，千金不能聘其才，真所谓神仙中人，风尘外物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148400_comment'></div>然而历观古之圣贤，未尝不有意于民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148400_comment'></div>故隐见随其时，语默得其所，进则为天下之福，退则知天下之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148400_comment'></div>在昔暴秦勃兴，荼毒华夏，虎猛择肉，网密凝脂，君政甚于豺狼，人命轻于草芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148400_comment'></div>先生知国不可辅，民不可化，拂衣高蹈，遁于山林，其隐也可谓得其时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148400_comment'></div>今皇帝奋布衣，提利剑，拨大乱，定大难，起龙虎于丰谷，会云雷于泗滨，席卷乱秦，电扫强楚，可谓英雄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148400_comment'></div>既而革秦之暴，纂尧之绪，定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148400", 1148400, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>覆盂</span>之固，成垂拱之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148400_comment'></div>唯于储嗣之间，忽有废立之议，臣下股慄，弗敢遑宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148400_comment'></div>良与帝同起于草莽间，始五六年，经七十战，出奇画策，未尝有一事见违，唯于此时，言不获用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148400_comment'></div>良掉三寸舌，为帝者之师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148400_comment'></div>封万户侯，乃布衣之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148400_comment'></div>敢于此际爱死不谏乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148400_comment'></div>盖恐死而无益于国事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148400_comment'></div>又闻古之有天下者，禅让于贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148400_comment'></div>今之有天下者，封树其子，亦已德薄于古矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148400_comment'></div>茍不选贤择能，树嫡立长，能无毁宗社乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148400_comment'></div>今太子为人元良，立事贞固，少海流润，荐雷振声，三善克隆，百技无爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148400_comment'></div>帝欲废而不用，天下失望，朝廷愕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148400_comment'></div>先生于此时可不有意于民哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148400_comment'></div>良愿先生出云关，开岫幌，驾玄鹤，驭金虬，俯降殿庭，辱对旒冕，定天下之惑，决君上之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148400_comment'></div>隐见语默之道，岂独美于昔贤邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148400_comment'></div>以凡干圣，人之所议，望先生无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1148400", 1148400, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>截辕杜辔</span>之虞，发函一披，则万国幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148400_comment'></div>良顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1148400_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。有拟碑文。作品：《拟侯君集平高昌纪功碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148526' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148526' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148526?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟侯君集平高昌纪功碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148526")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148526_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148526'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148526'>圣人之化，其行也无外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148526_comment'></div>王者之师，其征也无战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148526_comment'></div>化者声教之谓也，师者吊伐之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148526_comment'></div>以德柔远，虽蛮貊而必怀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148526_comment'></div>奉天行诛，虽荒服而不匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148526_comment'></div>是以周之薄伐，至于鬼方，未为劳也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148526_comment'></div>秦之祸衅，起于萧墙，弗能救也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148526_comment'></div>帝皇之道，今古同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148526_comment'></div>高昌国去中夏七千里，路多沙碛之艰，地无草木之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148526_comment'></div>夏风吹人，如燎如焚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148526_comment'></div>冬风切骨，飞冰飞雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148526_comment'></div>尝行百人，至者一二而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148526_comment'></div>历代以来，置之度外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148526_comment'></div>我高祖皇帝革隋之乱，筑唐之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148526_comment'></div>义旗高揭以来苏，倒悬斯解；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148526_comment'></div>天泽下流而怀远，犷俗知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148526_comment'></div>今皇上躬擐戎衣，赞成王业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148526_comment'></div>当开基拨乱，必矢石以亲临；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148526_comment'></div>洎嗣位守成，惟道德而是务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148526_comment'></div>遂使日月所照，霜露所加，人如子来，化乃盂覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148526_comment'></div>万方述职，梯航极率土之滨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148526_comment'></div>诸侯勤王，玉帛小涂山之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148526_comment'></div>高昌王曲文泰，为西戎之酋长，识南面之文明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148526_comment'></div>蝼蚁慕膻以来思，盖如舜行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148526_comment'></div>葵藿倾心而效顺，自向义之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148526_comment'></div>国家念重遐陬，礼存厚往，寻加王爵，仍许袭封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148526_comment'></div>虽恩信之弥隆，顾猖狂而未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148526_comment'></div>恃其远地，辄恣欺天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148526_comment'></div>凡彼行商，悉邀利而遏绝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148526_comment'></div>徵之入觐，复称疾以迁延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148526_comment'></div>顾兹蠢尔之徒，动我赫斯之怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148526_comment'></div>皇上咨询百辟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1148526", 1148526, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>缮理</span>六军，将兴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1148526", 1148526, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>出律</span>之师，爰择徂征之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148526_comment'></div>乃诏光禄大夫、吏部尚书、陈国公侯君集，授交河道行军大总管往讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148526_comment'></div>帝曰：「万里征行，师旅不得不武；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148526_comment'></div>四夷率服，叛逆不得不征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148526_comment'></div>止期混一于车书，且非贪求于土地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148526_comment'></div>慎尔专征之略，副予问罪之怀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148526_comment'></div>于是睿略风宣，人心胶固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148526_comment'></div>凿凶门而后出，设祃祭而启行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148526_comment'></div>指三苗之君，且非乐战，依九伐之法，惟仗至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148526_comment'></div>金鼓之响沸天，貔虎之心匪石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148526_comment'></div>京观将筑，鲸鲵斩首以须封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148526_comment'></div>泰山其颓，蝍蛆举尾而何益？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148526_comment'></div>故得鬼神幽赞，天地冥符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148526_comment'></div>坐甲裹粮，师次方屯于柳谷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148526_comment'></div>恶盈祸满，渠魁已动于《薤歌》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148526_comment'></div>我则礼不伐丧，义惟示信，俾知去就之理，谕以祸福之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148526_comment'></div>其子乃去顺效尤，婴城自固；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148526_comment'></div>我师则奉辞伐罪，鸣鼓而前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148526_comment'></div>鳞萃翼涉，然犹以之环合；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148526_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1148526", 1148526, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>鼎鱼幕燕</span>，孤垒于是卵危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148526_comment'></div>攻城之器械云趋，木堑之拓徒麇至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148526_comment'></div>高楼下瞰，疑鲸蜃以明喷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148526_comment'></div>飞石交驰，误星辰之夜陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148526_comment'></div>守陴者无复得立，入室者徒自偷生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148526_comment'></div>既无因垒之功，须解长平之瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148526_comment'></div>火生于木，信祸发以自贻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148526_comment'></div>城复于隍，纵深沟而徒尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148526_comment'></div>突厥惧威而失叛，智盛力屈以来降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148526_comment'></div>解涂炭于一城，忽开汤网；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148526_comment'></div>光祖宗于七庙，遽献秦囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148526_comment'></div>重瞳绝西顾之忧，流沙见东倾之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148526_comment'></div>非夫圣人之行化，王者之用师，孰能与于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148526_comment'></div>若夫化之未敷，政之或缺，则舟中敌国，况其远者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148526_comment'></div>圣人之有作，神之既至，则天下为家，况其迩者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148526_comment'></div>是知将不能立功，依至德而功自辑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148526_comment'></div>兵不能决胜，仗大义而胜自随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148526_comment'></div>幸施犬马之劳，实赖皇王之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148526_comment'></div>爰旌盛德，特树丰碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148526_comment'></div>庶使摧铜柱于炎荒，神功不朽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148526_comment'></div>烂燕然于绝塞，鸿业弥光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148526_comment'></div>其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1148526'>蠢兹高昌，天西一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148526_comment'></div>厥族蚁聚，其心犬狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148526_comment'></div>地无水草，天多雪霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148526_comment'></div>杜绝声教，扰乱边防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148526_comment'></div>爰自历代，致之度外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148526_comment'></div>赫赫巨唐，威行绝塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148526_comment'></div>伊彼蕃酋，是曰文泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148526_comment'></div>欣戴尧天，骏奔禹会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148526_comment'></div>于休圣君，恩隆远人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148526_comment'></div>封以王爵，列之外臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148526_comment'></div>其来也薄，孰为贡珍？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148526_comment'></div>其往也厚，礼同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1148526", 1148526, "Clauses/186/Comments/0")'>国宾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148526_comment'></div>一旦骄慢，恃其地远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148526_comment'></div>狂葵弗倾，逆草不偃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148526_comment'></div>邀我厚利，遏绝商贩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148526_comment'></div>拒我诏命，托之疾患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148526_comment'></div>王赫斯怒，爰整军旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1148526_comment'></div>桓桓六师，非义弗举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1148526_comment'></div>匪贪货殖，匪拓疆土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1148526_comment'></div>志在问罪，岂曰黩武？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1148526_comment'></div>乃命君集，兵柄是执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1148526_comment'></div>爰吊爰伐，非掩非袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1148526_comment'></div>勿谓遐方，化无不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1148526_comment'></div>勿谓劳人，功无不立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1148526_comment'></div>王师将至，渠魁自毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1148526_comment'></div>礼不伐丧，罪无及嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1148526_comment'></div>其子智盛，袭爵继位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1148526_comment'></div>婴城<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1148526", 1148526, "Clauses/217/Comments/0")'>向隅</span>，忘我大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1148526_comment'></div>事不获已，举而伐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1148526_comment'></div>高楼巨石，平隍塞池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1148526_comment'></div>民尽入室，兵无守陴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1148526_comment'></div>强援不至，孤城日危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1148526_comment'></div>势穷力屈，衔璧而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1148526_comment'></div>释缚军门，振我戎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1148526_comment'></div>献俘太庙，庆我王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1148526_comment'></div>人骇捷音，事光史笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1148526_comment'></div>非臣之力，乃君之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1148526_comment'></div>睿算无遗，神功不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1148526_comment'></div>化茍未敷，萧墙有隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1148526_comment'></div>道之既至，鬼方必尅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1148526_comment'></div>西域乂安，师人凯旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1148526_comment'></div>干戈倒载，风教诏宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1148526_comment'></div>德迈前古，功侔上玄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1148526_comment'></div>刊石纪事，垂千万年。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_114_1148526'></div><div id='poem_sentence_114_1148526_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟文。作品：《拟李靖破颉利可汗露布》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148372?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟李靖破颉利可汗露布</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148372")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148372_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148372'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148372'>尚书兵部臣闻：周征猃狁，长驱北伐之师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148372_comment'></div>汉讨匈奴，用绝南牧之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148372_comment'></div>惟帝王之耀武，亦今古之同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148372_comment'></div>我国家乘五运以膺图，顺三灵而改卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148372_comment'></div>义旗方举，万民喧《桃李》之歌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148372_comment'></div>神武惟扬，四海绝萑蒲之盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148372_comment'></div>建德寻膏于椹锧，世充俄系于俘囚，武周则瓦解以无遗，黑闼乃土崩而自尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148372_comment'></div>而杜伏威蜂屯江表，束手来降；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148372_comment'></div>徐圆朗鼠窃山东，连颈受戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148372_comment'></div>萧铣之冰销岭外，薛举之电扫陇川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148372_comment'></div>民心于是悦随，王业以之大定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148372_comment'></div>唯兹左衽，滞我休戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148372_comment'></div>颉利豺狼其心，腥膻异类，信天地之偏气，为声教之外臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148372_comment'></div>前王示含育之恩，历代患羁縻之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148372_comment'></div>和之则防如蛇豕，违背欢盟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148372_comment'></div>攻之则遁若犬羊，疲劳师旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148372_comment'></div>我高祖以洪基肇创，黔首未安，虑王化之不敷，舍鬼方而弗顾，稔以称臣之礼，加其厚往之仪，提神锋而方俟斩鲸，豢良犬而未遑顾兔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148372_comment'></div>谋臣为之切齿，壮士为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148372", 1148372, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>冲冠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148372_comment'></div>天威久戢于雷霆，丑族愈滋于蜂虿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148372_comment'></div>伏惟陛下经纶草昧，扫荡欃枪，出震宫而日丽九天，廓皇道而风行八表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148372_comment'></div>痛心疾首，长思渭水之侵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148372_comment'></div>缮甲理兵，待问铁山之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148372_comment'></div>而又侵凌王土，搔动边民，稔恶贯以既盈，奉天诛而无赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148372_comment'></div>臣等徂征授钺，仗义平戎，执乎彼曲之辞，乘以我盈之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148372_comment'></div>鼓鼙动地，三春掀蛰震之雷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148372_comment'></div>戈甲连云，千里散龙沙之雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148372_comment'></div>指阴山而直入，趋马邑以兼程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148372_comment'></div>康苏密应变知机，先来欸附；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148372_comment'></div>萧皇后离邦去里，再见京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148372_comment'></div>颉利有此败亡，方来朝谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148372_comment'></div>阱中饿虎，暂为掉尾之求；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148372_comment'></div>鞲上饥鹰，终有背人之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148372_comment'></div>臣与副将张某等知其犹豫，恐恣猖狂，遂乘无备之时，爰作袭人之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148372_comment'></div>赍二旬之路食，拥一万之精兵，火炎而立见燎毛，雷疾而宁容掩耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148372_comment'></div>斩俘馘于万级，虏羊马于千群，颉利生擒，义城断首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148372_comment'></div>尽复恒安之地，永清大漠之尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148372_comment'></div>韦鞲毳幕之人，从兹率服；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148372_comment'></div>浴铁衽金之士，将见凯旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148372_comment'></div>臣等职忝专征，材非善战，实赖自天之祐，敢言破虏之功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148372_comment'></div>遥荷皇威，不辜阃外之寄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148372_comment'></div>咸知睿算，自驱堂上之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148372_comment'></div>伫见兴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1148372", 1148372, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>耒耨</span>于沙场，戢干戈于武库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148372_comment'></div>幢幢夷邸，长倾捧日之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148372_comment'></div>寂寂边城，永罢防秋之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148372_comment'></div>臣等无任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1148372", 1148372, "Clauses/113/Comments/1")'>乐圣</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1148372", 1148372, "Clauses/113/Comments/2")'>戴天</span>、抃舞欢呼之至，谨具露布以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148372_comment'></div>谨奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1148372_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。有文。作品：《补李揆谏改葬杨妃疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>补李揆谏改葬杨妃疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148363")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148363'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148363'>臣闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148363", 1148363, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>天极</span>之后，有四星焉，盖后妃之象也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148363_comment'></div>是以帝喾四妃，法乎天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148363_comment'></div>后代帝王因之，王后之下，复立三妃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148363_comment'></div>俾坐论妇道，以助内治，亦犹王者三公，辅道经邦之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148363_comment'></div>所以章明妇德，以顺天下，内和而家理焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148363_comment'></div>居有保阿之训，动有环佩之声，哀窈窕而不淫，进贤才以辅佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148363_comment'></div>以宣阴化，以修内则，书在女史，贻于后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148363_comment'></div>故不取端正，但合法相而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148363_comment'></div>立则有册命之礼，没则有丧葬之仪，斯乃有国之彝典也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148363_comment'></div>伏以杨贵妃始以姿色召居掖庭，颇肆奸回，不循法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148363_comment'></div>以歌舞取媚，则《<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148363", 1148363, "Clauses/32/Comments/2")'>采蘩</span>》之职不修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148363_comment'></div>以珠翠饰身，则褕翟之衣不御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148363_comment'></div>竭百家之产，奉脂泽之资；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148363_comment'></div>枉万金之费，为汤沐之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148363_comment'></div>请托则府县响答，遗赂则远近云屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148363_comment'></div>土木劳人，崇丰蔀之屋，技巧尽妙，资耳目之玩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148363_comment'></div>娣妹窃夫人之号，昆仲尸列土之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148363_comment'></div>内乃帷箔不修，衽席无别，遂使帝心荡于上，人心怨于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148363_comment'></div>尚赖邦家有幸，宗庙降灵，故用禄山之乱，以警于陛下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148363_comment'></div>是以六师既诛国忠，又指贵妃为贼本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148363_comment'></div>及妖姬朝毙，圣祚夕安，岂非天人共怒之验乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148363_comment'></div>臣向谓陛下必暴贵妃之尸，以示天下，且以为子孙之戒，则宗庙之礼也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148363_comment'></div>岂可尚念旧恩，复行改葬，以取笑千古乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148363_comment'></div>且葬者藏也，欲人之不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148363_comment'></div>名位礼数，自有降杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148363_comment'></div>茍生有懿德，或厚葬之犹曰不可，况乱国之妇人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148363_comment'></div>臣位居宗伯，惟礼是掌，伏闻成命，不敢失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148363_comment'></div>谨昧死上言，伏望睿明，寝兹葬礼，则军民之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148363_comment'></div>臣顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1148363_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。拟表。作品：《拟长孙无忌让代袭刺史表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148364' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148364' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148364?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟长孙无忌让代袭刺史表</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148364")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148364_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148364'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148364'>臣无忌等言：伏奉诏旨，许臣等子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148364", 1148364, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>代袭</span>刺史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148364_comment'></div>恩覃延世，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148364", 1148364, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>代袭</span>专城，命虽已行，事则非次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148364_comment'></div>苟无言而冒宠，则后嗣以罹殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148364_comment'></div>叫天阍而自卜远图，让帝泽而诚非饰诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148364_comment'></div>臣等<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>臣闻帝尧光宅，设四岳以畴咨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148364_comment'></div>炎汉隆兴，命惟良而共理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148364_comment'></div>亲民之任，匪贤不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148364_comment'></div>茍传及于家门，是轻授于符竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148364_comment'></div>伏念臣等或因缘戚里，或参预义旗，或脱身草莽之中，或束手败亡之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148364_comment'></div>是以攀附<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148364", 1148364, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>鳞翼</span>，际会风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148364_comment'></div>至于平定两京，并因英武；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148364_comment'></div>荡除<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148364", 1148364, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>多垒</span>，皆是睿谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148364_comment'></div>俱无佐命之才，同偶太平之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148364_comment'></div>陛下录功惟重，有德弗居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148364_comment'></div>端冕凝旒，自保域中之大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148364_comment'></div>东征西讨，咸推臣下之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148364_comment'></div>臣等乃位极庙堂，地分藩翰，下至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148364", 1148364, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>凭熊</span>之秩，尽为尸禄之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148364_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148364_comment'></div>为相者未能开导皇风，燮调元化，拔一才，进一善，助陛下求理之心，但高步沙堤，窃据黄閤而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148364_comment'></div>为将者未能抚养士卒，攘却妖氛，出一奇，画一策，为陛下休兵之计，但高仗黄钺，甘寝柳营而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148364_comment'></div>牧民者未能政术循良，察问利病，泰一州，泽一县，应陛下忧民之怀，但滥执鱼符，横拥隼旆而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148364_comment'></div>加以增封食采，图画凌烟，祖考有赠官，妻妾有封邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148364_comment'></div>荣家若是，报国蔑闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148364_comment'></div>偷生实多，效死无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148364_comment'></div>臣等常自谓纵克全于首领，必贻咎于子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148364_comment'></div>岂意陛下念及后昆，恩逾往古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148364_comment'></div>下袭封之诏，固欲激劝忠臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148364_comment'></div>奈不肖之家，翻见亏损圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148364_comment'></div>且臣等诸子生逢圣代，各有家风，教之子道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148364_comment'></div>莫不先习以文武之艺，欲肯构者为陛下陈力之士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148364_comment'></div>次授以稼穑之务，欲不才者为陛下击壤之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148364_comment'></div>臣等但祭祀克存，则泉壤无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148364_comment'></div>若令袭爵，寔虑祸家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148364_comment'></div>上则玷陛下非则哲之明，下则陷臣等为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1148364", 1148364, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>馁而</span>之鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148364_comment'></div>仰祈睿鉴，特察愚衷，寝雨露之恩华，存草芥之苗裔，则生灵幸甚，宗族幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148364_comment'></div>臣等谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1148364_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。有赋。作品：《红梅花赋》<div id='poem_1148237' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148237' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148237?labeling=true' target='_blank'>红梅花赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148237")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148237_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148237'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148237'>凡物异于常者，非祥即怪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148237_comment'></div>夫梅花之白，犹乌羽之黑，人首其黔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148237_comment'></div>吴苑有梅，亦红其色，余未知其祥邪怪邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148237_comment'></div>姑异而赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148237_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1148237'>水国方腊，江天未春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148237_comment'></div>何青帝之作怪，放红梅而媚人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148237_comment'></div>脩柯焰发，碎朵霞匀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148237_comment'></div>认夭桃以何早，谓红杏以非邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148237_comment'></div>烧空有艳，照水无尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148237_comment'></div>仙人之绛雪团来，烟苞向暖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148237_comment'></div>王母之霞浆染出，露蕊含津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148237_comment'></div>樱欲然而乖类，火生木以非真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148237_comment'></div>上界之霓旌乍降，行春之双旆初陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148237_comment'></div>谁歌麝脐，散幽香而不断；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148237_comment'></div>谁浇猩血，泼繁英而尚新？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148237_comment'></div>尽觉渥丹而非素，休论返朴以还淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148237_comment'></div>至若雪瀌瀌，风习习，风欺雪打枝枝湿，徐福舟中五百人，鳌顶未逢皆掩泣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148237_comment'></div>又若烟漠漠，露瀼瀼，露洗烟笼树树芳，汉皇宫里三千女，鲸钟听后齐严妆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148237_comment'></div>足使万木羞耻，千花伏藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148237_comment'></div>掩素娥之抱朴，陋白帝之含章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148237_comment'></div>榆燧晓散，兰灯夜张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148237_comment'></div>宜玳瑁之筵畔，耐燕脂之脸傍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148237_comment'></div>蜀水春时，濯文君之锦段；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148237_comment'></div>骊山宴处，舞妃子之霓裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148237_comment'></div>向暖如醉，凌寒似伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148237_comment'></div>虽与物以无竞，亦令人之发狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148237_comment'></div>宋玉窥来，难展施朱之手；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148237_comment'></div>何郎折去，应惭傅粉之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148237_comment'></div>先疑寡耦，媚可齐房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148237_comment'></div>入何人之玉笛，汎谁氏之瑶觞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148237_comment'></div>含情可狎，不谁难量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148237_comment'></div>吟成陆凯之诗，未知标格；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148237_comment'></div>羞破寿阳之面，懒出闺房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148237_comment'></div>天使异众，人嫌弗常，茍群萃之不异，在声名之莫彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148237_comment'></div>梅之白兮终碌碌，梅之红兮何扬扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148237_comment'></div>在物犹尔，唯人是比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148237_comment'></div>木之华兮，人之文䌽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148237_comment'></div>木之实兮，人之措履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148237_comment'></div>茍华实之不符，在颜色而何以？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148237_comment'></div>苟履行之克修，虽猖狂而何耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148237_comment'></div>矧乎梅之材兮，可以为画梁之用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148237_comment'></div>梅之实兮，可以荐金鼎之味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148237_comment'></div>谅构厦以克荷，在和羹而且止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148237_comment'></div>梅兮梅兮，岂限乎红白而已？</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1148237_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=986&endYear=986')">986年</a>　在长洲任知县。有诗。作品：《苏州寒食送人归觐》《春晚游太和宫》《再泛吴江》《笋三首》《官舍书怀呈郡守》<div id='poem_494122' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_494122' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/494122?labeling=true' target='_blank'><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>苏州寒食日送人归觐</a><span class='authorDate'>（986年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_494122")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_content_494122'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_494122'>江城寒食下，花木惨离魂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_494122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_494122'>几宿投山寺，孤帆过海门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_494122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_494122'>篷声泼火雨，柳色禁烟村。<div id='poem_sentence_2_494122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_494122'>定省高堂后，斑衣减泪痕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_494122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_494122'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_494122_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_74828'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74828'>数里新萍夹岸莎，春来乘兴宿烟萝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74828'>随风蝴蝶颠狂甚，当路花枝采折多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74828'>绛节参差抽苦笋，翠钿狼籍撒圆荷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74828'>湖山满眼不休去，空羡渔翁雨一蓑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_164034'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_164034'>二<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作三）</span>年为吏住江滨，重到江头照病身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_164034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_164034'>满眼碧波输野鸟，一蓑疏雨属渔人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_164034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_164034'>随船晓月孤轮白，入座晴山数点春。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74635'>数里春蹊独自寻，迸犀抽锦乱森森。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74635_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74635'>田文死去宾朋散，抛掷三千玳瑁簪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74635_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74635'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74635_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74634' id='poem_sentence_0_74549'>偶学豪家种牡丹，数枝擎露出朱栏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74549'>晚来低面开檀口，似笑穷愁病长官<span class='inlineComment2'>（同上书卷三○）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74549'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74549_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　在长洲任知县。越州童子刘少逸随其师潘阆来苏州求见，禹称为其《与时贤联句诗》作序。作品：《神童刘少逸与时贤联句诗序》<div id='poem_1148448' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148448' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148448?labeling=true' target='_blank'>神童刘少逸与时贤联句诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148448")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148448_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148448'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148448'>夫君之所好，天必从之，物必应之，犹影响尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148448_comment'></div>是故虞舜修德，丹凤降其仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148448_comment'></div>穆满自狂，八骏呈其怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148448_comment'></div>善恶之迹，休咎之徵，斯不诬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148448_comment'></div>有宋二叶，天子好文之甚者也，志重悬科，亲执文柄，淑慝有别，升沉靡私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148448_comment'></div>其间翘楚之士，出白屋，褫麻衣，步赤墀，参黄閤者，数多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148448_comment'></div>与夫集青囊于寝帷，题御名于殿柱，又相万也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148448_comment'></div>遂使荒服之外，犷俗慕其文明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148448_comment'></div>草泽之中，比屋化其文教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148448_comment'></div>一变至道，三代同风，不其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148448_comment'></div>东南之秀，山川之灵，应我昌运，俊民挺生，神童刘生盖其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148448_comment'></div>婴孺不群，骨貌非俗，真麒麟之驹，凤凰之雏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148448_comment'></div>七岁孤藐，游于山阴，诗人潘阆见而奇之，乃引之以语，教之以诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148448_comment'></div>生性如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148448", 1148448, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>生知</span>，辞如老成，一联一咏，令人振惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148448_comment'></div>潘生许以并行，诲之不倦，且以其兄之子妻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148448_comment'></div>逮十一岁成三百篇，求之古人，曾不多让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148448_comment'></div>生又长于联句，敏而能精，若虚谷之应声，洪钟之待扣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148448_comment'></div>矧馀杭、会稽号为大郡，督转输、领郡县者，多朝之名臣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148448_comment'></div>至于儒素之士，缁黄之流，往往有秀民焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148448_comment'></div>或召生以升堂，或随生以求友，出句度以试之，穷寄险以难之，生意同预谋，语如夙昔，应声而答，旁若无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148448_comment'></div>疑孟东野、贾阆仙之徒变其精灵，潜于左右，更传互授，以助其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148448_comment'></div>不然，又安得敏捷清新之若是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148448_comment'></div>某闻之未甚信，一日，潘生与之偕行，惠然肯顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148448_comment'></div>因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1148448", 1148448, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>解榻</span>以延之，唱诗以验之，然后知其神矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148448_comment'></div>某初试以古人「竹节偶相对」，之句，生云「花枝忽并开」，其旧对云「禽名多自呼」，比生之句疏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148448_comment'></div>某又常抱伯伦之酲，病相如之渴，因戏曰：「一回酒渴思吞海」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148448_comment'></div>生云：「几度诗狂欲上天」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148448_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1148448", 1148448, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>偶属</span>之奇，他皆仿此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148448_comment'></div>意蚌腹有珠，待月而后成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148448_comment'></div>木性有火，得燧而乃生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148448_comment'></div>以刘生之天才，遇潘生之善诱，成此神异，不其然乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148448_comment'></div>其诗集曰《佩觿》，吴县尹罗君为之序矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148448_comment'></div>时贤联句凡数百言，若无甄收，且恐沦坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148448_comment'></div>序以冠之，列之于右。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1148448'></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1148448_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年4月</a>　在长洲任知县。苏州知州柴成务三年任满，将赴阙，禹称为文以贻之。作品：《送柴侍御赴阙序》<div id='poem_1148428' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148428' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148428?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送柴侍御赴阙序</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148428")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148428_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148428'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148428'>郡县天下已来，外官之贵者，惟二千石而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148428_comment'></div>入则拜三公而论道，出则拥五马以行春，南面百城，于斯为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148428_comment'></div>至有受藩维之寄，居将相之崇，虽极人臣，亦兼刺举，尊共理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148428_comment'></div>皇家承累朝之弊，削诸侯之权，自两都五府而下，至于羁縻州郡，率以儒臣承其乏，抑战功而重民政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148428_comment'></div>江东之郡，吴为大，厥赋惟上，其民实繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148428_comment'></div>纳土已来，名臣迭处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148428_comment'></div>天王九年春，平阳柴公自治书御史出典斯郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148428_comment'></div>公以文学之业，早登甲科；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148428_comment'></div>负王佐之才，未升显位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148428_comment'></div>法尚宽简，政惟循良，吏不能欺，人罔知化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148428_comment'></div>观其议一事，出一言，必能达今古之变通，极天人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148428", 1148428, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>奥妙</span>，合乎皇王之道，在乎经纬之谋，引而伸之，宜其相大君而化万国矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148428_comment'></div>今之为郡也，上有督责，事无便宜，才虽有馀，道或未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148428_comment'></div>是以体盈虚之理，息奔竞之心，不衒吏才，不沽时誉，冲澹自守，光尘必同，识者又知其吏隐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148428_comment'></div>属天官以三载考绩，黜陟幽明，举旧典以惩之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148428_comment'></div>考功以礼义兴行，肃清所部，奏课最以旌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148428_comment'></div>龚、黄于是政成，邵、杜以之相代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148428_comment'></div>是行也，道将行乎，位将至乎，圣主得其贤乎，苍生得其福乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148428_comment'></div>且见其佐佑一人，进退百执，调鍊和气，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148428", 1148428, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>簸扬</span>淳风，煦而为阳春，散而为霖雨，茂育品物，纳于华胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148428_comment'></div>然后富贵崇高，享之无愧，又不见房、魏彼何人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148428_comment'></div>舆论藉藉，形于是言，且未知天意果如何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148428_comment'></div>水国春暮，江天雨晴，下岩岩之虎丘，背汤汤之震泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148428_comment'></div>民洒别泪，沾于绣衣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148428_comment'></div>吏献离觞，愿驻骢马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148428_comment'></div>廷尉评王某，从宦属邑，受恩煦深，收涕挥毫，以序<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1148428", 1148428, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>行色</span>。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1148428'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1148428_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年4月</a>　在长洲任知县。诏柴成务为两浙转运使，禹称为文以赠之。作品：《送柴转运赴职序》<div id='poem_1148429' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148429' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148429?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送柴转运赴职序</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148429")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148429_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148429'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148429'>粤自三代已前，万国分理，藏用于天下，养兵于民间，王道以行，王室以尊，粟不推移，人无征戍，故转输之功未作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148429_comment'></div>洎秦废井田，汉杂霸道，增什一之赋而经费不充，又笼山煮海以佐之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148429_comment'></div>劳百万之师而蛮夷未服，又飞刍挽粟以供之，故转输之役始行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148429_comment'></div>虽去圣之道远矣，而随时之用大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148429_comment'></div>从权已来，僝功斯在，历代而数，其人可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148429_comment'></div>远则汉之酂侯、魏之邓艾，近则隋之宇文恺、唐之裴耀卿，皆能臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148429_comment'></div>然率不过调发租庸，充给关辅而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148429_comment'></div>我朝所任，道不在兹，何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148429_comment'></div>享国三十年，拓土万馀里，六师不匮，百官其勤，赋歛有定期，用度有常数，水陆之便，舟车之宜，皆不可不督，示成功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148429_comment'></div>然则转输之设，不独专其利，亦将求其义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148429_comment'></div>不独富于国，亦将安于民矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148429_comment'></div>是故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148429", 1148429, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>统临</span>诸侯，考覈群吏，刑罚不中，得以申明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148429_comment'></div>利害相交，得以改作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148429_comment'></div>民谣官谤，在我之升闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148429_comment'></div>岁沴天灾，自我之存恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148429_comment'></div>实外官取则之地，而天子责成之府也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148429_comment'></div>非洞于今古，明于变通者，又焉能举职哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148429_comment'></div>今国家之利，吴会居多，郡县繁雄，土疆绵亘，上自常、润，下及温、福，有水田之赋，有海物之资，杂羽毛竹箭之材，兼橘柚鱼盐之贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148429_comment'></div>东南所产，军国赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148429_comment'></div>茍非贤明，孰制繁剧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148429_comment'></div>漕运之地，固难其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148429_comment'></div>雍熙纪号之四年夏四月，苏州郡守平阳柴公受代江城，将归宪府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148429_comment'></div>翌日诏以转运使就加之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148429_comment'></div>朝端谓之得人，江东知其受赐，欢声喜气，雷奋云涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148429_comment'></div>长洲吏王某受公之知，探公之道久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148429_comment'></div>惜公蕴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148429", 1148429, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>洞天</span>之度，有致君之心，宜论思明主之前，援引先王之道，使我后圣德日新，国风还淳，陶冶品物如三五时，与夫皋陶、后稷异代而同功矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148429_comment'></div>岂复乘轺远方，陈力庶务，议一钟一石之费哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148429_comment'></div>噫，道之伸者，见其先屈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148429_comment'></div>器之大者，知其晚成，公有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148429_comment'></div>始见乎浙江潮声，天台山色，鉴湖夜月，赤城朝霞，销忧八咏之楼，登陵四明之险，灵踪胜概，将命而游，亦公之素志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148429_comment'></div>梅雨初霁，麦秋尚寒，画舸频移，绣衣渐远，拜首<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148429", 1148429, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>末路</span>，序以志之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1148429_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　在长洲任知县。有序送友人。作品：《送乐良秀才谒梁中谏序》<div id='poem_1148430' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148430' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148430?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送乐良秀才谒梁中谏序</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148430")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148430_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148430'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148430'>天下之人，背道义而趋势利者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148430_comment'></div>是故权门火炎，归之如市；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148430_comment'></div>散地灰冷，过而弗顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148430_comment'></div>偷薄苟且，率以为常，非士君子谋道徇义，乌能矫世而行哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148430_comment'></div>茂苑乐生，禀江山之气，为英秀之士，读书秉笔，务于立言，游圣人之阃域，修通儒之事业，杰出江外，人无与偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148430_comment'></div>自予作吏长洲，言交有日，遗书贽文，颇见其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148430_comment'></div>但若涉海而轻百谷，登岳而小群山，又孰知其汪洋峻极之势欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148430_comment'></div>居一日，生挂帆舣舟，款户言别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148430_comment'></div>问其行，则曰：「谒梁公于淮楚也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148430_comment'></div>问其故，则曰：「咨学道之消长也，唁谪官之憔悴也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148430_comment'></div>噫，梁公与古为徒，与时相戾，守大方而中立，禀上智而不移，颠踬官途三十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148430_comment'></div>以至自宫僚分司，以贰车左降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148430_comment'></div>淮水之涘，衡门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148430", 1148430, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>阒其</span>，甑有委尘，突无黔色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148430_comment'></div>虽原宪之非病，谅贾生之恸哭，声利之辈，轻而笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148430_comment'></div>但见长淮汤汤，东接吴会，使星朝客，鳞鳞其舟，有能过门而一顾，又何人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148430_comment'></div>生之往矣，其有旨乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148430_comment'></div>携盈编之文，陈函丈之礼，吊摈斥之贤，非谋道者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148430_comment'></div>鄙权豪之门，非徇义者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148430_comment'></div>昔余重生之文，今余知生之行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148430_comment'></div>先是，梁公之牧苏也，抚民之馀，待士尤谨，延誉后学，激劝远人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148430_comment'></div>于时乐生居客之右，亦犹常衮廉问闽川，引欧阳詹以为上客，闽人始举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148430_comment'></div>今昔相望，曾何愧与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148430_comment'></div>生之是行也，得非士为知己者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148430_comment'></div>武丘草萋，吴苑波渌，行春色态，濛濛著人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148430_comment'></div>去登龙门，再见君子，请益之外，幸道我伏膺之志焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1148430_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　在长洲任知县。秋，撰成自叙文。作品：《为长洲令自叙》<div id='poem_1148492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148492?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为长洲令自叙</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148492")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148492'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148492'>禹偁，名利之流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148492_comment'></div>一身之计，有亲族妻子焉，虽内无妾，外无仆，不可去者凡百指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148492_comment'></div>晨有炊爨，夕有脂烛，伏腊庆吊居其外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148492_comment'></div>月得俸金，太半长物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148492_comment'></div>是以从官三年，徒行而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148492_comment'></div>一邑之政，有租佣税调焉，土甚瘠而民不懈，吏好欺而赋愈重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148492_comment'></div>廉其身而浊者忌之，直其气而曲者恶之，恳无知音，动有变畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148492_comment'></div>去年多稼不登，编户艰食，赋敛之数，有乖其期，而民部督成于郡，郡侯归罪于县，鞭笞之人，日不下百数辈，菜色在面而血流于肤，读书为儒，胡宁忍此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148492_comment'></div>因出吏部考课历，纳质于富商，得钱一万七千，市白粲而代输之，始可免责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148492_comment'></div>春夏以来，民有归其直者，盖三分有其二焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1148492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148492'><span class='label'>按：</span>《吴都文粹》续集补遗卷上，影印文渊阁四库全书本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1148492_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年8月</a>　在长洲任知县。太宗闻王禹偁、罗处约名，召赴阙。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　在长洲任知县。有序。作品：《桂阳罗君(处约)游太湖洞庭诗序》<div id='poem_1148447' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148447' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148447?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳罗君游太湖洞庭诗序<span class='inlineComment2'>（处约）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（987年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148447")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148447_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148447'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148447'>造化之功，功大而不自伐，故山川之气出焉，为云泉，为草木，为鸟兽，必异其声色，怪其枝叶，奇其毛羽，所以彰造化之迹用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148447_comment'></div>山川之气，气形而不自名，故文藻之士作焉，为歌诗，为赋颂，为序引，必丽其词句，清其格态，幽其旨趣，所以状山川之梗概也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148447_comment'></div>古人登高必赋，义由是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148447_comment'></div>其或陟名山，览胜景，吝厥秘思，屯其妍辞，使云愤泉愁，岩羞谷耻者，故文士之大遇尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148447_comment'></div>太湖之为水也，亚于海而狎于众流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148447_comment'></div>洞庭之为山也，卑于岳而秀于群峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148447_comment'></div>故云泉草木鸟兽之异，非人世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148447_comment'></div>昔人由是而得道者有之，由是而遁迹者亦有之，故林屋之洞尚存，而陶朱之舟不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148447_comment'></div>至于文藻之士，歌咏之作，有能标绝唱、示后来者，予未见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148447_comment'></div>由是长戈巨鼎，非鲁阳、项籍，畴能挥而扛之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148447_comment'></div>桂阳罗君其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148447_comment'></div>君族茂有唐，气钟全蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148447_comment'></div>莲华突于太华，紫盖屹于衡阳，骨之秀也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148447_comment'></div>济川截河而不乱，渭水入泾而无染，神之清也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148447_comment'></div>列天下于户庭，视万古于指掌，学之奥也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148447_comment'></div>海鹏抟风而上汉，天马奔虹而逐日，文之逸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148447_comment'></div>前岁俯逐计吏，直干有司，霆声电光，骇人耳目，诸儒拳拳，不敢仰视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148447_comment'></div>其角立杰出而无比者，众谓君必当脱缝掖，珥朝簪，翱翔紫垣，奋迅鸿笔，书帝王胸臆，中万机之务，敷为事业，垂为谟训，固当仁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148447_comment'></div>会国家遵历试典，重亲民之官，故释褐以佐于临涣，成考而迁于吴县，又授廷尉评以优之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148447_comment'></div>君以百里之权，诸侯之位也，有人民以抚字，故布政以仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148447_comment'></div>有社稷以享祝，故事神以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148447_comment'></div>俭乎身而吏不敢欺，正乎法而人皆知措，曾未期月，而吴民称理焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148447_comment'></div>然后名山大川，可卧舟缄印而往矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148447_comment'></div>太湖汤汤，我得而发挥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148447_comment'></div>洞庭峨峨，我得而润色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148447_comment'></div>遂使幽云野泉，奇卉怪草，暨鸟兽虫鱼辈，皆欣欣熙熙，似有知于感遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148447_comment'></div>至于缁徒羽人，有解真空通气者，襞笺以赠之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148447_comment'></div>仙宫佛屋，有灵踪古迹者，拂壁以纪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148447_comment'></div>挥珠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1148447", 1148447, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>抵玑</span>，散落人口，仅得五十章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148447_comment'></div>间以倡和贽献之句，凡一百首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148447_comment'></div>虽金石不同其音，同归于雅正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148447_comment'></div>黼黻不同其文，同成于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1148447", 1148447, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>章施</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148447_comment'></div>前不见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1148447", 1148447, "Clauses/118/Comments/1")'>刘、白</span>，后不见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1148447", 1148447, "Clauses/119/Comments/1")'>皮、陆</span>，又何人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148447_comment'></div>子见受代之日，盈编而归，献于帝阍，有骇宸鉴，且使湖山之兴不披图而尽见之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148447_comment'></div>然则君之是役也，得不为大来之阶乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148447_comment'></div>又何徒劳之叹邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148447_comment'></div>茂苑吏王某，同年也，序以附之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1148447_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年10月</a>　在长洲任知县。秋冬间，王禹偁离长洲，潘阆作诗送之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　在长洲任知县。有序。作品：《送上官知十序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148417' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148417' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148417?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送上官知十序</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148417")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148417'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148417'>古者大夫三月而葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148417_comment'></div>战国已来，礼文残缺，葬祔之制，动或踰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148417_comment'></div>筮仕者复贪功好名，率曰「忠臣不得为孝子」，甚无谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148417_comment'></div>故吏部著式，祖、考未葬者不与调选，亦救弊之一端耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148417_comment'></div>今圣人以礼示万方，以孝治百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148417_comment'></div>陈力就列，上得忠于国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148417_comment'></div>生事死葬，下得孝于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148417_comment'></div>臣子之道，焕乎有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148417_comment'></div>中吴通理奉常丞上官公起家倅于洋，再命莅于苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148417_comment'></div>丁先明府忧，丧问既至，夺情诏来，衔哀在公，绰有勤政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148417_comment'></div>越明年，国家展圆丘之礼，洒漏泉之泽，幽明存没，靡不沾浃，赠先明府太子洗马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148417_comment'></div>亦既受代，飞章帝阍，请改葬于高密，诏许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148417_comment'></div>先明府为宰字之官，有循良之誉，贞遁田里，乡人法之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148417_comment'></div>又见其子擢进士第，历廷尉评，迁大匠丞，登朝为赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148417_comment'></div>令终之日，钟是贲饰，非积善有后，畴能与于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148417_comment'></div>是行也，郡县郊迎，父老改观，褫朱绂，具缞裳，号窀穸之前，火丝纶之命，外姻同位，得无羡欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148417_comment'></div>苏台郡守士庶荣而饯之，长洲长王某，属邑也，序以志云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1148417_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　在长洲任知县。有记。作品：《新修太和宫记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><div id='poem_1148491' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148491' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148491?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新修太和宫记</a><span class='authorDate'>（987年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148491")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148491_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148491'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148491'>夫大道无名，强其名而彰用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148491_comment'></div>至教无类，聚其类而诱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148491_comment'></div>得之者同出而异名，失之者贱彼而贵我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148491_comment'></div>自昔皇纲既紊，世教多门，虽分之而有三，亦统之而为一，盖应机以设，殊途而归者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148491_comment'></div>矧夫伯阳之道，宣父所师，尚清净以化民，体希夷而应物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148491_comment'></div>用之理国，则绝圣弃智，追轩、昊之淳风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148491_comment'></div>以之修身，则抱朴含章，异巢、由之素隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148491_comment'></div>无欲观妙，有感则通，邈乎远哉，不可得而言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148491_comment'></div>苏州太和宫者，唐毕諴之别业也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148491_comment'></div>諴之子师颜，及其子宗逸，避巢寇之乱，徙而家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148491_comment'></div>先是，道士戴省甄者，长洲人也，幼丧其父，随母归于毕氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148491_comment'></div>宗逸无子，戴实嗣焉，与兄子玄弃俗入道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148491_comment'></div>淮海王之有国也，五世其昌，三教具举，顾毗陵之勍敌，建吴门之巨屏，利用御寇，匪亲不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148491_comment'></div>节度使钱公文奉，茅土是分，缁黄尤盛，乃以子玄主开元观，省甄处洞玄宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148491_comment'></div>寻属兄也云亡，委兹棣萼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148491_comment'></div>母兮不造，伤彼棘心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148491_comment'></div>且念出破琴之家，继卧瓮之后，林乌返哺以无及，桑虫受食而有怀，思舍田园，肇兴宝宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148491_comment'></div>爰以己巳岁申牒而请命焉，则神德启运之九年，开宝纪号之二祀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148491_comment'></div>钱氏赐额曰太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148491_comment'></div>乃与弟子吴玄芝主而建焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148491_comment'></div>于是剪榛芜以树垣墉，浚污潦以开池沼，伐彼良木，鸠于梓人，系日以僝功，随方以募众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148491_comment'></div>亦既无怠，斯焉告成，倬彼仙乡，忽如神化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148491_comment'></div>则有上清之殿，事天尊也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148491_comment'></div>北极之堂，列仙官也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148491_comment'></div>星坛三级，侈祠祀也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148491_comment'></div>霜钟万钧，警昏旭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148491_comment'></div>绘事尽妙，睟容有仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148491_comment'></div>芝盖云骈，宛若瑶池之会；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148491_comment'></div>冰肤雪态，依然姑射之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148491_comment'></div>其或民罹札瘥，岁有水旱，则必祷三官而禳谢，修七斋之威仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148491_comment'></div>霜清步虚，露泠真箓，章醮具矣，福祐随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148491_comment'></div>实天神之攸凭，生民之所怙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148491_comment'></div>尔乃就水以治槛，因高而创亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148491_comment'></div>奇花移茂苑之春，怪石减洞庭之翠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148491_comment'></div>夏笋锦拆，秋荷盖圆，纤埃不生，众卉自茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148491_comment'></div>渔人误入，应谓桃源；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148491_comment'></div>海客遐瞻，史迷蓬岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148491_comment'></div>姑苏胜概，此实尽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148491_comment'></div>暨圣上承乾，许王入觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148491_comment'></div>随图籍而效贡，已在提封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148491_comment'></div>考碑篆以无闻，曷虞陵谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148491_comment'></div>禹偁字人多暇，访道于兹，爰述斯文，用垂来裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148491_comment'></div>振弦歌而化俗，尚愧子游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148491_comment'></div>乘风云而上天，焉知老氏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148491_comment'></div>谨为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1148491'>苏台南址，震泽东涘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148491_comment'></div>其谁居之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148491_comment'></div>毕公之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148491_comment'></div>其谁嗣之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148491_comment'></div>戴氏之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148491_comment'></div>弃兹浮世，依彼玄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148491_comment'></div>乃兴宫宇，肇自田园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148491_comment'></div>厥功既辑，其教弥尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148491_comment'></div>他山未勒，秘宇空存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148491_comment'></div>敢书事迹，贻于后昆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1148491_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=987&endYear=987')">987年</a>　在长洲任知县。有拟题。作品：《拟试内制五题》<span class='inlineComment2'>（作于长洲任内，姑置于是年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_74709_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74710?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74710'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74710'>妻儿莫笑甑中尘，只患功名不患贫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75034'>湖阔尽疑吞泽国，洞深皆道彻宣州。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75034'>杉松自宿千年鹤，橘柚堪轻万户侯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75034'>销夏古湾长积雪，隔帆危柱几经秋。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75034'>云叶拥僧迎墨绶，浪花和鹭裹仙舟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75034'>传书往事人难问，鍊药池空水自流。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75034'>明月峰高欺少室，桃花坞好似瀛洲。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75034'>许浑有句君应笑，张祜无诗我不愁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75034'>直拟如今抛印去，雨蓑风艇狎群鸥<span id='poem_sentence_10_75034_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

中牟

<div class='label1' id='a9a8a9c045f9476698093583725ef70b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a9a8a9c045f9476698093583725ef70b");'><span id='a9a8a9c045f9476698093583725ef70b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>，38岁</div><div id='a9a8a9c045f9476698093583725ef70b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　禹称贬途过中牟县，同年高绅来旅舍访问，并同行西上。作品：《中牟县旅舍喜同年高绅著作见访》<div id='poem_74679' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74679' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74679?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中牟县旅舍喜同年高绅著作见访<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（991年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74679")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74679_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_74679_0'>① 是时绅将命集津平籴，不期而会，至郏郊，方分首</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74679'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74679'>古县日初沉，轺车忽见寻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74679'>不将迁客累，方认故人心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74679'>无酒销寒漏，挑灯听远砧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74679'>郏郊千里路，并辔未妨吟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74679'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74679_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

郑州

<div class='label1' id='66818af0406443ce964523b926182277_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("66818af0406443ce964523b926182277");'><span id='66818af0406443ce964523b926182277_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>，38岁</div><div id='66818af0406443ce964523b926182277' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　贬途过郑州时，知州张秉亦来访逆旅，禹称与高绅、张秉三人同饮，禹称与张秉撰有七绝联句一首，高绅作小序。作品：《郑州与张秉监察联句》<div id='poem_494124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_494124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/494124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑州与张秉监察联句<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（991年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_494124")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_494124_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_494124_0'>① 时秉知州，来访逆旅，与绅同饮，因成一绝。高作小序不载于此</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_494124'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_494124'>函关秋霁雁初回，六里商于晓色开<span class='inlineComment2'>（秉）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_494124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_494124'>四皓有灵应笑我，谪官方始入山来<span class='inlineComment2'>（禹偁）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_494124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_494124'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_494124_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
