id='poem_sentence_3_74838'>家门记得咸通事，莫忘论兵夜召时<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74838'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_74838'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_74838_0'>⑴ 自注：咸通中，毕相在翰林时，懿宗将复河湟，夜召论边事，敷陈方略，甚称旨。上曰：吾方谋帅，不意颇、牧在吾禁苑。遂有登坛之命。按：此唐宣宗大中六年事，毕诚时官翰林学士。见《资治通鉴》卷二四九，参考岑仲勉《翰林学士壁记注补》，载《历史语言研究所集刊》第十五本。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_74838_comment'></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_0_74835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74835'>天上共分三字贵，山中全减贰车愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=991&endYear=991')">991年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有诗，语多牢骚，且有庄周消极思想。作品：《对雪感怀，呈翟使君、冯中允同年》<div id='poem_75028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对雪感怀呈翟使君冯中允同年</a><span class='authorDate'>（991年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75028")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75028'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75028'>岁暮山城雪，民和岁有秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75028'>深闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_75028", 75028, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>五裤咏</span>，聊减贰车愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75028'>凌乱藏溪寺，霏微洒郡楼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75028'>冻宜粘酒旆，香好试茶瓯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75028'>逐吹殊无定，连宵势未休。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75028'>仙娥低粉面<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：仙娥峰在商州西。）</span>，熊耳压峰头<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：熊耳山亦在州之西。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75028'>树老花重发，川长缟不收。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75028'>麋鹿全迷径，鹰鹯不下鞲。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75028'>夜村埋古屋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，丹水咽寒流。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75028'>六出寒光乱，重瞳喜气浮。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75028'>催班临秘殿，称贺拱凝旒。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75028'>漠漠笼天仗，轻轻落御沟。<div ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148519")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148519'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148519'>《易》称：「知进退存亡而不失其正者，其唯圣人乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148519_comment'></div>先生避秦，知亡也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148519_comment'></div>安刘，知存也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148519_comment'></div>应孝惠之聘，知进也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148519_comment'></div>拒高祖之命，知退也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148519_comment'></div>四者备矣，而正在其中，先生非圣而孰为圣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148519_comment'></div>若其秦乱而不避，则焚书坑儒，高、斯之流也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148519_comment'></div>汉危而不出，则素隐行怪，巢、由之徒也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148519_comment'></div>应高祖之命，则溺其冠而骑其项矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148519_comment'></div>拒孝惠之聘，则功不立而名不称矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148519_comment'></div>引而伸之，先生可谓全德者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148519_comment'></div>尝试论之曰：古称周公圣人也，鞭伯禽，教孺子，居摄六年，明辟未复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148519_comment'></div>而召公不说于内，三叔流言于外，盛德大业，几坠于地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148519_comment'></div>吁，扶幼君、秉大政之难也有如是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148519_comment'></div>观乎戚姬之嬖，如意之宠，以妾并后，以孽代宗，本根一摇，社稷将坠，咸谓扶苏之赐死，胡亥之亡国可翘足而待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148519_comment'></div>何止炎灵之不祀，抑亦黔首之罹祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148519_comment'></div>岂无留侯，陈八难、罢六国则可，议主鬯，则以水而投石也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148519_comment'></div>岂无曲逆，间强楚、解长平则可，言立嫡，则圆凿而方枘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148519_comment'></div>先生一出而助之，一言而定之，汉廷公卿皆出其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148519_comment'></div>而能锱铢钟鼎，桎梏衣冠，安万乘而不有其功，抗匹夫而不食其禄，自非至人达识，孰能与于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148519_comment'></div>向使先生定汉嗣，为汉臣，报德议功，必在平、勃之右，当以左辅右弼、前疑后丞而处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148519_comment'></div>居是时也，以四钜贤事一少帝，挟震主之威，负不赏之功，又何止流言不说之事哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148519_comment'></div>欲望其茹紫芝，卧商岭，其可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148519_comment'></div>是知先生之出，非独谋汉也，实将救时也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148519_comment'></div>先生之退，非独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148519", 1148519, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>全身</span>也，亦将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148519", 1148519, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>矫世</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148519_comment'></div>危而护之，不宴安于独善，可谓救乎时矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148519_comment'></div>定而去之，不乘时以聚禄，可谓矫乎世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148519_comment'></div>用是警民，犹有建桓立顺之徒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148519_comment'></div>呜呼，世之为人臣，议废立者可胜道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148519_comment'></div>或因定策而专国，或因援立而无君，戕弑凶残，何莫由此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148519_comment'></div>其后滔天于莽、卓，盗国于曹、马，移徙龟鼎，易于奕棋，累累简编，可为太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148519_comment'></div>是以先生危则助之，安则去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148519_comment'></div>其来也，至公于万民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148519_comment'></div>其往也，无私于一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148519_comment'></div>前所谓知进退存亡而不失其正者，千古四贤而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148519_comment'></div>或曰：周公相成王，摄天子，功成治定，制礼作乐，号为先圣，历代仰之，岂先生之道过于周公乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148519_comment'></div>愚曰：周公乘文、武之业，知王化可兴，故辅之以行道焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148519_comment'></div>先生当暴秦之后，知霸道终杂，故去之以远害焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148519_comment'></div>周公圣人之用者，先生圣人之晦者，但时异而迹殊耳，非所谓过乎周公者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148519_comment'></div>辛卯岁，予坐事解制诰职，翌日有商于贰使之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148519_comment'></div>下车拜庙西山之侧，退立廊庑，古碑在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148519_comment'></div>自唐御史大夫赞皇李公而下，作者若干人，因历览之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148519_comment'></div>美则美矣，叙先生之道似有未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148519_comment'></div>就馆濡笔，申之以碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148519_comment'></div>斯文也，岂直歌鸿飞、状鹤发而已哉，实欲使立朝廷，为臣子，而挟幼冲，图富贵者闻而知惧，亦《春秋》诛乱臣贼子之旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148519_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1148519'>猗欤先生，时行则行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148519_comment'></div>高眠商岭，逃难秦坑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148519_comment'></div>知秦之祚，亡于子婴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148519_comment'></div>知汉之祚，存于惠盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148519_comment'></div>一言悟主，万邦以贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148519_comment'></div>不有其功，不食其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148519_comment'></div>远害<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1148519", 1148519, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>全身</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1148519", 1148519, "Clauses/166/Comments/0")'>矫世</span>励俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148519_comment'></div>清泉洗耳，紫芝充腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148519_comment'></div>猎犬自烹，冥鸿不复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148519_comment'></div>矫矫高节，悠悠后来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148519_comment'></div>汉之戾园，晋之悯怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148519_comment'></div>江充厚诬，贾后雄猜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148519_comment'></div>先生不生，孰为来哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148519_comment'></div>昏乱之世，废立不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148519_comment'></div>操欺孤儿，莽抱孺子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148519_comment'></div>成既自我，权亦归己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148519_comment'></div>先生不生，大事去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148519_comment'></div>苍野峨峨，祠荒薜萝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148519_comment'></div>遗像斯在，德音可歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148519_comment'></div>清风凛凛，素发皤皤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148519_comment'></div>永怀贞遁，刻石山阿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1148519_comment'></div></div></div><br id='poem_content_75070'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75070'>不见阳城驿，空吟昔人诗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75070'>谁改<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_75070", 75070, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>避贤邮</span>，唱首元微之。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75070'>微之谪江陵，憔悴为判司。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75070'>路宿商山驿，一夕见嗟咨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75070'>所嗟阳道州，抗直贞元时。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75070'>时亦被斥逐，南荒终一麾。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75070'>题诗改驿名，格力何高奇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75070'>乐天在翰林，亦和迁客词。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75070'>遂使道州名，光与日月驰。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75070'>是后数十年，借问经者谁。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75070'>留题富水驿，始见杜紫微。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75070'>紫微言驿名，不合轻改移。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75070'>欲遣朝天者，惕然知在兹。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75070'>一以讳事神，名呼不忍为。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75070'>一以名警众，名存教可施。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75070'>为善虽不同，同归化之基。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75070'>迩来又百稔，编集空鳞差。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75070'>旧诗犹可诵，古驿殊无遗。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75070'>富水地虽在，阳城名岂知。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75070'>空想数君子，贯若珠累累。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75070'>三章诗未泯，千古名亦随。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75070'>德音苟不嗣，吾道当已而。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75070'>前贤尚如此，今我复何悲。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年3月</a>　在商州任团练副使。有诗送冯伉。作品：《赋得南山行，送冯中允之辛谷冶按狱 答黄宗旦书之一》<div id='poem_75153' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75153' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赋得南山行送冯中允之辛谷冶按狱</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75153'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75153'>商山三月花如火，草树青葱雨初过。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75153'>柳条渐软蝶双飞，桑叶尚多蚕一卧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75153'>薄情野水流不回，无力春云慵欲堕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75153'>团团榆荚是谁抛，漠漠游丝向人亸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75153'>转输昨日又移文，小氓诉牒何纷纭。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75153'>吾徒事业本稽古，得行其志当刑措。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75153'>未行此道且营营，营营为禄聊代耕。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75102_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75102'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75102'>吾生非不辰，吾志复不卑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75102'>既登俊秀科，又在清切司。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75102'>谏纸无直言，纶诰多愧辞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75102'>黾勉为何事，亲老与妻儿。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75102'>一旦命执法，嫉恶寄所施。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年3月</a>　在商州任团练副使。上疏请求“移近乡园，少得俸入，乐病友，聚穷族”，并致书李宗谔乞为之助力。作品：《与李宗谔书》<div id='poem_1148377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与李宗谔书</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148377")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148377'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148377'>月日，商州副使王某谨遣家僮致书于学士足下：日者痡仆自京师来，辱惠手翰，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148377", 1148377, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>敦勉</span>过厚，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148377_comment'></div>因窃自念：某，寒士也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148377_comment'></div>足下，相门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148377_comment'></div>某在罪谴之中，足下处嫌疑之地，不当如是之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148377_comment'></div>某自束发以来，与人游且多矣，能不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148377", 1148377, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>炎凉</span>为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148377", 1148377, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>去就</span>者，虽贫贱之交，固亦鲜得，况贵胄乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148377_comment'></div>岂某之末学小道能动足下之心邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148377_comment'></div>将足下之秉仁执义，不以某为累邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148377_comment'></div>若两不然者，何其爱我之深也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148377_comment'></div>因恃知己，辄复云云，惟足下始终留意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148377_comment'></div>某读唐史，见元和中刘禹锡贬刺播州，播州非人所处，而梦得有母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148377_comment'></div>时柳宗元同制贬柳州，固欲以柳易播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148377_comment'></div>会宰臣裴度亦为启奏其事，宪宗遂移善地，书诸信史，以为美谈，至今君子伏裴、柳之义，而嘉章武之仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148377_comment'></div>区区之怀，实望于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148377_comment'></div>然某待罪来思，未及满岁，固宜慎言动而俟恩宥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148377_comment'></div>今又妄动者，诚以家君七十有五，齿发甚衰，生身以来，未尝暂去乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148377_comment'></div>顷年前，某为长洲县令，侍亲而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148377_comment'></div>姑苏名邦，号为繁富，鱼酒甚美，俸禄甚优，是时亲年方逾耳顺，子孙妇女聚在眼前，尚念丘园，忽忽不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148377_comment'></div>况今年愈衰，家愈远，当非肉不饱之际，旅食于商山中，则其为情况，不待具言可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148377_comment'></div>脱不幸疾恙，则地无医药，何以慰人子之心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148377_comment'></div>又父母之情，惜其幼子，家弟少失母爱，叙婚甚晚，前年某忝职閤下，始能为娶一妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148377_comment'></div>今年闻有孙矣，而家尊未及见，此所以当食兴叹，永夕不寐，悲咤而不能解者，为是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148377_comment'></div>前时家弟自荆南乞丐以来，数日而去，临歧聚泣，闻者泪下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148377_comment'></div>况昆仲三院，妻女九人，亡者未祔葬，生者待婚嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148377_comment'></div>散于彼者，糊口于人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148377_comment'></div>系于此者，绝俸于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148377_comment'></div>其为穷人，亦无伍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148377_comment'></div>某尝自计之，一岁则仆马去矣，再岁则囊橐竭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148377_comment'></div>茍至是而量移，其能行乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148377_comment'></div>牵复果能起乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148377_comment'></div>静思熟虑，未免一诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148377_comment'></div>然前事是非，不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1148377", 1148377, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>较辨</span>，直以穷苦，闻于帝阍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148377_comment'></div>所望者移近乡园，少得俸入，乐病亲、聚穷族而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148377_comment'></div>斯亦自便其事，未知上果从乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148377_comment'></div>诉而不得，则无所望也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148377_comment'></div>默而不诉，则有所恨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148377_comment'></div>今已沥恳拜章，附递入奏，惟足下极力振拔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148377_comment'></div>某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1148377_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年2月</a>　在商州任团练副使。春，有《读汉文纪》诗，可见禹称以贾谊自况其出境。<div id='poem_75142' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75142' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75142?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读汉文纪</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年2月）</span><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年7月14日</a>　在商州任团练副使。太师赵普卒，王禹偁为之撰《神道碑》，并撰挽歌十首以悼之。作品：《太师中书今魏国公册赠尚书令追封真定王赵(讳普)挽歌十首》<div id='poem_74697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太师中书令魏国公册赠尚书令追封真定王赵<span class='inlineComment2'>（讳普）</span>挽歌<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（992年7月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", id='poem_sentence_0_75178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75178'>终南有嘉士，天子不得臣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75178'>务本不务末，求力不求人。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75178'>行是有馀力，稽古且学文。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75178'>稽古不为禄，学问非饰身。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75178'>立言复垂教，杨孟时有伦。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。禹称到郡一年，唱和始及百首，编成《商于唱和集》一册。作品：《仲咸以予编成<商淤唱和集>,以二十韵相赠，依韵和之》<div id='poem_75031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75031?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仲咸以予编成商于唱和集以二十韵诗相赠依韵和之</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_75031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75031'>齐强侵北鄙，许败守东偏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75031'>犹恨多虚日，何妨且系年<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75031'>拙句传非梦，雄词纵自天。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75031'>一嘲花灼灼，再咏雁翩翩。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75031'>糠籺豪家笑，铏羹古味全。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75031'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_75031", 75031, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>虎盐</span>宜燕享，猴棘谩雕镌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>步花砖。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75031'>重甚连城璧，精于<span class='link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。撰成《卮言日出赋》，其后汇集所作之赋为一卷，名曰《律赋》，并为之作序。<div id='poem_1148217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卮言日出赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（盈侧空仰，随变和美。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148217")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148217_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148217'>卮之为物也，空则仰，满则倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148217_comment'></div>伊斯言之无像，假厥器而强名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148217_comment'></div>日出弥新，尚安知其适莫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148217_comment'></div>天倪自得，亦胡系于虚盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148217_comment'></div>岂不以卮无所识，每逐物而欹侧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148217_comment'></div>言无所执，但因时而语默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148217_comment'></div>谅何思而何虑，固靡失而靡得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148217_comment'></div>用能满天下以无过，体寰中而可则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148217_comment'></div>徒观夫卮臲卼以弗定，言支离而不穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148217_comment'></div>孰见兆朕，难明始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148217_comment'></div>冥其心，若虚舟之泛水；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148217_comment'></div>应乎物，类天籁之鸣空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148217_comment'></div>是以至道无形，至人绝想，讵难追于驷马，实冥求于罔象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148217_comment'></div>以不器之器是资，以不言之言为上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148217_comment'></div>存于身，则大智之闲闲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148217_comment'></div>移于邦，则王道之荡荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148217_comment'></div>喻鸣钟之大小，物莫我欺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148217_comment'></div>取胶柱于枢机，吾将安仰？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148217_comment'></div>大哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148217_comment'></div>卮也者，既异欹器，且殊漏卮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148217_comment'></div>言也者，亦匪确论，又非诡随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148217_comment'></div>知万物之种也，奚千里而应之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148217_comment'></div>智过挈瓶，《梼杌》之书徒尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148217_comment'></div>信踰盈缶，《连山》之象云为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148217_comment'></div>故曰：不言则齐，同形<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148217", 1148217, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>相禅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148217_comment'></div>巧如簧兮非偶，卒若环兮无变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148217_comment'></div>得之者毁誉两忘，失之者是非交战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148217_comment'></div>详夫卮有空满，于义则那；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148217_comment'></div>言无准的，在理云何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148217_comment'></div>亦犹君不言而黔首化，天不言而玉烛和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148217_comment'></div>是以大道五千，取不知而立诫<span class='inlineComment2'>（《老子》云：「言者不知。」）</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148217_comment'></div>寓言十九，藉外论以同波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148217_comment'></div>今我后据北极之尊，穷《南华》之旨，思欲体清净而率兆庶，故先命辞赋而试多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148217_comment'></div>盛乎哉，崇道之名，不为虚美。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1148217_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。禹称旧同僚前平江军节度推官康怀圭以其父延泽之命，请为之预撰神道碑。作品：《前普州刺史康公预撰神道碑》<div id='poem_1148530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148530?labeling=true' target='_blank'>前普州刺史康公预撰神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148530")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148530'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148530'>立功名之谓贤，齐得失之谓道，悟生死之谓达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148530_comment'></div>三者有一，则可为闻人矣，况兼之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148530_comment'></div>其谁则然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148530_comment'></div>吾见于康公矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148530_comment'></div>公讳延泽，字润之，代北人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148530_comment'></div>其先盖夏后氏之苗裔曰淳维，世有北土，自立君长，其别处康居者，即始祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148530_comment'></div>西汉时康居国王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>纳质</span>于大单于，其后单于内附，遂有云中，以国为姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148530_comment'></div>曾祖嗣，皇任蔚州蕃汉都知兵马使，累赠太子太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148530_comment'></div>祖讳公政，皇任代州都知兵马使，累赠太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148530_comment'></div>考讳某，皇任河中节度使、检校太尉兼侍中，赠太师，谥曰武安公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148530_comment'></div>其世禄世功，载在《武安碑》，此不复书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148530_comment'></div>公即太师之次子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148530_comment'></div>母卫国夫人高氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148530_comment'></div>晋天福中，起家补东头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148530_comment'></div>历汉逮周，垂二十载，艰难险阻，靡不备尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148530_comment'></div>以功转染院副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148530_comment'></div>我太祖神德皇帝之开国也，以荆、湘未下，诏宣徽南院使李处筠、襄帅慕容延钊出偏师南讨，而公实从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148530_comment'></div>时江陵高保融死，朝议以其子继冲权领军府，因命公赍玺书、乘驲骑以吊抚焉，且观便宜，二帅留襄阳以待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148530_comment'></div>公宣谕而回，尽得机事，前导师旅，长驱而南，平定荆、湘，易于拾芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148530_comment'></div>寻转染院使、监护荆南军，赏功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148530_comment'></div>乾德中受代归朝，会国家有平蜀之役，诏公为北路前军都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148530_comment'></div>至固镇，主将王全斌请公领前军先入，以张万友佐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148530_comment'></div>寻击白水、阁子二寨，破之，勒兵会乾渠渡下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148530_comment'></div>蜀人恃险，出万仞寨以待王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148530_comment'></div>以公与万友选死士百人，先登水西寨，以兵继之，纵火燔烧栅木俱尽，遂取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148530_comment'></div>明日，全斌中军方至，乃合逼置口，走之，遂下兴州，与夔峡兵合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148530_comment'></div>进击西县、三泉，生获伪兴元节度使韩保贞，公皆有力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148530_comment'></div>由是乘胜讨逐，越大小漫天，累战皆获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148530_comment'></div>赴利州，夜半拔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148530_comment'></div>蜀人由桔柏江以遁，乃烧浮桥保剑门，恃天险也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148530_comment'></div>诸将方议进击，会有蜀卒来降，自言知山川道路，且告曰：「自益光江东有路曰来苏，直抵剑门南二十里，蜀人设寨以阨之，此捷径也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148530_comment'></div>于是全斌欲自来苏路入，诸将莫有言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148530_comment'></div>公曰：「来苏小路，无烦主将，可使偏裨以副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148530_comment'></div>大将亲叩剑门，剑门精兵所聚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148530_comment'></div>且蜀人闻来苏军入，必分兵以御我，此必克之势也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148530_comment'></div>乃命公与史延德往焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148530_comment'></div>公曰：「《书》称『徯我后，后来其苏』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148530_comment'></div>今路名来苏，天启吊伐之义也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148530_comment'></div>遂舍车马，披榛梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148530_comment'></div>而蜀帅王昭远、赵崇韬果留小将守剑门，引军于青强店下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148530_comment'></div>由是全斌克剑门，获赵、王二帅，席卷而西矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148530_comment'></div>时蜀世子玄哲统锐兵守绵州，闻剑关不守，乃弃城而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148530_comment'></div>蜀主遂令伊审徵奉表归顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148530_comment'></div>全斌因请公以一百骑先入成都，安抚军民，且伺必降之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148530_comment'></div>是时蜀国馀兵尚有七万，公往也，人情危之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148530_comment'></div>公既至，以二十骑自卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148530_comment'></div>入见蜀主，谕以祸福，示以恩信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148530_comment'></div>蜀之君臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>舞蹈</span>感悦，留三日，尽封府库，赍鱼钥而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148530_comment'></div>全斌等遂平蜀国，遣蜀主归于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148530_comment'></div>诏公为成都府兵马都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148530_comment'></div>而蜀军复乱，且以全师雄为首，所在杀知州、通判以应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148530_comment'></div>普州刘泽、遂州王可寮、果州宋德并受师雄伪署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148530_comment'></div>朝廷以公为普州刺史，公诣全斌，请卫兵赴理所，与公四十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148530_comment'></div>公发成都，至简州，招败亡之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148530_comment'></div>得刀手一千人，取器甲以给之，乃教战阵，立部伍，拥之而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148530_comment'></div>至郡境，有贼甲雕领众五千来犯，公一战败之，擒七百人，受伪命者立斩一百辈，馀皆释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148530_comment'></div>乃悬榜示人，谕以逆顺，招集<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>团结</span>，得刀手三千人，败刘泽三万人，自是贼势稍沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148530_comment'></div>公虽至普州，廨宇尽为煨烬，乃依山设屋，权驻师徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148530_comment'></div>而兵乱之馀，无食可守，公披攘群盗，且战且行，直至遂州，辇运储蓄，以至成城畚锸，靡不具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148530_comment'></div>既而王可寮等数郡贼兵合势来战，公又败之，遂至合州，赴江溺死者不可胜纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148530_comment'></div>未半年，普、遂、资、简、昌、合等六州飞奏以闻，优诏褒美，且命与曹璨充东川七州招安巡检使，仍赐钱帛，委公等随军赏给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148530_comment'></div>自全师雄乱后，东路艰难，贼害使臣、抄掠琛赆者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148530_comment'></div>时师雄虽死，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>贼众</span>尚有万人，立谢行本为主，以罗七君等佐佑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148530_comment'></div>闻公警巡，望风而遁，遂以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/205/Comments/0")'>贼众</span>保于金堂，非公所部也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148530_comment'></div>公乃越境以讨之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/208/Comments/0")'>贼众</span>又遁，因驻师以待焉，卒平狂寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148530_comment'></div>先是，金堂、新都、洛县等民为贼逼胁，皆饷馈资给之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148530_comment'></div>公则出令招诱，许以自新，约旬不来，无少长皆杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148530_comment'></div>民归者万馀户，咸得安堵，输税县官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148530_comment'></div>故民心有怀，贼党自溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148530_comment'></div>加以全斌等同心经略，两川悉平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148530_comment'></div>及奉诏班师，主将获罪，皆以杀降兵、受蜀赂故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148530_comment'></div>黜公为唐州教练使，天下人为公惋叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148530_comment'></div>公处之自若，不出怨言，惟筑室垦田、聚书训子而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148530_comment'></div>十年间辟草莱，植桑柘，居泌水之上，遂为富家，家到于今赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148530_comment'></div>开宝末，太祖幸西洛，祀南郊，始起公为供奉官，留监左藏库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148530_comment'></div>今上即位，就除左藏库副使，兼水北皇城大内巡检，又召公为东京畿内都巡检使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148530_comment'></div>俄而公之犹子六人皆恣用家财，不事生产，公以礼义勖之，反生怨怼，乃挝登闻鼓，愿析祖业以自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148530_comment'></div>诏公以理处割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148530_comment'></div>事未定，会灵昌河决，公受诏塞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148530_comment'></div>诸子复诉公违诏，遂罢使职，退居洛阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148530_comment'></div>不数年，向之犹子已饥寒于道路矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148530_comment'></div>上躬耕之岁，公会恩例当起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148530_comment'></div>权河南尹许仲宣颇相劝激，公曰：「三代为将，道家所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148530_comment'></div>吾自蔚州太师而下，世传将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148530_comment'></div>今幸功名以继祖祢，年享寿考，运逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/272/Comments/0")'>理平</span>，使子孙去櫜鞬，袭缝掖，熙熙自乐，以终天年，吾愿足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148530_comment'></div>吾尝读《李广传》，见其兵败，削为庶人，幸匈奴犯边，被召而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148530_comment'></div>及军吏责簿，自刎帐下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148530_comment'></div>欲望灞陵夜猎，其可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1148530_comment'></div>古人成败，取则不远」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1148530_comment'></div>以老疾为辞，而奏其二子焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1148530_comment'></div>淳化三年，公七十六矣，一旦，谓其子怀圭曰：「吾衰耄若此，死在朝夕，茍以先太师之灵，得保首领以没于地，吾无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1148530_comment'></div>然吾有平蜀微功，思预刻吾墓，其谁能之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1148530_comment'></div>吾闻商山王副使旧直紫薇，有文称于代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1148530_comment'></div>又尝任长洲宰，时汝为姑苏从事，亦同僚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1148530_comment'></div>试为我请焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1148530_comment'></div>怀圭曰：「预凶事，非礼也，且心所不忍」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1148530_comment'></div>公曰：「此人子之大情，名教之旧制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1148530_comment'></div>吾则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1148530_comment'></div>且古之达者，以生为寄，以死为归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1148530_comment'></div>今吾官历二千石，年踰七十六，吾不死而安归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1148530_comment'></div>吾欲生前自视其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1148530_comment'></div>知词无愧而功不诬也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1148530_comment'></div>怀圭不得已，命其子赍书而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1148530_comment'></div>某据事状，次而书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1148530_comment'></div>大率平蜀之功，公居第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1148530_comment'></div>离而辨之，其功有五：若先入蜀境，击白水、阁子二寨，开王师破竹之势，其功一也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1148530_comment'></div>径赴来苏，分蜀人青强之力，使剑门势解，其功二也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1148530_comment'></div>以二十骑入见蜀主，其功三也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1148530_comment'></div>以四十人定普州，其功四也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1148530_comment'></div>越所部擒罗七君，其功五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1148530_comment'></div>至于谟议机权，赏罚威戮，所不尽者，有公之自著《平蜀实录》在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1148530_comment'></div>初，全师雄之乱也，诸将议杀降兵二万七千人，恐为内应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1148530_comment'></div>公独请择老幼疾病者七千人释之，然后起二万人，以十人为率，皆反接之，若连鸡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/359/Comments/0")'>贯鱼</span>，桴江而下，以兵卫之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1148530_comment'></div>比<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/362/Comments/0")'>贼众</span>知之，可二百里矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1148530_comment'></div>若寇来劫夺，杀之于江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1148530_comment'></div>如此，则杀有名矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1148530_comment'></div>虽不见用，可谓仁乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1148530_comment'></div>后国家议罪，果以杀降为名，有先见之明，不免于戾者，命矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1148530_comment'></div>公形貌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/375/Comments/0")'>魁杰</span>，知谋宏远，刚而有变，勇而能仁，负将材，喜兵法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1148530_comment'></div>虽为王公之子，耻以恩泽封侯，故能立功于当年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1148530_comment'></div>齐得失以知命，悟生死而无惧，虽古之名将，世之达人，何以过此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1148530_comment'></div>与夫伏剑而悔降兵，仰药而罪地脉者，不亦贤乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1148530_comment'></div>公始娶安氏，蔚州别驾某之女也，先公而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1148530_comment'></div>男五人：长怀玉，进士不第，早亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1148530_comment'></div>次怀圭，前平江军节度推官、试大理司直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1148530_comment'></div>次怀理，以侍亲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_125_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/402/Comments/0")'>干家</span>，未听入仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1148530_comment'></div>次怀璟、怀琏，并补三班奉职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1148530_comment'></div>孙二人，赞华举进士，赞臣尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1148530_comment'></div>公再娶李氏，封陇西县君，秦王俨之第七女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1148530_comment'></div>以某年某月某日终于西京私第，某年某月某日葬于某乡某里，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1148530_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_130_1148530'>神德皇帝，驾驭英雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1148530_comment'></div>始即南面，乃平西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1148530_comment'></div>孰为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/420/Comments/0")'>前蒐</span>，时维我公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1148530_comment'></div>白水寨碎，来苏路通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1148530_comment'></div>剑门天险，一旦憧憧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1148530_comment'></div>蜀既送款，众尚七万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1148530_comment'></div>其谁先之，公膺是选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1148530_comment'></div>拥二十骑，扬鞭入见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1148530_comment'></div>谕以祸福，蜀民舞抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1148530_comment'></div>事讫而还，王师席卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1148530_comment'></div>全蜀虽定，群凶未收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1148530_comment'></div>帝命我公，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_141_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/439/Comments/0")'>欧攘</span>怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1148530_comment'></div>刺举一郡，警巡七州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1148530_comment'></div>盗死原野，人服田畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1148530_comment'></div>定功议赏，理当封侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1148530_comment'></div>孰为㺥狡，唁唁吠叫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1148530_comment'></div>谪去泌阳，前勋弗较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1148530_comment'></div>三月不仕，古人相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1148530_comment'></div>矧惟我公，十年不调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1148530_comment'></div>不调维何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1148530_comment'></div>熙熙而笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1148530_comment'></div>太祖起之，厥官尚微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1148530_comment'></div>我后增秩，暮年有辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1148530_comment'></div>徼巡西洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1148530_comment'></div>按察东畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1148530_comment'></div>竟坐家事，终成罢归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1148530_comment'></div>君子知命，达人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_156_1148530", 1148530, "Clauses/465/Comments/0")'>息机</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1148530_comment'></div>先人敝庐，可庇风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1148530_comment'></div>知止知足，何思何虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1148530_comment'></div>庆见曾孙，名扬先祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1148530_comment'></div>谓死为归，预铭厥墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1148530_comment'></div>不朽之功，永光垄树。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_161_1148530'></div><div id='poem_sentence_161_1148530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。友人臧丙卒，禹称为之撰《墓志铭》作品：《谏议大夫臧公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（或作于是年前后。）</span><div id='poem_1148532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148532' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148532?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谏议大夫臧公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148532")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148532_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148532'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148532'>淳化二年春三月，诏以右谏议大夫臧公知江陵府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148532_comment'></div>四月，至理所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148532_comment'></div>八月，得微恙，犹视事不辍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148532_comment'></div>明年春疾亟，不能出外屏，飞奏以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148532_comment'></div>上命中贵人领御医乘驲视其病，礼之如将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148532_comment'></div>既而饵药皆不效，肩舆归京师，以五月某日终于私第，年五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148532_comment'></div>上闻之轸悼，且问其嗣，或奏曰：「有子待用，未冠」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148532_comment'></div>乃授国子四门助教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148532_comment'></div>以某年某月某日葬于某州某县某乡某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148532_comment'></div>执友太原王某哭而铭其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148532_comment'></div>公本讳愚，字仲回，因梦先洗马导从入其第，呼公立阶下，且命仰视，曰：「老人星见矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148532_comment'></div>公梦中如教，见黄明润大若图谍所载者，再拜而寤，私喜曰：「吉祥也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148532_comment'></div>以寿星出丙入丁，乃名丙字梦寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148532_comment'></div>公年十七八，始执笔为四六文字，甚有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>风彩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148532_comment'></div>故兵部侍郎王公祜以监察御史里行宰大名之属邑，先洗马事魏王符公彦卿为要职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148532_comment'></div>每王公诣府，必厚为供帐，馆王于第，且出，公拜而以所业师焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148532_comment'></div>王公览之，叹异曰：「此子可教，若进修不已，当为闻人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148532_comment'></div>后变格慕韩、柳文，颇近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>阃阈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148532_comment'></div>既冠，丁父母丧，哀毁成疾，伏枕者弥年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148532_comment'></div>家财钜万，悉以散朋友亲戚，视之粪土如也，产将竭而病亦愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148532_comment'></div>遇日者于太行山下，言公四十当成名，公信之，因落魄于杯酒间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148532_comment'></div>又雅善音律<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>章程</span>之伎，为时辈所推服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148532_comment'></div>嬉游任侠者十五馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148532_comment'></div>上即位之岁，一举登进士第，解褐大理评事，通判大宁监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148532_comment'></div>监之所职，煮井为盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148532_comment'></div>先时，主事者悉多逋负，械系不减百人，公问其故，咸曰：「盐之要在积薪于夏秋，煮井于冬春，则辑事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148532_comment'></div>向者官给柴本钱，主事者恣为私用，薪既不登，盐将安出」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148532_comment'></div>公因取其质而给其价，故薪聚如山，迄公一政，亡被责者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148532_comment'></div>受代之日，人为之泣下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148532_comment'></div>是岁，上亲征太原，见于行阙，授太子右赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148532_comment'></div>并寇平，以公知辽州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148532_comment'></div>有伪署衙校劫盗于民者，公械送朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148532_comment'></div>时以旧染之俗，务从宽贷，因赦其罪，复补衙职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148532_comment'></div>公礼待之，且约无再犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148532_comment'></div>不踰月，劫盗如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148532_comment'></div>公捕获之，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>磔裂</span>而徇，然后以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148532_comment'></div>有秘书丞马汝士者，公进士同年也，以本官知石州，为政严急，军民苦之，且与监军不协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148532_comment'></div>一夕于公署中剚刃在腹而毙，遂以自尽奏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148532_comment'></div>公上疏理其事，其略曰：「倘明其负罪自裁，尸宜更戮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148532_comment'></div>茍雪其非辜致毙，魂亦无冤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148532_comment'></div>上览之骇异，遽命按其事，且召公还便殿与对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148532_comment'></div>上问公曰：「马汝士遇害，尔知其人乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148532_comment'></div>公曰：「人则臣不知，言自尽则厚诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148532_comment'></div>凡人罪非殊死，未有弃其生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148532_comment'></div>臣观汝士所为，略无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>私过</span>，盖盗憎民怨尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148532_comment'></div>然汝士一夫之命，不足挂圣虑，但秘书丞是陛下五品朝官，今死既不明，宿卫者亦不加罪，臣恐今后书生不能治边郡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148532_comment'></div>上为沉思久之，勉劳使罢，留监在京茶库，继赐钱五十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148532_comment'></div>遇郊禋，加著作郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148532_comment'></div>太平兴国八年，拜右拾遗、直史馆，赐银章朱绂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148532_comment'></div>寻知许州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148532_comment'></div>在许三年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>急吏缓民</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148532_comment'></div>迁河东转运使，积粟饷军，边用称足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148532_comment'></div>上籍田之岁，以恩例加尚书工部员外郎，直史职、转输如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148532_comment'></div>归朝，授户部郎中，面赐金紫，且诏知审官院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148532_comment'></div>上重四品官，转司农少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148532_comment'></div>未几，有大谏、荆南之命，辞日赐钱千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148532_comment'></div>之任多病，卧治而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148532_comment'></div>公为人廉直<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>刚决</span>，仁义忠信，知止足，不茍且，与人交礼简而情至，故久而弥笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148532_comment'></div>凡妻之昆弟，姊妹之婿，接之甚谨，虽竟月踰年，语不及于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/186/Comments/0")'>私亵</span>，人以此为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148532_comment'></div>监茶库时，今少府少监雷有终以殿中丞与公同事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148532_comment'></div>故真定王再入中书，权贵德望<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1148532", 1148532, "Clauses/191/Comments/0")'>熏灼</span>天下，朝臣得一见与语者，自以为荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148532_comment'></div>公朔望投刺，未尝求见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148532_comment'></div>真定使人召公，公未至，使爱子羽林大将军承宗达其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148532_comment'></div>是时某以举进士馆于公家，尝劝公速往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148532_comment'></div>公乃修谢启，缄封讫，复迁延数日，某问其故，公曰：「赵侍中不乐雷氏，众所知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148532_comment'></div>今某与雷同职，不告而去，恐招物议」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148532_comment'></div>因白于雷，雷果曰：「此无他，欲使著作伺吾罪舋矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148532_comment'></div>公乃焚其启，终不诣真定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148532_comment'></div>其不趋权势也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148532_comment'></div>惜哉，不享上寿，不登大用，命矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148532_comment'></div>公之世禄世功，洎昭穆乡里，详洗马志中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148532_comment'></div>公即洗马长子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148532_comment'></div>娶张氏，封清河县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148532_comment'></div>子二人，助教长也，次曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148532_comment'></div>女一人，适进士杨云卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148532_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_1148532'>胡为乎有生，去来兮靡恒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148532_comment'></div>吾梦惟星兮，竟亦无徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148532_comment'></div>浮生一梦兮，营营薨薨，梦中之梦夫何凭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148532_comment'></div>呜呼！</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1148532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148532'><span class='label'>按：</span>丙父名令图，洛阳人。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1148532_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有记。作品：《济州龙泉寺修三门记》<div id='poem_1148480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>济州龙泉寺修三门记</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148480")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148480'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148480'>古之官府通谓之寺，故今九卿之署，其名尚有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148480_comment'></div>浮图氏之教，来于西国，馆于鸿胪，斯得名之始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148480_comment'></div>庄严宏敞，历代增之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148480_comment'></div>得高其堂，揭以鸱尾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148480_comment'></div>得大其户，轩如雉门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148480_comment'></div>中心阙然，盖两观之遗制尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148480_comment'></div>济州龙泉寺者，唐大历四年建于郓州钜野县，县即春秋时西狩获麟之地，汉初时彭越聚盗之所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148480_comment'></div>东距任、宿，西接曹、卫，北走汶水，南极芒砀，皆百馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148480_comment'></div>其中薮泽深陋，民俗犷戾，揭竿啸聚，率以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148480_comment'></div>周广顺中，鲁侯以曲阜叛，六师薄伐，七旬来格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148480_comment'></div>思欲屏萑蒲之盗，启符竹之封，乃诏有司，改邑为郡，缁徒兰若，从而兴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148480_comment'></div>虽主者增修，而日不暇给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148480_comment'></div>既而前有殿，俨像设也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148480_comment'></div>后有堂，备说法也，虽廊庑未具，固已甲于他寺矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148480_comment'></div>唯兹三门，基而弗构，盖地苦洪水，民无馀赀，殆三十年，编蓬而横木矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148480_comment'></div>开宝丙子岁，功德主大德某，矢谟缔构，勠力经营，聚喜舍之财，节衣盂之费，伐木辇石，鸠工庀徒，凡五年而有成，即以太平兴国某年月日迁化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148480_comment'></div>弟子某嗣而葺之，丹青赭垩，焕乎有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148480_comment'></div>又立二金刚以守焉，望之巍巍，足为壮观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148480_comment'></div>夫寺之有门，若人之有衣冠、树之有枝叶也，不壮不丽，民安仰哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148480_comment'></div>某生于周，长于鲁，兴废始末，皆得而知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148480_comment'></div>举进士时，见托撰述，游宦靡定，于兹十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148480_comment'></div>待罪商于，始毕前愿，得以事实，总而书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148480_comment'></div>僧之耆宿、郡之檀越，暨租庸、至向，请书于石阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148480_comment'></div>时淳化三年某月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1148480_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有碑文。作品：《商州福寿寺天王殿碑》<div id='poem_1148521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148521?labeling=true' target='_blank'>商州福寿寺天王殿碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148521")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148521_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148521'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148521'>天王之名，在三代时实人君也，故见于《春秋》，载于礼文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148521_comment'></div>秦兼三五之号，王爵归于人臣，由是儒教无之，内典有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148521_comment'></div>其神异威力，具于佛经，此不繁述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148521_comment'></div>今所序者，废兴修建而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148521_comment'></div>商州福寿寺天王殿者，唐天祐三年所建也，其塑绘金碧，皆当时良工，于今百年，相好无减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148521_comment'></div>唯殿堂朽蠹，殆将不支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148521_comment'></div>先院主清弁，世姓席氏，房陵人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148521_comment'></div>后唐天成元年依寺僧戒贤出家，长兴初落发，寻受具戒于兴元府王子寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148521_comment'></div>清泰中继主寺事，以太平兴国四年迁化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148521_comment'></div>凡四十年间，建大殿，立三门，僧堂惟西，僧庖惟左，廊庑环合，亭台洞启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148521_comment'></div>树珍果，植名花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148521_comment'></div>佛事之庄严，释门之仪范，靡不具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148521_comment'></div>然后垦山田，造水硙，嘉蔬有圃，柔桑垂阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148521_comment'></div>兹所以备绀宇之缮完，给缁徒之供养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148521_comment'></div>别建罗汉阁于西偏，颇极宏丽，唯天王殿未暇改作，盖工用之大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148521_comment'></div>临终谓弟子怀省曰：「吾始居兹寺，属兵乱之馀，院宇圮毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148521_comment'></div>驱其豺虎，剪其荆棘，勤苦无怠，庶几有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148521_comment'></div>而商土瘠，商民贫，衣食唯艰，檀施且鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148521_comment'></div>吾粗衣粝食，往来竹山、上庸间，得尺布斗粟，负荷而归，积毫累铢，以至百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148521_comment'></div>今僝功虽在，示灭有期，心不满者，惟天王殿尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148521_comment'></div>汝能嗣之，吾愿毕矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148521_comment'></div>怀省泣受付嘱，戮力经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148521_comment'></div>始于庚辰，成于辛卯，伐木秦岭，徵工华阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148521_comment'></div>宏壮瑰奇，不可殚纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148521_comment'></div>非先师之理命，弟子之肯构，畴能与于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148521_comment'></div>初，怀省之伐殿材也，在深山穷谷之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148521_comment'></div>常时度木者，以僻险不取，咸谓虚弃其功，必不能致矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148521_comment'></div>会天大雨，溪水暴作，一夕吹积于山下，栾栌榱桷，以类而聚，若人力之区别然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148521_comment'></div>而寺封尚远，河流顿耗，非复一雨，不可至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148521_comment'></div>怀省乃昼夜环礼，精心祷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148521_comment'></div>果有风雷吼骇，山谷推荡漂注，集于郡南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148521_comment'></div>自非神功阴助，曷能若此之易也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148521_comment'></div>某左官商于，见托撰述，得以事迹，刻于贞石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148521_comment'></div>寺之原始，旧记存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148521_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1148521'>惟唐建都，崤函之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148521_comment'></div>惟商为郡，京辅之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148521_comment'></div>山名兔和，寺曰福寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148521_comment'></div>有天王殿，基于天祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148521_comment'></div>载祀绵远，栋欹甍漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148521_comment'></div>先师理言，弟子肯构。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148521_comment'></div>事虽人谋，材乃神授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148521_comment'></div>基耸抃鳌，山蟠灵鹫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148521_comment'></div>画拱丹楹，红栏青甃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148521_comment'></div>上方古木，南荣列岫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148521_comment'></div>梵宇增辉，睟容益茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148521_comment'></div>善绩可纪，良缘有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148521_comment'></div>刻兹贞石，用光不朽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1148521_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有序。作品：《商于驿记后序》<div id='poem_1148444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148444' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148444?labeling=true' target='_blank'>商于驿记后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148444")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148444_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148444'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148444'>有唐都长安三百年，商于为近辅，地望雄剧，亚于同、华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148444_comment'></div>其择用郡守，皆尚书名郎暨诸寺少列，入拜中丞、谏议者往往有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148444_comment'></div>自大历、贞元之后，王室微弱，李希烈陷大梁，李锜继叛，由是汴路或不通焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148444_comment'></div>吴越、江淮、荆湘、交广，郡吏上计，皇华宣风，憧憧往来，皆出是郡，盖半天下矣，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148444", 1148444, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>邮传</span>之盛，甲于他州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148444_comment'></div>会昌中，刺史吕公领是郡，新是驿，请翰林学士承旨、户部侍郎韦琮文其记，太子宾客柳公权书其石，秘书郎李商隐篆其额，皆一时之名士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148444_comment'></div>观其文不独记斯驿之盛，大率颂吕公之政耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148444_comment'></div>自唐风不竞，鼎入于梁，长安废为列藩，商于化为小郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148444_comment'></div>轺车罕至，传舍孔卑，古驿无馀，遗文空在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148444_comment'></div>运历五代，时踰百稔，痛乎吕公之政事、三贤之文翰，世莫得而闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148444_comment'></div>皇宋淳化三年，诏太子中允、始平冯公知斯郡，才大务简，居多闲暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148444_comment'></div>一日读《商于驿记》，见数字刓缺，慨然叹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148444_comment'></div>且虑碎于樵牧之手，亟命移徙，立于便厅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148444_comment'></div>四贤之风，想象在目，俾夫后之好事者模印传写，无翼而飞，自冯公始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148444_comment'></div>冯公名伉，字仲咸，尝策名于江左，归朝由同州户曹掾举进士，得御前第，某之同年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148444_comment'></div>式序始末，题于右阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148444_comment'></div>吕公记不书名，盖贵之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148444_comment'></div>又惜其今之人弗遂知矣，地僻无书，未获讨阅，俟学唐史者，补其阙文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148444_comment'></div>某年十月十九日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1148444_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。代赵普作表。作品：《谢圣惠方表》<div id='poem_1148342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148342?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢圣惠方表</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148342")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148342_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148342'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148342'>臣某言：今月日，得进奏院状报，十日准御书院劄子，奉圣旨降《太平圣惠方》第五十一卷至一百卷、并排门目录一卷，共五十一册，并用紫绫装褫，黄绢作签，仰进奏院递到西京赐臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148342_comment'></div>宸眷曲回，上方新制，《圣惠》本沾于黎庶，天慈续赐于老臣，欲令病废之躯，再获康宁之福<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148342_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下与世作范，视民如伤，穷百病之根源，选十全之方术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148342_comment'></div>爰自朱邸，逮于紫宸，垂十五年，成一百卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148342_comment'></div>救疾病疕疡之理，尽金石草木之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148342_comment'></div>莫不岐伯、秦和献其伎术，仓公、扁鹊奏其方书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148342_comment'></div>辨五声五色之微，察九窍九藏之动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148342_comment'></div>御制别加于序引，生灵咸识于指归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148342_comment'></div>笑玄宗《广济》之方，一何太简；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148342_comment'></div>继黄帝亲尝之理，千古同辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148342_comment'></div>顷以模印未全，施行不广，臣方居黄閤，首被鸿恩，常恐此生，不见全集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148342_comment'></div>岂谓陛下曲存终始，再有颁宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148342_comment'></div>窥天愈觉于高明，观海莫知其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148342", 1148342, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>涯涘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148342_comment'></div>惠过反魂之药，功深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148342", 1148342, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>起蹶</span>之针。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148342_comment'></div>进奉谢恩，恐自殊于方镇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148342_comment'></div>拜章叙感，犹窃比于台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148342_comment'></div>更延迟暮之年，实自生成之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148342_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1148342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有铭文。作品：《郑渠铭》<div id='poem_1148500' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148500' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148500?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑渠铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148500")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148500_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148500'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148500'>夫陆田者，系之于天，水旱不时，则一年之功废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148500_comment'></div>水田者，系之于人，浇溉得地，则三时之稼登矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148500_comment'></div>故伯阳曰：「水善利万物」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148500_comment'></div>《易》曰：「润万物者莫润乎水」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148500_comment'></div>其郑渠之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148500_comment'></div>秦好兴事，韩为密谋，爰命水工，以济人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148500_comment'></div>疏波决澜，滋我稼穑，溉田四万顷，利国数千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148500_comment'></div>首自泾水，尾入栎阳，无岁不丰，有地皆润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148500_comment'></div>张衡谓衣食之源，斯言当矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148500_comment'></div>噫，始欲害秦，终则利秦，韩之失耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148500_comment'></div>秦之福耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148500_comment'></div>所谓韩延数年之命，秦获万世之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148500_comment'></div>时或炎风焦砂，畏日铄石，五谷未茁，百草先萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148500_comment'></div>望岁者耋哭婴啼，祈雨者觋疲巫困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148500_comment'></div>多稼渐凋于南亩，密云空积于西郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148500_comment'></div>所以决此滂沱，沃之枯瘁，叶润根苏，英繁实积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148500_comment'></div>亩获一钟之利，国有九年之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148500_comment'></div>家给人足，岁和时丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148500_comment'></div>田有歌声，人无菜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148500_comment'></div>攘攘熙熙，不知帝力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148500_comment'></div>当是时，天下法之，故邺都溉以漳，泰山溉以汶，晋阳溉以汾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148500_comment'></div>皆非地之宜，反为田害，未若斯渠之盛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148500_comment'></div>然但能以浇溉利一方，不能以恩泽及四海，故未得长守矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148500_comment'></div>沿汉革魏，踵晋接宋，逮乎有唐，纪千祀矣，咸以浇溉为务，不以恩泽为施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148500_comment'></div>故得利于一方，失利于四海者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148500_comment'></div>我国家之御宇也，念郑国疏导之劳，察白公平治之绩，俾万国有郑渠之利，兆民同秦地之丰，惠不止于一方，恩普加于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148500_comment'></div>世有昏垫，则奠山浚川，栉风沐雨以治之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148500_comment'></div>时有枯旱，则自断爪身，为牺牲以救之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148500_comment'></div>夫如是，浇溉天下皆一渠耳，岂有间耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148500_comment'></div>与夫独利一方，何其辽哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148500_comment'></div>某薄游西都，父老谓之长熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148500_comment'></div>殊不知王者德广所及，六合皆然，但执一隅而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148500_comment'></div>因以郑渠为铭，极秦人之所炫耀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148500_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1148500'>秦以浇溉兮独利一方，秦所以亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148500_comment'></div>我以恩泽兮遍利八荒，我所以昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148500_comment'></div>三农百谷兮无灾殃，一茎六穗兮呈休祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148500_comment'></div>见万国之地兮恩瀼瀼，彼一渠之水兮徒汤汤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1148500_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有序。作品：《冯氏家集前序》<div id='poem_1148442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冯氏家集前序</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148442")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148442_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148442'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148442'>仲尼以《三百篇》为六经之首，以其本于人情而基于王化故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148442_comment'></div>然而删其义，次其章，系乎《国风》、《雅》、《颂》而已，不显乎人之氏族也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148442_comment'></div>洎卜商作序，篇之首始或著焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148442_comment'></div>若《鸱鸮》之什，直云「周公救乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148442_comment'></div>成王未知周公之志，公乃作诗以遗之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148442_comment'></div>《荡》之什又云「召穆公伤周室大坏」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148442_comment'></div>《云汉》之什亦云「仍叔美宣王」之类是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148442_comment'></div>其馀或称国人怨而作是诗也，或称大夫刺某王某公也，故诗人名氏阙者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148442_comment'></div>逮乎《离骚》则自云：「帝高阳之苗裔，朕皇考曰伯庸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148442_comment'></div>后之人故知其屈平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148442_comment'></div>且夫删诗无圣人，序诗无子夏，采诗无古官，则作诗者得不以家集自见乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148442_comment'></div>盖存其诗，人可知矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148442_comment'></div>察其人，国可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148442_comment'></div>诗之集也，岂徒然哉，亦《国风》、《雅》、《颂》之遗制耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148442_comment'></div>《冯氏家集》者，故江南常州观察使始平冯公之诗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148442_comment'></div>公讳谧，字某，其先彭城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148442_comment'></div>唐末避地，徙家寿春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148442_comment'></div>当李氏之建大号也，公之长兄某实为国相，公亦以文章器业历践清显，典掌诰命，出入台阁者十数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148442_comment'></div>然以气直道孤，尝被放弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148442_comment'></div>进退以道，识者是之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148442_comment'></div>周显德中，将平淮甸，公以起部贰卿为东都副留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148442_comment'></div>王师之傅维扬也，公督励士卒，坚守不下，竟以援兵不接，城陷而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148442_comment'></div>世宗一代真主，素闻公名，见而奇之，曰：「忠于所事，名节之士也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148442_comment'></div>擢拜太府卿，留阙下三载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148442_comment'></div>公朝请之暇，与中朝卿大夫以诗酒自乐，篇咏间发，传于人口，今首台李仆射方掌内制，与公卜邻，投分颇厚，故集中有《赠李学士》诗云：「邻居才十步，交分已三年」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148442_comment'></div>既而江南割地内附，愿比藩臣，世宗许之，因授公尚书刑部侍郎，且令持节归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148442_comment'></div>南辕之日，揆相赋诗一首，书罗巾以赠之，公答云：「罗巾挥逸翰，送我出夷门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148442_comment'></div>保惜安怀袖，流传与子孙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148442_comment'></div>其与时贤相知也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148442_comment'></div>公既归故园，慨然有挂冠之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148442_comment'></div>李氏待之益厚，不得已复授中书侍郎，历吏部尚书，遂有毗陵之拜，实以某年某月日终于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148442_comment'></div>太祖平吴之岁，金陵罹于兵火，士流书史盖煨烬矣，隶公府者，仅有存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148442_comment'></div>初，公尝以所业文集献于本国，至是亦入贡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148442_comment'></div>俄而公之诸子归于朝廷，首台犹为翰林承旨，见公之子弟，怃然有故人之念，且徵其家集焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148442_comment'></div>对以兵戈之中，丧失殆尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148442_comment'></div>相国叹息久之，且曰：「上尝以江表图籍赐于近臣，某获先君子诗一编，凡百馀章，常耽味之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148442_comment'></div>混同已来，俟得全集，今尽亡矣，子孙何观焉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148442_comment'></div>遂出而付之，因得传写于昆仲间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148442_comment'></div>公之季子、太子中允伉，字仲咸，某之同年生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148442_comment'></div>某去岁自西掖左官来商于，仲咸方佐是郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148442_comment'></div>居一日，携《家集》相示，且具道其始末焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148442_comment'></div>某再拜而受之，三复而阅之，见其词丽而不冶，气直而不讦，意远而不䛏，有讽谕，有感伤，有闲适，落落焉，铿铿焉，真一家之作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148442_comment'></div>惜乎公之文不可得而见矣，公之诗幸可得而传矣，公之志从可得而知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148442_comment'></div>匪独藏于家，亦将行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148442_comment'></div>后之人有如吴季札者，《国风》可辨也，有如韩宣子者，周礼可见也，岂徒录遗文、彰馀庆而已哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148442_comment'></div>翟公曰：「一死一生，乃见交情」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148442_comment'></div>李相之谓乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148442_comment'></div>周太史曰「不在其身，在其子孙」者，冯氏之谓乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148442_comment'></div>盛乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148442_comment'></div>公之长子僎，今泰州海陵令，次子侃，国子博士，并文学，策名于江左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148442_comment'></div>次子仪，岳州推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148442_comment'></div>次子价，渝州从事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148442_comment'></div>暨仲咸，皆登御前进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148442_comment'></div>与夫诸弟、诸孙奉箕裘，服名教，诜诜济济，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1148442", 1148442, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>驰骤</span>于好文之代，庸讵测其涯岸乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148442_comment'></div>夫如是，则公之负伟才，遇多难，入为王官，终于陪臣，位虽至而道不行矣，天其或者贻于后嗣而行于圣朝邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148442_comment'></div>君子是以知冯氏有后于宋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148442_comment'></div>某辱同年之顾，览文人之作，敢序梗概，少扬休美，庶垂于不朽焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148442_comment'></div>先是，公之孙玄度自序先集，附于篇末，故某之所述，特曰前序云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148442_comment'></div>时淳化三年正月五日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1148442_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有诗寄宋白。作品：《寄献鄜州行军司马宋侍郎（白）》<div id='poem_75145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄献鄜州行军司马宋侍郎</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75145")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75145'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75145'>钜贤如木铎，一振声盖代。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75145'>丈人文曲星，谴谪落下界。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75145'>辞源发昆崙，意尽若到海。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75145'>昔在神德朝，少秀负文彩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75145'>擢第应制举，召试拂华盖。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75145'>醉挥拔萃判，一字不复改。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75145'>传写遍都下，纸贵无可买。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75145'>一命佐著作，芸阁垂缨佩。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75145'>歌诗数千首，人口炙与鲙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75145'>志大轻俸钱，痛饮负酒债。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75145'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_75145", 75145, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>庸蜀</span>既即叙，出命玉津宰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75145'>题柱薄长卿，铭阁笑张载。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75145'>锦水清见发，峨嵋绿于黛。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75145'>物华曾不负，诗酒聊自待。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75145'>旨甘岂择禄，印绶久不解。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75145'>陶潜腰任折，莱子衣有彩。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75145'>蹉跎历四邑，尘土不可摆。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75145'>吾皇在藩邸，闻名四聪骇。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75145'>即位未浃旬，独许延英对。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75145'>相见恨已晚，欣然契嘉会。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75145'>谏官聊假道，紫微遽真拜。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75145'>制诰复西汉，碑板揭东岱。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75145'>金銮赴夜召，顾问及远大。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75145'>白麻几千纸，意出元白外。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75145'>荐贤恐不及，诱善曾无怠。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75145'>当朝自独步，晚节亦泛爱。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75145'>有别乐闻韶，无讥诗自郐。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75145'>贱子在广场，知见殊流辈。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75145'>进士数且千，驰鹜称俊迈。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_75145'>人人握灵蛇，许我珠无颣。<div id='poem_sentence_29_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75145'>超拔冠多士，权贵不得<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>碍。<div id='poem_sentence_30_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_75145'>御前中科第，阁下备寮寀。<div id='poem_sentence_31_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_75145'>讵惟师硕德，常许接佳话。<div id='poem_sentence_32_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_75145'>国朝大手笔，日夕期鼎鼐。<div id='poem_sentence_33_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_75145'>胸中泰山云，舒卷何霮䨴。<div id='poem_sentence_34_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_75145'>言下傅岩雨，蓄缩未霶霈。<div id='poem_sentence_35_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_75145'>吾道遂难行，一旦同得罪。<div id='poem_sentence_36_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_75145'>典午信冗散，贰车更狼狈。<div id='poem_sentence_37_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_75145'>商于甚僻陋，鄜畤近山塞。<div id='poem_sentence_38_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_75145'>共月踰千里，便风无一介。<div id='poem_sentence_39_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_75145'>何当遂乘桴，侍坐浮渤澥。<div id='poem_sentence_40_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_75145'>大笑引淳风，樽前一长噫。<div id='poem_sentence_41_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_75145'>今兹当委顺，自昔无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_75145", 75145, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>芥虿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_42_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_75145'>投诗助醉吟，入室生徒在。<div id='poem_sentence_43_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_75145'></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_75145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote'
