ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有诗。作品：《合崖湫》<div id='poem_75090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75090?labeling=true' target='_blank'>合崖湫</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75090")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75090_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75090'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75090'>合崖何嵌崆，湫水何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_75090", 75090, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>浺瀜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75090'>渟污暨积潦，滞泥<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：去声。）</span>不朝宗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75090'>有时见鬼怪，无人荐王公。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75090'>止可饮麋鹿，未尝产蛟龙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75090'>山氓自神之，祠祀众口同。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75090'>今春商于旱，太守职忧农。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75090'>先请境内山，熊耳有如聋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75090'>乃迎是湫水，盈乎素缶中。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75090'>州民与郡吏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_75090", 75090, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>觋女</span>杂巫童。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75090'>朝祈又夕祷，拜起虔且恭。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75090'>馨<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作爇）</span>炉复奠爵，牲币洁而丰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75090'>适与天雨会，三日势濛濛。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75090'>傅岩道丧久，咄尔贪天功。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75090'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_75090_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=992&endYear=992')">992年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有诗寄宋湜。作品：《携稚子东园刈菜，因书触目，兼寄均州宋四阁长（湜）》<div id='poem_75158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>携稚子东园刈菜因书触目兼寄均州宋四阁长</a><span class='authorDate'>（992年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年</a>　在商州任团练副使。有文。作品：《记蜂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（确年未详，当撰于谪官商州时。）</span><div id='poem_1148471' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148471' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148471?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记蜂</a><span class='authorDate'>（993年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148471")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148471_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148471'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148471'>商于兔和寺多蜂，寺僧为予言之，事甚具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148471_comment'></div>予因问蜂之有王，其状何若？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148471_comment'></div>曰：「其色青苍，差大于常蜂耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148471_comment'></div>问胡以服其众？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148471_comment'></div>曰：「王无毒，不识其它」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148471_comment'></div>问王之所处，曰：「窠之始营，必造一台，其大如栗，俗谓之王台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148471_comment'></div>王居其上，且生子于中，或三或五，不常其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148471_comment'></div>王之子尽复为王矣，岁分其族而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148471_comment'></div>山氓患蜂之分也，以棘刺关于王台，则王之子尽死而蜂不拆矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148471_comment'></div>又曰：「蜂之分也，或团如罂，或铺如扇，拥其王而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148471_comment'></div>王之所在，蜂不敢螫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148471_comment'></div>失其王则溃乱，不可向迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148471_comment'></div>凡取其蜜，不可多，多则蜂饥而不蕃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148471_comment'></div>又不可少，少则蜂堕而不作」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148471_comment'></div>予爱其王之无毒，似以德而王者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148471_comment'></div>又爱其王之子尽复为王，似一姓一君上下有定分者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148471_comment'></div>又爱其王之所在蜂不敢螫，似法令之明也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148471_comment'></div>又爱其取之得中，似什一而税也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148471_comment'></div>至于刺王之台，使绝其息，不仁之甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148471_comment'></div>故总而记云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148471_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年1月</a>　在商州任团练副使。朝廷举行南郊大礼，禹称作诗记之。作品：《南郊大礼诗十首》<div id='poem_74818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南郊大礼诗<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（993年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 id='poem_sentence_7_75146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75146'>春残尚有蝶，夏首始见蝀。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75140'>海末知难及，蕃青的不<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>过。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75022")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75022_comment'></div><div </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75025")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_75025_comment'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年3月9日</a>　王禹偁决狱曹州时，奉敕就差知单州州军事，赐钱三十五文。作品：《单州谢上表》<div id='poem_1148293' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148293?labeling=true' target='_blank'>单州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年3月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148293")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148293'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148293'>臣某言：今月九日，曹州进奏院递到敕一道，伏蒙圣慈，就差知单州军州事，兼赐钱三百贯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148293_comment'></div>祗荷宠荣，不任感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148293_comment'></div>臣已于今月十七日到本州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148293_comment'></div>乍别天庭，初临郡印，锡赉颇厚，恩荣实多<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148293_comment'></div>伏念臣本乏才名，素无门地，徒偶文明之运，滥登俊造之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148293_comment'></div>升朝便忝于谏垣，效职仍叨于纶阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148293_comment'></div>常罹罪谴，永合弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148293_comment'></div>仰穹旻而方类戴盆，遇庆赦而遽收<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148293", 1148293, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>坠履</span>，官复两省之列，职居三馆之先，俸厚于他司，班清于庶品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148293_comment'></div>固合优游仙馆，耽玩群书，常依日月之光，时贡刍荛之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148293_comment'></div>讵唯卒岁，亦可终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148293_comment'></div>昨以臣父将作监丞致仕某，足疾婴缠，年光迟暮，向因谪宦，深入穷山，常恐此生，不归故里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148293_comment'></div>自叨赴阙，颇更思乡，盖为衰羸，动多悲感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148293_comment'></div>有孙儿不识面目，有子婿未接笑言，分俸则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148293", 1148293, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>桂玉</span>不充，聚族则京师难住。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148293_comment'></div>近闻馆殿，亦有遣差，频发家书，令求外任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148293_comment'></div>遂沥事亲之恳，以干孝治之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148293_comment'></div>伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下，义在从人，恩推养老，假之符竹，惠以缗钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148293_comment'></div>居二千石之权，已为望外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148293_comment'></div>受三十万之赐，实自宸衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148293_comment'></div>感深而泪湿诏书，恋极而魂飞帝阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148293_comment'></div>即时赴郡，不日迎亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148293_comment'></div>本州以臣叨奉新恩，言承旧例，亦将歌乐，远出郊坰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148293_comment'></div>臣先以文书，并令止绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148293_comment'></div>盖以垄麦未秀，村民尚饥，当帝王旰食之时，非长吏自娱之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148293_comment'></div>庶几率下，不是近名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148293_comment'></div>况臣早忝掖垣，每亲旒扆，备熟忧勤之旨，饱闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1148293", 1148293, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>淳俭</span>之风，足以宣扬圣猷，训导属吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148293_comment'></div>此外则详评案牍，精究簿书，虽管库以必亲，庶狴牢而无枉，幸逃官谤，用报圣知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148293_comment'></div>且念亲民之官，自古所重，凡今共理，亦曰难才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148293_comment'></div>张齐贤罢自台司，止知京兆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148293_comment'></div>辛仲甫出从参政，方莅宛丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148293_comment'></div>虽小大之不同，在郡国而无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148293_comment'></div>唯臣此任，最是殊恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148293_comment'></div>十一年前，始为成武主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148293_comment'></div>九重天上，曾是制诰舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148293_comment'></div>望旧宫而虽隔云泥，过故邑而亦为荣遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148293_comment'></div>所恨者，忽离侍从，莫遂朝辞，实非臣心，轻去辇毂，但以臣父苦念丘樊，慰怀土之心，晨昏有遂，望拱辰之列，涕泗无从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148293_comment'></div>伏惟陛下少减焦劳，俯加颐养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148293_comment'></div>至于尧水汤旱，历数之常文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148293_comment'></div>丹浦青丘，征伐之彝事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148293_comment'></div>伫见斩继迁于独柳，送蜀寇于槛车，示天下不用干戈，驱域中咸归富寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148293_comment'></div>然后鸣銮日观，降禅云亭，追踪于七十二君，探策而万八千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148293_comment'></div>此际臣之本郡，实有行宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148293_comment'></div>傥得导引皇舆，扫除御路，撰礼天之书册，虽匪职司，对盛德之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1148293", 1148293, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>形容</span>，敢忘歌颂？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148293_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1148293_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
单县（单父）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='56a83d091a7241c3819195fd7a9940ce_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("56a83d091a7241c3819195fd7a9940ce");'><span id='56a83d091a7241c3819195fd7a9940ce_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=994')">993-994年</a>，40-41岁</div><div id='56a83d091a7241c3819195fd7a9940ce' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=994&endYear=994')">994年3月17日</a>　抵单州任，郡人多出城迎接，禹称深为感动，赋诗。作品：《初上单州有作》<div id='poem_74759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初上单州有作</a><span class='authorDate'>（994年3月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74759")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74759_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74759'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74759'>旧官休念直承明，就养虽能系宦情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74759'>蓝绶昔年为短簿，䌽衣今日是专城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74759'>妓人半在登楼看，亲老初来满郡迎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74759'>慢<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作漫）</span>逐板舆张皂盖，平生唯有此时荣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74759'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74759_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=993&endYear=993')">993年</a>　在单州任知单州军州事。有文。作品：《献讨李继迁便宜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（在单州作。）</span><div id='poem_1148368' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148368' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148368?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论讨李继迁便宜奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳化五年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148368")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148368_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148368'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148368'>伏睹国家出偏师讨李继迁，臣有便宜，比欲论奏，忽奉差使，仍放朝辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148368_comment'></div>奔命以来，在公少暇，必料天威大振，逆竖已擒，尚恐稽诛，敢伸前志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148368_comment'></div>臣淳化二年任商州团练副使之日，故团练使翟守素两曾夏州驻泊，因与臣同看报状，伏见李继迁进奉事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148368_comment'></div>是时，臣离阙下才是数月，守素因问臣云：「继迁几时有银州观察使之命」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148368_comment'></div>臣遂言七月间在中书当直，曾除此官，兼赐改姓名，恩渥优异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148368_comment'></div>守素言：「此贼未是由衷，必恐终怀反侧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148368_comment'></div>又言：「继迁曾被左右暗箭射之，横贯于鼻，偶然不死，今面上疮痕尚存」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148368_comment'></div>臣自闻此语，常贮于心，以为此贼不必劳力而诛，自可用计而取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148368_comment'></div>况讨伐之义，权变为先，引古證今，取则不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148368_comment'></div>汉光武时，彭宠据有渔阳，攻伐未下，家奴窃发肘腋，斩首而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148368_comment'></div>唐元和中，李师道父子盗据全齐四五十年，崛强难制，其裨将刘寤倒戈攻城，遂至族灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148368_comment'></div>近代梁太祖时，刘知俊兄弟以同州叛入李茂贞，梁祖下诏曰：「有捉得知俊者，赏钱一万贯，与节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148368_comment'></div>得其弟者，赏钱五千贯，与刺史」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148368_comment'></div>一月之间，生擒其弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148368_comment'></div>谚曰：「重赏之下，必有勇夫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148368_comment'></div>兵法曰：「使贪使愚」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148368_comment'></div>言贪者利其财，愚者不计其死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148368_comment'></div>今继迁本是匹夫，偷生假息，苦无财利，以结人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148368_comment'></div>伏望圣慈察臣愚见，明数罪恶，晓谕蕃戎及部下逼胁之徒，迁上骁雄之士，多署赏赐，高与官资，但如梁太祖捉刘知俊兄弟，信赏必行，使左右生心，蕃戎并力，继迁身首，不枭即擒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148368_comment'></div>恐小蕃力所不加，则少以官军应接，何必苦烦睿略，多举王师，且自陕以西，岁非大稔，加之馈饷，转恐凋残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148368_comment'></div>河北虽是丰登，须修边备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148368_comment'></div>况此贼通连北敌，朝廷具知，周亚夫所谓「击东南而备西北」，正在此时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148368_comment'></div>不可忿兹小竖，弗顾远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148368_comment'></div>臣本自草莱，擢居台阁，虽罹谴放，寻沐甄收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148368_comment'></div>每欲酬恩，恨无死所，智小谋大，惟俟诛夷，报国捐躯，岂复顾虑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1148368_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
滁州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f9be990abce0423d8a9206ed015ffbef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f9be990abce0423d8a9206ed015ffbef");'><span id='f9be990abce0423d8a9206ed015ffbef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=996')">995-996年</a>，42-43岁</div><div id='f9be990abce0423d8a9206ed015ffbef' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年6月3日</a>　抵滁州，上表述及其本人任翰林学士期间受谤议缘由。作品：《滁州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（夏秋间作。）</span><div id='poem_1148296' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148296' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148296?labeling=true' target='_blank'>滁州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年6月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148296")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148296'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148296'>臣某言：奉五月九日制命，伏蒙圣慈，特授臣守尚书工部郎中、知滁州军州事，已于六月三日到本州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148296_comment'></div>罢直禁中，临民淮上，虽离近侍，犹忝正郎，省己戴恩，既荣且惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148296_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣早将贱迹，误受圣知，进身不自于他人，立节惟遵于直道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148296_comment'></div>优游两制，出处八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148296_comment'></div>今春召自西垣，入叨内署，既在深严之地，仍当繁剧之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148296_comment'></div>虽积兢虞，终无补报，所宜远贬，以肃具寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148296_comment'></div>伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下曲念遭逢，俯存终始，止罢玉堂之职，仍迁粉署之资，委以专城，置于近地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148296_comment'></div>沿流数日，登陆三程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148296_comment'></div>诸县丰登，苦无公事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148296_comment'></div>一家饱煖，共荷君恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148296_comment'></div>处之一生，实为万足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148296_comment'></div>然而翰林学士，朝廷近臣，陛下登位已来，御前放人之后，从吕蒙正而下拜此职者，止有八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148296_comment'></div>臣最孤寒，亦预其数，言于圣选，不为不精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148296_comment'></div>数月之间，忽然罢去，众情尚或惊骇，微臣岂不忧惶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148296_comment'></div>且臣在内庭一百日间，五十夜次当宿直，白日又在银台通进司、审官院、封駮司勾当公事，与宋湜、吕祐之阅视天下奏章，审省国家诏命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148296_comment'></div>凡干利害，知无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148296_comment'></div>三日一到私家，归来已是薄暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148296_comment'></div>先臣灵筵在寝，骨肉衰绖满身，纵有交朋，无暇接见，不知谤议，自何而兴？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148296_comment'></div>臣拜命已来，通宵自省，恐是臣所赁官屋，在高怀德宅中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148296_comment'></div>一昨开宝皇后权厝之时，便欲移出，未有去处，甚不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148296", 1148296, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>遑宁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148296_comment'></div>寻曾指约公人，不令呵喝，切恐贵僧出入，中使往还，相逢之间，难为顾揖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148296_comment'></div>接旧制，自左右正言已上，谓之供奉官，街衢之间，除宰相外无所回避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148296_comment'></div>此盖贾谊所谓「人君如堂，人臣如陛，陛高则堂高」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148296_comment'></div>况臣头有重戴，身被<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1148296", 1148296, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>朝章</span>，所守者国之礼容，即不是臣之气势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148296_comment'></div>因兹谢表，敢达危诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148296_comment'></div>况臣粗有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1148296", 1148296, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>操修</span>，素非轻易，心常知于止足，性每疾于回邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148296_comment'></div>位非其人，诱之以利而不往；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148296_comment'></div>事匪合道，逼之以死而不随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148296_comment'></div>唯有上天，鉴臣此志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148296_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1148296", 1148296, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>伏望</span>陛下思直木先伐之义，考众恶必察之言，曲与保全，俾伸诚节，则孤寒幸甚，儒墨知归，在于小臣，有何不足？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148296_comment'></div>今则隋岸千里，尧天九重，微躯或遂于生还，劲节尚期于死所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148296_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1148296'></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1148296_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年5月9日</a>　在滁州任知州。有表。作品：《谢衣袄表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（夏秋间作。）</span><div id='poem_1148295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢衣袄表</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年5月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148295")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148295'>臣某言：今月十七日，供奉官、閤门祗候景元到州，伏奉圣恩，赐臣敕书一道、紫欹正绵旋襕一领者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148295_comment'></div>臣当时与官吏军员将校等望阙谢恩讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148295_comment'></div>远降王人，遍颁时服，捧如纶而增惧，对挟纩以知荣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148295_comment'></div>伏念臣素乏艺文，猥尘清近，虽罢金銮之职，尚分铜虎之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148295_comment'></div>而自移理藩宣，始踰旬浃，莫著裤襦之咏，空惭凋瘵之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148295_comment'></div>此者伏遇尊号皇帝陛下政在宵衣，恩加露冕，特有祁寒之赐，俾无卒岁之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148295_comment'></div>开缄并集于荣光，宣诏更增于和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148295_comment'></div>饰之瑞兽，空倾率舞之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148295_comment'></div>徵乃维鹈，难免彼己之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148295_comment'></div>伏限权司郡事，不获躬拜阙庭，臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1148295_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年4月</a>　在滁州任知州。有序送江翌黄。作品：《送江翌黄序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（六月作。）</span><div id='poem_1148423' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148423' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148423?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送江翊黄序</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148423")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148423_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148423'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148423'>仆直翰林时，进士钱易数以文相售，其中往往有《赠江翊黄诗》，怪其名异于常所谓进士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148423_comment'></div>今京西转运、太常姚丞铉赴职时来与余别，盛言生之才，用是于生之名甚熟，不知果如何人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148423_comment'></div>夏六月，自内庭谪官滁上，下车数日，生缝掖而见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148423_comment'></div>观其风骨秀朗，言论和雅，则钱之交、姚之荐，斯得之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148423_comment'></div>又继之以文，好古近道，趣向不俗，修之不已，可为闻人，况一第哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148423_comment'></div>遽来告行，书此为送。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1148423_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年7月</a>　在滁州任知州。闽人郑褒徒步赴滁上求谒，王禹偁爱其才，力加奖掖，有书。作品：《答郑褒书》<div id='poem_1148381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答郑褒书</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148381")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148381'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148381'>某白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148381_comment'></div>秀才郑生足下：前年八月，仆自长洲令徵拜右正言、直史馆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148381_comment'></div>既满岁，迁左司谏、知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148381_comment'></div>天下举人日以文凑吾门，其中杰出群萃者，得富春孙何、济阳丁谓而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148381_comment'></div>吾尝以其文誇大于宰执公卿间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148381_comment'></div>有业荒而行悖者，既疾孙何、丁谓之才，又忿吾之无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148381", 1148381, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>曲誉</span>也，聚而造谤焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148381_comment'></div>以吾平居议论，常道浮图之蠹人者，乃殆为吾《沙汰释氏疏》，盛于髡褐之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148381_comment'></div>又云孙何著论以无佛，京城钜僧，侧目尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148381_comment'></div>未几，吾坐事贬官商洛，谤者得志，喉如响而舌益滑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148381_comment'></div>明年，孙、丁俱取高第；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148381_comment'></div>又明年，吾被召赴阙，而谤燄稍衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148381_comment'></div>今春，吾自西掖召拜翰林学士，天子宠遇任委，过于往时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148381_comment'></div>而僧之不乐吾者，复以前事啅吠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148381_comment'></div>吾以为无能为也，在内庭果百日而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148381_comment'></div>然迁秩临民，恩也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148381_comment'></div>去近侍，治小郡，罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148381_comment'></div>将理装之官，有进士林介者，食于吾家七年矣，私谓吾曰：「今兹诏罢贡举，而足下出郡，进士皆欲疾走滁上，以文求知」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148381_comment'></div>吾谓介曰：「为吾谢诸公，慎勿来滁上，吾不复议进士之臧否以贾谤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148381_comment'></div>今携文而来者，吾悉曰韩、柳也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148381_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1148381", 1148381, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>贽赋</span>而来者，悉曰裴、李也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148381_comment'></div>赍诗而来者，悉曰陈、杜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148381_comment'></div>复加礼焉，谤则弭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148381_comment'></div>区区者皆是，何其韩、柳、裴、李、陈、杜之多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148381_comment'></div>且吾学圣人之道，受明主之知，三掌制诰，一入翰林，以文章负天下之望，何其多可易与，胸中混混乎无分别之若是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148381_comment'></div>不如绝之可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148381_comment'></div>介亦以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148381_comment'></div>既登舟，中夕思之，心又甚悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148381_comment'></div>夫士君子立身行道，是是而非非，造次颠沛，不易其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148381_comment'></div>吾以一失职而不交贤士，斯自弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148381_comment'></div>下车以来，有进士皆接焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148381_comment'></div>数日前得生书读之，因自贺曰：「向如前谋，则失郑矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148381_comment'></div>洎与生语，见生言讷而貌庄，气和而心谨，吾益自喜于得生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148381_comment'></div>退而阅其文句，辞甚简，理甚正，虽数千百言，无一字冗长，真得古人述作之旨耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148381_comment'></div>会吾疡生颐颔，中心无憀，未遑与生欸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148381_comment'></div>生复贻书抵吾，览其言，可谓直而不肆者也，且出孙氏昆仲在陕郊时送生二序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148381_comment'></div>孙之为人，刚果公正，未尝轻许可人，序生之文，情至而义切，非生不能致其然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148381_comment'></div>是生之道与孙、丁同，而命未偶矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148381_comment'></div>吾又欲生谒滁之僚属，生固拒吾曰：「某数千里来，所求见者，执事耳，诣他人非本志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148381_comment'></div>又问生之抵滁，舟邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148381_comment'></div>乘邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148381_comment'></div>生曰：「徒步而至」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148381_comment'></div>岂非不陨穫于贫贱者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148381_comment'></div>又非谋道不谋食者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148381_comment'></div>以生之文高行修之如此，而患无所立，吾不信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148381_comment'></div>生宜爱其身而有待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148381_comment'></div>生之书首引孙、丁之事，故吾述其始末，文不觉繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148381_comment'></div>生持吾文而往，道如孙、丁者，示之可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148381_comment'></div>茍非其人，不独厚吾之谤也，又将窒生之进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148381_comment'></div>生志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148381_comment'></div>七月三十日，尚书工部郎中、典滁阳郡王某顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1148381_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年7月</a>　在滁州任知州。王禹偁访唐李德裕在滁州刺史任内遗迹未得，而郡有北楼，通刺史公署，禹称登眺终日，作诗以见志。作品：《北楼感事》<div id='poem_75081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75081' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75081?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北楼感事</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75081")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75081_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75081'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75081'>北楼出林杪，登览开病姿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75081'>旁带滁州城，雉堞何逶迤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75081'>下入刺史宅，却临统军池<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：孟统军凿小池，在楼下。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75081'>伊予翰林客，失职方在兹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75081'>两衙簿领外，尽日吟望时。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75081'>晚窗度急雨，夏木交繁枝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75081'>淮南气候殊，经秋啭黄鹂。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75081'>檐前有山果，采掇亦甘滋。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75081'>樽中有官酝，倾酌任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_75081", 75081, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>醇醨</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75081'>忘机得真趣，怀古生远思。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75081'>念<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>昔李太尉，落落邦家基。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75081'>下笔到西汉，料兵如六奇。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75081'>谪官来此郡，郁郁持一麾。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75081'>尝作怀嵩楼，记文悲盛衰。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75081'>甚得进退理，深明祸福机。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75081'>未几再入用，斯言忽如遗。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75081'>君恩匪胶柱，天殃若影随。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75081'>六月万里行，炎荒竟不归。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75081'>功成又名遂，不退将安之。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75081'>姑以人事较，勿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>凭天命推。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75081'>矧予草泽士，被褐复羹藜。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75081'>谬因弄文翰，八载侍丹墀。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75081'>三入承明卢，古人期并驰。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75081'>玉堂百日罢，所累非文词。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75081'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_75081", 75081, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>强仕</span>未为老，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_75081", 75081, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>望郎</span>不为卑。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75081'>淮边永阳郡，人物自熙熙。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75081'>费用量所入，丰约从其宜。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75081'>一妻本糟糠，不识金翠施。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75081'>三男无庶孽，讵爱纨绮赀。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_75081'>甘贫绝诛求，易退<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>无羁縻。<div id='poem_sentence_29_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75081'>五十拟归耕，何必悬车期。<div id='poem_sentence_30_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_75081'>且予望卫公，云龙与山麋。<div id='poem_sentence_31_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_75081'>唐贤昔际遇，文雅道光辉。<div id='poem_sentence_32_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_75081'>进士取将相，易于俯拾棋。<div id='poem_sentence_33_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_75081'>自从五代来，素风已陵迟。<div id='poem_sentence_34_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_75081'>干戈为政事，茅土输健儿。<div id='poem_sentence_35_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_75081'>儒冠筮仕者，仅免寒与饥。<div id='poem_sentence_36_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_75081'>至今明圣代，此风犹未移。<div id='poem_sentence_37_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_75081'>自无经济术，乌用碌碌为。<div id='poem_sentence_38_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_75081'>归欤复归欤，无忘北楼诗。<div id='poem_sentence_39_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_75081'></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_75081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75081'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_75081_0'>⑴ 原作今，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_75081_0'>⑵ 原作忽，据孙本、经锄堂本、四库本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_75081_0'>⑶ 原作退易，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本乙</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75081_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年10月</a>　在滁州任知州。秋冬间，撰文，以为治民之根本在于解决土地问题。作品：《答黄宗旦书之二》<div id='poem_1148378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答黄宗旦书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（995年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148378")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148378'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148378'>秀才足下：走仆枉书，惠顾迁客，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148378_comment'></div>且观来书之旨，似求知于某者，何其误也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148378_comment'></div>又以某尝位于朝，与进士孙何、丁谓交，二子皆得高第，谓某能知人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148378_comment'></div>复引「人不易知，知人则哲」之义，非知言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148378_comment'></div>夫知人之道，惟帝时难，敢轻议哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148378_comment'></div>某向之知二子之文，业文者知之，非某特知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148378_comment'></div>是二子取高第者，命也，某何力之有焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148378_comment'></div>今足下之文，二子之文也，天下将知之矣，岂止某之一人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148378_comment'></div>必曰立朝廷、司文翰者，能以心之公私，轻重于后进间，则非某之所闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148378_comment'></div>杜紫微曰：古之圣贤，业大事钜，道行则不肖惧，道不行则不肖喜，故有不公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148378_comment'></div>今进士者，业微事细，如其成名不肖，未有所喜惧，何不公邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148378_comment'></div>足下诚能知求名者文也，成名者命也，又何求乎某之知邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148378_comment'></div>又何后乎二子之名邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148378_comment'></div>某白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1148378_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年7月</a>　在滁州任知州。有表。作品：《贺册皇太子表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（撰于八月底。）</span><div id='poem_1148300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺册皇太子表</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148300")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148300'>臣某言：今月二十八日，降到赦书一道，皇太子正位储宫，大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148300_comment'></div>臣当时集军州官吏、僧道、百姓宣读施行讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148300_comment'></div>礼崇储副，泽被华夷，凡在含生，罔不同庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148300_comment'></div>臣闻帝王之道，步骤殊途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148300_comment'></div>夏后所以传家，垂诸古典，姬昌之为世子，载于《礼》经，皆所以定人心而固国本矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148300_comment'></div>由三代而下，实百王不刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148300_comment'></div>洎乎唐室豆分，梁朝草创，庄宗则席未遑暖，明宗则日不暇给，联绵五姓，战伐百年，重念春坊，遂成阙典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148300_comment'></div>我太祖神德皇帝揖让神器，司牧黎元，择上圣之才，副下民之望，人神允属，狱讼攸归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148300_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，传自日兄，升为天子，德化威伏，垂二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148300_comment'></div>文物声明，尽合经义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148300_comment'></div>礼乐征伐，不自诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148300_comment'></div>始求主鬯之亲，用正副君之位，斯孟轲所谓「天与贤则与贤，天与子则与子」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148300_comment'></div>伏以皇太子生知忠孝，性禀温文，允符当璧之祥，宜正抚军之重，筮龟叶吉，简册增辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148300_comment'></div>而又举荐雷之声，因而作解；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148300_comment'></div>导少海之润，用以涤瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148300_comment'></div>必由旧章，降此大赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148300_comment'></div>纶綍四出，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148300", 1148300, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>狴牢</span>一空，率土普天，不胜庆幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148300_comment'></div>臣出官禁署，承乏方州，目不睹朝廷之仪，手不当文翰之职，虽违素望，实偶昌朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148300_comment'></div>伏限郡政，不获奔诣天阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148300_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年8月</a>　在滁州任知州。有笺。作品：《贺皇太子笺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（撰于八月底。）</span><div id='poem_1148359' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148359' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148359?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺皇太子笺</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148359")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148359_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148359'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148359'>某言：今月日降到赦书一道，皇太子殿下光膺册命，正位储宫，凡在普天，不胜大幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148359_comment'></div>伏以三代旧章，百年坠典，举兹盛礼，允属昌朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148359_comment'></div>伏惟殿下禀气涂山，诞祥甲观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148359_comment'></div>蕴间平之茂德，早冠亲贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148359_comment'></div>迈启诵之多才，式当储副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148359_comment'></div>既协人神之望，永隆邦国之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148359_comment'></div>某谬忝专城，尝叨内署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148359_comment'></div>正衙宣册，陪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148359", 1148359, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>鸳序</span>以无阶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148359_comment'></div>僻郡效官，拜龙楼而尚远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148359_comment'></div>无任抃跃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1148359_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年9月</a>　在滁州任知州。有碑文。作品：《滁州全椒县宝林寺重修大殿碑及后序》<div id='poem_1148523' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148523' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148523?labeling=true' target='_blank'>滁州全椒县宝林寺重修大殿碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148523")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148523_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148523'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148523'>寺名花山，县牒所传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148523_comment'></div>坏于会昌，缁徒散亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148523_comment'></div>兴于大中，层构崇崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148523_comment'></div>显德沙汰，兹名独在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148523_comment'></div>聚并阖县，凡十六院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148523_comment'></div>我皇御极，始赐今额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148523_comment'></div>嘉号宝林，用光布金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148523_comment'></div>有庄隶属，桑柔土沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148523_comment'></div>岁取稼穑，以供香积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148523_comment'></div>靡夏靡冬，僧来憧憧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148523_comment'></div>大殿岁久，基倾柱朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148523_comment'></div>有僧德缘，革而修焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148523_comment'></div>录事张戭，同兹大愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148523_comment'></div>化于邑郭，施及村落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148523_comment'></div>得钱百万，吾事斯办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148523_comment'></div>全椒林麓，材惟朴樕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148523_comment'></div>西走山阳，号大云仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148523_comment'></div>伐木编桴，栋梁栾栌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148523_comment'></div>荡波而来，厥惟良材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148523_comment'></div>其谁运斧，维曾维吕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148523_comment'></div>翚飞翼张，望之堂堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148523_comment'></div>既成栋宇，䌽绘无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148523_comment'></div>有晓贞师，先师从依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148523_comment'></div>及钵遗留，愿舍而修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148523_comment'></div>乃备丹雘，晶荧交错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148523_comment'></div>殿堂肯构，佛事犹陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148523_comment'></div>戭复化率，能始能卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148523_comment'></div>塑释迦像，金容可仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148523_comment'></div>菩萨善神，各三其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148523_comment'></div>对侍拱立，金碧耀熠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148523_comment'></div>矢谟雍熙，早夜孜孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148523_comment'></div>僝功淳化，檐楹秺秺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148523_comment'></div>令佐经营，曰壳曰祯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148523_comment'></div>政平讼息，兹出馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148523_comment'></div>有范百宗，成名泽宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148523_comment'></div>为贼曹掾，旧识吾面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148523_comment'></div>聿来诣郡，再拜恭恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148523_comment'></div>曰公词臣，久司帝纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148523_comment'></div>兹殿之碑，非公而谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148523_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1148523", 1148523, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>健毫</span>不抽，实寺之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148523_comment'></div>顾其勤勤，敢吝斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148523_comment'></div>直书事实，辞句<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1148523", 1148523, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>鲁质</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148523_comment'></div>庶几胜缘，垂乎亿年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148523_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1148523_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年10月</a>　在滁州任知州。撰有《答张扶书》，揭示其文学主张。<div id='poem_1148382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答张扶书</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148382")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148382'>秀才张生足下：仆之登第也，与子之兄为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148382", 1148382, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>同恩生</span>，故仆兄事子之兄，父事子之父，子之于仆亦弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148382_comment'></div>子又携文致书，问道于我，虽他人宜有答也，况子之于我哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148382_comment'></div>然仆顷尝为长洲令，因病起抄书，得目疾，不喜视书，书不读数年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148382_comment'></div>虽强之，少顷必息其目，不数日不能竟一卷，用是见仆道益荒而文益衰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148382_comment'></div>又四年之中，再为谪吏，顿挫摧辱，殆无生意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148382_comment'></div>以私家衣食之累，未即引去，黾勉于簿书间，以度<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148382", 1148382, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>朝夕</span>，尚有意讲道而评文乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148382_comment'></div>为子力读十数章，茫然难得其句，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148382", 1148382, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>昧然</span>难见其义，可谓好大而不同俗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148382_comment'></div>夫文，传道而明心也，古圣人不得已而为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148382_comment'></div>且人能一乎心，至乎道，修身则无咎，事君则有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148382_comment'></div>及其无位也，惧乎心之所有不得明乎外，道之所畜不得传乎后，于是乎有言焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148382_comment'></div>又惧乎言之易泯也，于是乎有文焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148382_comment'></div>信哉，不得已而为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148382_comment'></div>既不得已而为之，又欲乎句之难道邪，又欲乎义之难晓邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148382_comment'></div>必不然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148382_comment'></div>请以六经明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148382_comment'></div>《诗》三百篇，皆俪其句，谐其音，可以播管弦，荐宗庙，子之所熟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148382_comment'></div>《书》者，上古之书，二帝三王之世之文也，言古文者无出于此，则曰：「惠迪吉，从逆凶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148382_comment'></div>又曰：「德日新，万邦惟怀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148382_comment'></div>志自满，九族乃离」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148382_comment'></div>在《礼·儒行》者，夫子之文也，则曰「衣冠中，动作慎，大让如慢，小让如伪」云云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148382_comment'></div>在《乐》则曰：「鼓无当于五声，五声不得不和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148382_comment'></div>水无当于五色，五色不得不彰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148382_comment'></div>在《春秋》则全以属辞比事为教，不可备引焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148382_comment'></div>在《易》曰：「乾道成男，坤道成女，日月运行，一寒一暑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148382_comment'></div>夫岂句之难道邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148382_comment'></div>夫岂义之难晓邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148382_comment'></div>今为文而舍六经，又何法焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148382_comment'></div>若弟取其《书》之所谓「吊由灵」，《易》之所谓「朋合簪」者，模其语而谓之古，亦文之弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148382_comment'></div>近世为古文之主者，韩吏部而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148382_comment'></div>吾观吏部之文，未始句之难道也，未始义之难晓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148382_comment'></div>其间称樊宗师之文「必出于己，不袭蹈前人一言一句」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148382_comment'></div>又称薛逢为文「以不同俗为主」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148382_comment'></div>然樊、薛之文不行于世，吏部之文与六籍共尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148382_comment'></div>此盖吏部诲人不倦，进二子以劝学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148382_comment'></div>故吏部曰：「吾不师今，不师古，不师难，不师易，不师多，不师少，惟师是尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148382_comment'></div>今子年少志专，雅识古道，又其文不背经旨，甚可嘉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148382_comment'></div>姑能远师六经，近师吏部，使句之易道，义之易晓，又辅之以学，助之以气，吾将见子以文显于时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148382_comment'></div>某顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1148382_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年11月</a>　在滁州任知州。张扶致书诘难，禹称再答之。作品：《再答张扶书》<div id='poem_1148383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再答张扶书</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148383")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148383'>秀才张生足下：仆之前书，欲生之文句易道，义易晓，遂引六经、韩文以为證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148383_comment'></div>生继为书启，谓扬雄以文比天地，而下云云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148383_comment'></div>甚乎哉，子之笃于道而好于古者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148383_comment'></div>仆为子条辨之，庶知仆之用心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148383_comment'></div>子之所谓扬雄以文比天地，不当使人易度易测者，仆以为扬雄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148383", 1148383, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>自大</span>之辞也，非格言也，不可取而为法矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148383_comment'></div>夫天地，易简者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148383_comment'></div>测天者知刚健不息而行四时，测地者知含弘光大而生万物，天地毕矣，何难<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148383", 1148383, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>测度</span>哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148383_comment'></div>若较其寻尺广袤而后谓之尽，则天地一器也，安得言其广大乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148383_comment'></div>且雄之《太玄》，准《易》也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148383_comment'></div>《易》之道，圣人演之，贤人注之，列于六经，悬为学科，其义甚明而可晓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148383_comment'></div>雄之《太玄》，既不用于当时，又不行于后代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148383_comment'></div>谓雄死以来，世无文王、周、孔，则信然矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148383_comment'></div>谓雄之文过于伏羲，吾不信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148383_comment'></div>仆谓雄之《太玄》乃空文尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148383_comment'></div>今子欲举进士而以文比《太玄》，仆未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148383_comment'></div>子又谓六经之文语艰而义奥者十二三，易道而易晓者十七八，其艰奥者，非故为之语，当然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148383_comment'></div>今子之文则不然，凡三十篇，语皆迂而艰也，义皆昧而奥也，岂子之文也过于六籍邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148383_comment'></div>若犹未也，子其择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148383_comment'></div>子谓韩吏部曰「仆之为文，意中以为好者，人必以为恶焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148383_comment'></div>或时应事作俗下文字，下笔令人惭，及示人，人即以为好」者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148383_comment'></div>此盖唐初之文，有六朝淫风，有四子艳格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148383_comment'></div>至贞元、元和间，吏部首唱古道，人未之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148383_comment'></div>故吏部意中自是而人能是之者百不一二，下笔自惭而人是之者十有八九，故吏部有是叹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148383_comment'></div>今吏部自是者著之于集矣，自惭者弃之无遗矣，仆独意《祭裴少卿文》在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148383_comment'></div>其略云：「儋石之储，不供于私室；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148383_comment'></div>方丈之食，每盛于宾筵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148383_comment'></div>此必吏部自惭而当时人好之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148383_comment'></div>今之世亦然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148383_comment'></div>子著书立言，师吏部之集可矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148383_comment'></div>应事作俗，取《祭裴文》可矣，夫何惑焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148383_comment'></div>又谓汉朝人莫不能文，独司马相如、刘向、扬雄为之最，是谓功用深，其文名远者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148383_comment'></div>数子之文，班固取之列于《汉书》，若相如《上林赋》、《喻蜀》、《封禅文》，刘向《谏山陵》，扬雄《议边事》，皆子之所见也，曷尝语艰而义奥乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148383_comment'></div>谓功用深者，取其理之当尔，非语迂义暗而谓之功用也，生其志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148383_comment'></div>向有江翊黄者，自谓好古，仆见其文义尚浅，故答之曰：「修之不已，则为闻人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148383_comment'></div>今子希慕高远，欲专以绝俗为主，故仆欲子之文句易道、义易晓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148383_comment'></div>孔子曰：「由也兼人，故退之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148383_comment'></div>求也不及，故进之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148383_comment'></div>亦仆之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148383_comment'></div>某顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1148383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年</a>　在滁州任知州。濮州雷泽人高弁以文谒王禹偁，禹称奇之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年</a>　在滁州任知州。有表。作品：《贺正表》<div id='poem_1148288' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148288' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148288?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺正表</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148288")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148288_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148288'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148288'>臣某言：伏以元正首祚，景福惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148288_comment'></div>数蓂荚于尧阶，初生一叶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148288_comment'></div>献椒花于汉殿，齐列千官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148288_comment'></div>式彰负扆之尊，大祝如山之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148288_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下业隆三代，道冠百王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148288_comment'></div>和玉烛以授时，玄功克著；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148288_comment'></div>振金铃而徇路，春令爰行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148288_comment'></div>当三元资始之期，见万国会同之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148288_comment'></div>方物充庭而麇至，上公献寿以凫趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148288_comment'></div>日照冕旒，睹垂衣之肃穆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148288_comment'></div>风和象魏，陈悬法之威仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148288_comment'></div>讵遗率土之滨，同乐履端之候，膺乾纳祐，与天齐休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148288_comment'></div>臣滥奉朝恩，叨权郡印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148288_comment'></div>思预华封之祝，方远彤庭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148288_comment'></div>新颁羲氏之书，空惊素发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148288_comment'></div>但荷发生之德，莫酬煦育之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148288_comment'></div>臣无任祝圣戴天抃蹈欢呼之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1148288_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年</a>　在滁州任知州。有诗寄孙何、丁谓。作品：《书怀，简孙何丁谓》<div id='poem_74686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_2_74686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74686'>举人自代何由得，归去东皋种黍田。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74686'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74686_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年</a>　在滁州任知州。有诗。作品：《滁州官舍二首》《堂前井》《荒亭晚坐》《身世》《琅琊山》《为郡》《自笑》《自问》《夜长》《与嘉祐同游宝应寺》《迂儒》《花鹿》《今冬》《滁上谪居四首》<div id='poem_74970' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74970' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74970?labeling=true' target='_blank'>滁州官舍<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（995年）</span><span class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74766?labeling=true' target='_blank'>身世</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_74766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74766'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74766'>淮边为小郡，身世复何云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74766'>妻病无医药，儿痴废典坟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75114'>汉文亦禁酒，患在糜人谷。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75114'>自从孝武来，用度常不足。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75114'>古今事相倍，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_75114", 75114, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>帝皇</span>道难复。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75114'>吾无奈尔何，更尽杯中渌。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_75135_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75135'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75135'>元精育万汇，羽族何茫茫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75135'>为怪有鸱鸮，为瑞称凤皇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75135'>又从筮仕来，五年居帝乡。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75135'>孺人泣我右，稚子啼我傍。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75135'>嗟嗟汉贾谊，年少谪南荒。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75135'>故有鵩鸟赋，倚伏理甚详。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75135'>郇公暨邺侯，放逐同一邦。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75135_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 原作可，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_75135_0'>⑵ 自注：天宝中，韦郇公谪守蕲州，时李邺侯亦以处士放逐，因夜饮，闻鸱鸮，韦公泣下，李侯曰：此鸟人以为恶，其声可听。乃令坐客有不闻此声者，罚以大白。由是听之不厌。</div></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=995&endYear=995')">995年</a>　在滁州任知州。有诗。作品：《眼疾》《题滁州怀嵩楼》<div id='poem_74646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74646' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74646?labeling=true' target='_blank'>眼疾</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74646")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_74646_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74646'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74646'>古人功业甘无分，往圣诗书合有缘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74646'>何事病来花满眼，祇将简策枕头眠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74646'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74646_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74665' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74665' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74665?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题滁州怀嵩楼<span class='inlineComment2'>（唐李卫公守滁州日建）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（995年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74665")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_74665_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74665'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74665'>昔是优贤地，今为省过州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74665_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74665'>非贤亦非过，醉卧怀嵩楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74665_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74665'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74665_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年1月</a>　在滁州任知州。朝廷合祭天地于圜丘，大赦，禹称撰贺文。作品：《贺南郊大赦表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（一月下旬作。）</span><div id='poem_1148299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺南郊大赦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148299")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148299'>臣某言：今月二十日，降到赦书一道，南郊礼毕大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148299_comment'></div>臣当时集军州官吏、百姓、僧道宣读施行讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148299_comment'></div>严父配天，王者之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148299", 1148299, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>达孝</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148299_comment'></div>眚灾肆赦，有国之大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148299_comment'></div>凡在群生，罔不同庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148299_comment'></div>臣闻有虞尚乎德，祖颛顼而宗尧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148299_comment'></div>周人重其先，禘帝喾而郊稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148299_comment'></div>沿革之文则异，祠祀之义斯同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148299_comment'></div>率由旧章，兹曰大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148299_comment'></div>虽天子必有尊也，非圣人孰能行之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148299_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148299", 1148299, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>司牧</span>黎元，敦崇孝治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148299_comment'></div>言有父也，宣祖昭武皇帝积德而累功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148299_comment'></div>言有兄也，太祖神德皇帝开基而创业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148299_comment'></div>而自下武继志，守文则难，化成而日用不知，寅畏而夕惕若厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148299_comment'></div>故得昆虫咸遂，戎狄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148299", 1148299, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>允怀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148299_comment'></div>文物声明，损益乎三代；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148299_comment'></div>道德仁义，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148299", 1148299, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>寖染</span>乎万民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148299_comment'></div>有是圣功，推功于天地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148299_comment'></div>有是圣德，让德于祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148299_comment'></div>乃备严禋，聿伸大报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148299_comment'></div>礼乐具举，岂三年之不为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148299_comment'></div>玉帛载驰，见四海之助祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148299_comment'></div>列圣至止，上帝格思，锡鸿休于无疆，明大孝之不匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148299_comment'></div>礼成而退，天且不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148299_comment'></div>自非吉蠲之诚达于上下，孝悌之至通于神明，孰能若斯其盛欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148299_comment'></div>由是因纯嘏之休，覃雷雨之泽，谓万方有罪，于是乎释缧绁之人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148299_comment'></div>谓百姓不足，于是乎免逋逃之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148299_comment'></div>照烛幽壤，涤荡瑕疵，顺天推恩，与物更始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148299_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「一人有庆」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148299_comment'></div>《经》不云乎：「万国欢心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148299_comment'></div>自可追三王而比崇，非止黜五霸而不用者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148299_comment'></div>臣出官内署，承乏专城，既不得陪冠剑之班，行俎豆之事，舞抃于黄道，登降于紫坛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148299_comment'></div>又不得涌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1148299", 1148299, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>非烟</span>之词，濡甘露之笔，藻绘于玉册，发挥于皇谋，亦臣之不幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148299_comment'></div>然而当求治之朝，居分忧之任，得不导扬兑泽，训戒齐民，瘳其疮痍，浸入骨髓？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148299_comment'></div>亦臣之大幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148299_comment'></div>伏限郡事，不获奔诣阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148299_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1148299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年2月</a>　在滁州任知州。贾黄中、李昉卒，禹称作诗悼之。作品：《有伤》<div id='poem_74742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有伤</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_74742'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74742'>壁上时牌催昼夜，案头朝报见存亡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74742'>悬车又丧司空相，延阁新薨贾侍郎<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：二公相次薨背。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_74742_0'>⑵ 自注：予应举时，贾公以驾部员外知制诰、同知贡举，遂蒙首冠多士。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_74742_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_74716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74716'>垂行三入命，遽逼九原期。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74715?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74715'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74715'>列座先台席，温颜逼翠华。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
