id='poem_sentence_4_74715_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年1月</a>　在滁州任知州。有谢表。作品：《谢历日表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（一月上旬作。）</span><div id='poem_1148289' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148289' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148289?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148289")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148289_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148289'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148289'>臣某言：今月四日，进奏院递到宣头一道，伏蒙圣慈，赐臣至道二年新《历日》一道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148289_comment'></div>王春肇启，日官爰举于旧章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148289_comment'></div>帝命遐宣，守土各颁于新历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148289_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>臣闻天道无私，所以运行寒暑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148289_comment'></div>圣人有作，所以恭授民时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148289_comment'></div>聿令率土之滨，共乐同文之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148289_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，五行为质，万国咸宁，星辰即序于尧天，风雨弗迷于舜麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148289_comment'></div>御明堂之一十二位，克正阴阳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148289_comment'></div>运璿玑而三百六旬，无差晷刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148289_comment'></div>焕乎正朔，被于华夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148289_comment'></div>臣谬典鱼符，欣开凤历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148289_comment'></div>以时以日，敢忘匪懈之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148289_comment'></div>卜世卜年，更仰无疆之祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148289_comment'></div>伏限郡政，不获奔诣阙庭，无任感天荷圣激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1148289_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年1月</a>　在滁州任知州。有贺表。作品：《皇太子贺正表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（一月初作。）</span><div id='poem_1148300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺册皇太子表</a><span class='authorDate'>（995年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148300")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148300'>臣某言：今月二十八日，降到赦书一道，皇太子正位储宫，大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148300_comment'></div>臣当时集军州官吏、僧道、百姓宣读施行讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148300_comment'></div>礼崇储副，泽被华夷，凡在含生，罔不同庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148300_comment'></div>臣闻帝王之道，步骤殊途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148300_comment'></div>夏后所以传家，垂诸古典，姬昌之为世子，载于《礼》经，皆所以定人心而固国本矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148300_comment'></div>由三代而下，实百王不刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148300_comment'></div>洎乎唐室豆分，梁朝草创，庄宗则席未遑暖，明宗则日不暇给，联绵五姓，战伐百年，重念春坊，遂成阙典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148300_comment'></div>我太祖神德皇帝揖让神器，司牧黎元，择上圣之才，副下民之望，人神允属，狱讼攸归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148300_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，传自日兄，升为天子，德化威伏，垂二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148300_comment'></div>文物声明，尽合经义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148300_comment'></div>礼乐征伐，不自诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148300_comment'></div>始求主鬯之亲，用正副君之位，斯孟轲所谓「天与贤则与贤，天与子则与子」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148300_comment'></div>伏以皇太子生知忠孝，性禀温文，允符当璧之祥，宜正抚军之重，筮龟叶吉，简册增辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148300_comment'></div>而又举荐雷之声，因而作解；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148300_comment'></div>导少海之润，用以涤瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148300_comment'></div>必由旧章，降此大赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148300_comment'></div>纶綍四出，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1148300", 1148300, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>狴牢</span>一空，率土普天，不胜庆幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148300_comment'></div>臣出官禁署，承乏方州，目不睹朝廷之仪，手不当文翰之职，虽违素望，实偶昌朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148300_comment'></div>伏限郡政，不获奔诣天阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148300_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年3月18日</a>　在滁州任知州。进奏院递到敕牒一道，加王禹偁朝散大夫阶官，有谢表。作品：《谢加朝散大夫表》<div id='poem_1148297' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148297' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148297?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢加朝散大夫表</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年3月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148297")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148297_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148297'>臣某言：今月十八日进奏院递到敕牒一道，伏蒙圣慈，加臣朝散大夫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148297_comment'></div>礼成大祀，泽霈百僚，岂期郎吏之卑，亦从大夫之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148297_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣猥因薄技，获偶昌辰，自忝文科，累叨华贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148297_comment'></div>数年纶阁，徒勤润色之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148297_comment'></div>百日玉堂，讵有论思之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148297_comment'></div>而自身离近侍，官带责词，既别白以无门，但忧危而度日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148297_comment'></div>此者伏遇尊号皇帝陛下，圆丘展礼，率土推恩，特加五品之资，俾壮一麾之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148297_comment'></div>况臣早叨书命，备见旧章，每当行庆之时，必考授官之限，未满二载，例增五阶，率以为常，行之自久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148297_comment'></div>臣去年五月出职，今年二月加恩，承奉郎陛级未崇，朝散阶迁升不次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148297_comment'></div>必是上由睿圣，旁出佥谐，以其曾作近臣，不欲便同常例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148297_comment'></div>永言感遇，空极涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148297_comment'></div>遂使死灰之心，稍生于寒燄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148297_comment'></div>戴盆之首，亦见于天光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148297_comment'></div>誓捐微躯，以答鸿造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148297_comment'></div>无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1148297_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。有序送郑褒。作品：《送郑褒序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（夏末作。）</span><div id='poem_1148415' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148415' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148415?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送郑褒序</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148415")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148415_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148415'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148415'>闽人郑生成之，举进士来辇下，会诏罢去，枉趾滁上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148415_comment'></div>是岁日官置历，闰在孟秋，暑之烦酷，于前一月为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148415_comment'></div>某性不能热，每见生，不表絺绤而出，且虑生怒某之失礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148415_comment'></div>生退则卧凉轩，更仆交扇，而流汗不减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148415_comment'></div>因留生俟秋而行，生曰：「褒有母且老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148415_comment'></div>向之去数千里，别数百日者，欲干名而显亲，故虽远且久，若褒之在母左右也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148415_comment'></div>今诏已下，将及闽，及闽则乡人必以告，吾母必算程数日以待褒也，后一日即贻母之忧，用是不敢闻命矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148415_comment'></div>某曰：「生其纯孝欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148415_comment'></div>昔颍考叔以遗羹之意感郑庄公，丘明美之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148415_comment'></div>某无怙恃，不足以应生教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148415_comment'></div>为生泣而赋诗，亦足以警世之为人子者」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148415_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年3月</a>　在滁州任知州。有诗叙滁州民俗。作品：《唱山歌》<div id='poem_75143' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75143' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75143?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唱山歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75143")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75143_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75143'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75143'>滁民带楚俗，下俚同巴音。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75143'>岁稔又时安，春来恣歌吟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75143'>接臂转若环，聚首丛如林。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75143'>男女互相调，其词非奔淫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75143'>修教不易俗，吾亦弗之禁<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：叶韵。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75143'>夜阑尚未阕，其乐何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_75143", 75143, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>愔愔</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75143'>用此散楚兵，子房谋计深。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75143'>乃知国家事，成败因人心。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75143'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_75143_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。春间，为孙何、孙仅之父孙庸撰墓志铭。作品：《殿中丞赠户部员外郎孙府君墓志铭并序》<div id='poem_1148537' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148537' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148537?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中丞赠户部员外郎孙府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148537")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148537_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148537'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148537'>端拱元年正月朔，殿中丞富春孙公自龙州受代，终于岐山，诸孤护丧权窆于许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148537_comment'></div>服阕，长子何举进士中甲科，声名振天下，俄拜右正言，直史馆，赐三品服，进阶为朝奉郎，策勋为骑都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148537_comment'></div>且命副漕运使，于畿甸之西按行数十郡，属吏故人，负弩望尘之不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148537_comment'></div>今春上郊祀毕，以何贵，制赠殿丞府君为尚书户部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148537_comment'></div>将改葬，请进士王巘赍书来滁上，乞铭于工部郎中王某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148537_comment'></div>公讳庸，字鼎臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148537_comment'></div>其先出于姬姓，春秋时事卫为卿，三国时据吴称伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148537_comment'></div>五代祖植，始渡江为颍川长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148537_comment'></div>高祖简，徙居于蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148537_comment'></div>曾祖中、祖真，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148537", 1148537, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>隐德</span>不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148537_comment'></div>考讳镒，赠大理评事，先妣刘氏，追封彭城县太君，皆从公之贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148537_comment'></div>公即评事之次子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148537_comment'></div>少孤力学，举进士不第，退而修经世之务，欲以布衣干天子，取显位而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148537", 1148537, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>行道</span>，此其志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148537_comment'></div>周显德中，徒步诣招谏匦，上《赞圣策》凡二十有四条，多引贞观时文贞公事以自比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148537_comment'></div>世宗览而奇之，命试策于西掖，解褐除开封府兵曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148537_comment'></div>会省吏员，再考而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148537_comment'></div>建隆初，授河南府河南县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148537_comment'></div>月馀，丁彭城太君忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148537_comment'></div>服竟，留守向公从民之请，以前衔署摄，又权司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148537_comment'></div>乾德中调于天官，得开封尉，以亲王出尹而公实事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148537_comment'></div>秩满考绩，议当美迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148537_comment'></div>会上言令录多缺，有诏趋吏部，亟行补注，且曰无限品第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148537_comment'></div>因折六资，为登州录事参军，居十载不得代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148537_comment'></div>太平兴国五年，徙官巴蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148537_comment'></div>会朝达表公之才，且称其滞，上亦记公之名，始授太子左赞善大夫，寻以本官知荆门军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148537_comment'></div>明年，赐绯衣银章，旌善政而酬久次也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148537_comment'></div>移典龙州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148537_comment'></div>雍熙初，迁殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148537_comment'></div>在郡四年，得疾，肩舆而归，享年六十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148537_comment'></div>夫人张氏，故国子博士润之女也，先公一年而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148537_comment'></div>生以夫贵，封清河县君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148537_comment'></div>殁以子贵，追封河内县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148537_comment'></div>次子仅，举进士，文学如其兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148537_comment'></div>次子侑，少秀为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148537_comment'></div>长女适鄂州录事参军王道隆，夫亡守志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148537_comment'></div>次女适进士刘仲堪，俊而有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148537_comment'></div>某年某月某日葬于河南府某县某乡某里，从廷评府君之茔，以河内太君祔焉，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148537_comment'></div>昔西汉选用经术，晁错、董仲舒以对策高第显；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148537_comment'></div>太宗襄拔王佐，刘洎、马周以上书称旨达户部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148537_comment'></div>其斯人之徒欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148537_comment'></div>盖士君子得其时则功成事立，大位及于身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148537_comment'></div>无其时则卷道藏器，馀庆发于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148537_comment'></div>报若影响，曷尝有差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148537_comment'></div>始，世宗得公之策，即欲擢升谏垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148537_comment'></div>有沂水人赵守微以草泽上章，拜右拾遗，未几坐家行不修，贬商州户曹掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148537_comment'></div>丞相范鲁公谓公诚有奇才，历试而后用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148537_comment'></div>时移事去，沉于州县，此一不遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148537_comment'></div>故事，尉两畿四赤者，满岁则拜谏官、御史，由是而为大寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148537_comment'></div>公独折资纠郡，陆沉者十稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148537_comment'></div>此二不遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148537_comment'></div>上久在藩邸，僚吏数多，即位以来，鲜不超擢，其间才如孔维者亦至祭酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148537_comment'></div>而公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1148537", 1148537, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>守道</span>退默，未尝自陈，竟以列庶僚、典远郡而终身焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148537_comment'></div>此三不遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148537_comment'></div>呜呼，天其或者屈公之位而大公之嗣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148537_comment'></div>至于业官之绩，可以为吏师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148537_comment'></div>修身之道，可以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1148537", 1148537, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>人范</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148537_comment'></div>廉财慎言，出于天性，好学博古，老而不衰，又今人之所不及也，具于家状，此不复书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148537_comment'></div>有文集二十卷行于代，味其言，知其道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148537_comment'></div>初，廷评府君以通五经随计于僖宗朝，属巢寇覆二京而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148537_comment'></div>干戈之中，讲诵不辍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148537_comment'></div>秦宗权欲引为宾介，以疾拒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148537_comment'></div>夫如是，则户部之贤，三英之秀，有自来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148537_comment'></div>先是，某为左司谏、知制诰，有以何之文相售者，见其文有韩、柳风格，因誇于同列，荐于宰执间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148537_comment'></div>居数月，何始来候吾，又得仅之文一编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148537_comment'></div>时给事中兼右庶子毕公与吾同典诰命，适来吾家，因出仅文以示之，读未竟，乃大呼曰：「吓死老夫矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148537_comment'></div>其为名贤推服也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148537_comment'></div>仅之就举也，以兄中状元抑之未第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148537_comment'></div>方今搢绅中言掌诰之才者咸曰：「朝廷不命其人则已，命之则必何也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148537_comment'></div>场屋中语科第之殊级者亦曰：「国家罢举则已，举不罢则首冠者必仅也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148537_comment'></div>吾是以知廷评之积德，户部之道屈，在夫三子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148537_comment'></div>岂止文学之出人矣，又将富贵之逼身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148537_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1148537'>贤人有位，止于身贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148537_comment'></div>无位于时，子孙得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148537_comment'></div>廷评素履，家食而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148537_comment'></div>户部伟才，朝班而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148537_comment'></div>贻谋遗志，付与三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148537_comment'></div>三子堂堂，天实祐尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148537_comment'></div>赋尔懿文，锡尔繁祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148537_comment'></div>翰飞圣朝，何啻万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148537_comment'></div>君子曰：孙氏之诸孤，其光显于宋乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_79_1148537_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年4月</a>　在滁州任知州。春夏间，作诗寄省常上人，对杭州风景爱慕之情溢于言表。作品：《寄杭州西湖昭庆寺华严社主省常上人》<div id='poem_74930' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74930' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74930'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74930'>梦幻吾身是偶然，劳生四十又三年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74930_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>霜殿</span>磬声圆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74930_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74930'>谪官不得馀杭郡，空寄高僧结社篇。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。有记。作品：《画记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（冬天作。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年9月30日</a>　在滁州任知州。王师大破李继迁，王禹偁得进奏院报，即时集军州官吏等宣读告谕，上表贺之。作品：《贺胜捷表》<div id='poem_1148313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺胜捷表</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年9月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148313")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148313'>臣某言：今月三十日，得进奏院状报，今月十二日据夏州路马步军都部署王超、延州路马步军都部署范廷召等，各差入内殿头高品岑保正、入内高品贾继隆等，走马赍状到阙奏：两路大军入贼界，到乌白池会合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148313_comment'></div>前后一十六度掩杀著蕃贼，杀下米慕军主一十一人，吃啰指挥等二十馀人，及杀下蕃贼五千，活捉到蕃贼二千馀人，并收到马二千馀疋，夺到衣甲器械二万馀事件，伤杀却蕃贼不知数目，打夺到牛羊老小不少，收到粮料草窖窌极多，并已散与一行诸军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148313_comment'></div>其蕃贼帐族舍屋并烧毁荡尽，所有蕃贼田苗禾谷并总收刈及践踏净尽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148313_comment'></div>其李继迁与蕃贼并已溃散逃遁，其诸路大军并百姓已于今月二日并平安却回，各归逐处驻泊讫，皇太子、宰臣、文武百官于今月十三日入贺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148313_comment'></div>臣当时集军州官吏等宣读告谕，望阙拜舞称贺讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148313_comment'></div>黠虏窥边，王师出塞，大歼凶丑，永息祅氛，凡在照临，毕同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148313", 1148313, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>庆快</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148313_comment'></div>臣闻姬周备塞，来则击之，炎汉用兵，事不获已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148313_comment'></div>盖为民之除害，亦有国之常刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148313_comment'></div>言念夏台，古之白翟，虽居沙漠，实近崤函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148313_comment'></div>蕞尔继迁，久稽天讨，养成巢穴，召集逋逃，逼胁戎人，惊搔王土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148313_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下外其夷狄，念在生灵，戢堂上之奇兵，惜关中之民力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148313_comment'></div>以至赐之国姓，改以令名，位重察廉，官兼保傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148313_comment'></div>而兽心反侧，犬性猖狂，劫掠我吏民，侵陵我疆境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148313_comment'></div>皇威赫怒，禁旅奔驰，两路齐攻，三军合力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148313_comment'></div>鏖兵神速，突骑龙骧，疾雷无掩耳之期，烈火动燎原之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148313_comment'></div>大小十六阵，斩获万馀人，积甲如丘陵，僵尸满沙碛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148313_comment'></div>发其积聚，燔其室庐，俘牛马以谷量，蹂稼穑而扫地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148313_comment'></div>足使五千深入，笑李陵之无功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148313_comment'></div>十万横行，轻樊哙之虚语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148313_comment'></div>而况偏裨斩劓，罔有孑遗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148313_comment'></div>渠魁遁逃，仅以身免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148313_comment'></div>贼气大沮，人心已离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148313_comment'></div>系于双阙之前，诛乎独柳之下，止应剋日，别听吉音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148313_comment'></div>此皆断自宸衷，出于睿算，遏其横议，授以圣谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148313_comment'></div>故得帷幄之边，阵图犹展；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148313_comment'></div>沙场之上，捷书已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148313_comment'></div>历考自古帝王，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148313", 1148313, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>料兵</span>之速，未有如陛下者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148313_comment'></div>臣去年叨书密命，并直内庭，批<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1148313", 1148313, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>逆竖</span>之封章，屈王言而姑息，未尝不援毫切齿，怒发冲冠，惭无将帅之材，实忍大夫之耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148313_comment'></div>今则身居郎署，目睹神功，感涕忻欢，倍万<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1148313", 1148313, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>常品</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148313_comment'></div>伏限权司郡印，不获拜舞阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148313_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1148313_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年10月25日</a>　在滁州任知州。进奏院递到《太平圣惠方》并目录共一百一册，禹称上表谢之。作品：《谢赐圣惠方表》<div id='poem_1148298' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148298' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148298?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐圣惠方表</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年10月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148298")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。有答太子中允、直史馆、福建路转运使丁谓书，自述其平生志趣，且对丁氏来书所陈诸端，多加反诘。作品：《答丁谓书》<div id='poem_1148386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答丁谓书</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148386")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148386_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148386'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148386'>学士谓之足下：间者递中书至，且与诗俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148386_comment'></div>书之所指，皆中吾病，非谓之爱我，不能至是之切也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148386_comment'></div>《语》曰：「丘也幸，苟有过，人必知之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148386_comment'></div>《传》曰：「过而能改，善莫大焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148386_comment'></div>《易》曰：「不远复，无祗悔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148386_comment'></div>此皆古圣贤之旨，吾将践而行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148386_comment'></div>然书之所谓「『为善无近名』，名者公器，不可多得」云云者，吾亦有答焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148386_comment'></div>夫名之于人，亟且大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148386_comment'></div>盖修之于身，则为名节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148386_comment'></div>行之于世，则为名教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148386_comment'></div>名废，则教几乎息矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148386_comment'></div>且名恶可近邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148386_comment'></div>恶可得邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148386_comment'></div>苟无其实，虽欲近之，远矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148386_comment'></div>虽欲得之，失矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148386_comment'></div>是以仲尼修《春秋》，以名为主，故曰求名而亡，欲盖而彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148386_comment'></div>彼齐豹者，欲得不畏强御之名，而圣人不与；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148386_comment'></div>三叛人者，欲盖其恶名，而圣人固书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148386_comment'></div>甚哉，仲尼之于名之急也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148386_comment'></div>今谓之第一进士，得一中允，而欲与世浮沉，自堕于名节，窃为谓之不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148386_comment'></div>又谓吾之去职，由高亢刚直者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148386_comment'></div>夫刚直之名，吾诚有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148386_comment'></div>盖嫉恶过当，而贤不肖太分，亦天性然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148386_comment'></div>而又齿少气锐，勇于立事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148386_comment'></div>今四十有三矣，五年之中，再被斥弃，头白眼昏，老态且具，向之刚直不抑而自衰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148386_comment'></div>孟子四十心不动，养浩然之气；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148386_comment'></div>先师五十而读《易》，可以无大过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148386_comment'></div>吾将从事于兹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148386_comment'></div>谓吾高亢则无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148386_comment'></div>何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148386_comment'></div>吾为主簿一年，奔走事县令，为县令三年，奔走事郡守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148386_comment'></div>郡守即柴谏议成务也，县令即崔著作惟宁也，今皆存焉，可问而后知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148386_comment'></div>在三馆两制时，倍吾年者，皆父事之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148386_comment'></div>长吾十年、五年者，皆兄事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148386_comment'></div>如是而谓之高亢，使吾如何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148386_comment'></div>是盖以成败为是非，以炎凉为去就者说之云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148386_comment'></div>当吾在内廷掌密命，亲我者不曰，子高亢刚直，将不容于朝矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148386_comment'></div>又不当面折某人邪，不当廷争某事邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148386_comment'></div>及吾退而有是说，非知我者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148386_comment'></div>夫子曰：「天之未丧斯文也，桓魋其如予何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148386_comment'></div>孟轲曰：「予之不遇鲁侯，天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148386_comment'></div>臧氏之子，焉能使予不遇哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148386_comment'></div>谓之又谓韩吏部不当责阳城不谏小事，不当与李绅争台参，以为不存远大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148386_comment'></div>吾曰：退之皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148386_comment'></div>夫「守道不如守官」，《春秋》之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148386_comment'></div>今不仕则已，仕则举其职而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148386_comment'></div>舜作漆器，谏者不止，君岂有明于舜乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148386_comment'></div>事岂有小于漆器乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148386_comment'></div>盖塞其渐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148386_comment'></div>退之为大京兆兼御史大夫，不台参，盖唐有制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148386_comment'></div>故退之引桂管中丞得免台参以自解，则曲在绅矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148386_comment'></div>吾又见退之为袁州刺史，故事，观察使牒部刺史，皆曰「故牒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148386_comment'></div>时王弘中廉问江西，以吏部钜贤，特自损曰「谨牒」，而退之致书恳请，以为宜如旧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148386_comment'></div>夫如是，退之可谓当官而行，何强之有者也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148386_comment'></div>谓之其少详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148386_comment'></div>虽然，谓之之亲我，昆弟不能及也，吾敢不多谢而自悔焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148386_comment'></div>东闽风土与中土异，善饭自爱，是吾心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148386_comment'></div>月日，某顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_57_1148386_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。有传。作品：《滁州五伯马进传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（约撰于滁州任内。）</span><div id='poem_1148513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>滁州五伯马进传</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148513")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148513'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148513'>进隶滁州军籍，又为五伯三世矣，进之子生而无左臂，若髡截然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148513_comment'></div>人以为世主杖笞，多纳财利，而高下其心，轻重其手，天谴之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148513_comment'></div>呜呼，「鞭作官刑，扑作教刑」，则鞭扑者帝王之典也，可不慎乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148513_comment'></div>今之杖刑，非古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148513_comment'></div>古者示耻而已，故有蒲鞭而诫者，有束杖而治者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148513_comment'></div>虽然，上失其道，民散久矣，非刑不足以驱人之善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148513_comment'></div>既不得已而用之，其可以喜怒财货易其心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148513_comment'></div>彼五伯，贱隶也，刑不自口出，但以重轻不平而天谴若是，况执天下之刑者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148513_comment'></div>吾见世禄之家，子孙替坠，残癃疾废者有之，为人仆妾者有之，饥寒道路者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148513_comment'></div>岂止用刑之滥也，其谄主忌贤，剥民固宠，斯天谴之大者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148513_comment'></div>作《马进传》以自诫云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。有序送徐宗孟。作品：《送徐宗孟序》<div id='poem_1148422' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148422' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148422?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送徐宗孟序</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148422")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148422_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148422'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148422'>余去年出内庭，临滁上，境与合淝接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148422_comment'></div>闻其郡大狱烦，号为难治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148422_comment'></div>而使车游客往往道从事徐宗孟者，能佽助长吏，咸得其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148422_comment'></div>未几，以书遗我，见其文好奇而尚气者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148422_comment'></div>今年果被召赴阙，路出吾郡，与之言，又见其孜孜不忘于仁义也，宜乎慕孟轲而名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148422_comment'></div>且从余乞言，因书以为送。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1148422_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。有诗。作品：《甘菊冷淘》《淫雨中偶书所见》<div id='poem_75086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甘菊冷淘</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75086")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75086'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75086'>经年厌粱肉，颇觉道气浑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75086'>孟春奉斋戒，敕厨唯素飧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75086'>淮南地甚暖，甘菊生篱根。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75086'>长芽触土膏，小叶弄晴暾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75086'>采采忽盈把，洗去朝露痕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75086'>一举无孑遗，空愧越碗存。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75086'>况吾草泽士，藜藿供<span class='link' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75179'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75179'>丙申二月七，是夕月离毕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在滁州任知州。有诗酬杨遂。作品：《酬杨遂》<div id='poem_75164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬杨遂</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75164")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75164'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75164'>杨君江左士，文律何飘飘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75164'>人言未冠时，作赋凌洞箫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75164'>甲科中南国<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：江南状元及第。）</span>，通籍趋东朝<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：入中国为赞善。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年12月4日</a>　在扬州任知州，兼管内堤堰桥道事。上表谢移知扬州。作品：《扬州谢上表》<div id='poem_1148314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年12月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148314")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148314'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148314'>臣某言：十一月二十四日，枢密院马递敕牒一道至滁州，伏蒙圣慈，就差臣知扬州军州兼管内堤堰桥道事，替董俨，仍放朝谢，取便路，乘递马，发赴移任所者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148314_comment'></div>臣已于十二月四日到扬州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148314_comment'></div>祗奉朝佥，初权藩服，分忧任重，谪宦心宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148314_comment'></div>感恩而涕泗无从，省己而兢惶失次<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148314_comment'></div>伏以禹别九州，斯为奥壤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148314_comment'></div>唐分十道，是曰大邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148314_comment'></div>控淮海之津梁，会东南之漕运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148314_comment'></div>当圣主求贤之日，亲王领镇之初，宜择才能，俾乂繁剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148314_comment'></div>岂臣愚昧，而所克堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148314_comment'></div>伏念臣顷以艺文，获尘科第，三馆两制，遍历清华，千载一时，别无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148314", 1148314, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>媒援</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148314_comment'></div>由是上惟奉主，旁不忌人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148314_comment'></div>比因直言，频至左官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148314_comment'></div>去年自禁中出职，滁上临民，黾勉在公，忧虞度岁，鬓发渐白，眼目已昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148314_comment'></div>但以行年未高，不敢求退；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148314_comment'></div>明代难遇，犹思报恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148314_comment'></div>顾惟善政之蔑闻，岂望鸿私之曲被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148314_comment'></div>今者伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下擢从小郡，权莅大藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148314_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148314", 1148314, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>放弃</span>之臣，君恩未替；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148314_comment'></div>而要冲之地，使命孔多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148314_comment'></div>微臣素乏家财，本州元无公用，恐因供亿，别掇悔尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148314_comment'></div>冀圣心之察微，免众口之腾谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148314_comment'></div>此外粗当励力，岂敢旷官？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148314_comment'></div>况扬州虽号藩方，无多户口，凡干场务，皆有使臣，臣在其中，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1148314", 1148314, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>提振</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148314_comment'></div>至于决断词讼，督责赋租，持以无私，必期集事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148314_comment'></div>今缘奉诏急速，所以不敢稽留，庶于岁时之间，别求散慢之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148314_comment'></div>举头见日，空知京阙之遥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148314_comment'></div>白首为郎，甘老江湖之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148314_comment'></div>伏限权临郡政，不获躬拜天庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148314_comment'></div>无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1148314_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在扬州任知州。为友人同年进士王子舆之父撰墓志铭。作品：《累赠太子洗马王府君墓志铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（约作于是年或明年。）</span><div id='poem_1148538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148538?labeling=true' target='_blank'>累赠太子洗马王府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148538")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148538_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148538'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148538'>在昔唐鼎入梁，诸侯各专其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148538_comment'></div>就齐、鲁而言，则王师范据淄、青，时溥据徐、宿，朱瑄、朱瑾据兖、郓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148538_comment'></div>皆南结吴人，以张声援，西向而拒梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148538_comment'></div>梁太祖通和讨伐，智力殆尽，仅能平四州之地，而吴军北侵益急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148538_comment'></div>自清口之败，梁兵缩首不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148538_comment'></div>当时沂、密之民，被乱尤甚，不死于馁，即死于兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148538_comment'></div>非豪杰不能活妻子，况庇其乡党乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148538_comment'></div>于是民相保聚，离为八寨，以捍南寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148538_comment'></div>府君之祖讳某，以负勇敢，知礼义，为乡人所推，朝廷就署为沿边八寨都指挥使，却敌完民，声入贼境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148538_comment'></div>虽吴弩之劲，不敢北射一矢，使人得耕桑嫁娶如治平时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148538_comment'></div>后以老病而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148538_comment'></div>府君之显考讳某，袭父职无懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148538_comment'></div>属晋氏有平阳之辱，中原无主，贼帅赵重将掠高密南奔，显考府君以父子继职护边，穷迫不已，竟殁于贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148538_comment'></div>众推府君嗣其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148538_comment'></div>府君讳某字某，时年十八，雪泣枕戈，期以尽敌，不坠世业，邑人赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148538_comment'></div>既而世宗以一代英主，削平淮夷，府君始去兵即农，厚自封植，僮奴数百指，奔走供事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148538_comment'></div>树桑垦土，衣食以丰，马牛䐁羊，蕃息蔽野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148538_comment'></div>槌鲜酿黍，以享宾客，聚书讲学，以教子弟，任侠自许，弋猎为娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148538_comment'></div>游人归之如公邮，里人服之如官府，至于县大夫、郡刺史咸礼重焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148538_comment'></div>尝叹曰：「自祖考及吾，生在乱世，庇民御寇，其勤实多，未尝授一官、食㪷粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148538_comment'></div>报施之道，吾有后乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148538_comment'></div>以开宝六年十月十二日终于家，享年四十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148538_comment'></div>始赠大理评事，再赠本寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148538_comment'></div>今上即位，赠某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148538_comment'></div>夫人刘氏封彭城县太君，淳化五年以疾终楚州官舍，至道二年追封南阳县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148538_comment'></div>妇德母道，有史馆朱台符为之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148538_comment'></div>二男：长曰子舆，字希孟，擢进士第，长于辞赋，典丽可爱，今为殿中侍御史，赐五品章服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148538_comment'></div>先是，国家以鹾茗漕运之务，付于希孟，东极温、福，西尽荆、湖，南距番禺，北止淮甸，凡半天下，悉以委焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148538_comment'></div>希孟裁量经制，咸得其中，宿弊旧讹，一皆剔削，去繁存要，公私便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148538_comment'></div>每一舣舟，一就馆，则郡县申牒，委积如阜，待报而返，间不容时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148538_comment'></div>加以旧无规绳，事有利害，希孟阅视剖判，遣之如流，施于有司，靡不中理，所谓干国之蛊、兼人之才者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148538_comment'></div>次曰某，未冠而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148538_comment'></div>五女，既嫁而死、在室而夭者凡四人焉，今存者润州司户参军刘贞固之妻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148538_comment'></div>以某年某月某日葬于密州莒县某乡某里，以南阳太君祔，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148538_comment'></div>王氏皆帝王之后，居太原者为姬姓，隋末大儒号曰文中子，府君之先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148538_comment'></div>六代祖因官密上，爱岱岳东蒙之秀，又其俗被周公、太公、孔子之化，遂家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148538_comment'></div>至今密人呼「忻代王家」，以别琅邪之族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148538_comment'></div>夫如是，府君其周之苗裔乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148538_comment'></div>某与希孟既为布衣交，又为同恩生，重以宗盟，情分欸密，丈人之墓，所宜为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148538_comment'></div>曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1148538'>姬姓王氏，居于太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148538_comment'></div>隋文中子，即其裔孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148538_comment'></div>密上因官，其后家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148538_comment'></div>遇乱习武，三世百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148538_comment'></div>府君御寇，无禄无寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148538_comment'></div>阴德所施，宜其有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148538_comment'></div>乃生殿中，少登秀茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148538_comment'></div>立朝显亲，褒赠礼厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148538_comment'></div>扬名以道，克家惟孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148538_comment'></div>志墓刻铭，永光祖考。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1148538'></div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1148538_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在扬州任知州。有贺笺。作品：《皇太子贺冬笺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（冬至作。）</span><div id='poem_1148361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148361' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148361?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇太子贺冬笺</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148361")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148361_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148361'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148361'>某言：伏以晷运推移，日南长至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148361_comment'></div>启东朝而受贺，爰举旧章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148361_comment'></div>诣北阙以称觞，率先群后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148361_comment'></div>伏惟皇太子殿下日跻盛德，天纵多才，忠孝克奉于君亲，谦让动询于师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148361_comment'></div>寝门侍膳，诞彰三至之勤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148361_comment'></div>望苑礼贤，永作万邦之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148361_comment'></div>应时纳祜，与国同休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148361_comment'></div>某叨列通班，爰当亚岁，无任抃蹈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1148361_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗。作品：《立春前二日雪》<div id='poem_75030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>立春前二日雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_75030'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75030'>一夕满淮海，莎阶晓欲平。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75030'>气寒知<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>腊在，势猛共春争。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75030'>飘泊残梅妒，龙钟老桧擎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75030'>随风无定态，入竹有繁声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75030'>倚槛吟忘倦，援毫画不成。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75030'>南乡消瘴疠，东作助农耕。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75030'>片飏鹅毛远，光翻蝶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>翅轻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75030'>任贫添酒债，慵扫慰诗情。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75030'>群玉峰峦秀，华胥世界清。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75030'>老郎无政术，沉醉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>卧江城。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75030'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_75030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75030'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_75030_0'>⑴ 原作如，据经锄堂本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_75030_0'>⑵ 原缺，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本补</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_75030_0'>⑶ 原作酒，据孙本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75030_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=996&endYear=996')">996年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗送晁迥。作品：《送晁监丞（迥）赴婺州关市之役》<div id='poem_75132' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75132' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75132?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送晁监丞赴婺州关市之役</a><span class='authorDate'>（996年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75132")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75132_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75132'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75132'>关征市赋縻贤俊，谁爱此官为吏隐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75132'>将作晁丞于役时，婺女星临海边郡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75132'>黄绢辞高位尚卑，白华行洁身犹困。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75132'>会待时来即并伸，也知道在终无闷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75132'>君不见路随含笑坐市中，屈身岂愧丹阳尹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75132'>又不见张生狂醉恋扬州，冬瓜堰下甘肥遁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75132'>此行况是奉皇华，数丈轻舠载一家。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75132'>携瓶下岸买竹叶，挂席背风穿蓼花。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75132'>霜晴震泽初尝橘，泉过惠山应试茶。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75132'>虎溪晓云灵隐雪，钱塘夜潮照湖月。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75132'>密排诗景在途中，旋吟新句教儿童。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75132'>渐近金华见隼旟，五马来迎使者车。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75132'>应知骥足暂拘绊，八咏楼开频启宴。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75132'>醉中官妓乞歌诗，剡溪纸贵抄新词。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75132'>他年谁献子虚赋，召入金门五云路。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75132'>因思元白在江东，不似晁丞今独步。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75132'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_75132_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年1月</a>　在扬州任知州。毕父丧，依前授尚书工部郎中，知扬州军州事，作谢起复表。作品：《谢落起复表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（或二月作。）</span><div id='poem_1148301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢落起复表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148301")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148301'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148301'>臣某言：今月五日，进奏院递到敕牒、官告各一道，蒙恩落起复，授臣依前尚书工部郎中、知扬州军州事，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148301_comment'></div>丧纪爰终，朝恩遽至，泣血罔极，悼心失图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148301_comment'></div>伏以三年之丧，百王不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148301_comment'></div>墨缞急用，本因将帅之臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148301_comment'></div>腰绖从公，罔叶《春秋》之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148301_comment'></div>臣顷居近职，方执通丧，断恩勉副于鸿私，达礼重违于素志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148301_comment'></div>涓埃无效，空增<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148301", 1148301, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>腼冒</span>之颜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148301_comment'></div>日月有期，俄卒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148301", 1148301, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>禫祥</span>之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148301_comment'></div>此者伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下举其旧典，推以新恩，俾除抑夺之名，曲尽哀荣之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148301_comment'></div>援琴切切，痛岂忘于终天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148301_comment'></div>佩玉锵锵，班尚遥于就日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148301_comment'></div>伏限权司藩服，不获奔诣阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148301_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1148301_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗。作品：《海仙花诗三首》《芍药诗三首》<div id='poem_74628' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74628' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74628?labeling=true' target='_blank'>海仙花诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（三首并序）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（997年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74628")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_74628_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_74628'>海仙花者，世谓之锦带，维扬人传云，初得于海州山谷间，其枝长而花密若锦带，然其花未开如海棠，既开如木瓜，而繁丽袅弱过之，一朵满头，冠不克荷，惜其不香而无子，但可钩压其条，移植他所，因以释草、释木验之，皆无有也，近之好事者作花谱，以海棠为花中神仙，予谓此花不在海棠下，宜以仙为号，目为锦带，俚孰甚焉，又取始得之地，命曰海仙，且赋诗三章，以存其名。</div><div id='poem_preface_74628_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74628'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74628'>一堆绛雪压春丛，袅袅长条弄晓风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74628'>借问开时何所似，似将绣被覆薰笼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74628'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74628_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74627' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74627' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_74627_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74627'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74627'>春憎窈窕教无子，天为妖娆不与香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74627'>尽日含毫难比兴，花中应是卫庄姜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74755_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74755'>羽客暗传尸解术，仙家重爇返魂香。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74755_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年2月</a>　在扬州任知州。王禹偁长子嘉祐与张咏之女结婚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年2月</a>　在扬州任知州。有序。作品：《皇华集序》<div id='poem_1148443' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148443' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148443?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇华集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148443")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148443_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148443'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148443'>古者天子五载一巡狩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148443", 1148443, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>肆觐</span>群后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148443", 1148443, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>观省</span>风俗，黜陟幽明而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148443_comment'></div>后代沿革，命使巡行，两汉已来，其任尤重，非稽古有识之士，不得与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148443_comment'></div>皇上黜霸道，立民极，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148443", 1148443, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>褒拔</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148443", 1148443, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>秀茂</span>，辑宁黎元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148443_comment'></div>以为四海之大，蛮夷殊于华夏，非号令则教不被；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148443_comment'></div>兆民之众，茕嫠困于豪右，非询问则情不达；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148443_comment'></div>百吏之广，循良杂于苛暴，非考覈则人不劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148443_comment'></div>举行幸之典，虑供亿之劳，乃诏辅臣，精择邦彦，按郡国之政，张朝廷之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148443_comment'></div>召于延英，授以密旨，膺是命者，凡若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148443_comment'></div>济阳丁君，实使闽越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148443_comment'></div>君始以文学高第进，复以政事课最闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148443_comment'></div>朝佥曰然，帝命惟允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148443_comment'></div>君之出也，名贤惜其去，天子重其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148443_comment'></div>惜其去者，以为书典谟，备顾问，惟君称其职矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148443_comment'></div>重其任者，以为八州之政，万里之俗，非君孰可使矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148443_comment'></div>于是黄枢密勿之臣，青宫调护之客，两制三馆，造士名儒，咸赋诗以送，总若干首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148443_comment'></div>今春赴朝集之期，奏风谣之事，虚怀见纳，前席移时，黜者无怨言，升者无异议，尽以民瘼，达于帝聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148443_comment'></div>上心豁如，咸可其奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148443_comment'></div>重慰远俗，劳而遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148443_comment'></div>都门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1148443", 1148443, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>祖行</span>，即席探韵，又得若干首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148443_comment'></div>合为一集，播于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148443_comment'></div>道出维扬，以序为请，敢徵古义，命曰《皇华》，年月日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1148443_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。禹称作《答晁礼丞书》，对当日官场情况及自身性格、遭遇，慨乎言之。<span class='inlineComment2'>（春间作。）</span><div id='poem_1148384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答晁礼丞书</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148384")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148384_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148384'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148384'>礼丞晁君足下：某始识足下时，年未冠，身未婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148384_comment'></div>逮今四十有四，娶妻生子，长子复纳妇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148384_comment'></div>足下策名十八载，官未出奉常丞，青衫白发，司关市之税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148384_comment'></div>某擢第后足下二年，为尚书起曹郎，典大邦，被金紫，其间又再为制诰舍人，一为翰林学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148384_comment'></div>以某之所得，较足下之所屈，用时态观之，某不为不多，然道不行则一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148384_comment'></div>某<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148384", 1148384, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>褊狷</span>刚直，为众所知，虽强损之，未能尽去，夫今之领藩服，当冲要者，必先丰厨传以啖人口，勤迎劳以悦人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148384_comment'></div>无是二者，虽龚、黄无善誉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148384_comment'></div>某皆不能也，唯官谤是待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148384_comment'></div>又眼病虚花，不欲久视；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148384_comment'></div>髭苍发白，老相见逼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148384_comment'></div>终日阅缧囚，呵胥吏，于刑名钱谷、重轻欺诈间用机械以决胜负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148384_comment'></div>其于文学，无一点墨落纸，岂吾道之所欲也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148384_comment'></div>今得足下书暨《东阳》、《西楚》文赋二编，览之无斁，乃知足下屈于官而大伸于道者也，某屈于道而微得于官者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148384_comment'></div>江都、彭门，亭里连袤，长淮芳草，与春色俱绿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148384_comment'></div>把袂未期，秉笔无赖，强食自爱，以俟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148384", 1148384, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>大来</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148384_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148384_comment'></div>某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1148384_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年3月</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗送吴铉等。作品：《扬州寒食，赠屯田张员外、成均吴博士同年，殿省柳丞（宜）》<div id='poem_75092' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75092' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75092?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州寒食赠屯田张员外成均吴博士同年殿省柳丞</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75092")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75092_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75092'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75092'>前年寒食节，待诏直内庭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75092'>休假<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>百官出，独掩深严扃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75092'>近侍不敢醉，赐酒空满瓶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75092'>闲就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_75092", 75092, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>通中枕</span>，时闻索上铃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75092'>思入无何乡，兀然欲忘形。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75092'>永阳溪水渌，琅邪山色青。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_75092", 75092, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>留事</span>，听歌无欢声。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75092'>狴牢未空歇，堰埭劳修营。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75092'>屯田布素交，屈此关市征。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75092'>吏隐掌鹾茗，终朝看道经。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75092_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_75092_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年3月</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗。作品：《扬州池亭即事》<div id='poem_75091' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75091' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75091?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州池亭即事</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75091")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75091_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75091'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75091'>冥心阅群动，亦各趋所安。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75091'>胡为名利人，戚戚常鲜欢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75091'>吾生四十四，结佩呼郎官。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75091'>掌言入纶阁，待诏直金銮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75091'>匪谓得禄少，所嗟行<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作持）</span>道难。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75091'>前年谪滁上，忧畏<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作时）</span>双鬓残。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75091'>赖有琅邪溪，时濯尘缨冠。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75091'>朝佥徙淮海，任重力易殚。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75091'>君恩讵可报，感激涕汍澜。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75091'>民瘼不能治，恻隐情悲酸。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75091'>况复多病身，名宦心已阑。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75091'>归田未果决，怀禄尚盘桓。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75091'>公退何所适，池亭一凭栏。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75091'>旭日媚春卉，微风生鸣湍。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75091'>呵僮勿挟弹，留客不持竿。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75091'>用冀鱼鸟驯，熙熙肆游观。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75091'>神仙未可学，吏隐聊自宽。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75091'>孤吟刻幽石，此义非考槃。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75091'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_75091_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年4月</a>　在扬州任知州。太宗崩，真宗即位。作品：《贺皇帝嗣位表》<div id='poem_1148302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺皇帝嗣位表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148302")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148302'>臣某言：伏奉四月一日赦书，皇帝陛下虔膺顾命，嗣守鸿图，人神有依，华夏同庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148302_comment'></div>伏惟陛下奉先思孝，克己归仁，承列圣之贻谋，作兆民之司牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148302_comment'></div>重轮继大明之照，光被遐陬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148302_comment'></div>少海升百谷之王，泽流品汇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148302_comment'></div>肆赦涣汗，万邦底宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148302_comment'></div>臣逮事先朝，尝叨内署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148302_comment'></div>荐逢圣日，权守外藩，不获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148302", 1148302, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>蹈舞</span>玉阶，无任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148302", 1148302, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>抃跃</span>屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1148302_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年4月</a>　在扬州任知州。有碑文。作品：《扬州建隆寺碑》<div id='poem_1148522' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148522' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148522?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州建隆寺碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148522")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148522_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148522'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148522'>唐贞观中，制以天下战阵处为寺，且命虞世南、李百药、岑文本之徒，刊勒碑铭，纪述功业，传诸简册，灿然可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148522_comment'></div>盖圣人不欲无罪而杀一夫，无名而荒寸土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148522_comment'></div>及乎诸侯阻兵，百姓徯后，驱人以战，事不获已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148522_comment'></div>矢石之下，死伤则多，徇义效忠，有足哀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148522_comment'></div>虽复赠官爵，禄子孙，诚有劝于生，惧无益于死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148522_comment'></div>以为汉明之后，释教<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148522", 1148522, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>诞兴</span>，谓冥寞之中，有轮回之数，能使精魄复生人天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148522_comment'></div>其道如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148522_comment'></div>事佛诵经而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148522_comment'></div>繇是交兵之地，舍为梵宫，田不耕而有名也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148522_comment'></div>死事之人，尽离鬼趣，士揖生而无恨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148522_comment'></div>帝王所尚，今古攸同，虽有服儒冠而执名教者，又安知其果不然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148522_comment'></div>我太祖皇帝受禅于周，启封在宋，朱旗所指，黔首乂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148522_comment'></div>惟李重进作帅江都，婴城构逆，时建隆元年九月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148522_comment'></div>乃命故中书令石公，统王师以讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148522_comment'></div>十有二月，傅于城下，于是建行宫，迎法驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148522_comment'></div>是月十一日，太祖至大仪驿，距广陵六十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148522_comment'></div>夜半而城陷，诏宣徽北院使李公知军府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148522_comment'></div>寻以行在立为梵宫，取僧之有德行者处焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148522_comment'></div>是时，先寺主道晖本居孝先，众所推择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148522_comment'></div>李公列状以闻，即可其奏，仍改法名为道坚，以纪年为寺额；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148522_comment'></div>垦田四顷，隶省一庄，咸以赐之，供香积而饭缁流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148522_comment'></div>道坚既没，智速嗣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148522_comment'></div>智速又没，义幽嗣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148522_comment'></div>义幽，超化大师也，以淳化二年归寂，义隆、颢仁监而主焉，皆超化大师之弟子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148522_comment'></div>自国初至今凡四十载，日供僧不减六十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148522_comment'></div>像设庄严，经教具备，礼佛有殿，演法有堂，斋庖在东，僧寝在右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148522_comment'></div>奥有室供汤沐焉，外有亭给登眺焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148522_comment'></div>廊庑翼舒，门扉洞启，修竹交映，碧流萦回，实藩服之胜游，淮海之福地耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148522_comment'></div>先是，太祖将返銮舆，留其御榻，忌晨供帐，于今尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148522_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148522_comment'></div>战伐所亡，人骨已朽，乘兹善果，皆出冥涂，岂知不再事朝廷，复为臣子欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148522_comment'></div>义隆等谓，修建已来，碑志未立，以某出从翰苑，守是郡条，宜为斯文，理不可让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148522_comment'></div>是时大行晏驾，圣主承祧，至道三年四月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148522_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1148522'>神道设教儒所崇，佛法度人释之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148522_comment'></div>王者草昧多屯蒙，乃有征伐扬武功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148522_comment'></div>野必死战城必攻，出入矢石岂梯冲，殒首丧元争效忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148522_comment'></div>圣人念尔心所恫，诏舍战地为梵宫，游魂精气或感通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148522_comment'></div>拔尔出离冥涂中，恩异文王枯骨丛，事殊楚子京观封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148522_comment'></div>香灯钟磬飘天风，四十馀年僧憧憧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148522_comment'></div>止戈偃伯文轨同，三叶重光自建隆，祐我圣祚垂无穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1148522_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年4月</a>　在扬州任知州。特授王禹偁尚书刑部郎中，散官勋赐如故。作品：《谢转刑部郎中表》<div id='poem_1148303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢转刑部郎中表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148303")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148303'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148303'>臣某言：今月六日，进奏院递到敕牒一道、官告一通，伏蒙圣慈，特授臣尚书刑部郎中，散官勋赐如故，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148303_comment'></div>圣泽大赉，郎曹序迁，闻命若惊，省躬知幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148303_comment'></div>伏念臣顷因薄技，逮事先朝，误记姓名，过有奖擢，两知制诰，一入翰林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148303_comment'></div>报国之功，虽无绩效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148303_comment'></div>事君之道，粗守贞方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148303_comment'></div>虚名既高，忌才者众；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148303_comment'></div>直道难进，黜官亦多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148303_comment'></div>始贬商于，实因执法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148303_comment'></div>后出滁上，莫知罪名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148303_comment'></div>大行皇帝渐察非辜，移领大郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148303_comment'></div>方且精求民瘼，少报皇恩，期牵复于词臣，再发挥于王命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148303_comment'></div>不图上玄降祸，先帝登遐，奉讳之辰，号天罔极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148303_comment'></div>不得趋朝夕之临，无以为臣子之心，泪如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148303", 1148303, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>绠縻</span>，悲入骨髓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148303_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下祗奉顾命，钦承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148303", 1148303, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>庆基</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148303_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148303", 1148303, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>荼蓼</span>之情，既遵于易月；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148303_comment'></div>蓼萧之泽，遂洽于溥天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148303_comment'></div>爰自起曹，升于宪部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148303_comment'></div>望金銮之殿，诚隔烟霄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148303_comment'></div>入白云之司，亦非冗散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148303_comment'></div>得不恪居官次，虔奉诏条，谕淮海之遗民，识朝廷之新命？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148303_comment'></div>无汲黯积薪之叹，有子牟恋阙之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148303_comment'></div>感愧旧恩，追惟往事，西陵目断，泣血难收；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148303_comment'></div>东海日升，倾心更切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148303_comment'></div>伏限权司藩服，不获拜赐玉阶，臣无任感天荷圣激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1148303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有贺表。作品：《贺册皇太后表》《贺册皇后表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（五月末、六月初作。）</span><div id='poem_1148304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺册皇太后表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148304")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148304'>臣某言：伏睹四月一日制书，册皇太后礼毕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148304_comment'></div>子道大备，母仪有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148304_comment'></div>伏以皇太后德配先朝，功存内治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148304_comment'></div>遇《坤》之泰，叶《易》象之休徵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148304_comment'></div>「在河之洲」，动诗人之雅咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148304_comment'></div>克昌圣嗣，缵服<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148304", 1148304, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>宝图</span>，爰旌十乱之功，乃正万邦之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148304_comment'></div>祗膺玉册，诞受尊称，舜孝蒸蒸，汉仪穆穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148304_comment'></div>问安侍膳，载趋长乐之宫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148304_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148304", 1148304, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>含饴弄孙</span>，永镇显亲之殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148304_comment'></div>臣限拘官守，不获蹈舞玉阶，无任抃跃屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1148304_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1148305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148305' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148305?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺册皇后表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148305")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148305_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148305'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148305'>臣某言：得进奏院状报，五月二十四日制书，秦国夫人立为皇后者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148305_comment'></div>中宫正位，率土同欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148305_comment'></div>臣闻轩辕四星，上明于玄象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148305_comment'></div>虞舜二女，内助于皇风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148305_comment'></div>永惟王化之基，实系人伦之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148305_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下诞膺骏命，嗣守鸿图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148305_comment'></div>安上定民，动循于礼法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148305_comment'></div>自家刑国，先正于宫闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148305_comment'></div>符沙麓之祯祥，取涂山之正嫡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148305_comment'></div>蒸尝是奉，既逮事于先朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148305_comment'></div>车服有仪，更承颜于长乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148305_comment'></div>典册大备，邦家有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148305_comment'></div>臣以任假列藩，获闻盛礼，伏限恪居官次，不获蹈舞玉阶，无任抃跃屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1148305_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年6月</a>　在扬州任知州。有表。作品：《慰上大行皇帝谥号庙号表》<div id='poem_1148306' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148306' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148306?labeling=true' target='_blank'>慰上大行皇帝谥号庙号表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148306")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148306_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148306'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148306'>臣某言：得进奏院状报，今月六日敕下，大行皇帝谥号神功圣德文武皇帝，庙号太宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148306_comment'></div>七日，文武百寮诣西上閤门拜表陈慰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148306_comment'></div>典章大备，宗庙永安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148306_comment'></div>臣谨按《周礼》，太师帅瞽而廞，所以作柩谥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148306_comment'></div>又按《礼记》，大臣素服而郊，所以明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148306", 1148306, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>天诔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148306_comment'></div>盖子不得私其父，臣不得私其君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148306_comment'></div>爰兹考实之文，用正易名之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148306_comment'></div>洪惟盛典，属在圣朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148306_comment'></div>太宗皇帝知几其神，惟睿作圣，功济万物，德流八方，有经纬天地之文，有剋定祸乱之武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148306_comment'></div>录其行也既如彼，定其谥也宜如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148306_comment'></div>又以为极大曰太，有德称宗，懋建鸿名，永光清庙，礼官博士讨论而无异辞，公卿大夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148306", 1148306, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>佥谐</span>而合旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148306_comment'></div>为百代不祧之主，享万世无疆之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148306_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下以大孝显亲，以至公立法，率由茂实，诞上尊称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148306_comment'></div>太史之纪国书，有光直笔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148306_comment'></div>上公之读谥册，曾无愧辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148306_comment'></div>终哀且荣，爱礼达孝，秩秩之容既肃，穰穰之福无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148306_comment'></div>臣逮事先皇，累叨近侍，流落郡政，哀号国丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148306_comment'></div>执戟之官，既伤于疏贱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148306_comment'></div>如椽之笔，空入于梦魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148306_comment'></div>伏限官守，不获奔赴阙庭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148306_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年3月</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗。作品：《茶园十二韵》<div id='poem_75042' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗送董俨。作品：《送董谏议（俨）之任湘潭》<div id='poem_74893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
