class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74796")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74796_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74796'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74796'>俸钱随月尽，公务逐时生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74796'>白发多悲感，皇华倦送迎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74796'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_74796", 74796, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>奉身</span>无实事，困我为虚名。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74796'>会向沧浪上，秋风自濯缨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74796'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74796_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗赠吕通。作品：《赠吕通秘丞楚州监仓》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗赠虚己。作品：《赠虚己》<div id='poem_75020' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75020' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75020?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠虚己</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75020")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_75020_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75020'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75020'>溪边幽树好烟霞，别后春风几度花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75020'>梦忆一岩红薜荔，心轻三事紫袈裟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75020'>禅机悟了身无著，诗句高来鬓有华。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75020'>不遇苏州韦应物，昼公篇什向谁誇。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75020'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_75020_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗赠省钦。作品：《赠省钦》<div id='poem_75014' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75014' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75014?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠省钦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75014")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_75014_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_75014_0'>① 师善八分，太宗召于殿上，书数行，赐紫。一作王之道诗。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75014'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75014'>旧隐何年别翠微，瀑泉声入锁禅扉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75014'>御前曾写八分字，天上特宣三事衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75014'>灯照夜庵霜后冷，鼎烹秋菌雨中肥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75014'>终归五老峰边去，杯渡长江一锡飞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75014'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_75014_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗赠王子舆。作品：《赠王殿院（子舆）同年》<div id='poem_75009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75009?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠王殿院同年</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75009")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_75009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75009'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75009'>几年淮海叹驱驰，美拜初闻入奏时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75009'>乍作台官劳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_75009", 75009, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>马揖</span>，合为巡使近龙墀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75009'>多从此地升三字，莫向朝端说四推。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75009'>纵遇省桥休拗项，郎官班列甚喧卑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75009'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_75009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75009'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_75009_0'>⑴ 自注：时郎中八十馀员，员外数百员，唯台官稍少。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75009_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有诗。作品：《留别扬府池亭》《池边菊》<div id='poem_74632' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74632' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74632?labeling=true' target='_blank'>留别扬府池亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74632")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_74632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74632'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74632'>竹绕亭台柳拂池，徘徊终恋郡斋西。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74632'>斜阳更上渔舟坐，明日红尘逐马蹄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74632'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74632_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74563' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74563?labeling=true' target='_blank'>池边菊</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74563")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_74563_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74563'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74563'>绿池绕径几千栽，准拟登高泛酒杯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74563'>未到重阳归阙去，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_74563", 74563, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>金英</span>寂寞为谁开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74563'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_74563_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年5月18日</a>　在扬州任知州。真宗下诏求直言，王禹偁应诏上疏言事。作品：《应诏事言疏》<div id='poem_1148369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>应诏言事</a><span class='authorDate'>（至道三年五月十八日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148369")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148369'>伏睹陛下即位赦书云：「所宜开谏诤之路，拔茂异之材」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148369_comment'></div>又奉御史台告报：「准诏命内，文武臣僚，并许直言极谏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148369_comment'></div>此实陛下诞彰圣德，广达民情，速致时雍，追用古道之深旨，抑亦宗社无疆之休，军民莫大之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148369_comment'></div>臣才虽无闻，谏则有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148369_comment'></div>先皇帝时，初拜右正言直史馆，即日进《端拱箴》一篇，又上《御戎十事》，蒙先朝采纳，擢升纶阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148369_comment'></div>判大理寺时，抗疏论道安之罪，执法雪徐铉之冤，贬官商山，咎实因此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148369_comment'></div>寻沐徵用，再尘谏垣，又上《李继迁便宜》，寝而不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148369_comment'></div>俄忝内庭兼駮正，亦尝改更宣命，封还敕书，虽无报于朝廷，盖粗伸于职业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148369_comment'></div>伏遇陛下钦奉顾命，惟怀永图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148369_comment'></div>嗣位之初，赦书既如彼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148369_comment'></div>听政之后，诏命又如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148369_comment'></div>臣茍有所见，隐而不言，是上负先帝用人之心，下孤明主求谏之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148369_comment'></div>臣死罪死罪，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148369_comment'></div>伏以圣朝享国四十馀年，边鄙未甚宁，人民未甚泰，求利不已，设官太多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148369_comment'></div>今陛下治之惟新，救之在速，臣伏虑书生执言，有奏陛下，以为三年无改于父之道，可谓孝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148369_comment'></div>此不知古今异制，家国殊涂者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148369_comment'></div>假如帝尧既殂，帝舜在位，尧时有八元未进，四凶未除，舜乃流放举用，善恶两分，未闻后之人曰：「尧不及于舜也，舜不孝于尧也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148369_comment'></div>伏惟陛下遏老生之常谈，奋英主之独断，则天下幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148369_comment'></div>谨缘军国大政，奏事五条，傥稍动于圣心，庶大开于言路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148369_comment'></div>其一曰：谨边防，通盟好，使辇运之民，有所休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148369_comment'></div>方今北有胡虏，西有继迁，胡虏虽不犯边，戍兵岂能减削？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148369_comment'></div>继迁既未归命，馈饷固难寝停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148369_comment'></div>关辅之民，倒悬尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148369_comment'></div>臣愚以为陛下即位之始，当顺人心，宜敕疆吏致书虏臣，使达犬戎，请寻旧好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148369_comment'></div>下诏赦继迁之罪，复与夏台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148369_comment'></div>臣顷在翰林，见继迁上表云：「乞取残破夏州，以奉拓跋氏祭祀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148369_comment'></div>先皇帝虽有批答，只许鄜州节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148369_comment'></div>缘继迁本是反侧之人，岂肯束身归国？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148369_comment'></div>所有诏命不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148369_comment'></div>今陛下嗣统，大振皇威，亦恐继迁令人进奉，因举前事，彼必感恩，此亦不战而屈人之师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148369_comment'></div>如其不从，则备御诛擒，皆有方略，且使天下百姓知陛下屈己而为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148369_comment'></div>或曰：「富国强兵，不可示人以弱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148369_comment'></div>此乃誇虚名而忽大计者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148369_comment'></div>其二曰：减冗兵，并冗吏，使山泽之饶，稍流于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148369_comment'></div>伏以乾德、开宝已来，国家之事，臣所目睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148369_comment'></div>当时东未得江浙、漳泉，南未得荆湖、交广，朝廷财赋，可谓未丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148369_comment'></div>然而击河东，备北虏，国用亦足，兵威亦彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148369_comment'></div>其义安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148369_comment'></div>所蓄之兵锐而不众，所用之将专而不疑故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148369_comment'></div>自后尽取东南数国，又平河东，土地财赋可谓广矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148369_comment'></div>而兵威不振，国用转急，其义安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148369_comment'></div>所蓄之兵冗而不尽锐，所用之将众而不自专故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148369_comment'></div>今诚能简锐卒，去冗兵，而委之以将帅，用恩威法令驾驭之，资之以天下之财赋，而曰兵不振，用不丰，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148369_comment'></div>臣愚以为：陛下宜经制兵赋如开宝中，则可以高枕而治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148369_comment'></div>至于引唐虞、比三代者，皆为空言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148369_comment'></div>臣所以不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148369_comment'></div>臣又见开宝中设官至少，何以验之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148369_comment'></div>臣本鲁人，占籍济上，未及第时，常记只有刺史一人，李谦溥是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148369_comment'></div>司户一员，今司门员外郎孙贲是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148369_comment'></div>近及一年，朝廷别不除吏，当时未尝阙一事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148369_comment'></div>自后始有团练推官一员，今枢密直学士毕士安是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148369_comment'></div>太平兴国中，臣及第归乡，有刺史陈廷山、通判阎炜、副使阎彦进、判官李延、推官柳宣、兵马监押沈继明，监酒榷税算又增四员，曹官之外，更益司理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148369_comment'></div>问其租税，减于曩日也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148369_comment'></div>问其人民，逃于昔时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148369_comment'></div>一州既尔，天下可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148369_comment'></div>冗兵耗于上，冗吏耗于下，此所以尽取山泽之利而不能足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148369_comment'></div>夫山泽之利与民共之，自汉已来，取为国用，不可弃也，然亦不可尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148369_comment'></div>方今可谓尽矣，何以知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148369_comment'></div>只如茶法，从古无税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148369_comment'></div>唐元和中，以用兵齐、蔡，宰相王涯始建税茶之法，唐史称是岁得钱四十万贯，东师以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148369_comment'></div>今则钱数百万矣，民何以堪之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148369_comment'></div>臣故曰：减冗兵，并冗吏，使山泽之饶稍流于下者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148369_comment'></div>其三曰：艰难选举，使入官不滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148369_comment'></div>古者乡举里选，为官择人，士君子行修于家，学推于众，然后荐用，登之于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148369_comment'></div>故从政而政和，临民而民泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148369_comment'></div>自三代涉两汉，虽有沿革，未常远去此道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148369_comment'></div>隋唐已来，始有科试，得人之盛，与古为侔，然自唐初终太祖之世，科试未尝不难矣，每岁进士不过三十人，经学不过五十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148369_comment'></div>重以周高祖之后，外诸侯不得奏辟，士大夫罕有资荫，故有终身不获一第，没齿不获一官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148369_comment'></div>先皇帝毓德王藩，睹其如此，临御之后，不求备以取人，舍短从长，拔十得五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148369_comment'></div>在位将逾二纪，登第亦近万人，不无俊秀之才，亦有容易而得，如臣者容易中一人尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148369_comment'></div>臣愚以为数百年之艰难，故先帝济之以汎取；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148369_comment'></div>二十载之濡泽，陛下宜纠之以旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1148369_comment'></div>伏望以举场还有司，如故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1148369_comment'></div>至于吏部铨择官材，亦非帝王躬亲之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1148369_comment'></div>比来五品已下，谓之旨授官，今则幕职州县而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1148369_comment'></div>京官虽有选限，多不施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148369_comment'></div>太祖已来，始令后殿引见，因为常例，以至先朝调选之徒，多求侥倖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148369_comment'></div>或以哀鸣泣涕，便获超资；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148369_comment'></div>或以捷给山呼，便升京秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148369_comment'></div>遂使《长定格》真同长物，吏部官只若备员，既无耻格之风，渐多阘茸之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148369_comment'></div>臣愚以为宜以吏部还有司，依格敕注拟可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148369_comment'></div>其四曰：沙汰僧尼，使疲民无耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148369_comment'></div>夫古者唯有四民，治民者士也，故受养于农，工以造器用，商以通货财，皆不可阙也，而兵不在其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148369_comment'></div>盖周井田之法，农即兵也，有事则战，无事则耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148369_comment'></div>自秦已来，以彊兵定天下，故战士不服农业矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1148369_comment'></div>是四民之外，又生一民，而为五也，所以农益困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1148369_comment'></div>然而执干戈、卫社稷，理不可去也，但使帝王之道，不得与三代同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1148369_comment'></div>汉明之后，佛法流入中国，度人修寺，历代增加，不蚕而衣，不耕而食，是五民之外，又益一民，而为六也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1148369_comment'></div>故魏、晋而下，治道不及于两汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1148369_comment'></div>有唐大儒韩愈《谏宪宗迎佛骨表》云：昔黄帝在位百年，年百一十岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1148369_comment'></div>少昊在位八十年，年二百岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1148369_comment'></div>颛顼在位七十九年，年九十八岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1148369_comment'></div>帝喾在位七十年，年百五十岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1148369_comment'></div>尧在位九十八年，年百一十岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1148369_comment'></div>舜、禹皆寿百馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1148369_comment'></div>当时未有佛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1148369_comment'></div>是知古圣人不事佛以求福，古圣人必排佛以救民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1148369_comment'></div>假使天下有僧万人，每日食米一升，岁用绢一疋，是至俭也，而月有三千斛之费，岁有一万疋之耗，何况五七万辈哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1148369_comment'></div>而又富僧钜髡，穷极口腹，一斋之食，一袭之衣，贫民百家，未能供给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1148369_comment'></div>此既不能治民，又不能力战，不造器用，不通货财，而高堂邃宇，丰衣饱食而已，不曰民蠹，其可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1148369_comment'></div>臣愚以为国家度人众矣，造寺多矣，计其费耗，何啻亿万！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1148369_comment'></div>先朝不豫，舍施又多，佛若有灵，岂不蒙福？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1148369_comment'></div>事佛无效，断可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1148369_comment'></div>陛下深鉴前王，精求理本，亟宜沙汰，以厚生民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1148369_comment'></div>若以嗣位之初，未欲惊骇此辈，且可一二十载，不令度人，不许修寺，使自销铄，渐而去之，亦救弊之一端也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1148369_comment'></div>又其五曰：亲大臣，远小人，使忠良謇谔之士知进而不疑，奸纤倾巧之徒知退而有惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1148369_comment'></div>夫君为元首，臣为股肱，言同体也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1148369_comment'></div>得其人则勿疑，非其人则不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1148369_comment'></div>凡今天下，言帝王之盛者，岂不曰尧舜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1148369_comment'></div>尧舜之道，具在方册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1148369_comment'></div>是时百姓不亲，五品不逊，契作司徒，敷五教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1148369_comment'></div>蛮夷猾夏，寇贼奸宄，咎繇作士，明五刑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1148369_comment'></div>伯夷典礼，后夔典乐，禹平水土，益作虞官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1148369_comment'></div>大哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1148369_comment'></div>尧之为君，可谓委任责成而无疑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1148369_comment'></div>或曰：「诚如是，尧有何功德耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1148369_comment'></div>臣曰：有知人任贤之德尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1148369_comment'></div>虽然，尧之道去世辽远，恐不可复，臣以近事言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1148369_comment'></div>唯有唐之政，可以损益而行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1148369_comment'></div>臣读元和贤相《裴垍传》，宪宗尝命垍铨品庶官，垍奏曰：「天子择宰相，宰相择诸司长官，诸司长官自择僚属，则上下不疑而政成矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1148369_comment'></div>以陛下之明择宰相数人，犹有非其人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1148369_comment'></div>况臣之不佞，择数十人诸司长官，常恐不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1148369_comment'></div>若更令臣择庶官，恐非致治之要」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1148369_comment'></div>当时识者以垍为知言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1148369_comment'></div>伏望陛下远取帝尧，近鉴唐室，既得宰相，用而不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1148369_comment'></div>使宰相择诸司长官，诸司长官自取僚属，则垂衣而治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1148369_comment'></div>所谓忠良謇谔之士知进者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1148369_comment'></div>臣又闻古者刑人，不在君侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1148369_comment'></div>《语》曰：「放郑声，远佞人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1148369_comment'></div>又曰：「浸润之谮，肤受之愬，不行焉，可谓明也矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1148369_comment'></div>是以周文王左右无可结袜者，言皆贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1148369_comment'></div>夫小人之徒，巧言令色，先意希旨，事必害政，心惟忌贤，非圣帝明王，不能深察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1148369_comment'></div>臣又按旧制，南班三品尚书，方得登殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1148369_comment'></div>比者三班奉职，卑贱可知，或因遣差，亦得升殿，惑乱天听，亵黩至尊，无甚于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1148369_comment'></div>伏望陛下振举纪纲，尊严视听，在此时矣，不可不思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1148369_comment'></div>所谓奸纤倾巧之徒知退者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1148369_comment'></div>臣愚以为今之所急，在先议兵，使众寡得其宜，措置得其道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1148369_comment'></div>然后议吏，使清浊殊涂，品流不杂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1148369_comment'></div>然后难选举以塞其源，禁僧尼以去其耗，自然国用足而王道行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1148369_comment'></div>今若不去冗兵，不并冗吏，不难选举，不禁僧尼，纵欲减人民之赋，宽山泽之利，其可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1148369_comment'></div>伏惟陛下承二圣之贻谋，鉴千古之治道，明比日月，几先鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1148369_comment'></div>圣智所周，不遗一物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1148369_comment'></div>英断所及，出于百王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1148369_comment'></div>而又三事大臣受遗辅政，岂容郎吏辄议国经？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1148369_comment'></div>盖以臣素被宠光，常思报效，有所贮蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1148369_comment'></div>不敢缄藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1148369_comment'></div>臣又念诏书云：「言之而不用，罪在朕躬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1148369_comment'></div>求之而不言，咎将谁执」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1148369_comment'></div>臣不胜大愿，所以辄进狂瞽，上干冕旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1148369_comment'></div>伏惟陛下践诏书之言，则天下幸甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1148369_comment'></div>谨斋戒拜疏，实封附递以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1148369_comment'></div>惟陛下宽其罪而念其诚，以来谏诤之路，则臣死无恨矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_151_1148369_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年</a>　在扬州任知州。有谢表。作品：《谢弟禹圭授试衔表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（夏秋间作。）</span><div id='poem_1148316' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148316' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148316?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢弟禹圭授试衔表</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148316")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148316_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148316'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148316'>臣某言：臣禹圭昨差押本州贺登宝位进奉，伏蒙圣慈，特授将仕郎、试秘书省校书郎者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148316_comment'></div>千年遭遇，九族辉荣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148316_comment'></div>伏念臣出自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148316", 1148316, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>孤平</span>，猥叨班列，虽累居近侍，而未免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148316", 1148316, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>食贫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148316_comment'></div>言念禹圭，臣之母弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148316_comment'></div>素无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148316", 1148316, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>文性</span>，早使专经，重以先臣，惜其幼子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148316_comment'></div>本期擢第以慰慈颜，自后住举六年，丁忧三载，渐及强仕，未有出身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148316_comment'></div>今者伏遇皇帝陛下缵嗣宝图，诞敷文德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148316_comment'></div>凡居守土之任，义合骏奔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148316_comment'></div>因命在原之亲，入修职贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148316_comment'></div>伏蒙陛下举先朝之故事，推出震之殊恩，俾列官常，仍居雠校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148316_comment'></div>起家之调，曲荷于生成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148316_comment'></div>报国之心，同期于死所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148316_comment'></div>伏限郡印，不获蹈舞玉阶，臣无任感天荷圣、激切屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148316_comment'></div>谨奉表陈谢以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1148316_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=997&endYear=997')">997年9月</a>　王禹偁应诏离扬州归阙。时丁谓奉使闽中回朝，路过扬州，与禹称同行。作品：《扬州道中感事，兼简史馆丁学士》《次韵和史馆丁学士赴阙书怀见示》《次韵和丁学士途中偶作》<div id='poem_74741' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74741' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74741?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州道中感事兼简史馆丁学士<span class='inlineComment2'>（时与丁同赴京）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（997年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74741")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74741_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74741'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74741'>淮边为郡再相逢<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，又得同途赴九重。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74741_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74741'>顾我尚骑天厩马，共君遥想鼎湖龙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74741_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74741'>贾生北望朝文帝，白傅何期哭宪宗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74741_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74741'>携手驿桥残照里，断魂空对<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>隔江峰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74741_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74741'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74741_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_74741'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_74741_0'>⑴ 原作闻，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_74741_0'>⑵ 原作断，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_74741_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_74746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74746?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和史馆丁学士赴阙书怀见示</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74746")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74746_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74746'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74746'>清夜哀吟敌晓鸡，行藏无玷白于圭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74746'>阳春寡和人传郢，肉味都忘子在齐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74746'>绝俗文章终远大，循资班列暂卑栖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74746'>看君更刷鸾皇翼，一举方知燕雀低。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74746'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74746_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_74745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_74745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/74745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和丁学士途中偶作</a><span class='authorDate'>（997年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_74745")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_74745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_74745'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_74745'>淮海丰登接帝畿，家家耕破旧荒陂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_74745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_74745'>乳牛引犊精神健，野叟携孙鬓发衰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_74745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_74745'>河市妓翻轻茜袖，社筵人插小红旗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_74745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_74745'>凭谁画取村田乐，尽使忧民圣主知。<div id='poem_sentence_3_74745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_74745'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_74745_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
潢川（加禄驿）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='03b1454dfe1e4583b356ae06076b06bb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("03b1454dfe1e4583b356ae06076b06bb");'><span id='03b1454dfe1e4583b356ae06076b06bb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年</a>，46岁</div><div id='03b1454dfe1e4583b356ae06076b06bb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年闰三月9日</a>　王禹偁出守黄州，行抵光州加禄驿，为友人鞠仲谋之父鞠恒撰墓碣铭。作品：《著作佐郎赠国子博士鞠君墓碣铭并序》<div id='poem_1148539' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148539' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148539?labeling=true' target='_blank'>著作佐郎赠国子博士鞠君墓碣铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年闰三月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148539")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148539_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148539'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148539'>鞠氏之先，伯禽之裔也，世为东莱著姓，徙居高密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148539_comment'></div>公讳与今上御名同，字可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148539_comment'></div>曾祖某，孝悌力田，不求闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148539_comment'></div>祖真，登州黄县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148539_comment'></div>父庆孙，申州团练判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148539_comment'></div>母王氏，故太子少师延之次女，左补阙、史馆修撰、赠太师伸之从父妹，户部侍郎、参知政事、赠工部尚书沔之姑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148539_comment'></div>申州府君始娶某氏，生子曰恂，公即申州次子，与弟愉皆王氏出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148539_comment'></div>幼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148539", 1148539, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>聪悟</span>，善属文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148539_comment'></div>汉乾祐中一上登进士第，年二十一，榜中推为探花先辈，解褐秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148539_comment'></div>宰相范鲁公奏为集贤校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148539_comment'></div>顷之，求外官，得郓州观察支使，历永兴军节度掌书记，伊阳、猗氏令，蔡州防御判官，继宰介休、魏县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148539_comment'></div>开宝五年，故相国赵韩王取为著作佐郎，与今兵部侍郎兼秘书监杨公徽之，兵部郎中、知制诰李公若拙，故左补阙、知制诰赵公邻几同列东观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148539_comment'></div>当时天下得佐著作局者，唯公等四人而已，才名地望，辉映搢绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148539_comment'></div>居无何，授河清令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148539_comment'></div>以七年某月某日寝疾，终于官舍，年四十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148539_comment'></div>夫人于氏，太常少卿鹏之次女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148539_comment'></div>太平兴国七年某月某日终于私第，年四十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148539_comment'></div>二子：长曰仲谋，擢进士第，任太常博士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148539_comment'></div>次曰仲渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148539_comment'></div>长女适太子中舍聂巨川，次适故太常丞王禹锡，次适聂巨容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148539_comment'></div>初，公长兄恂早亡无嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148539_comment'></div>弟愉周广顺二年登进士第，历某官，仓部员外郎、知制诰张澹以女妻之，生子曰孟容、季昌，女适周氏，恂早亡，惟季女适靳氏在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148539_comment'></div>仲谋丁母忧时，徒步诣申、陕、河、洛，扶护祖考暨叔父、母、兄孟容五丧东归，致书于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148539_comment'></div>且曰：「叔父府君，传父兄之业，敦孝友之行，显位未至，赋命不融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148539_comment'></div>我先妣太君贞淑慈爱，和平均一，两院儿女，凡有九人，训抚提携，并如己子，于今乡人不知有从父兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148539_comment'></div>嗟予小子，罪逆不孝，禄不及亲，官忝通籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148539_comment'></div>今奉天子命得封赠父母，未立片石以表坟墓，大惧我祖考之遗烈，将坠于地，幸与足下布衣之旧，岂惜一言，不慰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148539", 1148539, "Clauses/97/Comments/1")'>罔极</span>之心乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148539_comment'></div>某谢而许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148539_comment'></div>左宦掖垣，忧畏奔迫，闰三月九日晨及光州加禄驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148539_comment'></div>昼寝既酣，初夕无寐，因命家僮秉烛，据行实而书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148539_comment'></div>公举进士时著《四时成岁赋》万馀言，声振场屋，与弟愉并有文集行于代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148539_comment'></div>呜呼，士之处世，患才无所取，名无所闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148539_comment'></div>才名既立，患无知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148539_comment'></div>惟公负天才，得高第，复见范鲁公、赵相国为之引掖，而不登<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1148539", 1148539, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>朝籍</span>，终于畿令，岂非命欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148539_comment'></div>在其子孙，必有达者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148539_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1148539'>鞠氏姬姓，本出于鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148539_comment'></div>世居东莱，缝掖章甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148539_comment'></div>明经神童，里选乡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148539_comment'></div>擢第业官，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148539_comment'></div>策进士名，考《登科记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148539_comment'></div>大鞠之门，自公而始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148539_comment'></div>申州府君，文学茂异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148539_comment'></div>命屈于时，终于从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148539_comment'></div>谋孙翼子，在公昆弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148539_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1148539", 1148539, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>猗嗟</span>我公，高才下位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148539_comment'></div>伯伦酒德，披文见意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148539_comment'></div>王绩醉乡，含章遁世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148539_comment'></div>殁后二纪，赠典方至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148539_comment'></div>犹限彝章，成均博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148539_comment'></div>孝子不匮，永锡尔类。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1148539_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
黄冈
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='81ef08153ac24859b34a65f616ab310d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("81ef08153ac24859b34a65f616ab310d");'><span id='81ef08153ac24859b34a65f616ab310d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=1000')">999-1000年</a>，46-47岁</div><div id='81ef08153ac24859b34a65f616ab310d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年闰三月</a>　赴黄州途中，有诗。作品：《凤凰陂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（赴黄州途中作。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年闰三月9日</a>　抵黄州任所，有谢上表。作品：《黄州谢上表》<div id='poem_1148308' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148308' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148308?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年闰三月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148308")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148308_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148308'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148308'>臣某言，伏奉去年十二月二十九日敕，落知制诰，差知黄州军州事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148308_comment'></div>逼于日限，寻即朝辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148308_comment'></div>自后以改葬先臣，蒙恩给假，幸获亲于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148308", 1148308, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>远日</span>，免积恨于终天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148308_comment'></div>坟杵未停，征轮靡盬，已于今月二十七日到州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148308_comment'></div>乍离近侍，犹忝专城，循省尤违，弥深感泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148308_comment'></div>伏以黄州地连云梦，城倚大江，唐时版籍二万家，税钱三万贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148308_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148308", 1148308, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>人户</span>不满一万，税钱止及六千，虽久乐升平，尚未臻富庶，永言养活，亦藉循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148308_comment'></div>如臣庸愚，曷副<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148308", 1148308, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>忧寄</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148308_comment'></div>谨当勤求人瘼，遵奉诏条，窒塞嚚讼之民，束缚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148308", 1148308, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>憸猾</span>之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148308_comment'></div>敢言课最，庶免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148308", 1148308, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>旷遗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148308_comment'></div>况当求理之朝，必为无害之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148308_comment'></div>伏念臣叨司帝诰，又历周星，既不曾上殿求见天颜，又不曾拜章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148308", 1148308, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>论列</span>时事，入直则闭閤待制，退朝则杜门读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148308_comment'></div>虽每日起居，实经年抱疾，不敢求假，恐烦医官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148308_comment'></div>自后忝预史臣，同修《实录》，昼夜不舍，寝食殆忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148308_comment'></div>已尽建隆四年，见成一十七卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148308_comment'></div>虽然未经进御，自谓小有可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148308_comment'></div>忽坐流言，不容绝笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148308_comment'></div>夫谗谤之口，圣贤难逃，周公作《鸱鸮》之诗，仲尼有桓魋之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148308_comment'></div>盖行高于人则人所忌，名出于众则众所排，自古及今，鲜不如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148308_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下雷霆霁怒，日月回光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148308_comment'></div>鉴曾参之杀人，稍宽投杼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148308_comment'></div>察颜回之盗饭，或出如簧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148308_comment'></div>未令君子之道消，惟赖圣人之在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148308_comment'></div>况臣孤平无援，文雅修身，不省附离权臣，秪是遭逢先帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148308_comment'></div>但以心无茍合，性昧随时，出一言不愧于神明，议一事必归于正直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148308_comment'></div>愠于群小，诚有谤词；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148308_comment'></div>谋及卿士，岂无公论？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148308_comment'></div>以至两朝掌诰，四任词臣，紫垣最忝于旧人，白首不离于郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148308_comment'></div>以微臣之行己，遇陛下之至公，久当辩明，未敢伸理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148308_comment'></div>今则上国千里，长淮一隅，虽叨守土之荣，未免谪居之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148308_comment'></div>霜摧风败，芝兰之性终香；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148308_comment'></div>日远天高，葵藿之心未死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148308_comment'></div>仰望旒扆，不胜涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148308_comment'></div>臣无任瞻天恋圣，省己激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1148308_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年6月</a>　在黄州任知州。宰臣、监修国史李沆等上《重修太祖实录》五十卷，以王禹偁曾预修，特授朝请大夫。作品：《谢加朝请大夫表》<div id='poem_1148318' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148318' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148318?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢加朝请大夫表</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148318")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148318'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148318'>臣某言：今月十三日进奏院递到敕牒一道、中书劄子一封，伏蒙圣慈，以臣预修《太祖实录》，特授臣朝请大夫，仍赐绢五十疋、银五十两者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148318_comment'></div>陛级清崇，锡赉优厚，恩生望外，事系宸衷，仰戴宠光，伏增战越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148318_comment'></div>臣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣素无望实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148318_comment'></div>久玷清华，训诰典谟，罔知体要；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148318_comment'></div>《春秋》、《梼杌》，岂识指归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148318_comment'></div>去岁伏遇尊号皇帝陛下详观国书，追念始祖，顾复不祧之庙，光扬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148318", 1148318, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>纳麓</span>之勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148318_comment'></div>以为自昔编修，或多漏略，永怀丕烈，深轸孝思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148318_comment'></div>谓汉祖元功，立纪于武帝之世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148318_comment'></div>神尧《实录》，重定于高宗之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148318_comment'></div>爰诏近臣，再编茂实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148318_comment'></div>臣叨膺是选，尤愧非才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148318_comment'></div>尚赖宰臣李沆、监修钱若水总领其职，臣则讨论遗事，润色旧文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148318_comment'></div>始则合秦赵世家，得国姓之根本，考唐杜氏族，见太后之源流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148318_comment'></div>凡所改更，皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148318", 1148318, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>按据</span>，庶彰帝业，以副天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148318_comment'></div>方施汗简之劳，遽有分符之命，无由别白，但积忧危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148318_comment'></div>加以年鬓渐高，郡封甚僻，野鸟闲暇，潜窥贾谊之容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148318_comment'></div>江鱼噞喁，欲噬灵均之骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148318_comment'></div>未知何日，再睹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148318", 1148318, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>天光</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148318_comment'></div>岂谓大典初成，群贤进御，陛下以臣曾施翰墨，曲记姓名，俾进阶资，复援恩例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148318_comment'></div>丝纶涣汗，金帛辉华，州民改观，谪官增气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148318_comment'></div>领郡城而兼史氏，何异唐贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148318_comment'></div>奉朝请以为大夫，荣同汉制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148318_comment'></div>非小臣稽古之力，乃陛下好文之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148318_comment'></div>涕泗纵横，乱于縻绠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148318_comment'></div>神魂飞越，若在烟霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148318_comment'></div>唯知遭逢，曷可报效！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148318_comment'></div>然念臣业文之外，蔑有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148318", 1148318, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>器能</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148318_comment'></div>知命之年，别无嗜好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148318_comment'></div>才思未减，笔力尚雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148318_comment'></div>驰于文翰之场，犹能识路；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148318_comment'></div>责以循良之政，恐误分忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148318_comment'></div>傥用所长，期不辱命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148318_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1148318_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年8月15日</a>　在黄州任知州。王禹偁在黄州子城西北隅筑小竹楼二间，撰成《竹楼记》作品：《黄州新建小竹楼记》<div id='poem_1148487' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148487' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148487?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州新建小竹楼记</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148487")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148487_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148487'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148487'>黄冈之地多竹，大者如椽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148487_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>竹工</span>破之，刳去其节，用代<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>陶瓦</span>，比屋皆然，以其价廉而工省也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148487_comment'></div>子城西北隅，雉堞圮毁，蓁莽荒秽，因作小楼二间，与月波楼通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148487_comment'></div>远吞山光，平挹江濑，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>幽阒</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/14/Comments/1")'>辽夐</span>，不可具状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148487_comment'></div>夏宜急雨，有瀑布声；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148487_comment'></div>冬宜密雪，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>碎玉</span>声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148487_comment'></div>宜鼓琴，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>琴调</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>虚畅</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148487_comment'></div>宜咏诗，诗韵清绝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148487_comment'></div>宜围棋，子声丁丁然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148487_comment'></div>宜投壶，矢声铮铮然，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>竹楼</span>之所助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148487_comment'></div>公退之暇，披鹤氅，戴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>华阳巾</span>，手执《周易》一卷，焚香默坐，销遣世虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148487_comment'></div>江山之外，第见风帆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>沙鸟</span>、烟云竹树而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148487_comment'></div>待其酒力醒，茶烟歇，送夕阳，迎素月，亦谪居之胜概也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148487_comment'></div>彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>齐云</span>落星，高则高矣，井干丽谯，华则华矣，止于贮妓女，藏歌舞，非骚人之事，吾所不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148487_comment'></div>吾闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>竹工</span>云：「竹之为瓦，仅十稔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148487_comment'></div>若重覆之，得二十稔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148487_comment'></div>噫，吾以至道乙未岁自翰林出滁上，丙申移广陵，丁酉又入西掖，戊戌岁除日有齐安之命，己亥闰三月到郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148487_comment'></div>四年之间，奔走不暇，未知明年又在何处，岂惧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1148487", 1148487, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>竹楼</span>之易朽乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148487_comment'></div>幸后之人与我同志，嗣而葺之，庶斯楼之不朽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148487_comment'></div>咸平二年八月十五日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1148487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148487'><span class='label'>按：</span>《小畜集》卷一七。又见《皇朝文鉴》卷七七，《五百家播芳大全文粹》卷一○六。《文章类选》卷四，《古文奇赏》卷二二等。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1148487_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年8月15日</a>　在黄州任知州。有记。作品：《黄州齐安永兴禅院记》<div id='poem_1148481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148481?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州齐安永兴禅院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148481")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148481_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148481'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148481'>齐安，郡名也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148481_comment'></div>永兴，院额也，盖僧耆故老通而呼之，遂以为常耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148481_comment'></div>唐时旧州在齐安河上，《院录》云因刺史杜仆射，以白云观建为斯院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148481_comment'></div>按唐史，未尝有官至端揆而刺黄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148481_comment'></div>疑唐末杜洪据有鄂渚，北结梁人，东抗杨氏，黄鄂之属郡也，或以宗族典之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148481_comment'></div>于时皇纲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148481", 1148481, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>弛紊</span>，官纪僭忝，仆射之称，不为异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148481_comment'></div>其后随郡迁徙，立院于兹，兵掠火燔，曾无宁岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148481_comment'></div>乾宁中，杨行密尽有淮南之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148481_comment'></div>天祐二年，杨公卒，其子渥称嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148481_comment'></div>吴王奉唐正朔，以部将孙彦思为黄州刺史，始造院宇，崇佛像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148481_comment'></div>彦思母王氏舍妆奁铸钟，于今尚在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148481_comment'></div>主院之僧，传法之祖，丧乱无纪，莫得而知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148481_comment'></div>今所述者，断自紫陵而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148481_comment'></div>紫陵者，郢中名山也，山僧晓禅，世谓之紫陵和尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148481_comment'></div>其后舍兹院，游凤翔，从清泰入洛，赐号国师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148481_comment'></div>次曰同一，次曰行忠，次曰节运，次曰延真，次曰自正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148481_comment'></div>此五僧者，自前唐天祐止圣朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148481_comment'></div>端拱初，有若蕲州三角山龙门禅院僧自南，开堂演法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148481_comment'></div>自南者，合淝人，世姓解氏，住持凡七年，复归蕲州四祖山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148481_comment'></div>淳化中，有若蕲州白云山广教院僧智雨，嗣兴院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148481_comment'></div>智雨者，涟水人，世姓朱氏，以至道三年十一月一日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1148481", 1148481, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>寂灭</span>，俗寿五十一，夏腊二十七，临终召院众付嘱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148481_comment'></div>今长老仁辩，遂宁人，得法于智雨者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148481_comment'></div>即以其月十二日，用荼毗之法葬智雨，起塔于长圻村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148481_comment'></div>二十八日，仁辩会大众，升法堂，有僧玄资问曰：「如何是齐安境」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148481_comment'></div>答云：「后面青竹连道观，前头绿水接武昌」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148481_comment'></div>又问：「如何是境中人」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148481_comment'></div>答云：「大似不相见」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148481_comment'></div>此之谓住持传法僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148481_comment'></div>院旧有堂厨各五间，淳化二年，郡人王福舍钱二百万造大殿，成再兴舍钱一百五十万造僧堂，郡之众户<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1148481", 1148481, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>率钱</span>二十万建老宿堂，又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1148481", 1148481, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>率钱</span>十万立方丈室，左都押衙丁文燧舍钱五十万建浴室，蕲州人王真舍钱四十万创菩萨殿，塑弥勒像，里人周遇舍菜圃，此之谓檀越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148481_comment'></div>知院元吉掌申牒公府，维那法俊掌提辖堂司，供养主文遇掌化募施利，典座道真掌庖厨，直岁省慎掌垦种，此之谓知事僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148481_comment'></div>先是，众僧请院前闲田一段，又请逋民麦庄一区，由是来麰蔬果丰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148481_comment'></div>住持传法僧无祖祢，道高众伏则推之，知事僧无资级，才堪心愿则为之，故上下熙熙，而忿争不作矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148481_comment'></div>夫禅者，儒之旷达也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148481_comment'></div>律者，士之名教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148481_comment'></div>浮图氏离而为二，罕能兼之，其甚者，互相矛盾，过于仇雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148481_comment'></div>唯长老仁辩禅其心以度人，律其行以伏众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148481_comment'></div>有来斯应，虚往实归，禅其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148481_comment'></div>一裘一饭之外，日诵《法华经》二部，律其行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148481_comment'></div>某筮仕以来，治僧之讼多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148481_comment'></div>独爱其无亲疏，无人我，有贤智则尊而事之，有才力则信而使之，去而不强，推而无竞，浑然几乎道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148481_comment'></div>故总而为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148481_comment'></div>至于院宇之至向，田园之广袤，道具经典，租庸什器，请书石阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148481_comment'></div>时大宋咸平二年八月十五日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1148481_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年</a>　在黄州任知州。八月丙申，真宗大阅禁兵于开封城东北郊，作大阅五言诗，令属和，禹称撰有《大阅赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（撰于八、九间。）</span><div id='poem_1148214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大阅赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148214")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148214'>大阅之义，载于《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148214_comment'></div>彼乃一国之军旅，千乘之诸侯，曾未若天子之大阅，扬神武而阐皇猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148214_comment'></div>天祚有宋，受禅于周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148214_comment'></div>太祖以武功戡定，太宗以文德怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148214_comment'></div>亿兆人兮颂声作，四十载兮王泽流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148214_comment'></div>二后上仙，贻厥孙谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148214_comment'></div>一人继统，承天之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148214_comment'></div>大舜孝思，四海遏密；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148214_comment'></div>高宗谅闇，三年宅忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148214_comment'></div>俯顺先王之丧纪，重违百辟之勤求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148214_comment'></div>于是延英入閤，端冕凝旒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148214_comment'></div>钧台锡宴，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>拊石</span>鸣球。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148214_comment'></div>天地同和，睹来庭之凤舞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148214_comment'></div>君臣相遇，歌在藻之鱼游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148214_comment'></div>惟圣克念，惟皇聿修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148214_comment'></div>方欲生擒颉利，血灭蚩尤，辑大勋而光祖考，练武经而平寇雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148214_comment'></div>以为天生五材，孰能去其兵革；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148214_comment'></div>武有七德，予将整乃戈矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148214_comment'></div>时也，鹰隼击，虹蜺收，陨箨飞乎原隰，嘉禾敛乎田畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148214_comment'></div>因农隙而顺时令，数军实而修戎政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148214_comment'></div>野庐设次，甸师奔命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148214_comment'></div>御幄立而天开，教场平而霜劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148214_comment'></div>雷动风行，千骑万乘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>于以</span>威八荒，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>于以</span>安百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148214_comment'></div>师出以律，我所以表严壮之称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148214_comment'></div>器不示人，我所以执征伐之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148214_comment'></div>乃幸近甸，出重城，天步顺动，帝车启行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148214_comment'></div>申军令于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>偃草</span>，揭灵旗于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>画荆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148214_comment'></div>赳赳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>洸洸</span>，卫社之将帅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148214_comment'></div>皇皇济济，扈跸之公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148214_comment'></div>从龙云合，捧日霞生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148214_comment'></div>卤簿前驱，案礼文而不忒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148214_comment'></div>招摇在上，法天象而有程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148214_comment'></div>肃肃戈戟，镗镗鼓钲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148214_comment'></div>期门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>佽飞</span>，云蒸而鳞萃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148214_comment'></div>材官骑士，岳立而山横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148214_comment'></div>旌旗衣服，文物声明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148214_comment'></div>列羽林之仗，空细柳之营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148214_comment'></div>钖鸾和铃，铿天籁于晓吹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148214_comment'></div>枪棓锋盾，戢星芒于太清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148214_comment'></div>皇帝乃降步辇，升帐殿，明誓六师，诞修一战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148214_comment'></div>法武侯之阵，示以纵横；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148214_comment'></div>按风后之图，亲加训练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148214_comment'></div>出游兵以定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>两端</span>，握<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>奇数</span>而制四面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148214_comment'></div>摇乾荡坤，飞霆走电。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148214_comment'></div>八尾四头，千化万变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148214_comment'></div>开阖舒卷，若常山之蛇蟠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148214_comment'></div>沸渭喧阗，如沧海之鳌抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148214_comment'></div>则有超乘贾勇，戏车为郎，挟辀射戟，挽强蹶张，剑倚青汉，戈挥太阳，可以越巨壑，踏昆岗，气压乎北方之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148214_comment'></div>又若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>屈产</span>新羁，渥洼逸驾，汗血兰筋，腾霜照夜，师子花狞，胡孙色赭，可以走高山，突平野，势吞乎南牧之马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148214_comment'></div>莫不虓若虎貔，猛如熊罴，鏖兵神速，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>彍骑</span>飙驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148214_comment'></div>前御其前，必参长而补短；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1148214_comment'></div>阵间容阵，亦雁行而鱼丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1148214_comment'></div>疾徐有节，动静有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1148214_comment'></div>无穷如天地之运转，不竭如江汉之渺㳽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1148214_comment'></div>没而复出如两曜，尽而复生如四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1148214_comment'></div>同子弟之亲父兄，急难相救；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1148214_comment'></div>若手足之捍头目，斯须不离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1148214_comment'></div>屹屹然立不败之地，堂堂乎成无敌之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1148214_comment'></div>以虞待不虞，则祸乱息矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1148214_comment'></div>治多如治寡，则进退随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1148214_comment'></div>所谓有备无患，居安虑危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1148214_comment'></div>保宁宗社，震詟蛮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1148214_comment'></div>畅皇威于禹画，生兑悦于尧眉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1148214_comment'></div>夫如是，岐阳大蒐，安能窃比？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1148214_comment'></div>骊山讲武，不足称奇！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1148214_comment'></div>以此攻城，何城不克！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1148214_comment'></div>以此平戎，何戎不北！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1148214_comment'></div>兵虽示乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/164/Comments/0")'>服习</span>，战必分其曲直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1148214_comment'></div>周武桓桓之众，尚以仁而伐不仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1148214_comment'></div>汉高将将之材，固斗智而不斗力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1148214_comment'></div>既而皇欢洽，白日斜，还北阙，御车华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1148214_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1148214", id='poem_sentence_74_1148214_comment'></div>赐奉国契丹之印，永属皇家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1148214_comment'></div>帝庸作歌曰：「顺时狝狩，安边御寇，扬我武兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1148214_comment'></div>师人辑睦，军阵习熟，威丑虏兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1148214_comment'></div>不教而战，秪取败兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1148214_comment'></div>不戢自焚，予深戒兮」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1148214_comment'></div>近臣再拜而赓歌曰：「秋大阅兮威穷边，兵力锐兮人心坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1148214_comment'></div>封狼居兮禅姑衍，抵瀚海兮登燕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1148214_comment'></div>俾遁逃兮无地，咸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1148214", 1148214, "Clauses/201/Comments/0")'>扶服</span>兮朝天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1148214_comment'></div>无外之化兮被率土，升中之礼兮告上玄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1148214_comment'></div>然后飞英声，介景福，亿万斯年」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1148214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年11月</a>　在黄州任知州。朝廷祀天地于圜丘，大赦天下，特授禹称上柱国之勋官。作品：《谢加上柱国表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月下旬作。）</span><div id='poem_1148309' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148309' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148309?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢加上柱国表</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1148309_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148309'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148309'>臣某言：今月二十日，进奏院递到官诰一通、敕牒一道，伏蒙圣慈，特授臣上柱国，馀如故，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148309_comment'></div>礼成大祀，泽霈具寮，岂期谪宦之臣，亦预策勋之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148309_comment'></div>伏念臣因缘薄技，遭遇昌辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148309_comment'></div>承明四入于直庐，才非润色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148309_comment'></div>淮甸三移于郡印，政昧循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148309_comment'></div>方俟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148309", 1148309, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>黜幽</span>，敢期受宠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148309_comment'></div>今者伏遇皇帝陛下躬修禋祀，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148309", 1148309, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>严配</span>祖宗，率由旧章，大赉群后，遂令郎吏，亦厕勋官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148309_comment'></div>八柱之名，实叨于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148309", 1148309, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>茂渥</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148309_comment'></div>一麾之任，有耀于专城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148309_comment'></div>誓将冰檗之心，上答云天之施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148309_comment'></div>无任感天荷圣，激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1148309_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年1月</a>　在黄州任知州。有赋。作品：《三黜赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（春间作。）</span><div id='poem_1148215' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148215' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148215?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三黜赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148215")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148215_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148215'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148215'>一生几日，八年三黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148215_comment'></div>始贬商于，亲老且疾，儿未免乳，呱呱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148215", 1148215, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>拥树</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148215_comment'></div>六百里之穷山，唯毒蛇与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148215", 1148215, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>贙虎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148215_comment'></div>历二稔而生还，幸举族而无苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148215_comment'></div>再谪滁上，吾亲已丧，几筵未收，旅榇未葬，泣血就路，痛彼苍兮安仰？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148215_comment'></div>移郡印于淮海，信靡盬而鞅掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148215_comment'></div>旋号赴于国哀，亦事居而送往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148215_comment'></div>叨四入于掖垣，何宠禄之便蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148215_comment'></div>今去齐安，发白目昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148215_comment'></div>吾子有孙，始笑未言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148215_comment'></div>去无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148215", 1148215, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>骑乘</span>，留无田园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148215_comment'></div>羝羊触藩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148215", 1148215, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>老鹤乘轩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148215_comment'></div>不我知者，犹谓乎郎官贵而郡守尊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148215_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148215_comment'></div>令尹无愠，吾之所师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148215_comment'></div>下惠不耻，吾其庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148215_comment'></div>卞和之刖，吾乃完肌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148215_comment'></div>曹沫之败，吾非舆尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148215_comment'></div>缄金人之口，复白圭之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148215_comment'></div>细不宥兮过可补，思而行兮悔可追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148215_comment'></div>慕康侯之昼接兮，茍无所施，徒锡马而胡为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148215_comment'></div>效仲尼之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1148215", 1148215, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>日省</span>兮，茍无所为，虽叹凤而奚悲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148215_comment'></div>夫如是，屈于身兮不屈其道，任百谪而何亏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148215_comment'></div>吾当守正直兮佩仁义，期终身以行之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1148215_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年12月</a>　在黄州任知州。真宗车暂幸河北，禹称为此事上《起居表》<div id='poem_1148311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>起居表</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148311")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148311_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148311'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148311'>臣某言：今月二十五日，进奏院递到御札一道，皇帝陛下取今月五日暂幸河北者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148311_comment'></div>黠虏猖狂，圣人顺动，伫歼凶丑，永息祅氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148311_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下缵嗣鸿图，忧勤庶政，戢神武以不杀，用人文而化成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148311_comment'></div>蠢尔契丹，敢干天纪，陵越堡障，惊搔吏民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148311_comment'></div>王师已振于捷音，帝命尚劳于巡幸，契百姓来苏之望，是六师贾勇之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148311_comment'></div>以镒秤铢，移山压卵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148311_comment'></div>即日荡平蕃部，更无南牧之人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148311_comment'></div>守吠塞垣，愿作北门之狗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148311_comment'></div>在兹一举，永服四夷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148311_comment'></div>方属祁寒，暂劳天步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148311_comment'></div>臣以任居僻郡，地远行朝，捍牧圉以无由，仰云天而积恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148311_comment'></div>臣无任瞻天望圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1148311_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年</a>　在黄州任知州。有记。作品：《黄州重修文宣王庙壁记》<div id='poem_1148485' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148485' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148485?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄州重修文宣王庙壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148485")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148485_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148485'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148485'>世之有人以儒为戏者，谓文宣王庙慎不可修，修之必起讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148485_comment'></div>复有郡县长吏，奸赃自污，畏懦不治而获罪者，适以修庙时契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148485_comment'></div>由是中人以下谓信然也，故庙貌益毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148485_comment'></div>黄州文宣王庙旧殿三间，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148485", 1148485, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>阽危</span>不可入，以十数柱扶持之，犹惧其颠覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148485_comment'></div>以至迁像设于门庑之下，拆之则瓦木朽解，十不存一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148485_comment'></div>前知州、国子虞博士，廉勤之吏也，率同僚属官洎郡之缝掖者，得数十千，市木于山，桴江而下，屡为风涛漂泊，材植仅有至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148485_comment'></div>未几，坐度僧过限，又坐纳盐不如法，连被制劾，非时受代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148485_comment'></div>留郡听命者百馀日，穷窘不得去，或以为修庙起讼不诬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148485_comment'></div>某自西掖谪守是郡，睹其事，叹曰：「先师若是凶邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148485_comment'></div>吾将试焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148485_comment'></div>因其旧赀，鸠工揆日，命左都押衙丁文璲督其役，月馀而殿成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148485_comment'></div>素王十哲，咸新其像，䌽绘金碧，焕乎有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148485_comment'></div>又取上都国学赞文，请从事曾硕书之，刊石镂板，置于神座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148485_comment'></div>俾夫春秋释奠，有所瞻仰，塞戏儒之口，刷先圣之耻，亦无愧孔门之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148485_comment'></div>至述先师之道，则孟轲所谓「生人以来，未有如夫子者」，其功不在舜禹下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148485_comment'></div>韩吏部曰：「天下通祀者三，唯社、稷与夫子庙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148485_comment'></div>某敢轻议哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148485_comment'></div>故予书修建之由而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148485_comment'></div>时大宋咸平二年月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148485_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=999')">999年</a>　在黄州任知州。有序。作品：《孟水部诗集序》<div id='poem_1148446' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148446' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148446?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孟水部诗集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148446")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148446_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148446'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148446'>余总角之岁，就学于乡先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148446_comment'></div>授经之外，日讽律诗一章，其中有绝句云：「那堪雨后更闻蝉，信绝重湖路七千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148446_comment'></div>忆昔故园杨柳岸，全家送上渡头船」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148446_comment'></div>余固未知谁氏之诗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148446_comment'></div>及长，闻此句大播人口，询于时辈，则曰江南孟水部诗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148446_comment'></div>游宦已来，求其全集，卒不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148446_comment'></div>咸平己亥岁，余自西掖出领齐安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148446_comment'></div>未几，诏除太子中舍孟唐为黄州司马，访其氏族，即水部之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148446_comment'></div>因捧其家集，且请为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148446_comment'></div>水部讳宾于，字某，生于连州，其先太原人，故其诗云：「吾祖并州隔万山，吾家多难谪郴连」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148446_comment'></div>幼擅诗名，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148446", 1148446, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>吟味</span>忘倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148446_comment'></div>后唐长兴末，渡江赴举，岐帅李秦王曮馆于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148446_comment'></div>晋相和鲁公凝、礼部王尚书易简、翰林承旨李学士慎仪、刑部李侍郎详咸推荐之，由是诗名籍甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148446_comment'></div>游举场十年，故有「十载恋明主」之什，凡八章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148446_comment'></div>五上登第，故诗云：「两京游寺曾题榜，五举逢知始看花」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148446_comment'></div>晋天福甲辰岁，礼部符侍郎蒙，门人也，寻以拜庆就养，归于长沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148446_comment'></div>当马氏专据湖湘，大开幕府，遂以宾席縻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148446_comment'></div>俄出为永州军事判官，历阳山县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148446_comment'></div>汉乾祐末，马希广兄弟阋墙，寻戈不已，江南李氏命边镐为将，以兵陷湖南，尽俘马氏之族于建康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148446_comment'></div>水部遇乱无依，携光启年县印归于金陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148446_comment'></div>李氏方僭称唐，得之甚喜，故有水曹朱绂之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148446_comment'></div>顷之，辞归玉笥山，著道士衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148446_comment'></div>吉州高使君奏为郡倅，不得已用冠褐就职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148446_comment'></div>旋归旧隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148446_comment'></div>是时江左士大夫若昌黎韩熙载、东海徐铉甚重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148446_comment'></div>会高越以江南命使回岭表，访其所居，同舟而出，强起为丰城令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148446_comment'></div>既而引去，嬉游吟啸者二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148446_comment'></div>老求致仕，得本曹郎中，分司南都，服章金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148446_comment'></div>太祖平吴，以老病不任朝谒，听还故里，后以令终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148446_comment'></div>有《金鳌集》者，应举时诗也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148446_comment'></div>《湘东集》者，马氏幕府诗也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148446_comment'></div>《金陵集》者，李氏诗也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148446_comment'></div>《玉笥集》者，吉州诗也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148446_comment'></div>《剑池集》者，丰城诗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148446_comment'></div>总五百五首，今合为一集，以官为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148446_comment'></div>盖古之诗人，多求水部，何逊、张籍是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148446_comment'></div>唐之诗流，多出孟氏，浩然、东野是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148446_comment'></div>况姓氏官纪萃于一家，又其没后二十馀年，得余为序，足以振令名而雪遗恨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148446_comment'></div>至于雅澹之体，警策之句，知诗者开卷可见矣，此不复云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1148446_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=999&endYear=1000')">999-1000年</a>　在黄州任知州。有诗。作品：《瑞莲歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（或作于明年。）</span>《月波楼咏怀》<div id='poem_75159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瑞莲歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（999年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75159")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75159'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75159'>江城五月江雨晴，荷花到处红交横。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75159'>宋家池上瑞莲生，袅袅出丛抽一茎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75159'>茎端菡萏开两朵，忽似娥皇将女英。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75159'>九疑望断苍梧暮，低头并照湘波清。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75159'>花落莲成碧于卵，瑟瑟尘轻熨人眼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75159'>萧郎弄玉合卺时，一齐覆下琉璃盏。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75159'>草木效灵载图史，守臣尽可闻天子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75159'>吾君有诏抑祥瑞，异兽珍禽不为贵。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75159'>瑞莲无路达冕旒，也随众卉老池头。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75159'>吏民归美贺郡守，敢贪天功为己有。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75159'>古来善政数杜诗，桑无附枝麦两歧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75159'>瑞莲信美产兹土，起予谩作闲歌辞。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75159'>年年更愿再熟稻，仓箱免使吾民饥。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75159'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_75159_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_75079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>月波楼咏怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75079")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75079'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75079'>郡城无大小，雉堞皆有楼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75079'>其间著名者，不过十数州。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75079'>吹箫事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_75079", 75079, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>辽夐</span>，仙迹难寻求。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75079'>庾公在九江，缔构何风流。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75079'>谢守镇宣城，叠嶂名有由。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75079'>东阳敞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>八咏，吾闻沈隐侯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75079'>白雪架郢中，调高难和酬。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75079'>黄鹤倚鄂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>渚，仙去事悠悠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75079'>赞皇谪滁上，作赋怀嵩丘。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75079'>楼居出俗态，泽国多胜游。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75079'>好景不遇人，安得名存留。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75079'>齐安古郡废，移此清江头。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75079'>筑城随山势，屈曲复环周。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75079'>兹楼最<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_75079", 75079, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>轩豁</span>，旷望西北陬。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75079'>武昌地如掌，天末入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_75079", 75079, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>双眸</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75079'>平远无林木，一望同<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_17_75079'>三国事既远，六朝名亦休。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75079'>近从唐末来，争夺互仇雠。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75079'>斯楼备矢石，此地控咽喉。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75079'>终朝望烽燧，连岁事戈矛。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75079'>可怜好诗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>景，牢落无人收。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75079'>皇家统万国，远迩尽怀柔。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75079'>三圣四十年，荡荡文德修。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75079'>淮甸为内地，黄冈压上游。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75079'>儒冠假郡印，践更若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_75079", 75079, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>公邮</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75079'>况多办职吏，谁肯恣吟讴。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75079'>伊余何为者，窃慕骚人俦。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75079'>两朝掌文翰，十年侍冕旒。<div id='poem_sentence_28_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_75079'>何人名月波，此义颇为优。<div id='poem_sentence_31_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_75079'>西南新桂魄，初上悬玉钩。<div id='poem_sentence_32_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_75079'>晓濑清且浅，漂荡影沉浮。<div
