id='poem_sentence_40_75079'>此景吟不出，谩使声呦呦。<div id='poem_sentence_40_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_75079'>千里画图阔，四时诗兴幽。<div id='poem_sentence_41_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_75079'>野花媚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_75079", 75079, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>宫缬</span>，芳草铺碧䌷<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作油，据赵本、经锄堂本改）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_42_75079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>　在黄州任知州。枢密副使宋湜卒于澶州，王禹偁有祭文。作品：《祭宋枢密文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（春间作。）</span><div id='poem_1148544' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148544' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148544?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭宋枢密文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148544")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148544_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148544'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148544'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148544_comment'></div>昔在先朝，命卿赴举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148544_comment'></div>公名籍甚，众推独步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148544_comment'></div>伊予不佞，敢云接武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148544_comment'></div>片善謏闻，亦或许与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148544_comment'></div>公既策名，予果下第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148544_comment'></div>恨不同时，终身负愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148544_comment'></div>其后九年，俱升掖垣，更置锁闼，对掌王言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148544_comment'></div>银艾金紫，渥泽便蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148544_comment'></div>公领秋曹，我司大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148544_comment'></div>执法议刑，以直被毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148544_comment'></div>侧目倖臣，抢头狱吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148544_comment'></div>由我之褊，为公之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148544_comment'></div>谪去周行，商于武当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148544_comment'></div>共嗟悬磬，俱有高堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148544_comment'></div>都门马上，洒涕其滂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148544_comment'></div>徵还馆殿，敛翼徊翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148544_comment'></div>牵复纶阁，重沾宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148544_comment'></div>曾未满岁，齐归玉堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148544_comment'></div>嗟予蹇剥，黜去滁阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148544_comment'></div>三年两郡，奔走靡遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148544_comment'></div>归来相见，家忧国丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148544_comment'></div>拊膺殆绝，触目增伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148544_comment'></div>推毂相授，拔茅尽力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148544_comment'></div>公登内枢，我还西掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148544_comment'></div>又领齐安，曾未煖席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148544_comment'></div>惟公惊怛，为我开释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148544_comment'></div>来访衡门，不虑近职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148544_comment'></div>吾儿作掾，吾家在京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148544_comment'></div>问讯馈饷，见公之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148544_comment'></div>八銮顺动，万务纵横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148544_comment'></div>运筹扈跸，劳心竭精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148544_comment'></div>既神用之无吝，致风恙之内并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148544_comment'></div>扶疾而还，捐馆澶渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148544_comment'></div>恩加等兮死王事，寿知命兮终天年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148544_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148544_comment'></div>谁知昔别，便为永诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148544_comment'></div>燕、许文章，欧、虞笔札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148544_comment'></div>识度清远，行义高洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148544_comment'></div>孝友无伦，谦和有节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148544_comment'></div>惟懿范与清芬，肯谁物而殒绝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148544_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1148544_comment'></div>蛇虺有毒，何享年而不夭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1148544_comment'></div>狐狸无德，何通神而难老？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1148544_comment'></div>淑人君子，胡不寿考？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1148544_comment'></div>黄河之涘，清江之湄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1148544_comment'></div>未脱郡印，遥瞻繐帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1148544_comment'></div>默默千古，悠悠四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1148544_comment'></div>音容寂寞，涕泗涟洏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1148544_comment'></div>写哀诚而一奠，冀神灵予格思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1148544_comment'></div>伏惟尚享！</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1148544_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148544'><span class='label'>按：</span>《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷一三五，清抄一百五十卷本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1148544_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年2月</a>　在黄州任知州。真宗自河北返京城，禹称上表贺之。作品：《贺圣驾还京表》<div id='poem_1148317' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148317' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148317?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺圣驾还京表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148317")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148317_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148317'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148317'>臣某言：今月十六日，进奏院状报，正月二十三日大驾还京者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148317_comment'></div>犬戎逃遁，銮辂凯旋<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148317_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下，奉承祖宗，威怀戎狄，但懋守文之德，靡矜神武之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148317_comment'></div>蕞尔林胡，无名内侮，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148317", 1148317, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>蜂屯乌合</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1148317", 1148317, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>鼠窃狗偷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148317_comment'></div>必想边民夺梃以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148317", 1148317, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>殴攘</span>，亭长持绳而絷缚，岂劳车驾，远涉山川？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148317_comment'></div>陛下念二圣临朝，每经营于河朔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148317_comment'></div>属三时不害，乃巡幸于沙场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148317_comment'></div>存问耆年，劳来疆吏，有征无战，陈诗观风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148317_comment'></div>边人识龙凤之姿，胡马避虎貔之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148317_comment'></div>昔周宣薄伐猃狁，深入太原，汉武斥逐匈奴，遐临瀚海，颇为劳弊，尚著声诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148317_comment'></div>曾未若陛下仰顺天时，俯从人欲，出狩适当于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148317", 1148317, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>冬隙</span>，班师未废于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148317", 1148317, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>农祥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148317_comment'></div>端居紫宸，饮至清庙，谷雨方霈，春华正繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148317_comment'></div>捧觞长乐之宫，锡宴上林之苑，皇欢大洽，天步永安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148317_comment'></div>《易》曰：「圣人以顺动，则刑罚清而民服」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148317_comment'></div>《孙子》曰：「不战而屈人之师，善之善者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148317_comment'></div>其是之谓乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148317_comment'></div>臣方在谪官，无由扈从，既不得草颉利可汗之露布，又不得答冒顿单于之慢书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148317_comment'></div>当文士有为之时，处山州无用之地，迎銮莫遂，望阙弥深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148317_comment'></div>无任歌时乐圣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1148317_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年5月</a>　在黄州任知州。有谢表。作品：《谢宣赐表》<div id='poem_1148310' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148310' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148310?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣赐表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148310")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148310_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148310'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148310'>臣某言：今月八日，进奏院递到宣头一道，伏蒙圣慈，以臣先撰《元德皇太后谥册文》，特赐臣衣著五十疋，银器五十两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148310_comment'></div>礼毕园陵，恩沾论撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148310_comment'></div>伏念臣学惭稽古，才不兼人，际会先朝，忝尘近侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148310_comment'></div>东里子产，累居润色之司；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148310_comment'></div>南面仲弓，继荷分忧之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148310_comment'></div>洎逢缵嗣，复窃掖垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148310_comment'></div>适当议云阳之陵，定昭成之谥，猥承诏命，恭草册文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148310_comment'></div>深虞孤陋寡闻，难当大手笔事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148310_comment'></div>虽经御览，未息<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1148310", 1148310, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>兢惶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148310_comment'></div>今者谥册入陵，神主祔庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148310_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下孝思罔极，兑泽下流，颁厥篚之䌽缯，锡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1148310", 1148310, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>中金</span>之器皿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148310_comment'></div>捧承靡措，蹈舞失容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148310_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148310", 1148310, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>儒冠</span>之荣，无以加此；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148310_comment'></div>孝治之化，足能感人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148310_comment'></div>惟觉冒荣，曷知报效？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148310_comment'></div>臣无任瞻天荷圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1148310_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年7月</a>　在黄州任知州。有记。作品：《江州广宁监记》<div id='poem_1148483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148483?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江州广宁监记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148483")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148483_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148483'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148483'>夫百货所聚，必以一物主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148483_comment'></div>金玉，重宝也，滞于流布；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148483_comment'></div>粟帛，要用也，滥于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148483", 1148483, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>湿薄</span>，权轻重而利交易者，其唯钱乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148483_comment'></div>考诸历代，汉五铢钱于民最便，既坏于王莽，又破于董卓，故鲜有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148483_comment'></div>唐武德中铸开元通宝钱，大行天下，于今赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148483_comment'></div>唐之铸钱，炉冶非一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148483_comment'></div>今钱有「益」字者，成都所铸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148483_comment'></div>有「润」字者，丹阳所铸也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148483_comment'></div>其馀分布郡国，不可具述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148483_comment'></div>然自古铜铅，仰给饶、信，故《史记》言「吴王即山铸钱，诱聚亡命」，又濞云「寡人金钱遍天下者」是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148483_comment'></div>自乾宁而后，杨行密父子兄弟据有江淮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148483_comment'></div>晋天福初，李昪僭号，传子及孙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148483_comment'></div>至皇朝开宝末，凡百岁馀，铸钱之利，不入中国，故开元钱刓缺销毁，时用渐稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148483_comment'></div>太祖平吴，因旧制开监于鄱阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148483_comment'></div>太宗即位，淮海王钱俶入朝，又得杭州钱监，寻以铜锡不充而废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148483_comment'></div>至道二年，某自翰林出守淮甸，调民输炭，自滁抵饶，溯洄江涛，人颇咨怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148483_comment'></div>某即按唐史具炉冶数目、郡国处所，飞奏以闻，请分监署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148483_comment'></div>章未报，会康州刺史杨允恭亦言其事，始分铸于池州，用减淮民数千里汎舟之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148483_comment'></div>圣上嗣统，聿修先旨，以为钱刀之利，军国所先，将使水衡廪牺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148483_comment'></div>贯朽而不可较，琼林大盈，充牣而无虚月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148483_comment'></div>咸平二年夏五月，诏尚书郎冯某、中贵人白某，乘驿而周视南土，自番禺、闽越、吴会、荆蛮，相水土之宜，度舟车之便，设局署吏，大兴鼓铸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148483_comment'></div>于是建阳首焉，浔阳次焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148483_comment'></div>明年，敕江州广宁监，奏以秘书丞、知吉州太和县李某总领之，右班殿直郑某佐佑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148483_comment'></div>监地即榷务之旧址也，湓江带其右，庐阜居其前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148483_comment'></div>度木庀徒，揆日蒇事，肇四月癸亥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148483_comment'></div>终七月己卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148483_comment'></div>曰厅曰院，若库若场，役夫有营，王人有宅，总大小若干间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148483_comment'></div>于是广宁之大壮具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148483_comment'></div>岁铸钱二十万贯，铸钱之费八万八千三百六十贯四百五十五，得实钱一十一万一千六百三十九贯五百四十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148483_comment'></div>其为利也博哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148483_comment'></div>与夫租庸赋调之入，盐铁榷酤之课，相与为表里，资助国用，亦重事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148483_comment'></div>且夫工徒无赖，聚一州而非便，散之则盗心不生矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148483_comment'></div>钱币益多，流四海而不匮，用之则盗铸几息矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148483_comment'></div>非吾皇顺考古道，留心庶政，兴九府之圜法，恢二圣之永图，孰能若斯之速邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148483_comment'></div>资以冯、白之干事，李、郑之办职，上下协力，成兹僝功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148483_comment'></div>将见开蜀郡铜山，革公孙铁币，复汉、唐之旧法，与五铢、开元流于无穷也，岂止江南而已哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148483_comment'></div>咸平三年七月日记。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1148483'></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1148483_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年9月戊子</a>　在黄州任知州。有赋。作品：《罔极赋》<div id='poem_1148216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罔极赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年9月戊子）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148216")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148216'>后周广顺，太岁甲寅，季秋戊子，实生吾身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148216_comment'></div>禀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1148216", 1148216, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>粹和</span>于两仪，荷鞠育于二亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148216_comment'></div>粤自始孩，逮乎成人，求名得名，干禄得禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148216_comment'></div>痛吾母之早终，受君羹而舍肉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148216_comment'></div>丁吾父之大忧，徒倚庐以食粥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148216_comment'></div>被朝恩之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1148216", 1148216, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>抑夺</span>，履人事而悽迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148216_comment'></div>五鼎或来，羡仲由之斗米；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148216_comment'></div>三牲纵具，非茅容之只鸡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148216_comment'></div>岂无兄弟，各怀禄而悽悽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148216_comment'></div>亦有子孙，方嬉戏乎孩提。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148216_comment'></div>冗食兮纪纲之仆，多病兮糟糠之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148216_comment'></div>望松楸以暮泣，履霜露而晨啼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148216_comment'></div>今日何日，家人举爵，祝我寿考，劝我欢乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148216_comment'></div>感<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148216", 1148216, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>悬弧</span>于兹晨，念陟岵而泪落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148216_comment'></div>换斑衣兮纯素，变华颠于总角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148216_comment'></div>孰谓儒者，不如农夫，良田十亩，柔桑百株。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148216_comment'></div>无求于人，身何忧其悔吝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148216_comment'></div>必出于力，养不间乎精粗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148216_comment'></div>父母俱存，缊袍重襦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148216_comment'></div>子弟匪懈，夕耕晓锄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148216_comment'></div>鸡豚掩豆，黍稷盈壶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148216_comment'></div>草堂为寿，其乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1148216", 1148216, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>只且</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148216_comment'></div>嗟乎，吾不得而及也，赋《罔极》而长吁！</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1148216_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年10月21日</a>　在黄州任知州。王禹偁在黄州公署西建成书斋一所，名曰“无愠斋”，并作记一篇。作品：《无愠斋记》<div id='poem_1148486' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148486' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148486?labeling=true' target='_blank'>无愠斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年10月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148486")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148486_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148486'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148486'>古人三仕无喜色，三已之无愠色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148486_comment'></div>某在先朝，自左司谏知制诰，左迁商州团练副使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148486_comment'></div>又自翰林学士出知滁上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148486_comment'></div>今天子即位，自尚书刑部郎中、知制诰，出守齐安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148486_comment'></div>到郡之明年，作书斋于公署之西偏，因徵古义，以「无愠」为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148486_comment'></div>后之人治是郡者，公退之暇，当以琴书诗酒为娱宾之地，有馀力则召高僧道士煮茶炼药可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148486_comment'></div>若易吾斋而为庖厨厩库者，非吾徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148486_comment'></div>三年十月二十一日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1148486_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年10月</a>　在黄州任知州。建成“无愠斋”之后不久，王禹偁又建成寝室一所，名曰“睡足轩”，取杜牧《忆黄州》诗：“平生睡足处，云梦泽南州”之义。作品：《集贤钱（若水）侍郎知大名府序》<div id='poem_1148434' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148434' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148434?labeling=true' target='_blank'>集贤钱侍郎知大名府序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148434")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148434_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148434'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148434'>夫序君臣，明善恶，莫大乎国书，故曰史馆重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148434_comment'></div>备顾问，预宴私，莫亲乎书殿，故曰集贤清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148434_comment'></div>至于天官品藻士流，京尹禁遏豪右，皆古今之通贵，仕宦之夷涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148434_comment'></div>此外，则河朔一方，封疆千里，倚作巨屏，时惟大名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148434_comment'></div>屯期门佽飞之师，捍衽金浴铁之寇，委诸儒士，出自圣谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148434_comment'></div>遍历诸难，才登强仕，考乎前代，未见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148434_comment'></div>公天与才名，时推秀杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148434_comment'></div>策名委质，遇知己之帝王；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148434_comment'></div>言行计从，享逼身之富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148434_comment'></div>心虽易退，望峻具瞻，委是藩宣，即归廊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148434_comment'></div>至如竭家财而飨士，行权道以救民，枉尺直寻，知几识变，谅归雅度，不假謏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148434_comment'></div>伫见刁斗不鸣，沙场载祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148434_comment'></div>卧魏尚云中之鼓，狂虏不侵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148434_comment'></div>对谢安淮上之棋，捷书自至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148434_comment'></div>王师载戢，儒将独高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148434_comment'></div>无功不酬，降爰立之命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148434_comment'></div>当仁不让，居代天之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148434_comment'></div>某空遇昌辰，坐成弃物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148434_comment'></div>黄金台上，此时莫厕于嘉宾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148434_comment'></div>绿野堂中，他日或容于逋客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148434_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1148434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148434'><span class='label'>按：</span>《永乐大典》卷一○九九九。又见《小畜外集》卷一三（仅存前四十四字）。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1148434_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年10月20日</a>　在黄州任知州。黄州甚寒，始有冰，禹称作古诗一首记之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年10月</a>　在黄州任知州。王禹偁上疏言事，真宗亟命中使乘驿劳问，醮禳之。作品：《上真宗论黄州虎斗鸡鸣冬雷之异疏》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年11月</a>　在黄州任知州。有贺表。作品：《贺收复益州表》<div id='poem_1148312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺收复益州表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148312")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148312'>臣某言：今月日，进奏院状报，雷有终奏收复益州者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148312_comment'></div>臣当时集官吏望阙称贺，并告谕诸县讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148312_comment'></div>守臣不武，戍卒弄兵，暂出偏师，果平<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1148312", 1148312, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>孤垒</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148312_comment'></div>臣伏观益部，久乐皇风，蕞尔王均，敢萌逆节，盖灾流于分野，致盗据于城池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148312_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下断在睿谟，擢兹儒将，虽依九伐之法，特开三面之罗，尚敢婴城，斯为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1148312", 1148312, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>迷复</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148312_comment'></div>惧困兽犹斗之义，徵围兵必阙之文，纵以遁逃，自今糜溃，尽由圣略，永净坤维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148312_comment'></div>臣任忝颁条，欣闻捷奏，无任歌时乐圣、欢呼蹈舞之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1148312_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年12月</a>　在黄州任知州。濮州有贼夜入城，略知州王守信、监军王昭度家，王禹偁闻之，遂上书言事。作品：《上真宗乞江湖诸郡置本城守捉兵疏》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年12月30日</a>　在黄州任知州。王禹偁出守黄州后，即着手编次平生所为文。今年十二月，编成三十卷，名曰《小畜集》，自为序。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>　在黄州任知州。王禹偁为僧赞宁文集撰序。作品：《左街僧录通慧大师文集序》<div id='poem_1148445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>左街僧录通惠大师文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148445")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148445'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148445'>释子谓佛书为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1148445", 1148445, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>内典</span>，谓儒书为外学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148445_comment'></div>工诗则众，工文则鲜，并是四者，其惟大师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148445_comment'></div>大师世姓高氏，法名赞宁，其先渤海人，隋末徙居吴兴郡之德清县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148445_comment'></div>祖琄、考审，皆隐德不仕，母周氏，以唐天祐十六年，岁在己卯，某月某日，生大师于金鹉山别墅，时梁贞明五年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148445_comment'></div>武肃王钱某专制江浙，后唐天成中出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148445_comment'></div>清泰初，入天台山受具足戒，习四分律，通南山律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148445_comment'></div>长兴三年，武肃薨，文穆王讳嗣位，大师声望日隆，文学益茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148445_comment'></div>时钱氏公族有若忠懿王讳、宣德节度偡、奉国节度使亿、越州刺史仪、金州观察使俨、故工部侍郎昱，与大师以文义切磋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148445_comment'></div>时浙中士大夫有若卫尉卿崔仁冀、工部侍郎慎知礼、内侍致仕杨恽，与大师以诗什唱和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148445_comment'></div>又得文格于光文大师汇征，受诗诀于前进士龚霖，由是大为流辈所服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148445_comment'></div>时钱塘名僧有若契凝者，通名数一支，谓之「论虎」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148445_comment'></div>常从义者，文章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1148445", 1148445, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>俊捷</span>，谓之「文虎」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148445_comment'></div>大师多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1148445", 1148445, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>毗尼</span>著述，谓之「律虎」，故时称四虎焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148445_comment'></div>署本国监坛，又为两浙僧统，历数十年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1148445", 1148445, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>像法</span>修明，缁徒整戢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148445_comment'></div>太平兴国三年，忠懿王携版图归国，大师奉真身舍利塔入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148445_comment'></div>太宗素闻其名，召对滋福殿，延问弥日，别赐紫方袍，寻改师号曰通惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148445_comment'></div>故相卢朱崖，深加礼重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148445_comment'></div>参知政事李穆，儒学之外，善谈名理，事大师尤为恭谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148445_comment'></div>八年，诏修《大宋高僧传》，听归杭州旧寺，成三十卷，进御之日，玺书褒美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148445_comment'></div>居无何，徵归京师，住天寿寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148445_comment'></div>参知政事苏易简奉诏撰《三教圣贤事迹》，奏大师与太一宫道士韩德纯分领其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148445_comment'></div>大师著《鹫岭圣贤录》，又集《圣贤事迹》凡一百卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148445_comment'></div>制署左街讲经首座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148445_comment'></div>至道元年，知西京教门事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148445_comment'></div>今上咸平元年，诏充右街僧录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148445_comment'></div>先是，故相文贞公悬车之明年，年七十一，思继白少傅九老之会，得旧相吏部尚书宋琪，年七十九；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148445_comment'></div>左谏议大夫杨徽之，年七十五；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148445_comment'></div>郢州刺史、判金吾街仗事魏丕，年七十六；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148445_comment'></div>太常少卿致仕李运，年八十；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148445_comment'></div>水部郎中、直秘阁朱昂，年七十一；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148445_comment'></div>庐州节度副使武允成，年七十九；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148445_comment'></div>太子中允致仕张好问，年八十五；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1148445_comment'></div>大师时年七十八，凡九人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1148445_comment'></div>文贞公将宴于家园，形于绘事，以声诗流咏播于无穷，会蜀寇作乱，朝廷出师，不果而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1148445_comment'></div>今九老之中李、宋、杨、魏、张已先逝矣，大师年八十二，视听不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1148445_comment'></div>于本国，历武肃、文穆、废王、忠懿凡四世，于朝历梁两帝，后唐庄宗、应顺、清泰，晋高祖、少帝、汉高祖、隐帝，周太祖、世宗、梁王，我太祖英武圣文神德皇帝，我太宗神功圣德文武皇帝，通今上凡十五朝，而能受《洪范》向用之福，处浮图具瞻之地，岂所谓必得其寿，必得其位者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1148445_comment'></div>大师以述作颇多，叙引未立，猥蒙见托，不克固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1148445_comment'></div>总其篇题，具如别录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1148445_comment'></div>凡《<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1148445", 1148445, "Clauses/130/Comments/4")'>内典</span>集》一百五十二卷、《外学集》四十九卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1148445_comment'></div>览其文，知其道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1148445_comment'></div>因徵其世家行事，备而书之，使后之传高僧、铭塔庙者，于兹取信云<span class='inlineComment2'>（《小畜集》卷二○。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1148445_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1148445'>此所举仅三虎，或脱一虎，或「四」为「三」之误。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1148445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>　在黄州任知州。有记。作品：《潭州岳麓山书院记》<div id='poem_1148484' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148484' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148484?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州岳麓山书院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148484")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148484_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148484'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148484'>三代而下，两汉称理，次叙循吏，彰示后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148484_comment'></div>西京首述文翁，《东观》先书卫飒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148484_comment'></div>观其理蜀郡、教桂阳，率以庠序为先，夷落自化，是知学校政之本欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148484_comment'></div>崇文广武圣明仁孝皇帝嗣位之明年，诏以供备库副使陇西公知武安军府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148484_comment'></div>公自以当不次之用，临至剧之郡，思树殊迹，以答奇遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148484_comment'></div>下车布政，比屋允怀，参考吏能，寻绎民病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148484_comment'></div>狱讼纷紊，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1148484", 1148484, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>决剔</span>无留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148484_comment'></div>米盐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1148484", 1148484, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>靡密</span>，推行不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148484_comment'></div>属岁非大有，人用阻饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148484_comment'></div>减估发仓，茕嫠无告者得安其业；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148484_comment'></div>募兵置籍，强梁亡赖者悉拘于军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148484_comment'></div>千里耕桑，涸辙得水，七州兵甲，走丸在槃，有废必兴，无政不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148484_comment'></div>初，开宝中，尚书郎朱洞典长沙，左拾遗孙逢吉通理郡事，于岳麓山抱黄洞下肇启书院，广延学徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148484_comment'></div>二公罢归，累政不嗣，诸生逃解，六籍散亡，弦歌绝音，俎豆无睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148484_comment'></div>公询问黄发，尽获故书，诱导青衿，肯构旧址。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148484_comment'></div>外敞门屋，中开讲堂，揭以书楼，序以客次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148484_comment'></div>塑先师、十哲之像，画七十二贤，华衮珠旒，缝掖章甫，毕按旧制，俨然如生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148484_comment'></div>请辟水田，供春秋之释奠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148484_comment'></div>奏颁文疏，备生徒之肄业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148484_comment'></div>使里人有必葺之志，学者无将落之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148484_comment'></div>谁谓潇湘，兹为洙泗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1148484_comment'></div>谁谓荆蛮，兹为邹鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1148484_comment'></div>人存政举，岂系古今；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1148484_comment'></div>导德齐礼，自知耻格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1148484_comment'></div>先是，公之先公好儒术，通《春秋》，刺济州日，命乡之荐不减百人，宴以嘉宾之诗，遣以计吏之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1148484_comment'></div>举进士者，钱五万，袭衣以副之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1148484_comment'></div>应学科者，钱三千，绨袍以遗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1148484_comment'></div>咸出己俸，人以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1148484_comment'></div>故其子孙不忘儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1148484_comment'></div>某占籍济上，出职禁中，直承明之庐，已叨三入，开缑氏之学，将谈六经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1148484_comment'></div>托以斯文，拙于叙事，聊书兴废，用纪岁时而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1148484_comment'></div>大宋咸平三年某月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1148484_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>　在黄州任知州。为钱若水知大名府作序。作品：《集贤钱（若水）侍郎知大名府序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（当撰于秋冬间。）</span><div id='poem_1148434' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148434' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148434?labeling=true' target='_blank'>集贤钱侍郎知大名府序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148434")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148434_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148434'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148434'>夫序君臣，明善恶，莫大乎国书，故曰史馆重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148434_comment'></div>备顾问，预宴私，莫亲乎书殿，故曰集贤清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148434_comment'></div>至于天官品藻士流，京尹禁遏豪右，皆古今之通贵，仕宦之夷涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148434_comment'></div>此外，则河朔一方，封疆千里，倚作巨屏，时惟大名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148434_comment'></div>屯期门佽飞之师，捍衽金浴铁之寇，委诸儒士，出自圣谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148434_comment'></div>遍历诸难，才登强仕，考乎前代，未见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148434_comment'></div>公天与才名，时推秀杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148434_comment'></div>策名委质，遇知己之帝王；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1148434_comment'></div>言行计从，享逼身之富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1148434_comment'></div>心虽易退，望峻具瞻，委是藩宣，即归廊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1148434_comment'></div>至如竭家财而飨士，行权道以救民，枉尺直寻，知几识变，谅归雅度，不假謏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1148434_comment'></div>伫见刁斗不鸣，沙场载祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1148434_comment'></div>卧魏尚云中之鼓，狂虏不侵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1148434_comment'></div>对谢安淮上之棋，捷书自至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1148434_comment'></div>王师载戢，儒将独高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1148434_comment'></div>无功不酬，降爰立之命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1148434_comment'></div>当仁不让，居代天之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1148434_comment'></div>某空遇昌辰，坐成弃物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1148434_comment'></div>黄金台上，此时莫厕于嘉宾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1148434_comment'></div>绿野堂中，他日或容于逋客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1148434_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1148434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1148434'><span class='label'>按：</span>《永乐大典》卷一○九九九。又见《小畜外集》卷一三（仅存前四十四字）。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1148434_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>　在黄州任知州。有铭文。作品：《瘤樽铭》<div id='poem_1148503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1148503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1148503?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瘤樽铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_1148503")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1148503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1148503'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1148503'>男嘉祐于麻城山中取到，受一斗七升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1148503_comment'></div>以其欹侧，作交床以承之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1148503_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1148503'>老树蟠樛，突如蛟虬，旁生赘瘤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1148503_comment'></div>吾儿好古，爰命斤斧，致之予所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1148503_comment'></div>不雕不镌，匪方匪圆，贵其天然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1148503_comment'></div>鲸呀虎蹲，白臼如盆，命为瘤樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1148503_comment'></div>溪侧山阿，覆之新荷，非象非牺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1148503_comment'></div>挹以长杓，自斟自酌，用全吾朴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1148503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>　在黄州任知州。有诗。作品：《总诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（春间作。）</span>《筵上狂歌，送侍棋衣袄天使》《江豚歌》<div id='poem_75150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>筵上狂歌送侍棋衣袄天使</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75150")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75150'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75150'>昔事先皇叨近侍，北门西掖清华地。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75150'>太宗多材复多艺，万机馀暇翻棋势。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75150'>对面千里为第一，独飞天蛾为第二。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75150'>第三海底取明珠，三阵堂堂皆御制。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75150'>中使宣来示近臣，天机秘密通鬼神。<div id='poem_sentence_4_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_75150'>乃知棋法同军法，既诫贪心又嫌怯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_75150'>唯宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_75150", 75150, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>静胜</span>守封疆，不乐穷兵用戈甲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_75150'>先皇三势有深旨，岂独一枰而已矣。<div id='poem_sentence_7_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_75150'>当时受赐感君恩，藏于箧笥传子孙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_75150'>至道年中出滁上，失脚青云空怅望。<div id='poem_sentence_9_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_75150'>移典维扬日望还，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_75150", 75150, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>轩辕鼎</span>成飞上天。<div id='poem_sentence_10_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_75150'>龙髯忽断攀不得，旧朝衣上泪潺湲。<div id='poem_sentence_11_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_75150'>吾皇曲念先朝物，徵归再掌西垣笔。<div id='poem_sentence_12_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_75150'>悲凉忽见红药开，哭临空随梓宫出。<div id='poem_sentence_13_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_75150'>去年领郡得齐安，山州僻陋在江干。<div id='poem_sentence_14_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_75150'>黄民谁识旧学士，白头犹作老郎官。<div id='poem_sentence_15_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_75150'>昨日江边天使到，随例沾恩著衣袄。<div id='poem_sentence_16_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_75150'>皇华本是江南客，久侍先皇对棋弈。<div id='poem_sentence_17_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_75150'>筵中偶说当年事，三势分明皆记得。<div id='poem_sentence_18_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_75150'>我从失职别上台，御书深锁不将来。<div id='poem_sentence_19_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_75150'>遥想棋图在私室，天香散尽空尘埃。<div id='poem_sentence_20_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_75150'>今日因君聊话及，翻作停杯向隅泣。<div id='poem_sentence_21_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_75150'>人生不易逢圣朝，君恩未报双鬓凋。<div id='poem_sentence_22_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_75150'>金銮殿花春灼灼，永熙陵树夜萧萧。<div id='poem_sentence_23_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_75150'>空叹拖肠在泥土，不如舐鼎升烟霄。<div id='poem_sentence_24_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_75150'>多病相如犹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>未死，追思往事欲魂销。<div id='poem_sentence_25_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_75150'>星使今辰回马首，强对离筵满倾酒。<div id='poem_sentence_26_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_75150'>悲歌一曲从事书，唱与朝中旧知友。<div id='poem_sentence_27_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_75150'></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_75150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75150'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_75150_0'>⑴ 原作由，据孙本、赵本、经锄堂本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75150_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_75095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_75095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/75095?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江豚歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（1000年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(29711, "北宋", "王禹偁", "poem_title_75095")'>王禹偁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_75095_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_75095'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_75095'>江豚江豚尔何物，吐浪喷波身突兀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_75095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_75095'>依凭风水恣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_75095", 75095, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>豩豪</span>，吞啖鱼虾颇肥腯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_75095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_75095'>肉腥骨硬难登俎，虽有网罗嫌不取。<div id='poem_sentence_2_75095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_75095'>江云漠漠江雨来，天意为霖不干<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>汝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_75095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_75095'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_75095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_75095'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上《小畜集》卷一三<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_75095_0'>⑴ 原作忓，据四库本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_75095_1'>⑵ 自注：俗云豚出则有风雨。（注原缺，据经锄堂本补）</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_75095_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
蕲春
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ac7660ba3f874b61ae808cb37090af4a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ac7660ba3f874b61ae808cb37090af4a");'><span id='ac7660ba3f874b61ae808cb37090af4a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1001&endYear=1001')">1001年</a>，48岁</div><div id='ac7660ba3f874b61ae808cb37090af4a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1001&endYear=1001')">1001年</a>　春，王禹偁奉命移知蕲州。时已疾甚，肩舆上道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1001&endYear=1001')">1001年4月</a>　禹称到蕲州任，有谢上表。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1001&endYear=1001')">1001年5月17日</a>　王禹偁卒于蕲州，年48，临终撰有遗表。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1001&endYear=1001')">1001年6月18日</a>　真宗闻讣告，甚嗟悼之，厚赙其家，赐一子出身，赠禹称礼部尚书。禹称墓在巨野县境。<br /></div>
-----end
